title: SunTea 新作の茶 Ackroyd

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Javen Kay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoUSR-retmDaLP5Jg3xQCy8bsN49n3Y4bmHUv6t1vWUqWT5Kiw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had the Taro milk tea at SunTea and it was great! The pearls weren't too mushy as I've had it at some other stores. The restaurant had a good vibe. When we arrived later at night, there wasn't much seating so that was probably the only downside. Otherwise, great bubble tea!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqlugPDz9MRybqzj_z-NkUlHc2OFUUHmNVZXws&fid=0x0:0xbb89421a3783015a"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"P C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLEgCH5sf2bCDDdK_-HE7At1EtaSxoC_FLoNPoTdEWpFYj_jjfX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This may be the best bubble tea I’ve ever had. We had to wait a little bit and the cashier seemed to struggle a bit with English. However, it seemed the manager who is helping her was a bit better and our orders were accurate and delicious. The fact that they have a sugar-free option is a huge plus. we will stop on the way back home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRjc7V3CdlKvwQCQW6exxoMMnyxS8akaXWgHLj&fid=0x0:0xbb89421a3783015a"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Bibi Smth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuaNJvP6CZ7viJ_-CmnIWfN0Wy3jd4uONhuCGHj8G0CFvIFmEq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I got the mango tea with sago. It was pretty good but I wish there was a 30% sugar level because I still found 50% a bit sweet.
I had never been here before so I asked ONE question about popular choices and received a snappy response (there was no other customer in there at the time).

3.5 stars for the whole experience but rounded to 4 because I’m sure the drinks can be good if you’re familiar with their menu.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elmira Nazari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS8psOPde-fgvVYsglTVKj-j9hpNdB1347mGr_T9d11yAStREO4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Drinks are well made and the service is very friendly. They take the time to explain ingredients and flavours if you'd like to try something new or wild. Well priced. Most of the parking is paid in the back, but there are a few spots close in front and on the side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIQj1e-8kVsJOc9QvaxKJ0EHd4LZvghOKFbxYT&fid=0x0:0xbb89421a3783015a"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Dan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6Vpad3zmd_bRS_NRyMDg5xHn355DE6cSY0nXB1CDQJfi5a5o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good bubble tea place. Love the 1L drink that they offer. 1 complain about their Mochi bread though. Filling is so little, it does not fill the middle. Taste is lacking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGjh6Zd4b657TK9I_VJzNS_ykU99-2l6iIUO5-&fid=0x0:0xbb89421a3783015a"],"When":"2023-11-5"},{"Name":"Vivian L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVhWOALBXZ-YmRRjV6uhR-emT4pcduCF6BWuEqmeJBum7jmoG8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have so many interesting, tasty drinks on the menu! They even had some buns/desserts available.

We got the Fruit Tea and Fleshy Lychee Tea and they were perfect!!

I absolutely loved the toppings that came with the “Fleshy” tea.

I liked that the Fruit Tea came with a lid so it is removeable to eat the fruit. They also provided a fork with the fruit tea as well.

The place had a great ambience and they had a ticket # system for your order.

Highly recommend :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWyJfniBKSvcpra1zJLwh7ISShd7hDT1CH4fIU&fid=0x0:0xbb89421a3783015a"],"When":"2023-5-14"},{"Name":"Scott Alexander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZrv01JcJi-aa9r8ZgpcgUzrAqQSibsQGhw9bd8Uvv2g-hug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried SunTea for the first time, and they have a lot of good things going for them. The staff greeted us pleasantly when we walked through the door, and the seating area was tidy. Conventional tables and chairs weren't being but there was plenty of bar-style window seating. They were playing good bubble tea shop music.

The staff spoke clearly when taking our order, made recommendations, and made sure we were okay that one of our drinks would be caffeinated, and confirmed our order details at the end, which we thought showed that they cared about our order. Overall a very good experience.

We found out that they're open 24 hours on Fridays and Saturdays, which is a refreshing change in a post-pandemic world of many other bubble tea shops closing as early as 8pm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMe9f_MxOH3mfzpMsFeFqES99XOf__SGuzW0x0&fid=0x0:0xbb89421a3783015a"],"When":"2024-2-26"},{"Name":"Gabriel C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUu8OeUarJaPOMHbrOjB4FX58EsefXHkZGBeafjTsuN3yCQzDc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First of all 5 stars for the service! The guy at the cashier/counter was amazing! Incredibly helpful and even waited for me to sign up for their app for reward points while they started my drinks. So it's my first time here and I grabbed a passionfruit pineapple tea and a mango slush. The white pearls are some funky mix between a tapioca and a jelly. Takes some getting used to. The prices are pretty good and the place is clean. Will be back to try a grape slush or a strawberry peach tea. Here are some photos of the place and drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMfM5JwihYt6SvhRvXRjjykcJVSglHXYbA-DoN&fid=0x0:0xbb89421a3783015a"],"When":"2022-2-23"}]

title: Paragon Tea Room
address: 4328 Number 3 Rd Unit 140, Richmond, BC V6X 2C2
open_hours: {"Friday":["10 a.m.–7 p.m."],"Monday":["10 a.m.–7 p.m."],"Saturday":["10 a.m.–7 p.m."],"Sunday":["10 a.m.–6 p.m."],"Thursday":["10 a.m.–7 p.m."],"Tuesday":["10 a.m.–4 p.m."],"Wednesday":["10 a.m.–5 p.m."]}

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jenny Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyruovd3E8Tx5MBsyO8-Dd-DpYOIPX1sg-Vx1hyvwyVYuQTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So happy that Paragon opened another location 😊. I love their hot genmaicha oat. The matcha coconut refresher is great if you want something light especially after working out. Their tea infused baked goods are so yummy. They are collaboration with other local small businesses. The space is super cute and cozy. It can get pretty busy on the weekends but the line moves quickly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNfrVeRYvhR4gzIuWdocYRnXtwu_Q9Oc1RFR7v&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Paragon Tea Room has opened a shop in Richmond!

This new shop shares the same welcoming and warm atmosphere as the Vancouver W. shop. It also offers dine in and take out, although seats are limited inhouse. We came in a Monday late afternoon and managed to grab the two final seats.

It was absolutely pleasing to watch the lady gracefully hand-whisked the green tea to make my Matcha Black Sesame Oat. The matcha and the black sesame complemented each other so well with a good balance between each flavor and yet without losing their uniqueness. The seasalt chocolate cookie further  enhanced the taste of my drink by adding a little bit of saltiness.

I was very tempted to try their mochi muffins and bubble waffle, both of which were highly rated on Google, but I had to leave them for next time.

We will be back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmd61c1vTAYdTnMiHerNThP0V_pRGeaaYsX6yn&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Nikka Adrias","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGi6Gz_tMMFxsiHqVtyo9UQujDLj1XNHKkomkhpjbqVuxkYAZ79Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My visit to the Paragon Tea Room Richmond location was perfect! I highly recommend their Classic Matcha Oat. It's the perfect amount of earthiness and it's not too sweet. You can definitely tell it's high quality matcha. The exclusive mochi muffins at this location are a great lil' sweet treat when you're on the go.

If you're lucky enough to come across them, maybe you'll have Jasmin or Tiffany as your baristas – they were so warm and welcoming and their service was very smooth.

Will definitely be coming back for more soon!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEbCQsvLOXYcOoDoC45FW05VPUVBgB9WAS_2_w&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Aaron Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxKZ7-UTFQni0mrdKYzhez4Ll3vvr5m_nxy9gIdPj06QAW9g8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Paragon Tea Room in Richmond, and it was a wonderful experience!

The comfortable environment and convenient location makes it perfect for a quick refreshment.

The drink selection is fantastic—my favorite is the Obsidian Hojicha, rich and flavorful. They serve a variety of teas, plant-based bubble teas, and delicious bubble waffles. The staff were friendly and efficient, especially with managing the line ups, and ensuring orders came out in a timely manner.

Whether you're looking to hang out with friends or just enjoy a tasty treat, Paragon Tea Room is a must-visit while in the neighbourhood.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNH8RnzTWaAxIUPLiThqUlHZCGN9rkNFBImPPwG&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excited to see they have opened up their Richmond location. Their green tea beverages and tea powders set the bar high for its competitors in the GVA.

If you have never tried, it’s worth trying","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4J9iBTQenxjICBDqxeI3RdKXv-8kh-YfOoyAK&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Henry Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcTlx45tkivdnVyW4B38kXt4WHZXtLMp6yRttTlIFdf-1gou8R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As good as the Vancouver store. Interior is clean and modern. Barista is a bit slow making everything. Bubble waffle and tea drinks are good. Lots of space for parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3RjHWGMP8v2hH9Vxk7OIAgFvA-MrKVfQiadED&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Elton Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_SVkVqkNe3SvSFwaZ1xrBYHObNVkTiTTXXYykf58guqGIk3qy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was a cold morning, my wife and I needed hot beverage to warm us up. We came to this tea room as we visited their main shop in Cambie Street before.

This tea room has a similar theme of interior and there are several tables and single person seats opposite to the cashier.

We ordered matcha latte and tea misto. They both had a bold taste of tea and silky milk foam on top. The taste was satisfactorily rich.

This is one of the best tea rooms to go in Richmond.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXODY0Mjx2P3GkHfxbOSjMgCWlzpTn4I6nmO8&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Belva See","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKA0yW8ovdsF8RER5QKnV7faGXhFRY_rCpDJLu01gM6B7onuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I like their drinks and have been a long time customer for both locations but I just want to share an experience about making sure to pay attention to their holiday hours.
I ordered their Santa shortbread collection on Dec 23 for pick up the next day on Dec 24. I remembered clearly at the time of ordering to check for their closing hours to be sure that I can pick it up on time and that they weren't closing early for X'mas (both the Google hours and their main website said at the time of ordering that their store closes at 7 pm/ regular hours so I proceeded with ordering).
When I got to the Richmond store on Dec 24th at 4:15 pm, I then realized from the sign posted outside their door that they actually closed at 4 pm. I want to thank the staff that they still opened the doors after hours when I knocked, thank you to one of the ladies who called her manager to let her know about the situation and thankfully, in the end, I was able to still pick up the order but I want to raise a few concerns here:
1) I would not have ordered from Paragon if I knew ahead of time that they were closing early or I would have arranged someone to pick up for me. I have done my due diligence to check for their holiday hours on the day of placing the order. Their holiday hours should have been posted on their main website given that they have an online ordering system on this site and they have order pick up available on xmas Eve (even until today, Dec 24th, the holiday hours aren't posted). The hours on google were not updated until the day of. The receipt also does not indicate pick up deadline. I raised this concern to the staff at pickup that their hours aren't updated and her response was that this is posted on Instagram. There shouldn't be an assumption that all their customers follow  their Instagram or that their go-to would be to check Instagram for their hours, especially when there is a store website and the Instagram account is not the first link that is attached the Google business page. I could not find a phone number to call either to give them a heads up or inquire what to do in this case.
2) It would be appreciative if the staff could have called the customers who did not pick up their orders (or even called 30 min before closing which some other stores would have done) or sent an email regarding this which will highlight more professionalism here. When asked about this, the staff answered that they have too many orders to call the customers (which is interesting because do they have many orders left behind by customers who do not pick up their order for the day they ordered for).
In summary, I still want to thank the staff for taking their time for helping me but I hope the store understands the frustration for a customer who is trying to rush from work and hoping to gift the cookies for an X'mas dinner. This could be handled with better customer service and professionalism.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPp2nBWzmJi7dbcF5UHsZFQaWmDwVsqNjavRLr3&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-12-25"}]

title: CHICHA San Chen 吃茶三千 (Richmond)
about: [{"id":"from_the_business","name":"From the business","options":[{"name":"Identifies as women-owned","enabled":true}]},{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Curbside pickup","enabled":true},{"name":"No-contact delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lucy Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuwCjTEBDQem6hcfmmxSA0I0nNlJPkS88N0KyjwlMUZAjI_Jdm8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My new favourite bubbletea place!!! I got the taro queen drink and it was amazing. The drinks don’t taste artificial at all and the taro balls are really unique. Their peach tea and fruit tea are also really good. The only downside is that the drinks are expensive, with tax & tip it comes down to $10 for a regular sized drink. Also there is limited seating in the store. However I highly recommend giving this bubbletea place a try if you’re in the area!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo28dd6smahQJcAqCdiKMSCgw6ZLcHaKEb-6OM&fid=0x0:0x4b72b3dce203cff6"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Rongting Luo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoUuPmBkCCZ4u--x14TLCOW3fVhRv0PFZZ3T-BSlj2I0mcMQMi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So I ordered choose your own tea option, Green tea with 30% sugar, what is even better taro balls is fresh made, taste a bit chewy is exactly what I want, definitely will go back for another one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4M_KSAFZMtaFVxp1BSL-ennhlJfJrFb-ycruR&fid=0x0:0x4b72b3dce203cff6"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Tiffany V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJN05QxwHq5UqFc65zgS5OJi0DYD4Yn-_UBzyziCnyl3859icym=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5/5 Ding Dong Oolong Tea + Cream + Bubble: easily one of the best bobas I've ordered in recent memory!

The barista meticulously measured out the tea leaves to brew, and the tea was SO fragrant! The boba was perfectly chewy and bouncy!

Would absolutely make additional trips here to try the rest of the menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGDDXHXG4Q9s_TiDW0087d1VNBVeP5FSt2Bqle&fid=0x0:0x4b72b3dce203cff6"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Rhea Rodrigues","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUi7z0vvpjVUlwbw7TBLIf7LR4sFT-GVYeCIFFifCKIUNcdqOT1SA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was one of the best boba experiences I’ve tried. The pearls are soo fresh and so is the tea that’s brewed through the machines. The layout of the store is really tasteful, the staff are helpful but it seems like they are busy with online orders.
I always enjoy getting the classic boba.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNd5pQdVnjbG16N6NKxqI3nRcbJTISjavKUoAzS&fid=0x0:0x4b72b3dce203cff6"],"When":"2023-10-12"},{"Name":"Seraphina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkUUpLfIdziS9KQIoAUfw5pPG8kKZVUvuFTWQGL9Uwp22V6WPi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my new favourite bubble tea place when looking for quality tea. Probably not the place if you are into fruit drinks/slushes. I ordered the oolong with mousse and taro balls, and the flavours worked together so well. The natural flavour of the tea is so fragrant and leaves a pleasant aftertaste. The staff measure out tea leaves for each order and each cup is brewed individually! I also can't recommend the mousse enough. It is lightly salted and works so beautifully with the tea. I usually order 30% sugar at other bbt shops but this time tried their "perfect" (regular) sugar and it lived up to its name, was not too sweet. Taro balls were very QQ and the perfect size to have in a drink.

The shop is aesthetic but is cramped and it can be difficult to tell who is lining up to order VS waiting for their drink. They have no menu on the wall, only on the counter in front of the cashier. There is also no area to sit down inside. They offer free 2hr parking if you fill out their form inside.

Update: visited again and seems like they have increased the price of drinks since 6 months ago. Quality of the tea is consistent and good! Still no changes to the line up system or posting of menu elsewhere in the store other than the front counter.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO01_FSsq1rvRjhRJZf41uuN-uyuMzWv_MhxUc6&fid=0x0:0x4b72b3dce203cff6"],"When":"2023-11-14"},{"Name":"mochi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFJ3YzQy4Ek7Uv6iuvuDDt8SDrpfRq8OqiVFgoo79K5l16GqzX4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"[November 2023]

Boba that reminds me of taiwan! A grab and go tea shop that is much better than the Chatime, Coco and GongCha nearby. Finally a place where 100% sugar tastes just right. First time coming and the tearista who helped me today provided friendly service even when they were busy.

However, it would be helpful if the topping option was included for some drinks. The osmanthus tea that I ordered (it's good! I recommend it!) was one of them. The other one that toppings can be added is the Ding Dong tea. The store on Fantuan could also be updated with that change. There is no seating, or public wifi. $7.88 for Honey Osmanthus tea with boba.

[December 2023]

Dong-Ding + Fresh Milk
Didn't look like the picture and tasted too grassy for me. 3/5

[February 2024]

Got a hot tea that burned my tongue and my hands upon opening the lid. The service was not as friendly as before, so -1*","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOj3-cP2ZnqNHrEKLeQ48xSWi11zZoZSMtKAxmX&fid=0x0:0x4b72b3dce203cff6"],"When":"2023-11-17"},{"Name":"Jason167","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGGlyLLixNxC_6llVM2CDa_B6WcSkAtVt8JRRrRIlznxR6yA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful place!
Friendly staff!
The tea is very good and worth to be waited.
Btw there is a handsome tall man😍, which is the manager I think, he is so friendly and explain the tea and the store very detail to me.
I love this place, I would come back soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQ8r8hx9uWBMUMaiqMoTx13_6_L79Cg2daEu2_&fid=0x0:0x4b72b3dce203cff6"],"When":"2023-8-4"},{"Name":"Chloe Raven","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNrbIQlv8YkWOfbLINnjG6ywHTOPijpZhAtoEyMG_xglZS-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an awesome time at Chicha Sanchen Richmond! Came from the States, and it was totally worth it. The place is cool, the staff are friendly, and the drinks are just amazing. Loved every sip! Definitely a must-try spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5EOvfQwDMaD0smB6euJ33pVnF_ZwKgtqRZR4S&fid=0x0:0x4b72b3dce203cff6"],"When":"2023-12-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Julie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6iqNbgJ99pEVigrdmqTpMQQRCYbL7zrrvCytBAxs45Tk47A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The bubble tea was pretty pricy and it wasn’t great. I’d say it’s alright. Not my fav","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHSweeaxP006BCmu_9x1LCbVx2ES-B4IcEKWhp&fid=0x0:0xbd3038a477f50c66"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Ly Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9Rfi9YJyNXoeUcOB0q836NlpdhCZYOXnMsyIK7wwlRTMlQ2vr0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am absolutely delighted with my experience at CHUN FUN HOW Richmond! The tea quality is exceptional, with perfectly balanced fruity flavors that are both refreshing and satisfying. The boba is just right—chewy and full of flavor. I also love the beautiful cups they serve the drinks in. Although the shop is on the smaller side and more suited for takeaway, it’s perfect for grabbing a delicious drink on the go. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ayuu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWASytRjnB071FlOavyCkT31BSNx6IrSO_EFMs-U_nsclyPxCi8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"i don't care this place is just my favourite bubble tea shop ever. it's small, open until 12 am, has a respectable selection and complemented with the sweetest staff. i've never EVER had to wait very long for my drink, even when it was busy with a lower amount of employees. not once have i had my drink be wrong, even if i ordered with other people. the cup designs are the cutest thing,, and i do indeed value that! i got two free cups from their summer '24 event and they are cute plus work well. i typically do not have any issue with occupancy; come here both day and night. personally, i do enjoy their oolong tea VERY much. i always get it LOL, i would recommend. very much enjoy the smaller size of the store and the music is a nice touch to the place. staff are incredibly kind and always thank you for coming. it's located in a very spectacular spot as well, as i enjoy going into some other shops around the area before heading back home.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Luke Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-nw_Hipvgt6UpenAw0abcDlQMvwpFIko8ke_8Sy_24ohAlwTK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am glad they opened up a location in Richmond. I love their teas. The tea flavor is always super strong and not diluted. The pearls are chewy/bouncy. Cup designs are so cute!

Love that they also have their own delivery.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONcf5i_qaO3wvTGneKneVpS1YRAq3MXFmUdpWo&fid=0x0:0xbd3038a477f50c66"],"When":"2023-10-11"},{"Name":"Andy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhlSS7jPz5zCaOBcdduZUQiQLkdoBrNXd3voRg2PZcAC_6HQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The teas here are really good, especially if you're looking for strong tea flavour! Their Pearl Oolong Milk Tea is my personal favourite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlyChgyMxNNRKxuSrssAgRJWceIunVm8PbxkpV&fid=0x0:0xbd3038a477f50c66"],"When":"2023-9-11"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The fragrance of the teas and fruit when you walk in the door leaves you salivating for each of their drinks.  However my wife was upset that the person working gave everyone the same cup when we had 6 orders.  (We got home and realized they got my order wrong😢 and one of my kids threw up after drinking)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYiqcesq0_x-hnmfPvqYgHFV6Pg4aZ-zAozLts&fid=0x0:0xbd3038a477f50c66"],"When":"2023-1-15"},{"Name":"Shibe Life","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUC4Mb1DHizRVJ60Sg_sm7ibJx8EQiAVjPSsfgIJdoHWmHYbUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I like the cups but basically that’s it.

The pearls were not that fresh. Taste imported and not handmade.not worth the extra $1

Teas taste like sugar. Tea is also brewed wrong so it is bitter. How can a drink be bitter and too sweet??? Just try this place lol","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"K L H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQFZJuD0_NE10o4xSC-XtXQSVqtA5ZrAaHnqFaD10csHc_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the very few high quality bubble tea shops in the lower mainland that don’t doesn’t skimp on quality or portions. Rare nowadays.

Love how they don’t dilute, shove a crapload of ice when you ask for 30%, gets sweetness levels right every time, or add any crazy amounts of cheap coffee mate to the drinks. Pearls are cooked perfectly, other toppings are always fresh, and the customer service is top notch! They hand you your bubble tea directly while in store too! :) Keep up the good work!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Lai Lai Tea Store (台灣茶）
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Ilya Meerovich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMb0Yn-Fx1t0S2Qwa6f0VgKaIVigpWrYJVKpo4HmLJJcSjxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend this shop to anyone looking to stock up on high quality teas. The owners are fantastic, extremely knowledgeable people and were very generous with their time and energy. They made tea for us, talked to us about the various origins they sourced from, made casual recommendations, and shared their tea journey with us. Although they specialize in high mountain tea from Taiwan, they carry a range of phenomenal teas of different processes and origins. You won't regret getting tea from Lai Lai!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEBFtu9RtLC_5Lp0UNkHEw6zxCwaNvnWzPqtgB6C34VTSCW71s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a tea fanatic, as much as I’d like to gatekeep this little gem, I truly feel they deserve the 5 stars!\n\nThe quality of the tea, and their passion for conducting tea ceremonies, I would absolutely come here for all my tea refills!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charles Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe0oP7QLQzSh_KmkEjx6VsFPTio0e4zhgLebiGuPPWQ3gzIo8Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best part of my experience at this shop is not the product my wife purchased (although the product quality is great!), but the educational course the shop owner gave to us about the Taiwanese green tea.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgRJ5uh1IYhxKQwcF_9ravpC0OGUhQROQD5vMfPTkVp7-uhLh3yQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I bought green tea 🍵 from this place a week ago. Bought organic, and two other varieties of green tea. All of them are simply amazing. The quality is top class. The organic is the one with the strongest flavour. Highly recommended this tea store.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kay Ton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLv7RuNbq1M1zxBiXgtosaz92b_2WXJXwOUKiDtAhup_HQiIg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"had some tea and it was really good, very friendly staff!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle Franken","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzBBKBGkBQYJkAu79TgkARo96QD5LYtuxdmOgCCRo8BkVa-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great people. Hooked me up with allot of tea equipment and explained how tea culture worked. Enjoyed the tea they served. Spent a hour just chatting with them. If your looking for tea or tea equipment. These are the people to talk to.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Barnabas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUt0GRkD9CoDte9z1WrkzQURWEFGJ15STKYpGSP2cS57wienvvHsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic organic green tea. Very high quality, fresh and aromatic. The owner is also very friendly","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nic Jas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQZ0xtsSsKZFV6o1hXTh9kxjrdnTUPhJJ0rdpazECofITUZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"High Quality teas and the owners are very kind and passionate.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Rachel Keery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7HrRs2lYWD-a0OMwYD8hcg13jIWjm47WrdDcC3B391YGfNtPv3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Drinks tasted great , ordering was a little difficult to get our order correct.\nCute gingerbread bottles but only available with the drinks shown can’t substitute anything.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwm3YEwR3tCydw0XXTBMS_lwtdGCKGV70KE5dH\u0026fid=0x0:0x3f450279d979fa84"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Le Thanh Quang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnBJw2xJAqroToFn2U0ww-W22fxkXputW6WAZ9qpU4TmtHis0-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quality milk tea, I have tried here many times, all are great. Especially some of their drinks are available in jumbo size, really satisfy my milk tea craving. But the strawberry milk tea I recently ordered was a bit sweeter than other drinks and the drink lacked the tea flavor of milk tea but still a good drink. Also, the staff are really nice and friendly, should be on the list to try when visiting Richmond centre mall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCrVy00qBlL-x3z5PjXCqCvnOoJFx86bs7xce2\u0026fid=0x0:0x3f450279d979fa84"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Win Nie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZh8JI7hF0RPjg2XaWcihILfZm1QFtcp0fdf16r5ajBrO30Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I never get bbt from food court but tried Fairbee once and I keep going back!! Best bbt shop in RC and even outside the mall. I would go just to get their bbt. All the drinks I’ve tried so far have been good. Their pearls are soft and prices are reasonable. Bonus is they always change their cup designs too, so cute to look at. My go to is their milk tea with white pearls, the foam on top is so good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaE6_Wl3tpMzh9dAodK_W_gtbdvm4fApUvKHj3\u0026fid=0x0:0x3f450279d979fa84"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Katie Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBDK3zjuiOEbhhmROW824stlBpmCpGZEQFIpQp-T56GdYeG3uzOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m a sweet tooth, so you have to believe that Fairbee always delivers on their dessert drinks! They’re decently priced, and the employees are always so lovely and sweet whenever I stop by to pick up a drink during my shopping trips.\nI got the strawberry milk tea this time, and it tastes just like a strawberry pocky 🍓I’m in love with this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVfBm-gaM3WwJtf9UzEUgIBPfh7U85j_ejYcXU\u0026fid=0x0:0x3f450279d979fa84"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Jennie L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpdyPYq_UEg_tKXjP6ulDk4pSRVYUhZML75kcuFsHUDtRW-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fairbee bubble tea is one of my all time favourites! The black milk tea with grass jelly and tea jelly is my go to. They also have this amazing 2 for $8 dollar deal on selected drinks!! Try this place if you ever get a chance","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcmuZg0ADdcMdV7Kv_PN5_Fh17RQRLJFT-Wq8H\u0026fid=0x0:0x3f450279d979fa84"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Albert Cherng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2AYaSfHm3FolRzm5pTtzww9NlenNwViv8VJczOj_IeDJCYO9B7A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honest and high quality ingredients! I tried both their fruit-based and milk-based bubble teas and was very impressed. Their staffs were well trained and it was fascinating to see how quickly they work. Definitely must try if you’re in RC.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYi1qMS2tEjl4HndJbTksEWDtiK4nYuPrdQ22x\u0026fid=0x0:0x3f450279d979fa84"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Crender Brine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLknuYKtqPzeOZUuVMzxSaZUX9ta2zfPI5Ja-axtkyNifD36A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An old favourite of mine, they’ve been around since the 90s. My go-to is still the Black Milk Tea with pearls. Also, the Fresh Papaya Milk and Mango Coconut Slush is a must try when it’s in season!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxNOaxmEjYWhE9nw7956CrWa3olWki_-U_zxKr\u0026fid=0x0:0x3f450279d979fa84"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Helen Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKI-mzgGlleZ4ePt7mDYbQ4Gabh9zw-OBKk6bKlySQQQboerA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The lady offered me a sample of passion fruit green tea and it tasted amazing but a little too sweet for me. Luckily you can choose the sugar level. So I got a large passion fruit green tea with 30% sugar and it tasted just right. They are very friendly and efficient. You can choose to add toppings, such as pearls and coconut jelly. I like this place and I will come back to try more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVmG3J40KGbQnoYmvHJX1pJ6ZNeztV2PmoKOo3\u0026fid=0x0:0x3f450279d979fa84"],"When":"2023-7-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Karen C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtPS6I3b8y1jNUovDv24BcEbLWnZ3vfFryLQpkUVMdhUgwR4YUgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Enjoyed the quiet atmosphere for lunch on a weekday. Lovely space with good food. I didn't know the pork ribs with white radish and rice was in a soup, but I really enjoyed it. Unique desserts were nice to try. Would come again.
Parkade was about $6 for two hours, otherwise very limited street parking in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3P2QbtHA5woY-iS0FcUxNmJkD2fLLSkVNlEAW&fid=0x0:0x91792f1e4c8d5d2b"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Bianca Luo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdn2255Z8E8-_wsVaF3cQ82Qet3AGrEciGdHHNfczc_PMtWA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Cute small tea house. The menu looked very tasty with canto/hongkong comfort foods. But the tomatoes beef rice/risotto did not meet my expectations. The beef was chewy and there was very little tomato. I will come only to try their tea and dessert. Service was good though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgyLXriYnkH2JcEB_mYJ629q5Ylze-UzTHL3uU&fid=0x0:0x91792f1e4c8d5d2b"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Vivian Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMODx4tsHcnGW55wfMPzYYzuyZk27_2r9UUTniNqXPL2XPaini=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute place to hang out but the drinks it self wasn’t impressive. But I love the esthetic and would come just if I want to chat or meet up with someone .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtlWLNiCZX_WoQNpX__yWH_ZMoixChSnyZ2HNT&fid=0x0:0x91792f1e4c8d5d2b"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Amy Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvtm7hBqZHDYxXgP_oxkelx2FGhwfW-EuwTv9rdyjxo-_-_8Nq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cozy cafe/restaurant with authentic Chinese desserts. The taro salted egg yolk basque cheesecake was quite yummy. Huge focus on tea, would be great for tea lovers to try different tea, they also sell it too. For the non-meal food menu, it’s small, but quality desserts. Service was nice and welcoming. The plates and utensils were really unique! I enjoyed my time here but not sure I would come again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAE76Ld5_L9evIQTpTVy553xaLZZnPa9goa4ZN&fid=0x0:0x91792f1e4c8d5d2b"],"When":"2024-1-7"},{"Name":"Kris C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKreAKn4vn2wDsLPPbr1-Tyj8LLPhAalhXSg1Lriconwhw0GQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We visited later in the day for a meal but would come back for their desserts as it was all sold out by then.

Overall, the food was very delicious, well made, and generous portions. We were worried that the pork rib soup rice may turn up bland, but it had depth in flavour while still being light and comforting. The beef rice had a fragrant sauce that gave a kick but not too spicy. We would recommend the Osmanthus oolong milk tea, which had a lovely aroma to start and became more flavourful as it sat. The peach oolong milk tea, however, was flat in flavour and not as memorable.

The server was kind and friendly but a bit shy, and the service was slow. Not sure if they don't serve water unless requested since we ordered drinks. The meals also took longer to prepare and we waited with an empty table for awhile but didn't mind as much since the atmosphere was nice and we relaxed and chatted as we wait.

Vibe is slow, but would come back for tea and desserts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRIZ4rhOnQO3kXVU9UOYYnAsa6vcL3zH42AFUK&fid=0x0:0x91792f1e4c8d5d2b"],"When":"2024-2-21"},{"Name":"Haha Ha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqhwZfkCwLkmEWm7PsAISKD1IQeSP5-kl4ZbYaEgh49AQQTew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Not recommended. The tea was really nice but the service is very hard to describe. On one of the Saturday, I invited my client for a casual business chat. Everything was great but we got hungry and wanted to try foods. We are not sure how to order so we assumed it would be the same as restaurant and waved at the staff there for ordering. The only staff (a young lady) was on her phone all the time. It got very awkward with my client as we are waving for a long time. I guess we could be wrong, so I stood up and went over the counter and put down the order. This is fine as it might be the “rule” for a tea house and we just don’t know. During eating, we wanted to refill some water into the tea so we try to ask the server but again she was sitting down in the corner and could not see us. We are like fine, as we are chatting and don’t want to interrupt and stand up again. When we are about to leave, after we pay, the young lady asked the question “ can you give us the reason that why you didn’t tip?” I was in disbelief, first, I did not receive any service from you (except for passing the food to our table ) secondly it’s up to me whether to tip you or not regardlessly. I just can’t believe someone questions me like this and I felt really offended, for someone who always tip according to the services they provided. Maybe I’m wrong that’s this tea house suppose to operate like this. I’m too old for this generation perhaps. My recommendation is that just go for the tea in the place, if you want to eat something please prepare beforehand for this extra tipping together being treated with disrespected attitude.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kitty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhMuwg_tl1TRTc24JxH5iTo3OJVTHqCQijM2P6PldLkYJ1Idkn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to catch up with friends. They also have booster seat / high chair, and quite baby friendly which is amazing! The staff were very nice and friendly. The original milk tea was very tasty and their noodle / cake was good. Will definitely go back to try their other dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNz6o5Utl1zk5Csivn3274KKd2AdPzendQrReGN&fid=0x0:0x91792f1e4c8d5d2b"],"When":"2023-4-14"},{"Name":"Bianca Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjlIiSla_YfmuKaJiceOLXQVdHyC1ne2upZrkSAFv7b4f4CX5J=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was looking forward to visiting this cafe and it didn’t disappoint. The woman who served me was really sweet and attentive. She made me feel welcomed even though I was awkwardly carrying all my baggage before my flight.

The tea is so good and they give you the traditional set up. The tea also comes with some snacks. The panna cotta was delicious. It’s a small space, but the vibes were great! It gets busy during lunchtime. Overall, it’s super clean and had soft music in the background. It really does feel like a modern tea shop and I will definitely be going back there the next time I’m in town. They take all forms of payment and they have wifi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbcYB8vYfzj0n4vTNWd669cuIEIonSx_tOSUl4&fid=0x0:0x91792f1e4c8d5d2b"],"When":"2023-9-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"REGGIE NRI MAH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwcAfVQbjygBNPR1GqmfGPlFduk4OQyY-y__TAVw60yM9C12J_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming here weekly since they’ve opened. Never disappoints and it was much needed for Richmond to finally have an aesthetic, small business owned coffee bar / shop.

My go to is the Matcha Latte with Oat Milk with along with a UBE Cream Cheese Muffin !!

I’ve had their sandwich bagels as well as cookies which was also great.

5 stars for Food
5 stars for Service
4 stars for Atmosphere only because they could potentially have a bit more seating, I know it’s a small space but there is space to add seating I feel but I do like the clean look. Perhaps when it’s nicer weather again they will be allowed to have outdoor seats as well ?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOttJmlQq3t0bPIg8dyBRqECOB04XyyTKKXZOMI&fid=0x0:0x8ba9cd64a6ece30"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Seraphina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkUUpLfIdziS9KQIoAUfw5pPG8kKZVUvuFTWQGL9Uwp22V6WPi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I really loved Miion cafe's food and drinks, but I have to give them 3 stars because of the subpar service/workflow. I met up with a friend to catch up, and we made a spontaneous decision to go to Miion instead of the cafe next door, drawn in by the cute interior. However, we started to regret our decision decieved by appearance as we sat in the cafe and witnessed multiple (10+) errors with peoples' orders and transactions. There is no doubt that the staff were kind, but the service was just not efficient. Many times staff would make a drink and call out to ask who ordered it, finding out nobody did. They brought drinks to other tables in to-go cups when the customers had asked to dine in. They also brought a steamed milk to another customer who did not order it and did not realize he was accidentally charged for it. Although they do have the confusion of take out and dine-in customers, there are only 3 small tables in the cafe. I think they need a better system, i.e order numbering system to keep track of who ordered what items. We also observed that the staff kept switching roles from making drinks to working as cashier, so there was not smooth communication and knowledge of orders.

My friend and I had ordered a matcha cream cheese muffin to share and two drinks. They had brought the muffin first but we wanted to wait for the drinks to have it together. It reached the 1hr mark of us sitting in the cafe and we still had not received our drinks (it already took 30mins to receive the muffin despite them only needing to remove it from the display case, not reheat). We asked the staff where the drinks were, and they told us that they were still making them. The woman we had asked returned to us 5 minutes later and ask us what we ordered because they had in fact not started making the drinks. She then asked us to go pay for them, when I explained that I already had. After this, we recieved the drinks about 10mins later.

I have never seen genmaicha so green before and I initially thought they had mistakenly made a matcha. I was amazed that it tasted so fresh yet had the nuttiness of the roasted rice. The matcha was even more vibrant and smooth, not astringent at all. The matcha cream cheese muffin was cold but moist and creamy, and the matcha flavour was actually strong, leaving a nice aftertaste. In many other matcha desserts, they taste too sweet with too little flavour even if it appears green. If their food/drinks weren't so good I think I would've had to give them 2 stars.

The seating of the cafe was very limited with about three 2-person sized tables. There wasn't much space to put our jackets or bags either, so we both held everything in our laps. They decorate the space to be very clean and homey so I hope they continue to update the seating/environment to reflect that!

I understand that there are often little errors and miscommunications in customer service, but it felt like Miion was just continually making them due to systematic problems. I hope this feedback can allow them to improve, especially in such a high traffic and competitive location. I would love to come back to try more of their drinks, but only if I know I can receive what I ordered without so much confusion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_NQYKlN5Ok6PvPSnzy8VHoYhGt_ky3ynDhM8m&fid=0x0:0x8ba9cd64a6ece30"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Nick Go","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWy1wVzdpckJ20S9UmFPOeDxIPDcWXe0ZStOYXqUqdan15D_SEi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Richmond finally has a good independent coffee shop!

Miion is super cute, the branding, interior design, furniture selection and overall vibe are "chef's kiss". The jazz music is a nice touch.

I love that they have tea lattes like jasmine, hojicha and genmaicha versus  just the regular matcha. Pastries are tasty as well.

Service is friendly.

On top of all that, they also have free parking.

My only nitpicks are that the seating is limited and once more people know about this place, they will likely be very busy. The latte art could also be improved.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVtGpTydZM-aw2dEFiFk6_Ldjv9OiascGcXYQt&fid=0x0:0x8ba9cd64a6ece30"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Will Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGDD7brNtaOWSPrb4kG9HB25Ge1x-VU_HZtlpi-qzw-EVvrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another solid coffee shop that offers a good pour over product. The bean quality was nice with a good selection.

Only gripe is the sitting is limited, so if you are looking for place to sit and relax then you might run into problems.

Overall a solid new coffee shop in Richmond which is good for all the coffee lovers","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhIEkRgA-99FZQcquntTnGlRJWZRo-3F5g1TTd&fid=0x0:0x8ba9cd64a6ece30"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Kenny Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCkKTuOESfGudPEm0-BDzQVkIamalgjsSUzE_II9VRplB0iEEX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went to this coffee shop in late November 2024.
It was a Friday afternoon, non-peak hours.
Ordered a piece of Ube Loaf and a 12oz hot latte.

From what I see on the shelves, Pallet would be the roaster for their espresso-based coffee.

My latte was slightly over extracted (hence a bit of a burnt bitterness, just slightly), but the Ube Loaf was pretty nice.

I bet coffee is relatively subjective, however, I believe a bit more fruity flavour would make the latte more balanced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxkawQ7R68fwbqwHLZwFVHvr-IXJ1gEidNVpA-&fid=0x0:0x8ba9cd64a6ece30"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"LZ Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVmt10h3Padiemooh7l_BPncjSnKmk7S4h0ehSk8XAV7E3a0gw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered a latte, and it turned out to be the best I’ve ever had in Richmond—perfectly balanced and smooth. I also tried their purple muffin, and the texture was absolutely amazing. Will definitely come back to try out other items on their menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLaFTvgNQzT1QZc7eHuBg5zad4HHTlQ-egArSQ&fid=0x0:0x8ba9cd64a6ece30"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Nick W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOcgvTDQITdk_BEgCLNEAQLcZlpaTdHgED_a7ulSMJTMBCipLl5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend and I visited there on Christmas. One of the few places open, glad we went, got a matcha latte, the matcha was just perfect not bitter at all. Also picked up an ube loaf, it was perfectly moist, and the very sweet guy working behind the counter warmed it up and brought it right out to me. Definitely made a great start to my holiday!! The look of the place is quite bright and clean. Would definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGckhA5KFR1EGzO0pHJfE8Yh1O-ryiSnFjZKwX&fid=0x0:0x8ba9cd64a6ece30"],"When":"2024-12-27"},{"Name":"Ollie Han","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqsdJoI5woZm4pgC3eKJ2ZbPOuqBtbPMv1lNO5Rg9CYTAl1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super charming café with thoughtful decor and a vibrant theme! So glad Richmond has a new coffee spot. The pastries are cute, the ube muffin is truly unique","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9NjG4nkUT4wuW25y347FA2G9AiAe5pykWhFJE&fid=0x0:0x8ba9cd64a6ece30"],"When":"2024-12-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Elton Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_SVkVqkNe3SvSFwaZ1xrBYHObNVkTiTTXXYykf58guqGIk3qy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a nice cafe with plenty of choices of Taiwanese foods and drinks. The interior has a wooden hut theme like an old wooden inn in a small town. The vibes is warm and comfy with good service.

I usually come here for Taiwanese style milk tea and snacks. The Taiwanese chicken sandwiches is one of my favourite foods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRILHJtblc1mCONAk-R9CUBbaZ3e638KZjo2k&fid=0x0:0xb333a051e4a8db9a"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Aminul Huq","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVzqymJ0TBICnYonVoahhL-Obco1YY5NFXkXew4a2XKep2j90VNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good place to enjoy tea, coffee and dessert. This has always been my go to place for desert for the past 2Years. Nice atmosphere to sit down and talk. My favorite is the chocolate coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxaXJNiwfK7W1Qa94-6tQJcbeITluvxiqtngs1&fid=0x0:0xb333a051e4a8db9a"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Juan Fernando Tirado Uribe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_JUbrk0nXxFocvio5qhbrYVwMcTsK5shZSOSNdKJBD9iYeIvS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is an old-style themed cafe that takes you back to the 50s or 60s with its vintage furniture and nostalgic decor. The atmosphere was very chilled and relaxed, making it a perfect spot to unwind.

The menu focuses on coffee, tea, desserts, and light meals. Everything we tried was beautifully presented and very tasty.

Overall, Cafe Leisure offers a nice experience with its old-fashioned charm and delicious offerings. If you're looking for a cozy place to enjoy a good cup of coffee and some sweet treats, I highly recommend visiting 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtn17__P7_4ukVb7dVcmK49TixrXqcdiJTBnu3&fid=0x0:0xb333a051e4a8db9a"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Angel-Connie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqrdJ1_oHixLkvmJI-GgqCPCjZF4dRN52Z9UavctvKXs2OEyPuhw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my all time favorite spot in Richmond for brunch in the past 25 years. Cozy European interior, friendly staff. Quality coffee, delicious brunch items and Taiwanese style sweets. 👌🏼👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzRgGxEGrA4TKq23Y3I7-_pQUgCCawpwnXaueY&fid=0x0:0xb333a051e4a8db9a"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"K Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBu4_ZaAgECG41rev8GrGyGl2x4Ekp-734YP2jktPLGAnRXGaB4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The taste and vibe is timeless. Thank you for keeping the way it is since I first visited as a teen. The shave ice is pack with toppings and it is perfectly pair with syrup. Is a cute place to gather and converse.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHAqDAedfbHQIwYaj4zmuYuMnULufdYbv83io-&fid=0x0:0xb333a051e4a8db9a"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Little Journey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlNkzOJynLpgqJCrPnrmAAn5viwim-B3Uir-26DOWxIzwcnZ0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I didn't realize this cozy cafe in Richmond until recently. The English style tea cups and the interior decor has a vintage aesthetic. They have a variety of coffee/tea and desserts to choose from.

I was told it has been around for so many years. Well, it's never too late to try all of their signature dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdZitEDX12i7bmAuH2Mf67tUaoHfeS8rArOFbs&fid=0x0:0xb333a051e4a8db9a"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Kateryna Lazaryeva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSlLwInOjTD3QhFCZzPQIAdE0julelZFq0LL29qA3f9uUmcw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great cafe with classical interior design. The most unique things about the interior design are the collection of tea cups and different photos on the wall. We found it very elegant and nice.
The menu has different kinds of dishes ranging from main course dishes to desserts.
The staff is very friendly. This is a great place to experience the elegance of Western culture with your family and friends!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcj2VGmRURnGlIoXL9KX9aiVTqTaC69F_UeOQ-&fid=0x0:0xb333a051e4a8db9a"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Lisa N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2KHLvnsh19HJMAOMiI8byw-52uRB0TkrEatkGaTv_TqsJFoVa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Unassuming cafe but partner insisted we visit from his past experience with Taiwanese friends many years ago. Our food and drinks were good. Fresh taro, #43 hot winter melon with taro/sweet potato was tasty (but too sweet), fried chicken was great, as well as the souffle thick toast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9rDYwY3gavVKZBkDKQrnLO02bNClm2hGZ2b4c&fid=0x0:0xb333a051e4a8db9a"],"When":"2024-5-16"}]

about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"No-contact delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nick Go","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWy1wVzdpckJ20S9UmFPOeDxIPDcWXe0ZStOYXqUqdan15D_SEi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This spot very well known for the King of Mango smoothie - that is until mango season ends. When that happens, go for grape.

All the drinks are good.

Chi-chi means cheese foam.

There can be line ups and be aware that parking in this plaza during peak hours can be challenging. \","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgCI1D55_5mfEa602ifPz4vD7Wyg_nPbCEp47e&fid=0x0:0x46d86a3815b83628"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Kevin (KC)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrZpzDcm4xbgvb_oOynyP_bQvwIe7l-wMoPIs8L4UeVZ-waBkO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really busy place with long lineups but the #1 King of Mango smoothie on the menu was worth it!

Mango smoothie was fresh and had just the right amount of sweetness. I also like the cups they use and the lids that allow you to put a straw without stabbing the lid like most plastic BBT lids.

Only con is the lineup, but I guess that is to be expected when you have like 1000+ TikTok foodie 'influencers' hyping this place up.

Overall though it is a good place to grab a mango smoothie. 🥭","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDGt9ht3msFr-tS8WfneiIf0CjUSgsi4g98SVm&fid=0x0:0x46d86a3815b83628"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Kelly Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwXTwWPi0f0C76m9b7ohgdsL3CpuHkuvPE28inqJasz4aJoh9x=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Do you love mango?! Have you ever dreamed of just straight up drinking mango through a straw?! MACU TEA has you covered! Try their King of Mango Smoothie… and you won’t regret it.

As my first time, I christened it with a King of Mango Smoothie! The tea jelly was an interesting flavour and the pomelo was a bonus. It wasn’t very smoothie like to be honest, as it really felt like you were just drinking mango. It’s not my favourite time of “bubble tea”, but it’s very good for any mango lovers out there.

Next time I’d like to give their milk tea a try and their “chi chi”! It looks interesting. (Hence the 4 stars)

There’s no place to sit and most of it is self order using the machine they have in the front. You can pay by cash after putting in your order in the machine, and go to the till next to it and someone will come to help you.

The store is small so when waiting it’s a bit cramped.

It was very busy when I came, but I got my drinks in less than 5 mins! That’s 3 King of Mango smoothies!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJb2k1IMoG6_mT5QBCTpLqKqdyvE9IcVL5YymC&fid=0x0:0x46d86a3815b83628"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The mango is actually as good as everyone says, and the lines are equally long.

The only downside is that you need to keep track of generally when to go in to collect your order once it’s done. Sometimes it’s so packed you can’t stay inside. They need a number board or something so you can easily see when your order is up.

Definitely a must try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjbCLzsDuR3tD__2UfG8STsdXL0B83jpd5fV6p&fid=0x0:0x46d86a3815b83628"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Curious after seeing a long line at Macu Tea on Capstan Way, I decided to give it a try. Many reviews raved about their famous King Mango Chichi and Chichi Grape Smoothies and the Bobos. The Bobos has the extra agar they said but I don’t know what that is so I went with the Chichi Strawberry as the grape and mango is out of stock.

As someone health-conscious, I initially hesitated because the drink looked heavy in pictures. However, after watching how they prepared it behind the counter, I was impressed. They use fresh ingredients and load the drinks with real fruit, which immediately gave me confidence. Sure enough, the Chichi Strawberry was incredible—packed with a cup of fresh strawberries and topped with cheese foam. It was so good! It was like strawberry and cheese.

What surprised me most was the jasmine-scented jelly sinker at the bottom. The drink wasn’t overly sweet, which I appreciated, and I liked it so much that I’m now curious to try more from Macu’s smoothie series—it’s absolutely worth it.

As for their milk tea, it was just average, similar to what you’d find elsewhere. But what sets Macu apart are their Bobo and Chichi drinks. The quality of the fruits they use is exceptional, and for that alone, I’m giving Macu Tea 5 stars!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOhpGdq1VCBt2BUb_B1dQzpCLyfVzCqTyqDIqk&fid=0x0:0x46d86a3815b83628"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Ann Tseng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVA_zf_5YooDT-l3fkXhkvK6zA1gOe7gRLX4x4Ri-M_afE98MoV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the No. 1 best seller King of Mangos and I can see why it is!! It’s very refreshing with the jelly and grapefruit inside. You cannot change this signature sweetness or add anything to it but you don’t need to. It’s sweet but not overwhelming. There are lots of chunks of mangos and grapefruit. It’s so worth it.

Be warned lots of people. You order from the big tablet. They are as efficient as they can be but just plan for a line.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNo7w5Q_2EMVNfULt8JVVQ2liTaqbMt76_uNT8Z&fid=0x0:0x46d86a3815b83628"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Law Rence H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX-gD_1eapEh74OqyTe0YNfW1L_Xu19R2dfxMN8tNFSt7HowTh1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Macu Tea at Capstan Way is a go-to spot for bubble tea lovers. The Mango Smoothie and Sunshine Li-Li Tea are must-tries, offering a perfect balance of sweetness and refreshment. Their seasonal drinks, like the Peach Oolong Tea, are also a hit, featuring fresh, in-season ingredients. The shop has a modern vibe, and while seating is limited, the friendly and efficient service makes up for it. Prices are reasonable, making it a great place for a quick, delicious drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeli6mpxJSdqYlQ1J9vFOqqbl6GiDGxR64foup&fid=0x0:0x46d86a3815b83628"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"cece","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOTYAw-4x6T_LItftuWBdtv1AVKE0ARwrB2csYY0hWpTD6r0qa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their 🥭 King of Mango and 🍇 Grape Smoothie series are amazing.  This place is always busy.  Always line up.  Love the drinks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-2UkXXzsiz9caHSyYKFudcGcnzJXsnX5WciLf&fid=0x0:0x46d86a3815b83628"],"When":"2024-4-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sunny M Cafe never disappoints! Today isn’t my first visit, and it definitely won’t be my last. The donut coffee is a standout—unique and delicious. I also had an Iced tea which was very fragrant and perfect for the hot sunny summer weather. The service here is very personalized, making each visit feel special.

Sunny M Cafe has quickly become one of my two favorite coffee shops in Richmond. The atmosphere here is quiet and cozy, and the attention to detail in both the drinks and the service keeps me coming back. Whether you’re a local or just passing through, this is a must-visit spot for coffee lovers. Just note that price is on the more expensive side compared to the regular cafes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZ1UyCvAj8kVGHLXk1oda7N9-ypADS3SPfX5zS&fid=0x0:0xf155067405d86e0"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Asad Sumair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlXXuGsd29jki8e-yWx8Fx-Kh3bHQIFBKgwfaVoaIMQnjiyUM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sunny M Specialty Coffee and Tea

I recently visited Sunny M Specialty Coffee and Tea and had an excellent experience. This cozy coffee shop offers a welcoming atmosphere, perfect for relaxing or catching up with friends.

I ordered two Spanish lattes and one coconut latte, and they were really good. The Spanish latte was rich and smooth, with the perfect balance of espresso and sweetness. The coconut latte was equally impressive, offering a delightful tropical twist that was both refreshing and satisfying.

The ambiance of Sunny M Specialty Coffee and Tea adds to the overall experience, with comfortable seating and a warm, inviting decor. The staff was friendly and attentive, making sure that every detail was just right.

Sunny M Specialty Coffee and Tea is a must-visit for anyone looking for a cozy spot to enjoy high-quality coffee and tea. I highly recommend it and look forward to my next visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQIGusimehWvkkDAKqzRnk1DxPXCMABRaeQRyW&fid=0x0:0xf155067405d86e0"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Will Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGDD7brNtaOWSPrb4kG9HB25Ge1x-VU_HZtlpi-qzw-EVvrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pour over selection with some interest reserve auctions beans. The owner was really cool and provided some explanation to the origin of the beans.

Only down side is shop has limited seating.

Will return to try the tea offerings","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpNC8ugo_B_LsTXBc4A_0-DoTZd0ZtxykM_llr&fid=0x0:0xf155067405d86e0"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Jim Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3tXWnX8xFhA_qZcSgIAVcjedjNVtb5Riz6aB4ltUNzTkDmgfU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another hidden gem coffee shop in Richmond. Never had a Dacquoise pastry before and it was sooo goood. 😋😋

Americano met my wife’s expectation too and she’s very picky with her taste in coffee.

The place is a bit small with only three table. It’s quiet and a very relaxing atmosphere. Will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeBkVBTMNZgiVc8-HtsQNpW5ZSUXq55m_twb9O&fid=0x0:0xf155067405d86e0"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Kenny Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCkKTuOESfGudPEm0-BDzQVkIamalgjsSUzE_II9VRplB0iEEX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited this coffee shop in Aug 2024. Very friendly and helpful staffs. Good boutique shop atmosphere. Decent coffee.

Had iced Americano and iced Latte. Also the tiramisu dessert. Overall pretty good. Expected a bit stronger/richer coffee drinks, as they have a good selection of beans for sale, e.g. ONYX and Five Elephants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJgc4KjxInobyMj4xCDuN5RSLRuRrCL2KMuNsW&fid=0x0:0xf155067405d86e0"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Angel David","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbHsnbRpH_Q6WjHO3KGuWDX9xxq_8wvkZ54MVUQi8qlPdh5tSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"10/17/2024 - first visit at this cafe. I didn’t know what to expect going in but the at atmosphere of the store (calming music, the tiny but cozy space)  made it so welcoming. Absolutely loved the Spanish latte and Black Pineapple Sea (especially if you’re into “weird flavours/combos”. 9/10 would definitely come back again. Perfect place to just relax and have a sip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6nkqSEHJo-G5W5dRSyetuVYS2xTaJzZXIK-V0&fid=0x0:0xf155067405d86e0"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Merle Langlois","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZnruGVXm60ftapBuESQGQtjZaF1P3OYbvdZyq6WrVWTjNEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love how they focus on the coffee instead of kissing people's ass. I like the no notebooks, pads, wifi on weekend and holidays. The coffee itself is good and is from specialty roasters. In other words, it seems to be one of those businesses where they actually care. I wish more businesses would be like this. The customer service is good. They even offered me a shot glass of ice to put in my Americano if I found it too hot, which I'd never experienced before.

The only drawback is they don't seem to have a bathroom.

It seems like this is right next to the place where an individual drove their car through the storefront!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgK-Yyln1QyZT0rSvg90Wm5S0MfmTx_RZlPBur&fid=0x0:0xf155067405d86e0"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Ilya Meerovich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMb0Yn-Fx1t0S2Qwa6f0VgKaIVigpWrYJVKpo4HmLJJcSjxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love it here, this is a fantastic coffee shop with lots of very interesting beans on offer. There's a wide assortment of beans from roasters all over the world, as well as rare lots roasted by the owner himself. You can order off the menu or get a Pick of the Day to make your decision easier. I highly recommend this place to folks who are really into coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkoAoAwIVEa_fR97zP8IqKZ8YsfbdI-dB18dCa&fid=0x0:0xf155067405d86e0"],"When":"2024-8-15"}]
