user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Peanut’s Bubble Tea in Richmond Public Market is a gem for bubble tea lovers. Their outstanding lemon slice tea and refreshing plum lemon tea are must-tries. The papaya milk tea is great, offering a unique and delightful flavor, while the taro milk tea stands out as excellent. Each drink is crafted with care, ensuring a consistently high-quality experience. For a fantastic bubble tea treat, Peanut’s is the place to go. Highly recommended for its variety and deliciousness!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3Ju0qkD1Pu3hnUgBEKmfe81L9Kg22jRcoib9_&fid=0x0:0x53bb0b73b49d05f6"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing that this food court bubble tea shop has been open for 30 years! Their prices are also like a step back in time - maybe not 30 years back, but before food prices skyrocketed in the past few years. You can get a drink with toppings for $5-7 and the wheel cakes are a little over $1. Some of the toppings are a little expensive, but with the base price of the drink as affordable as it is, you can still get a premium topping and have a drink at a reasonable price. My drink, a green bean slush with taro paste, plus two wheel cakes was $9.75. Cash only.
Despite the low prices, I was impressed by the quality of my drink. The earthy and natural flavour of the green bean paired with nutty taro was really nice. The taro paste was thick but smooth, and they were generous with it. Didn’t taste like "cheap" bubble tea even if the price is not too high.
The wheel cakes were also so good! They have 10 flavours that they make, but only 4 were ready when I ordered. Luckily they had two that I wanted to try: radish and taro. They're constantly cooking the wheel cakes so mine were still nice and warm when I got them. The cakes were super soft inside and generously filled. The warm taro paste was almost custardy and the savoury radish filling was also tasty.
The woman who took my order was super nice! There was a bit of a line but it moved fast. I probably got my order less than 10 minutes from the time I got in line.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2dRtWcrQgwT8TvZLJ2kUKvIyCaGES6UNTDsFL&fid=0x0:0x53bb0b73b49d05f6"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Ray Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3wj8Ne3ngI4eg9ouEU6zPmvERlQuudbckz4ma4Vg6pfYrsWM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wide selection of choices for drinks. Fast service, and very friendly. I wish I had a chance to try their wheel cakes before they sold out as this seems to be a specialty of this food stall vendor in the Richmond Public Market.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzJ51ieV-ryhdNOBZaNWCudHQ9rVDqo0LUZ07A&fid=0x0:0x53bb0b73b49d05f6"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Located on the second floor within the Richmond Public Market is a stall that sells old style bubble tea. There are many food restaurants surrounding it but this bubble tea spot is very popular with patrons. There are many varieties of milk tea to choose from and prices are very reasonable. You can choose ice and sugar levels. There are also snacks available. The original milk tea flavour was nice with more milk flavour than tea. Packaging was very simple. Overall, a good place to get your pearl milk tea fix in Richmond.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaV7EBF90M1zu69FW83th4hbbTTdDDyIGxr7LH&fid=0x0:0x53bb0b73b49d05f6"],"When":"2023-12-20"},{"Name":"Ellehcor Nire","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1C6MgNrkAWB3MzpeLwSSoAQ7O5eAvANGGUw1-7fxo334T6g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite bubble tea spot in Vancouver! A huge assortment of flavours, including fresh fruit options though the classic pearl milk tea is perfection. Wheel cakes are a must try, especially when fresh off the pan. Owners and staff are extremely welcoming and efficient in taking orders.  Best priced bubble tea in town. Also MEDIUM SIZED TAPIOCA. Enough said. The only place you need to try in Richmond Public Market 😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNizq1PhbN40iG5JB-hGhVwwanTIn6wWf-tA6uq&fid=0x0:0x53bb0b73b49d05f6"],"When":"2023-5-28"},{"Name":"E. Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWapxfDmUmneoBwxC1ihDSroK6TaIbvpgMe2GHZhKT4HcESHYsOew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been getting bubbles teas from Peanut's since 1993 when bubble teas became popular in Taiwan and my BF at the time wanted to open a tea shop in Taiwan. In search of the perfectly-made bubble tea, he declared at the time that Peanut's drinks are the best in Vancouver: tea sufficiently strong and bubbles perfectly "Q" (chewy). Since then, Peanut's drinks have not changed at all: the same quality and flavor, run by the same dedicated family. Their prices are a lot lower than other trendy tea places, and they have not increased their pricing significantly, like other vendors, yet you are still getting the same quality that they have maintained since my first drink there almost 30 years ago.  When you get your drinks there, don't forget to try their carefully-crafted (literally, with toothpicks!) wheel cakes for a nice snack to go with their refreshing drinks.

There will always be good bubble teas elsewhere, but are the quality and flavor consistent? Only time and repeated patronage can tell. Peanut's has certainly proven this over their decades of business.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPk05DTEWpR2C1Z4cqjPBX_nzVLClz9a88Z4wyy&fid=0x0:0x53bb0b73b49d05f6"],"When":"2022-7-19"},{"Name":"Nathalie Mark-Yam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoQrdGaBUxO_MNnJ-iLC9WdC71OuyDLsFvoe30Bt1qowJxg6Fk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"most popular place upstairs in the richmond public market. line up on Wednesday at 2pm. its a cool bbt & smoothie place that serves wheel cakes for $1 each.  these wheel cakes are so popular. most of the flavours were sold out already. We tried the taro, coconut and cream. the taro was the best out of the 3. the cakes have a mochi outside texture with a lot of filling inside. Their original milk tea was okay. it was more milky and not roasted enough for us. prices are great for what you get.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxJ_rr59vfAInvTFSKsdlPl_hN6OK7s3oPSvuF&fid=0x0:0x53bb0b73b49d05f6"],"When":"2021-12-1"},{"Name":"Alexandra Gaevsky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnjItyjfR1qVEZnY6caUOLCi6uNaCD4VjAop9J7DwgHSC2Qmwo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bubble tea tastes great! I drink the milk tea slush with boba, and it's delicious. The boba is chewy and perfect. However, the paper straws ruin the taste of the drink 😭","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0WmIuXc-kb_P00ZMKpZbBLvJm9DoHZaE_CMq0&fid=0x0:0x53bb0b73b49d05f6"],"When":"2024-8-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Coco Bubble Tea in Richmond Centre is a must-visit for bubble tea lovers! Their pearl milk tea is always delicious with perfectly chewy pearls, and the Mango Pomelo Sago is a refreshing and fruity option that’s just right. The standout for me is the Taro Slush—it’s smooth, flavorful, and simply excellent. The drinks are consistently high-quality, and the service is fast and friendly. If you’re craving bubble tea, Coco won’t disappoint!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrp9e8thkxm4YPVlVXRW6eI7x7E2peRrTK6sIh&fid=0x0:0xa1630c636df1bb22"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Laiza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKoapHCgD5yeQmHM39AB8OjvbVWbGinOc-W27dSQiCLwPA6IA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Coco Tea offers a delightful experience with their wide range of delicious drinks. Ordering online is so convenient, and my orders always arrive before the expected completion time. A great choice for a quick refreshment!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tsz Fung Heung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8IYYO2g6XLyEl38AsG6EMJjGWof8A5b0YAaWvA1owyfDhumu-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered a Mango smoothie here. I waited for 15-20 minutes, just to notice that they missed my order. I have to urge them and eventually getting my drink after 5 more minutes. At least the smoothie that I got is not too bad. But still I will never buy anything here ever again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Luxuan Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZOC2cGvamcxndEwV1SBGly3rQRqLoN5vpNgj9cGK85SEo9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was patiently standing aside, silently waiting for my drink, when the staff member in the pink shirt abruptly and rudely said, 'We’ll call you when it’s ready!' Her tone was unprofessional and unnecessarily harsh, making me feel uncomfortable for simply waiting. This kind of attitude is disappointing and certainly not what I expect as a customer.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"kenny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWL1agyDfnP8CR5gCadfPYTnKOXQW-zzblNz3kf8e3fHO6jClg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came to Richmond Centre Coco to get a drink, I order a Green Tea with 30% sugar, No Ice, COCONUT JELLY, and Honey Jelly. I find out later that there was no COCONUT JELLY to be found. I had to pay extra for a topping I didn’t get. Please make sure your staff don’t mess up other people orders like mine, please and thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVHcFZitJvjFsCdH9YQ-0QBcIagNuE7hHmvqNS&fid=0x0:0xa1630c636df1bb22"],"When":"2023-8-23"},{"Name":"Даниїл Гусак","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXHCkmVWQ9p099Qv3EkkQ3JtExVpUsm7iKeAlHNTnXucB6qghB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I bought two Dream grapes and it’s so disgusting. i love grapes but it’s the first time i try something bad like this. The cashier was looking at me like i did something. Really bad place i don’t recommend.
I can recommend you another place but i think i cant say it here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zhongjie Shen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQdpLpicSWBkeTiW58KL-DDp4avZ0bnQ4Ge6Ah6getaY2VNENFww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"BECAREFUL ABOUT WHAT THEY CHARGE YOU.

We ordered a QQ milk tea. Their poster said it’s $6 but we got charged $6.2. Not a huge amount of money but this sneaky action is disgusting and illegal","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgEOV5MHYHAAIK3abNjcA3Z1yTw5UmlZ-HdmJT&fid=0x0:0xa1630c636df1bb22"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"mochi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFJ3YzQy4Ek7Uv6iuvuDDt8SDrpfRq8OqiVFgoo79K5l16GqzX4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"bubble gaga was good~

between chatime & coco, I prefer coco

keep up the good work

edit: taro and specialty drinks are wayyyy too sweet. tastes like sugar water :((( best to order the “original” drinks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYb0CDTS5MuKU0ZrD6PQ42m_2jDumjHOC2Gy_s&fid=0x0:0xa1630c636df1bb22"],"When":"2023-3-9"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Cary","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-y9np6oC778HLNlYYLfpIxcj5raTwBxDmUtIQXyy23slCcRaN=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great spot for high quality Chinese tea! The vibe is super chill, and the tea is beautifully served. The staff is super friendly and happy to help you pick out something tasty. Definitely a must-visit if you’re into tea or just want a nice, relaxing place to hang out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxCIpvxBLpoboWjBb4doiiK7Q426GXk_df6YhY\u0026fid=0x0:0x23b354f8d90c80c4"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Karen Hsu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXe-sTxyvg0gru_unLL38RluvWWUpNKJwSKpBva_p-oWjc5ShDz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"High quality tea! And dessert is very tasty and not too sweet. They have the other desserts looking tasty. Environment is very clean and new, good for spending a quiet afternoon here. And they have chargers for most seats.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnMdLL7WAmya5FNcWd_QXfGmxUlRN_Rs6hqdWQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x23b354f8d90c80c4"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Jane-Lauren Amerson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjrRiXQMqwrD34JzfvWbI8qNFn0KfCA7ARMRnvmQoewgFU3ED2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute tea cafe that has interesting tea blends. Tentative owner and staff that's passionate about educating people in tea flavours. Cute desserts but haven't tired it all. Everything down to every tea vessel is thought through.\nWill be coming again to try different teas and desserts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNa8H4Nk2ubnvb55Mq_AcOTDW37pwQpwyJ7DCiQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x23b354f8d90c80c4"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Brandon Vergara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0sUCKmJzb5ULZmZk4uKb7mCDYcBYckTM0Rkua9mbof6HqpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredible tasting experience, and great tea. Had never been before and was given a full explanation on each tea and how they would be served. Lots of quality tea for sale if you would rather make it at home. Great spot to chill as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB76AoaJ0Nn002z4P4Ff1tUrapoeRGSWqwJGsJ\u0026fid=0x0:0x23b354f8d90c80c4"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"M T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2FWGhgeZWb5P3t4wV0TsBf9jotAgG5K7R_um74uZ0bSzmol412w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Will definitely be coming back to Tea Origin. The staff were friendly and knowledgeable about tea and gave us a lovely introduction to all of their teas so we could best choose what we liked. Also, their desserts are delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxhofRgWqCYjoPdKtxDZPckJnbG7FSOjEiUTgK\u0026fid=0x0:0x23b354f8d90c80c4"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Kaiwen Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9Ruel6f7BXK0xg4bKT8y4C7VS0td9BVQFzIHxcpGRCbSQWjx1Zg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great place to spend your afternoon! We got the Ya'an Snow Jasmine Tea雅安飘雪 and Highly Aromatic Oolong Tea鸭屎香单丛 and they are very aromatic and fragrant. The place is pretty quiet and clean. Service is great as well. I got a coupon for this review but this place is actually worth coming.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJV-8m1qi4xrGcjCc5mlaxp0D2Jvs3CrIy69U2\u0026fid=0x0:0x23b354f8d90c80c4"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Eddie Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrB2_zQ2TAxfhzYkH4qMCENknBQ-UpPYinOAqf27ZOelHdzkhY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Overall a wonderful experience, they had an expansive menu with prices as low as $18 and up to $58.The owner was very knowledgeable about their tea options and patient enough to recommend me one based on my tastes. 10/10 would bring friends here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_oAufvCnaJhNNoeAGJlwXa4-RdnDGahugXqcf\u0026fid=0x0:0x23b354f8d90c80c4"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Mika","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW19cIczv6cWjTLdjGL333iUdYSXMEgAG10g81S8IdF-TTeW4pf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Walked in here spontaenously and ended up being treated to high-quality tea and desserts! Beautiful space and I got wonderful explanations on the tea and desserts I chose.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeSQ8l-ZGvdC4PIykvrRgqeHNORW1anVqFPj7E\u0026fid=0x0:0x23b354f8d90c80c4"],"When":"2024-11-5"}]

Light strawberry flavour and creamy consistency.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjoEb9AqCFuWGyC155L7EJHzgwmcvefAoYrUVp\u0026fid=0x0:0x2fa8dd5ef5905b6d"],"When":"2023-7-7"},{"Name":"Deepam Redhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLwYQvaA-l9XoQoaXAEh76BkED5p6ILY5o_83lmA6YX-33B8GyAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolute gem of a place and the vibe was great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqxw_hLG8HqYxz1K4nWP5nkQZau9oWm3qqWosI\u0026fid=0x0:0x2fa8dd5ef5905b6d"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Emil Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXknQyW2NyUMju0S4iRNBwNDE7nYLdVHOkBGGQSNCl5ndte_DxmgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered on Uber, everything is super!! Their croissants are amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipND6zLFRG24_MkPHt1C2-rDN2xYWA4uTEX8iACb\u0026fid=0x0:0x2fa8dd5ef5905b6d"],"When":"2023-7-7"},{"Name":"Christopher Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtomsyAfb3P160zSezAO91mUu9ObfiSYuPNey0xwHcFYArHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I thought I ordered a chestnut cake instead I was eating some Taro + something I don’t know cake. I don’t understand why people find that pink interior beautiful and elegant. It’s like a Barbie just walk pass by and exploded there. It’s hideous and it hurts my eyes. I wish google have the native star feature so I don’t have to give them one star.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: BeauTea 茶倾城
address: British Columbia, Richmond, Number 3 Rd, BeauTea 茶倾城邮政编码: V6Y 2B2
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eloise Peng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPtJjkKitbLnU92oxnqd37O3lxUJvENa6NTNodG65-7KQOLdf5Jw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We visited first time and it will definitely be the last time here. we ordered 3 drinks from Fantuan app, and ended up waited for 45 mins to got all our drinks. while asking for the reason, the staff manager stated in a rude attitude, and insisted that we will have to wait for all dine in order to finish, even they all came after our order.

the drinks were bad. we ordered 50% sugar but it was still too sweet.

we also ordered 2 bubble waffles and a drink from the counter, but the bubble waffles were the worst in town. very artificial taste. disappointing

Updates: a few minutes after i posted my experience, the staff manager called me with a criticizing manner, stating they intensionally postponed all Fantuan orders because one drink was discounted, knowing that we also ordered three full prize items with the counter and two other drinks in fantuan was also full priced.

he talked to me in a hostile tone and threatened me to never come back. this is how you treated your customer who just spent more then $40 for your “best” service in the shop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGeC4LFj4r49Sp_YXHmIDdYWfbceoKn3660xNq&fid=0x0:0xac3ee02fb3ccc6d3"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Tony Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsQQa4cKs0V-JLu9LHIxS8VATl42BnxGao3He7SS0Ay4p7XQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I visited today for the first time and ordered two drinks. I requested one with the least sugar and less ice, and the other with half sugar and less ice.Upon receiving the drinks, I noticed that both were made with half sugar and less ice.

I returned to the counter to inform the staff member of the mistake, indicating that one of the drinks should have been made with the least sugar.

The staff member responded with a noticeable attitude, stating, "I guess you are the customer," and then proceeded to remake the drink. Unfortunately, the remade drink tasted sweeter than the one with half sugar.

While I understand that mistakes can happen, this experience was disappointing. I might consider returning, but only when a different staff member is on duty.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anzhelika Nikolaichuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU123RIplbiNXMscZq9u4X1V1XLbPxoeLEjsPk_rz0EGzX_SMBh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered roselle rose slush and this is what I got for 7,35 $ + tax. The big half of the glass is blended ice, what  am I supposed to do? Wait for the ice to melt? Moreover, it took about 10 minutes to make this drink(?), although there were no orders before  me. This place gotta be a joke.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKOv7zO4hsI0YH6wad5x3arNtnTqjNHhRu3Zsp&fid=0x0:0xac3ee02fb3ccc6d3"],"When":"2024-1-30"},{"Name":"Aster Hu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7hUWW6e9lpPfhOrfYT3zVMMLX_AFMK9xBnObEoS_XLvRjJVM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the daily special Osmanthus  Oolong Milk Tea (half sugar, less ice) and I'm quite happy with it!

The oolong is definitely there and I can also taste the osmanthus fragrance. It comes with a decent amount of topping (I think it's tea jelly). The half sugar option is sweet enough but not too sweet for me (for benchmarking I used to go with no sugar at chatime). Overall, excellent milk tea with great balance!

Their menu is also interesting, I like that they offer daily special at a slightly lower price and I would love to try other milk teas if I visit again. IMO this is the standard of real milk tea. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ooo A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtK053dw0DreymaVahhbm6A8LZxVvMpJRAmtfS2mBpZQNowOGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My fav bubble tea shop so far!
The rose tea and other tea made with dried flowers are all amazing!
However might be too sweet for most people, half sugar will be recommended!
Like this spot not only because of their products but also because of their sweet service. Always make my day so well!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A small and cute boba shop around the Richmond Centre area, definitely doesn't disappoint! They have a pretty stacked menu, and also daily specials that are sold at a cheaper price. I highly recommend their brown sugar rose milk tea with pearls :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhQ_SZz3G_Cet9Y6tosOJKO7mT2vwd8SbYwkqL&fid=0x0:0xac3ee02fb3ccc6d3"],"When":"2023-9-7"},{"Name":"cindy yeah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYjrf9LubDi7Yzc_UAArC4y5OBiYlXaqSLa4qqL0hM5GyWHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"the music wa so loud...and drink didnt taste that good but i have to wait for so long, there is also a lot of dust on the decorations...also not good for pick up bc hard to park","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Deep","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9WlDSw-OlO2Uu1Fhe9VlfCRiv62H3rAl2GqFBp0OelGy3hw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So confused with the negative reviews, this place has hands down the best bubble tea I have ever tasted. The only slight negative is the sweetness but that's a personal thing, I went with half sweet and next time will probably go down to a quarter or less. It took time to make the drink and I understand why, this isn't your average bubble tea at all. Wow. On a side note, I don't understand any Asian languages but there was non stop bangers being played thru the store. I had to Shazam a bunch of tracks, straight fire now on my playlist.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Teresa Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7-lXcJ0oGwGmWUti9zI1w1UEIEORUR365nlesFkUSnO2t8bT1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Loved the Shiny Tea at the international village location, but they closed down. I was initially excited to give this location a try, but what I ended up with was a letdown.

The barista was sloppy with my tealato as the toppings were all on one side, and it was bare on the other. There is one topping I always ordered at the now closed international village location, and I'm not sure if this location or chain switched suppliers, but it tasted very odd and it's not good way. As someone who worked in a similar job, I don't require minimum or near minimum wage baristas to be happy, bubbly, and enthusiastic, but I would like it if they made it look like there was some effort put in making the items at least to a passing standard. Even just drizzling a topping recklessly around the tealato is better than dumping it on one side near the edge of the cup.

The milk tea was either sitting for a while or poorly made as it tasted like a generic sweet drink that is arguably worse than the bottled milk tea that you can purchase in asian supermarkets. If milk tea could taste stale, that's probably how I would describe it. The international village location always had a nice taste of tea that's noticeable and tasted fresh. The quality here took a nosedive, at least it did during my visit.

I like that this location is surrounded by great shops, which made visiting an enjoyable experience. I would visit the area again for the shopping, but not for this Shiny Tea location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNK8c02hFxe8R_BSq4STFFb3yBbe-9rOaMiaysv&fid=0x0:0x5281ea1f8d114369"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Emily Gan (甘可莹)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXENzagQ-F8-I2RvyQHjdfm9S2l0nEZGba2prkZP8YiyLRhUxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The shop was easy to find. The service was good and was rlly quick. The food was amazing, I would definitely recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvh2egH3Mwwn5KeCb2YNb7NgViu6K4KjI_lgbs&fid=0x0:0x5281ea1f8d114369"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Yiming Sun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHFO7eZqOmuUqaTbiBo6v-IZsB-hfbRTMwl0i6RKjwgJuwCz1v=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the tea here. They have a wide selection and the tea is as delicious as that from any other shops within the building, only a little more affordable. Highly highly recommended. The only tricky part is to find the shop -- it is the located in an edge row facing the train track on the second level.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"lu lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwxAUCTVKfQvDbrO03zOVK_GfDks1VFvsZ5E8p84ZbqLbl7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried milk tea and chocolate mixed ice cream. It’s good and rich in chocolate. The location is easy to find and the price is reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxZS-_WtHTYbLM_D06TMEwVdxslsdoIEKTz1AU&fid=0x0:0x5281ea1f8d114369"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Chloe “FA’sGalleyCorner”","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpzcRhul_Z0HhKGHDtxAmTp4x4oc1iw1-Iw2QCs-N_mGNcfy39=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"No place to sit, but you can alway sit upstairs. Never tried their dessert here. But relatively good “to go” bubble tea spot.  A lot of options to pick from.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8zuHW8VMPR6rwmECxAjb9NJ-k9PxHxP7Uloje&fid=0x0:0x5281ea1f8d114369"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"KPC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7k4kFfAsSrMElL09Q1yl0BM9p685Utc9lruLzkYxban-NfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered two drinks, a passion fruit slush and a mango green tea with grass jelly. However, I’m quite disappointed with both of the drinks.The passion fruit slush turned out to be lacking any passion fruit taste, it just tastes very mild and milky, when I assumed slush doesn’t contain any dairy. It’s totally not a fruity drink and it’s very different from what I’ve had at other stores before. I ordered 0% sweetness for the mango green tea but it tasted like it had 100% sweetness. I’m not sure if it was the mango syrup or what but it’s definitely not 0% sweetness. Please improve.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"kenneith do","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO_P1hyA3YeWNuMJD32ERIeG7BV0MWaxP3Yfzoaj7-dIJ-2XKS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love coming here to get bubble tea when I am in the Aberdeen square, the workers are very friendly and the service is good. The honey jasmine green tea is my favourite.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yan Wai Sze","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYabMYA4JyCzrs5-blhseKWcYdq8fPgU3OMpu9vky5PPFxjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always buy the oreo milk tea and it tastes so good with affordable price!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRBXLReA0RJ0dduUjIP2gfcvekv8SZ01CZNJNq&fid=0x0:0x5281ea1f8d114369"],"When":"2024-11-28"}]

[{"Name":"Mini Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVd8UO7vSQ6uAepc8Q89jz06o2Hk-hIH8uLSPAuosYQnY_rixIXnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the new tasting menu (Pineapple series)!
The passion fruit and pineapple tea is so fresh! It's REAL PINEAPPLE & PASSION FRUIT😍No artificial taste!

Love it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6OOmNr8MQHel5GbQ9_59N2WXVk6l6IhuvcDZR&fid=0x0:0xafa344b6fd541964"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Maya R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNTJTaxVFS43rU8wffMV_TIY3vSjpuWE92T3_3_2VvyKeT1ytzJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Royal milk tea reminds me more of a roasted milk tea. I got my drink with no ice but it came just slightly empty. I'm not sure if that was intentional.
Overall not a bad experience but I don't think I would call it a 'royal milk tea'.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCOkpK5Hqubzx4E0jF_CPFU8XvKW-10q4dQqpf&fid=0x0:0xafa344b6fd541964"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Nara Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhvqYviVmNRdUs4hBsTj9aEeMEUIUtVFXoe8f3rZFhfWT27yat=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It’s an okay place to have bubble tea and bubble waffles. Service is okay too. Great choice of music and plenty of seats.

You can park in the parkade and get a parking pass from the cashier if you plan to stay for a while.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1KIp5oKknWtCHk9cWZATIeo8KBlEuc666_n5P&fid=0x0:0xafa344b6fd541964"],"When":"2017-12-28"},{"Name":"Séra Klein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsX2Wc9rwt6p1OFqqYfVPexVGfJIkNDIJIJ9g28niJxvEKTtY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The drinks are good, standard gongcha experience. The inside seating only has about 4 tables, so if you come here to study, you just gotta get lucky for a table, because some people stay here for a really long time, lol. Good if you wanna pop in and out for a bbt.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM72A-r3jJAcnHBEgAvg_O2gGEk3w9awTDq1aaN&fid=0x0:0xafa344b6fd541964"],"When":"2020-10-9"},{"Name":"Paula Hlavacek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUEHsTUDREBV0VNUK6UGtTRNbBuCTOdBVYyLeZYC7hO1QTx25MLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Your average typical bubble tea! Ps no lactose-free alternatives here.. they have lots of Christmas specials with unique flavours such as Hot purple yam latte, hot matcha latte and my favorite Hot Taro latte! I got the honey lemon green tea with aloe & coconut jelly .... I found it to be too sweet and didn’t really like it while the other drink brown sugar pearls with Oreo taste like dirt. Stick to the original brown sugar drink. The matcha waffle however was perfect! Crunch yet soft on the inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1840TDUyYgdtNgIlWmjSWs_8KRF8cDNrLi3_M&fid=0x0:0xafa344b6fd541964"],"When":"2020-12-21"},{"Name":"Steven Kwan (kwanste)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6842Md8cxNbpZUmdIiQtAIMLlTr1BRhgUWJantzMzNS3JXy0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The bubble tea is consistent and dependably good. I stop here pretty regularly when I’m just in there mood for something solid. It’s also pretty chill here. PROTIP the entrance to the parking lot is in the alley in back. It’s free parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQD7nIb3uCHNr4HkiHELdP_OY4lMhUyRtKHbw&fid=0x0:0xafa344b6fd541964"],"When":"2023-1-15"},{"Name":"mochi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFJ3YzQy4Ek7Uv6iuvuDDt8SDrpfRq8OqiVFgoo79K5l16GqzX4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Discounts on Tuesdays (I believe 15% off any drink). Good place to get your bubble tea fix. I rated the strawberry matcha more for its looks than the taste. Boba isn't the best that I've tried (slightly on the hard side).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYrzEVZFFfwYQ_obAAXn7M7DNRlRrb16SainkY&fid=0x0:0xafa344b6fd541964"],"When":"2023-4-7"},{"Name":"jambingoo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4XoLAUvqX0_n7K0yyq_zZCyfuMST3JOhDaDR-hXm8GdWpNg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Finished my drink and found a piece of rubber/plastic that's obviously not supposed to be part of the drink. It's definitely not edible, and I don't know if the drink was even clean then. Not happy with this experience, and very disappointed. Cleanliness should be a central part of any food/drink establishment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyo3-m4WQbTRp_OIPOZIXUiUvQV2apFQ7YAYNH&fid=0x0:0xafa344b6fd541964"],"When":"2021-5-12"}]

[{"Name":"TOMMY LEE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWPgWPrOC1lvNCModpnvaap-NwRog6YNULAARQI9BtWfn14oeP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful little bubble tea boutique. Service that mother would be proud of. You have various flavours to choose from, if you have a hard time deciding ask for the most popular drinks. As with most bubble tea stores you can customize your sugar, ice levels according to your taste buds. Don’t forget to add your pearls, jelly, beans. They are extra $ but are so worth it.
Add a sweet dessert for take out as well. Hey you need to treat yourself or that someone special once in awhile 👍. You deserve it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJ2QQPJYj_-VxsKkII3weeNjt7ONMTTks8DKMs&fid=0x0:0x40eaad676613d4b9"],"When":"2024-4-24"},{"Name":"leesa tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWsWaHyhzcw7kKPh9V3HkvTK5TTa81TdmCDp9IylYllx4puXIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"New dessert shop close to Richmond Centre! I tried the mochi, milk tea and chocolate cakes and I thought they were pretty decent. I would say the mochi would be my top pick followed by the chocolate then milk tea.

Also tried the passion fruit and mango green tea and thought it was a bit too sweet for my liking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoFdDW4TU79n5LP2OcJJUBQQiS38OCx780OtyG&fid=0x0:0x40eaad676613d4b9"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Domingo Hui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzPoe6E88HJrdTgEgR3TnzoHZSG7eFnLZnjBJE3tqtddR2nHo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful shop! New bubble tea place by the bus loop. I got a lemon lime oolong tea that was truly special with flavours not found in many other places. Make sure to treat yourself with home made desserts too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWvg3b_WV1kx8RooMMMg3lXdvSQbPYv9Gt9k91&fid=0x0:0x40eaad676613d4b9"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"Dan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6Vpad3zmd_bRS_NRyMDg5xHn355DE6cSY0nXB1CDQJfi5a5o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A very small shop at the corner of No 3 road.
Turn right at On The Run and you’ll find this little store. I walked around the whole block to locate this store 😂 I tried their mango pomelo sago, not the best I’ve had, the coconut flavor overpowered the mango flavor. The drink is good, but I just prefer stronger mango flavor. Their passion fruit mango green tea was fantastic though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMa9TOynIjrj8LPy6TQ8nPIIBAoY3hRixeguVFT&fid=0x0:0x40eaad676613d4b9"],"When":"2024-4-17"},{"Name":"Vic Yung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjSUFpvFSwHsCrywPzGZzN7WDhV8Ljlj3YECw07iwjqMR_leW5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went on a weekday evening and the store was relatively easy to find. It was not very busy. I tried to order the oolong tea with peanut foam but they did not have the peanut foam. They did suggest the cheese foam instead, so I ordered the matcha with cheese foam, 50% sugar and ice. The drink was made right away and was not too sweet. The matcha flavor could have been more pronounced.

The price is not too high, considering the size and the location.

Parking was not necessarily easy to find, so it was much easier to access by walking. Since the space is so small, I would recommend visiting just to order and pick up without staying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOS1xxw2T3HmefRF4bNfFeUBM2aSeZmreFDqc5X&fid=0x0:0x40eaad676613d4b9"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Sally","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYjadMy5T259gkmUlT3p9sRdMDrhLZLohAcAX0TlTZ6TSMTtRT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The brown sugar pearl fresh milk lacked the aroma of tea and tasted heavily of artificial sweetener. I asked for it to be made with less sugar and ice, but it still ended up quite sweet and cold.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-HiYj3-Io9sq3HSGigxCjy0R3RVhJu1n5A-MM&fid=0x0:0x40eaad676613d4b9"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"J Lum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjVDSF6GLpOt9TbGVIYbPyuME5IGvtBYEUCly96a8repQNOavA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good drinks. Located next to chicha sen so will be hard to compete. If you don't like holding cold drinks they have a sleeve cover that helps deal with that. Went when they had a 20% all drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnm1-4MzuimY3RjQDFFbEvEbq17HD2o9R_d8UU&fid=0x0:0x40eaad676613d4b9"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"Anna Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQPX1o77PN2D8R16afgriKVqiL9bxxXgvpLd_TwEQr4BaQNf0L=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"ChooWee Bubble tea has been one of the few places that actually produces quality. I've had my fair share of bubble tea, and I could probably recite lines and lyrics from my fantuan order history about the worst and best places. Needless to say, Choowee is on the top.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"ctm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXB1imkqcUxp_Bz-Je5mCP_ShxLap8YPZmbWo3qteDmNMMm7ePy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I typically avoid negative reviews but this one really pissed me off so it’s more of a buyer beware‼️‼️‼️

Ordered the holy duck and holy ****, it is absolutely tiny. I counted 3 little pieces of duck , one tiny slice of tomato and lettuce. It looks nothing like their image the use on their menu, and the DISPLAY MODEL they have in store. the actual product is extremely small and misleading . The size of the croissant is probably 1/2 of what it should be.

This looks like some grocery store bought tiny croissants and quickly slapped together with little to no effort.

I understand sometimes good food does not come in large sizes but this is just absolutely misleading; and the taste is nothing out of the ordinary. Using cheap ingredients to market products as high quality food is not something to be proud of.

Beware!! There is no way this is worth your hard earned money.

I do not recommend coming here if unless you have an appetite of a 2 year old child.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxZw70_hLtg2j7b_xSL9pHHV4nia3gfEB9IWxg&fid=0x0:0x5993a362f4b0d6d9"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"明好來示範by徐馬力","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQLC5pMP0vC1AYCyqJ5brqSpWpkuxwsBGEUrhJd5QneW4K5pfE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good Pour over coffee, and the sandwiches are very decent. Had scallop and shrimp sandwich and spicy chilly duck sandwich. Seen lots of people come here for oyster but too bad I am not an oyster fan, looks super fresh!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsoq1EZqJKCCmSqUViWDcJOhEJgkMJa4GyYltf&fid=0x0:0x5993a362f4b0d6d9"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Origin Delight Cafe in Pacific Plaza food court is a fantastic spot for a delightful meal. Their lobster scallop croissant is a must-try, offering a unique and delicious combination. The mango salad is fresh and flavorful, perfect for a light bite. Don’t miss their signature drinks like fruit tea and green tea, which are both refreshing and tasty. The lychee soda is a refreshing treat. Origin Delight Cafe is a top choice for excellent food and drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgrcukqsizfzWiaXIcE85c6IhGd0y_3GE-UB6-&fid=0x0:0x5993a362f4b0d6d9"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Cassandra Hung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyqE7_G_YQE66KTdUJ4OXzizw3a7lxSkRa8HY-fJWKGdjIYxfW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem in a food court. Superb service, small but offering great variety. Many people come for their oysters, but it’s their croissants that captured my heart 🥰😋 The mango coconut milk with aloe vera is my go-to for summer—refreshing and not overly sweet. The crème brûlée is also a must-try. I hope they’ll expand and move into a proper café space with seating soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlsqajt7QgUK7d_v5WCOFxIoxCtU6nOqmENBJN&fid=0x0:0x5993a362f4b0d6d9"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Mandy Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNuY-0jTdNxHB6ttH2ufYmdFgIPCnay3FkwmJb6Egjx8UEdzY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally got the chance to go to Origin Cafe and try their dishes. We had the fresh oysters, black truffle chicken croissant, scallop and shrimp croissant, and also the aeropress - preimum bean coffee. All of them were incredibly delicious! The croissants were generously filled and bursting with flavor. The cafe even thoughtfully provided disposable gloves, which was great. The oysters were fresh, plump, juicy and sweet, especially when paired with the spicy sauce and lemon. I recommend trying a little bit of the spicy sauce first before adding it to the oysters because it's quite spicy. The aeropressure coffee is a speciality selection, rich and smooth without any bitterness, with a hint of the natural acidity of the coffee beans, which was a pleasant surprise!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCCK8mGKriXlvMQR-gBbYLa1pIhRBYU2emR18&fid=0x0:0x5993a362f4b0d6d9"],"When":"2024-2-8"},{"Name":"Keanna Brudy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrvtVDpTLv907TJCSFf5_gQPgnW430klNywJKG1DsDcUodZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We arrived hungry and didn't savor our food but it was delicious!! We had the Lobster tail croissant, Spicy Duck croissant and 6 of the West Coast Oysters. Pairs with a Mango bubble tea and a pineapple bubble tea with cream top. The lobster was cooked well, not rubbery at all. The oysters were probably the freshest and largest oysters we have ever had. Well worth the 21$ for 6 oysters. They could probably charge double considering the size.
All in all, we thoroughly enjoyed our visit from Mission, BC to this cafe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNmc_UCqqMRbdikVJgKEqLs2uXipmw4wYaB2Un&fid=0x0:0x5993a362f4b0d6d9"],"When":"2024-3-16"},{"Name":"Danny Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh9iLvKMlzIwNDPlGVTDPUlwHsbvep-h1JgMdVcgZXaG5lVvewMw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This small cafe is in the food court area. I had their pour over coffee and a black truffle chicken croissant. Both are beyond my expectations, a very speciality coffee with a perfect croissant. It is a very good place for a quick bite and for a delicious drink or coffee","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLWEl5mrEXj_eWWMIGp_bwhh-2y31jRTS1sPcA&fid=0x0:0x5993a362f4b0d6d9"],"When":"2024-6-14"},{"Name":"Stanley Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJv828Mq0RI43_3pU5iL16DocKE33YwgSXBDUJw-tBWhL_ELA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A cafe that offers their best to the customers.
I ordered Flat White and oysters from the cafe today. The barista picked the coffee bean with a special characteristic for me. It's processed with brandy! I could smell the brandy aroma when the barista was preparing the coffee. Could taste a tiny bit of wine but not overly strong. Just right! Coffee specialist quality at chain cafe price...... much better value.
This was the second time I bought the freshly opened oysters from Origin. I had the palm-sized east coast oysters this time. Super yummy! They came with full set of condiments, well packed with ice. Chatted with the staff and I can tell they really care about the quality of food they deliver to their customers. That's the attitude I always look for! Definitely a cafe I'd like to visit often.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfvP9iuA5SdUGylBYQiiFIuT77JjxVM5Pnbty0&fid=0x0:0x5993a362f4b0d6d9"],"When":"2023-2-25"}]

title: Well Tea
descriptions: Relaxed storefront offering Taiwanese cooking including vegan/vegetarian options, plus bubble teas.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Well Tea

Location: 4811 Hazelbridge Way, Richmond, BC V6X2K7

I chose to visit Well Tea during peak dinner hours to experience their offerings firsthand.

Appetizers

Squid Ball

The flavor of the squid ball was commendable, and the accompanying sauce complemented the dish well. While the exterior was slightly overcooked, the interior remained tender and flavorful. This minor flaw did not significantly detract from the overall enjoyment.

Rating: 7 out of 10

Beef Noodle Soup

The beef noodle soup featured a well-balanced flavor profile and a satisfying portion size. The beef was tender and well-prepared, contributing to a hearty and enjoyable dish.

Rating: 7 out of 10

Satay Hotpot

The satay hotpot offered a pleasant flavor, though I found the proportion of vegetables to be somewhat excessive for my personal preference. Nevertheless, it was a well-executed dish.

Rating: 7 out of 10

Beverages

Taro Slush & Summer Girl

The taro slush was expertly prepared, with a smooth consistency free of any large ice chunks. The “Summer Girl” beverage, recommended by our waitress, was equally impressive and refreshing.

Rating: 9 out of 10

Ambiance

The restaurant provided a comfortable and inviting atmosphere, enhancing the dining experience.

Service

The service was exemplary. Our waitress demonstrated extensive knowledge of the menu and was both friendly and patient in explaining the various options. Her attentiveness was particularly notable, as she checked on our table multiple times to ensure our satisfaction. Such a level of service is rare in similar establishments and greatly contributed to the overall positive experience.

Rating: 9 out of 10

Price

The pricing is reasonable, offering good value given the quality and quantity of the food served.

Verdict

I will undoubtedly return to Well Tea. The diverse selection of Taiwanese cuisine, combined with affordable pricing and outstanding service, makes it a highly recommended dining destination.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUjW9wxtfTFQ2QNQJsobqo9HFNTBGVmK2iD6o-&fid=0x0:0xc588e04911339462"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Enjoy the Taiwanese BBT food at Well Tea. My friend and I came here for lunch and he had the Taiwanese beef noodle, while I had the chicken nugget fried rice with the honey drink.

Usually have space because it is a relatively large restaurant. Parking can be busy on the weekends so plan accordingly.

This restaurant has been around for a long time too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMu31KtNPNTFKhRHoM-7oQfCxv0xGWpSshHGo-m&fid=0x0:0xc588e04911339462"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"becky Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAcpzr_qZ0tHJ8i2epPczMv5nMp1TE0nZA9oYeqQ7f10pg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to Well Tea occasionally especially when we have a large group like 20 to 30, they can definitely accommodate.
I visited yesterday to have a Sunday lunch. I was impressed by their service and also the food portion. Three of us share 2 dishes and at last brought 1 dish to go because of the big portion of it. The pork chop fried rice was surprised me of its taste. And it only cost you $20.5. Also, the lunch meal was a great deal for a deep fried chicken nugget with fried rice and a drink included costed you only $21. How can you find it in Vancouver with this price and the size of the dish. The only thing I suggest to improve is putting less salt. But this is my very personal preference. There's a bit of wait for the food to come, but the waitress did give us a heads up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNs2YVvmVDjnrH2sg3-WXf7-lEQGBkq8afCok&fid=0x0:0xc588e04911339462"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A classic taiwanese place with great food portions! Their salty pepper chicken nuggets were really well made, so that was quite a treat too and I highly recommend it :) Though their bubble tea is just alright...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFJjJD12fUTuCZYPsYcUET-XsthM0cZrnxxqba&fid=0x0:0xc588e04911339462"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It's a cute, clean, Taiwanese  restaurant. They have an extensive bubble tea menu with lots of flavours. They also have lots of Taiwanese classics, hot pot, udon, sides, noodle soups, and fried rice dishes. Overall, the food is average and reminiscent of mall food court quality Asian food.

The fried chicken is flavourful but on the greasier side. Portions are nice, large, and filling. Soup is decent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmvTNDkybhG6uug5AxsF9qmvbnV2vEEz43jtSE&fid=0x0:0xc588e04911339462"],"When":"2022-8-4"},{"Name":"Edwin Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_Xc2MCIbsA4DTgcPPFgt5WjCG_W1GvoTaIMAfget67u8dEbjjmg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food, excellent service, and very good loyalty rewards!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGZN6L_fhiGMywrHvs7WpLgburBUmIZXei6sp9&fid=0x0:0xc588e04911339462"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Jay A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0RELLdGDmU4mUU2O4splg5RoL3yTJnShh825sqC7IizJnW3IrnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for lunch and ordered some of their lunch specials!!! The one that I got was the beef noodle soup. It was awesome!! It didn’t taste salty. Some resto usually have that way too salty. Although, I wish it would have more meat. The rest of the food were good too!!! The flavours stayed the same since pre covid! That’s not even the highlight!! The highlight for my family there is, that was our toddlers very first time going to a restaurant that she can taste “adult” food! We told the person who helped us (which I failed to ask her name but) that the fish is for a golfer and she literally flicked a switch and said, “okay, less or no salt, no MSG, and no deep fried. Got it.” My wife and I were quite shocked and at the same time, relieved. That was a great introduction of trust! My family and I really enjoyed the food and time there!!! We definitely will go back to our routine of ordering from this restaurant again. Good job guys! Keep it up! Keep up the cleanliness too!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKaMBylWvRxESpZrhDWs6JYA2Y06jCpQ1aCFw5&fid=0x0:0xc588e04911339462"],"When":"2022-12-13"},{"Name":"Esther Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYOKzFB3nJZUSwtwyFCaWXA7R63eRLwnpBfj9pH76oOIk5pQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is decent.  Portion is huge
Some dishes may be slightly salty.
Love its hot rose milk tea and honey green tea with meal.
Parking is easy on Alexander Road.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Tsujiri Richmond

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bri G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_d9MZVk6NEsD3j9u47PSlmzO-GrumfKJQg0DEWtuWsOzRROk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an absolutely awesome experience.  So glad we did the afternoon autumn tea set. The onigri was so good! It was all good. The stunning plating. Felt very special.

One of the best parts was the staff. Super nice people all of them.  In particular, our waitress Mia( I think . Not sure if i heard wrong. We went Nov. 1st at 230pm). She was so kind, diligent in our tea and very helpful with all the questions we asked about where to put shoes, about food and dishes ect. 10/10 service pushed this place to full stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIpgERitSMNPvPVyZJK6VAus1woGcV7i2vu3Cv&fid=0x0:0x5cf0fb3964ec903"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We booked the table in 30 mins after they opened so it wasn't busy yet. A warm welcome greeted by the staff. Clean and organized, everything looked nice. We booked high tea to celebrate our daughter's birthday. Because we love to try high tea so some for kids, some for adults, perfect! Everything looked good. What a good experience to try Japanese high tea! And all the recommendations about what is good for kids, if they should have or shouldn't, appreciated it! The only thing that I think they should do is change the washroom lock, move it down more  because it's a bit too high for kids. And also difficult to unlock for kids. My daughters got stuck inside because it was difficult to unlock for them. Even me, I had a problem unlocking it. You have to put the door out to be able to unlock it so my friend put the door from outside for my kids to unlock the door. Anyway, we all had such a great time so thank you very much! Oh! I love green tea so I tried all their green tea menus, liked them all! They are not cheap on the ingredients.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQUUMn9j2XVRGx1j_zmf9bdNI51t6GEZcXvj4R&fid=0x0:0x5cf0fb3964ec903"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Leanna Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-SXyk3Kx1735OiIr1tgjifqKKjDGVUvlOKwRxhFYCtDjEz6O6zQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's hard to find high tea options with sweets that aren't too sweet so I'm glad we came across Tsujiri. Although the place has limited seating, we were able to reserve a table in the tatami section which I recommend as it's quieter and aesthetically pleasing. We got seated quite quickly and they started us off with the tea. We found the tea to be too sweet and couldn't make it less sweet no matter how much water we added. The tea was a blend of a black tea with Korean honey Yuja cha from T&T. Tasty but too sweet. All the savoury and sweet items arrived all at once. They were beautifully presented although some of the sweet items were beginning to melt when we got to them. We had 3 people and the amount of food was more than enough. The savoury items were better than your typical high tea sandwiches. I think 1 more savoury item would've balanced out the menu more. Our favourites were the unagi inari for the savoury item and the yogurt/ice cream parfait with cornflakes and brown sugar pearls for the sweet items as the different textures made it a fun experience to eat. Didn't care for the mochi Dango on a stick as it was too chewy and flavorless. We couldn't finish it all so we ended up packing some of the sweets to go. The service was friendly when we were able to get their attention but it was quite difficult as we were sitting at the back. The total for 3 people (3 sets) came to $120 which is good value for the price and experience. I would come again to try another set.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1ASFIsSRBIY_apq-pZl6MyLWsf507CW-F1SLM&fid=0x0:0x5cf0fb3964ec903"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Sinyo ganteng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK6DhObLW3StVcJ_e9Ph42mdmAq5cSoW-d536hao-jSu7WAn8I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the best  Japanese matcha, from their cakes to their drinks are made for perfection. I've been there several times and still want to go back. Richmond Tsujiri, I think it is better than others' locations. I gave the atmosphere 3 stars due to its always crowded. The table needs to have a reservation. Else, you may need to wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMs3VkI6K5ktDL7eJbDqWOZkkwZ3ToeGv8Rorx3&fid=0x0:0x5cf0fb3964ec903"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Branden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIs6a_R5xAIaJ3H2Q6Ffpj_MclDRcJQiQ0Lkja_94WV7pr_tw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went for high tea. Good selection, good tea, good atmosphere although it was too cold.

Food selection was good but some desserts were still slightly frozen. Service was okay, the waitress did not explain to us what were eating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdRf9eDV5y1JgB1hl082nJh0H_1iqZiKNiL3Kc&fid=0x0:0x5cf0fb3964ec903"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Zephyr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi0Xbpfu6tRkPw0IoGrJ0CmwuI_fq3bZplujLoTo1QVvPthPHi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tsujiri Richmond is a Japanese restaurant that offers a variety of matcha and hojicha beverages, along with traditional Japanese dishes such as soba noodles.

I tried the matcha ice cream, which featured a distinct matcha flavor with a subtle bitterness. The brown sugar added a nice sweetness that complemented the matcha. As I reached the bottom, there was additional brown sugar, making the overall flavor slightly sweeter. The dessert also included sweet cereal and soft pearls, adding interesting textures.

While the matcha ice cream was enjoyable, it didn't particularly stand out as exceptional. It’s a pleasant dessert that I might consider having again if I happen to be in the area, but it’s not something I’d make a special trip for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpOrR_EE9fngLfpJBx9UEFRMF3pGVXZzx-qsOq&fid=0x0:0x5cf0fb3964ec903"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Soojung Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0VgVSLiu0hA_KXN2UPR1cfNMrtFH3J6vQ9X825HDcPyDg1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went so many time this cafe! drink is good and match Cheesecake also super good. And we enjoyed several times high-tea.
At first, the quality of the food was good, but I could feel that the quality of the food was getting worse. This part is a little disappointing, but other than that, it‘s satisfying","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNL7_MdOyUv-naCofNDZAkV2YMMeLxaA3Wivdnh&fid=0x0:0x5cf0fb3964ec903"],"When":"2024-2-6"},{"Name":"Yuki Koi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlZs9LPQXdFOiluwjpoSCsUwrTPGNtLq82ldvGSnLzYdwpCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I wanted to buy a Father’s Day cake and I was immediately interested in the green forest cake for its beautiful design. But as soon as I received the cake, it was totally different from the picture 😭. I was definitely disappointed in the presentation. The cream was not evenly spread on the back of the cake; making it look messy. “Happy Father’s Day” was messily written on the chocolate. I could see they were rushing as all the other cake had been messily written too. I was told that the cake was different because they haven’t updated the pictures for a long time. The workers there just kinda stood around not knowing what to do while one lady was doing most of the work. Overall, the store was clean and all but the cake was really disappointing. Next time, please email or call if you are changing anything to the cake. I would definitely choose another store that does a better job for $75.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7Hqs5UOoaGyXvRdc-_A-nXCgZkhoN5xTJmyyi&fid=0x0:0x5cf0fb3964ec903"],"When":"2024-6-17"}]

title: NICETEA世界饮 (Order From Our Website & Win Surprise!)
owner: {"id":"115589067252027387846","name":"NICETEA世界饮 (Order From Our Website \u0026 Win Surprise!) (Owner)","link":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115589067252027387846"}

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alex Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7fMaXrubS8frD5Eei0Qwf6hJGqhzbFmJ8LnCIuciT6H4aU73G=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious fresh fruit tea options and a pleasantly bright & clean ambiance. (Tried the Day N Tokyo - lychee with konjac jelly).  Service was very patient and friendly as well. Drinks do not taste overly sweet at 50% sugar. I also appreciate that they use strong paper lid covers/straws instead of plastic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5q-iqMHpOCrI9pUgc2d7Rie4fTIEU5EE6I38B&fid=0x0:0xd93b1e7e2f443735"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"D Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIDwLc6YMoLSBMOkxChQTiFZMDqECaXGYe75FF5RrvctNzLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered their jumbo signature fruit tea - twice. Excellent both times. Cost about $9.50 with tax. Lotsa fruit - likely in their photo, and in a big cup, and you get a small fork as well.

I ordered at 30% sweet, and between two of us who shared it, we found it to be among the best fruit teas we've had in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWZLkKKneqd_kh6rt4ezc362_x1DCi1BO8mJxw&fid=0x0:0xd93b1e7e2f443735"],"When":"2021-7-7"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Got the Sunny Vancouver drink which is tea with mixed fresh fruits. Pretty refreshing and tasty in a giant cup. Serves as a secondary fruit salad. Only drawback is the fruits are quite large and roughly cut... Like not fine, like someone randomly chopped chunks of fruit and threw them in the drink not as pictured/advertised which looked like a prettier drink with small cubed melon. Otherwise the place is cute.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0HxPI3I-4XbtRNbVckTAvzAy5oGRsyFgtZv6d&fid=0x0:0xd93b1e7e2f443735"],"When":"2022-6-2"},{"Name":"gurjeet singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnZbwO5GpKCr2y0pt66yjpzIFGOmJc-Ydf2HufbeAaNd5Rr9o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So i came to near laundromat and i needed the loonies but i have only 2 dollars coin and i went in there for change and the staff they are very very very nice people they helped me even though they have very less coins and after taking the coins i came back to drink as thank you but i think i still owe them for the help because these drinks are really good and the staff is very helping
Thank you so much guys may god bless you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoqSr0WEbHrIgERP-480WtVo07C_y2h85shMMO&fid=0x0:0xd93b1e7e2f443735"],"When":"2024-3-4"},{"Name":"Chloe McClain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3fzcpsQmpVx-npD61byCHIeP3TtJcrGZB7Wvsfygh023L3OSE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were originally going to go to Snowy Village across the street, but then saw the World Tea House and decided to go there instead.

Little did we know that this would be the best tea we’ve ever had! The Tokyo drink was amazing. The staff was friendly and welcoming!

Cozy ambiance on a dark rainy night. Cute decoration, lighting, and mood. Perfect for a girls’ night out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgpGudZP17GPNURwIpo6OSkbAtrRBWHRbk2yb5&fid=0x0:0xd93b1e7e2f443735"],"When":"2022-4-11"},{"Name":"Rina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFro_bo-7QGaoVS_suV3IOtreX0dlKwvWzVOVgFYOxTT1i9-RQTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I only tried the sunny vancouver drink but it's so good. It's really sweet though so I recommend getting less sugar. It has many different types of fruit inside which is nice compared to other drink shops. They even give you a cute fork to eat the fruit with. The girl working there is also very nice and welcoming. If you are also a student you can also show your ID to get 20% off which I think is amazing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is very cute inside, and quite spacious too! The drink tastes pretty good too, but it wasn't anything specular, and their menu is a little on the pricier side too, but they do have a wide selection to choose from. The parking is pretty easy to find though, which is nice. I highly recommend their hawaii sunshine :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBkPVsDcbtTGKGuseY-eHBhAZaOKSbTwq2QGp8&fid=0x0:0xd93b1e7e2f443735"],"When":"2023-5-22"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Located in a little nondescript mini mall in Richmond.  Tried their Sunny Vancouver and
Mango Man. Not a whole lot of flavour to them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXuEtgs-aMlaYgkQPLd348ZFq4O99XoCHLYUJ9&fid=0x0:0xd93b1e7e2f443735"],"When":"2024-2-5"}]

about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Curbside pickup","enabled":true},{"name":"No-contact delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Drive-through","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"E L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd_b_CXHEZIb1pTu7y4x-2BElsP76KRkoMefUqyc0kTmxk5PjYTg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tea King offers a broad spectrum of loose teas, ranging from white to black and a variety of puerh tea cakes at fair prices.   Very good value for everyday drinking.   The young proprietors, Benton, and his partner, are enthusiastic and knowledgeable.   They are generous with their product and time.  Benton threw in samples of jasmine and tea balls with my purchase.  Though Tea King is predominantly a wholesaler, they welcome retail customers.   The loose tea can be purchased in smaller volumes with the exception of dried chrysanthemums.  Chrysanthemums come in massive 5lb pillows. The buds are extremely fragrant.  Be sure to contact the number posted prior to going to ensure the shop is open.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwNqrFXburJcnzB3QBUCKmqhgcYypog7tw0NL_\u0026fid=0x0:0x9afa66a95b1176fc"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Nikki Jin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9Eun6QJxBA_Iuj7-95iA3pc9YsdMPsvLLYqQx5MZBq4QyAGmu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a delightful experience meeting the very friendly \u0026 helpful young owner \u0026 his partner. They offer a great variety of teas at very affordable prices. Highly recommend it to regular tea drinkers and restaurant owners. Indeed, they supply tea to many local restaurants.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Walk With Will","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVS__EcHHsPlbVmX-nfw500gH9OcZm1FjpK_KLA9n24JjNvqLI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I stumbled upon this tea shop after a delightful meal at a nearby restaurant. The tea selection here is incredible, and the quality is top-notch. The best part? The pricing is incredibly reasonable for such high-quality teas. I couldn't resist taking home a few different varieties, and they've become a staple in my daily routine. A must-visit for tea enthusiasts!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"karmen fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHOqelFjXEEfWju4FxJFm0-l-j-PejaMyRr7hbHZAsBHdxVA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This tea shop is truly a hidden gem, and I owe my discovery to a restaurant that mentioned it! The tea quality is exceptional, and the prices are incredibly reasonable. Whether you're a seasoned tea connoisseur or just starting your tea journey, this place has something for everyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Law","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLU7ZychsGJj9Z57vcMAE4JCxNcy-gLqdrTVbxiRv1NIzyW-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am so happy that after all these years, I finally found a place where I can buy the best quality Chinese tea at a very reasonable price. It's definitely a 10 !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Connie Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJknknRsdrQc-F7JWk-DF_nw2Aw_JjCL5KdC5cBamRLoydvbg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Not a lot of selections but premium quality for sure. Was able to get some Oolong tea delivered to my mom’s place too! Came here after finding out they supply to most Chinese restaurants throughout lower mainland.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Will Tam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqk8KZ7GsGAY1z3NODBhFXmzqDla9eILaP7uvnt8Z4-WsSrA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family loves Chinese tea and found this store online. Service was amazing, delivered right to my door. Found out they supply most of the Chinese restaurants across lower mainland too!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charlie Hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdTRvqYmvVy5dYhz2iT7hGoX_me0ddBOsdafzvYRag4QEZAg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just amazing the quality of tea that they have and they deliver it right to my door without any complications","Images":null,"When":""}]
