user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Khue N.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVhVKylYAtr_zgjEBMuypkuJBrSM3sCJT_8EE6YWBCFfnw53OL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The coffee here was so good, took me right back to Vietnam!!!

I’ve tried many ca phe sua at many viet places in Vancouver but always left feeling disappointed, it’s either too sweet or too watery. This place really nailed it, can’t wait to try more drinks!

I’ve seen they even sell bottled coffee (?) and it’s inside Banh Mi Ba Le place so you get two in one place. Sooooo good!!

Limited seatings but plenty parking spots.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCB6J-B3UcE-QmxMtJkEWP7JSyLb7oyOO4dEgR&fid=0x0:0x3f0edf035b552130"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Clement Chew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwKhl3mEn2gCZF6VdKbi7gB6oYfqEyv4ScXRvTHDS2H04sB70nmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really enjoyed the Hanoi drip ube Vietnamese coffee! The ube was perfectly balanced—not too sweet—and complemented the rich flavor of the Vietnamese coffee","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5DQw3XnIV4k5gQjG_oQlqM9nrdktEqgw10NTm&fid=0x0:0x3f0edf035b552130"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"elaine zhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-SjtHnXPj_icrE-ZwEVjQB_3_Gx4hU_dtsEb7kHOxO1xpEcdj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered Ube Coconut Coffee and Black Sesame Latte, and love both! Nice drink and looking forward to try other drinks on the menu next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsWUFCQUP3nTReg_Q6R3Z2gUTOaBNhQQHk05VE&fid=0x0:0x3f0edf035b552130"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9-9RM8UxhR1OSp_BYzMNofg4VvmPhWmfDxtsrIseThc-pNA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hanoi Drip Coffee Richmond is a must-visit spot for coffee lovers! From the moment you walk in, the vibe is warm and inviting, blending modern design with authentic Vietnamese charm.

The coffee is next-level—their 100% Vietnamese robusta beans create bold, smooth, and perfectly balanced drinks. I tried the classic Vietnamese iced coffee (ca phe sua da), and it was the perfect kickstart to my day!

Customer service is on point. The staff is knowledgeable, friendly, and clearly passionate about what they do. They were more than happy to explain the menu and even share the story behind their coffee beans!

Whether you’re grabbing a quick coffee or looking for a cozy place to work or hang out, this spot is the real deal. Don’t miss their ube coconut latte—so unique and delicious.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"C L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTU8TH5lq4rZ1fPYRJ14w_qANSg-34AdVnR04TJt3cMzGq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had the viet iced coffee at the Hanoi Drip Rupert location and it was very strong and good.

Seems like Bale finally opened up a Hanoi Drip few days ago.  So instead of getting viet iced coffee, I tried the Red Thai Milk Tea.  Very good...similar to what you get in Thailand.

Minus one star for wanting to charge additional % if you use a credit card instead of cash or debit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlRdRPlM9-mXw_Oi0snluCaf4iw7Tg1NGfRlobrT8noGkzJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Viet coffee. Probably one of the best and tastiest because most Vietnamese places don’t seem to get the right sweetness or taste when making the Viet coffee. Will definitely come back when I’m in the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karwen Tsan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn0t5jmwXxKS3KRBdJYmn5Oq1KIVbQONhEn8KH992P65_MT1fa8w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fast speedy service.   Great tasting coffee and Crispy banh mi bread. Will return.  Thx","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMD4M5JbsvY17e4kspiVQOD0Lcwv9423mcOM9nb&fid=0x0:0x3f0edf035b552130"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Dennis Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVod0Irwbj4BHs0xH4gjix0eqZz1UbVO78AnVXMUDeHt7RpcSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the ube coconut 🥥 Viet icecoffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOV0lH2ulpFiiqsx4SxgMnz2r7HKmTvJDkDv5h&fid=0x0:0x3f0edf035b552130"],"When":"2024-10-14"}]

Well, yes it smells nice, but that's not what we are looking for. She finally sold us some teas that we asked for that, once we got home and tasted it, we definitely paid way too much for. The quality for the price was definitely not there. What a shame. They didn't seem to understand English very well, which isn't the end of the world, you can still figure things out.  However we really didn't feel welcome in the store. Very disappointing visit! We will continue our tea search and  hopefully can find a friendly, helpful vendor locally instead of having to order online.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ké","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4DO9PodDS1KD_OL1cP-G6hd2X2rw1XWXgCp700buSPrEX-2_m=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Currently my go-to tea place in Richmond! Great knowledge of the source of different teas, I know I’m getting real proper leaves here :)
The selection is really awesome too, from traditional classics to more premium leaves, this is a great place to explore the diversity of teas across China, Taiwan and HK. Some of their home-boxed teas also come with precise brewing instructions. I’ve been coming here for a year now and their recommendations don’t miss!!
I got myself a gaiwan set from here too and the quality is amazing, keeps the heat for a long time, and cleans so easily. Such an upgrade to my brewing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPB28ol1vB53_dnLYcTZl3mTiVUPMJCU0qu6lwV&fid=0x0:0x501ce115ce257e00"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Karen Milton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLG1tog9Z68hIYIthdwojQZgrcSB8JKPM-Eoa-BhefkkWw2iw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were welcomed in at the door by Patricia. Very lovely lady. Michael began showing us various teas as Patricia made us some tea to sip while we shopped. Very welcoming, warm reception. Michael later made us several different teas that we had asked to try and added a couple he thought we would enjoy. Wonderful experience. Michael is very knowledgeable and generously shares that knowledge.  We will definitely be back again and again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M Malarky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKYnw9WXCYvDMSzU0GXe3b5iuagnuSh6XmEFdGmbLCqvKttavg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Truly the Best Tea House! Came here this afternoon with my mom we are new to Chinese tea and Micheal and Patricia were very welcoming he ran through various types of tea then we sat down and tried about 3 or 4 different teas! Very nice! Definitely found our tea shop!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gooseberry Bilberry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMJD-L9WmQytMhbODZNa3Nz3Kk8Z3fxnupE5Xvb8JG11rhZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The Asian woman, who sat with an Asian man with one young Asian guy and one young Asian lady, waved at us when we entered the store.  We asked if they had Pu-erh tea bags and they said they did not.  Then she started to tell me about the kinds of Pu-erh tea that they had.  I noticed that the label on the packages of tea was incorrect (the words did not make sense) and she sounded confusing so we said we would think about them and started to leave.  Then she told us how to make tea with the filter and the tea cup condescendingly.  We left.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bill Nup","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgIjZplpFUeOxAw_EsxAzozsF6jl1uv2ytUVjMtkUCnDG2dA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in with my daughter looking for a tea pet and had the pleasure of sitting with Michael for probably close to an hour,  he prepared several teas for us and was so incredibly welcoming and knowledgeable.  We will be back for sure!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Igor Boyko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsiGiANpOY1Ux2AR-FBnMY9-4wAelQBRfXO12GfyZdJSa71Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best place to get good tea in Richmond.

Thank you for your help and professional advice.

Tea just amazing, this what I was looking for long long time ago.

I am just happy with my tea.

Thank you","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ricky Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXG5NgPTcY0QXPOb1hjXCi47f7NTqFje0byqfCfdGg-S9kl8Y7SbA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"premium chinese teas sold here","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yilyas Noor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7PLVY7fd-AX2vF9sLouHZa6eczrZ8_9AhiMy9A6xkdK078jzEJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"gavinsanjeev thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGAUeLD5NOXIorKGAGR49axJ13D84pV0I4_0Fx5437DzMhNg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pretty cringe place to be honest, mostly because atmosphere and the room design is bad.

Drink is decent and cake is good, however I believe due to its natural ingredients it taste plain. Won't recommend if you looking for high quality milk tea, but if you have allergy on certain chemical ingredients, this is the best Buble tea plaxe for you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOk7JbkYjHajfsMDeTCbmfGBdHcrlO1xJLlptbb&fid=0x0:0xa1ba8e52d09ec1bf"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Miche Priest","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6Ngks-gIlQZUWNp2YZpQdCdgDV2Rgucn_N6cuOor3x1nOTaQR0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best bubble tea! I’ve probably had bubble tea from at least a dozen places. My favourite was Machi Machi, then they closed. I ordered a hot Jasmine boba tea here at On-Yon Tea. The flavour had such beautiful depth, naturally fragrant. Friendly service. It’s a bit tucked away. I’m definitely coming back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cristina Tena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnsF2zssFqWee5osM7ipnQXzZgMOzWAlfjFr58e2fbIfYBed3M5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The two ladies were the kindest. They were very welcoming and the tea we ordered was delicious. The drinks were nicely presented in a high-quality cup that looked very nice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kimberly Roobish","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-mHkYXmYITIwN8VDy9DRAIbdv-7n1JMEl2Xoe5Ic1u3Uat2o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of our favorite places in Richmond, BC. The Mango Paradise is by far our favorite drink. Unmatched in terms of taste and quality. One of my favourite cakes!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ching Daniel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdQTVDOoo_VeQepkQR4XW4h7cPIvNMxrAmwo-rjRrRwI_xr7Ks=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the cakes are superb (must try), and the drinks are really good as well","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpkQeo7-_mC76xREcfcPdiy2rTN6ySs1jjOVPrT90jQWRlv3sL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"nice place for relaxing with yummy cakes and gorgeous drinks","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Ellie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzPXm7yzmjwIi7z40aX-XbcjL84D3EATyCX-2d4N01jMWZel46SQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love their Oreo mochi milk tea since it is my go to drink of choice. I wish they had 30% sugar option because 50% is still a bit too sweet. Other than that, the service here is good but there are some occasions where the staff does not notice customers entering the store because of the huge signs covering the window where the cashier normally stands.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNi3f7D-vuWqFmnfgY1PiudqPqB_nx3Q_aYvJRn&fid=0x0:0xbeca2cb01f9cf4d9"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"Toni Anne Tajanlangit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0ymDhbmyIxMZ7bUKQJTmgF2r3wn_dJCpiyPnY96pCFIpPOw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Picked up a BOGO offer from uber eats. Fleshy mango slush with coconut milk 2 for $9.35. It was good. Will come back to try more interesting flavors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRiVCX0q7r10t9bC4LGyJfSnipk_hSEZZ92J_1&fid=0x0:0xbeca2cb01f9cf4d9"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Laura Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtiSLYZ_v-k3n1J3v_J89nk8p15U4Kzr5DvU3QkqpqeGiecg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It was good until they started reducing the fruits. The same fruit tea we got during summer is now half the amount of fruit we got 10 days ago. My friend also had the same issue with their mango drink - also less mango. Just cos it’s not in season doesn’t mean the patrons should get dinged on the amount of fruit!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sweets Fanatic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKT4q9vq4bFnKURKLo-IuFZkNgSUZrYyHCHwVq7PvVTaTofHHc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered a purple sticky rice and tofu milk tea. It was surprisingly good despite the only option being either 100% sugar or 50% sugar. The sweets were a bit too expensive for my preferences but there milk teas are good in size and price.

Will come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnb11M2C-JoviitzpFNEdVSNYh8XNCro_VnO9s&fid=0x0:0xbeca2cb01f9cf4d9"],"When":"2022-9-16"},{"Name":"Ray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGVd5s-06Fr3JDo-bYWWNiziS7uiGN7g2hEorOk1Vp-qtDK_-cTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really tasty. I loved the Brulee Oreo Milk Tea, Brulee Boba Milk Tea, and Coconut Pudding Strawberry Coconut Milk. Strawberry Dorayaki is great but small for the price. Same with Matcha Mochi Cookie. Sea Salt Oreo Box cake was okay. Unfortunately I didn't like the Pumpkin Mochi at all. Would buy the drinks again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO9psHA5fJyBxybHkzn-pJnu-dOCa6ZdJkkJlT&fid=0x0:0xbeca2cb01f9cf4d9"],"When":"2023-7-20"},{"Name":"Tony H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4iwkPfc8cBtJSYR3BiViC9KJBg8yUWbPVhSbTSGqN7VfXMx-Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Used to my favourite bubble tea shop. I placed an online order yesterday, but couldn’t pickup in time. Tried to call them five times but no answer at all. It seems like their phone line exists just for fun. They just tossed my drink away at the end of day and told me to contact the platform.

I don’t think I will ever go back again and neither will my friends. What a joke.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEGhGvCVHJ0rc1yTm9UxnAOBOCqtLKZepf7_02z92wsrykmuOn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got their orange tea with BOGOF  promotion on ubereats.
It was amazing!
Their packing and cups were good, not cheaply made, and it got a lot of fresh oranges and limes inside 🥹
Very refreshing!
I'll visit in person soon to try more menue from them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6J7gTW5y3Pt9f-WR6QV0oDy4jZWEH_BIOif-L&fid=0x0:0xbeca2cb01f9cf4d9"],"When":"2023-4-11"},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The boba here is phenomenal, and there’re plenty of boba places in Richmond to compete with! Their sweetness and flavour is just right, at 100% sugar/ice, and the shop is very cute. It is a little small, and doesn’t have a table to sit at, but they also have some baked goods, which are also quite tasty! I highly recommend the oreo mochi milk tea and brûlée boba milk tea :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKr59fJi6ETZ45fwFnjq0Swi6gZ3ksybFIy2ga&fid=0x0:0xbeca2cb01f9cf4d9"],"When":"2023-4-28"}]

title: The Bubble Tea Shop
descriptions: Bright counter-serve spot offering bubble tea drinks, fruit slushes, coffee & egg waffles.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kel Shaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxlG7dSzG0XCaRucFdzjLtGXMN3t4REtRn-uT0qJZlGy2kASSN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little dessert place located under real Canadian superstore. Ben a few times. I’ve orally never had the bubble tea. Just their super tasty dessert waffles. They have sweet and savoury with no shortage of fillings and toppings. Be prepared to wait a bit as they do take time to make and sometimes only have 1 server on","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPr_8hhGESH7q_ix8bj3HVPd_NPwjoCTerJBvs\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c3fcb803f5e5454"],"When":"2024-3-14"},{"Name":"Duy T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-q9Nk62bNz4EuciUr1qRGxxQ8g_xJikWCDGYy4XykvphUvOlY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Did not try their waffles, but the drinks were pretty good. Nice looking place with sellable small merchandise with plushes and action figures. Pretty and helpful ladies.\n\nAccommodating what we wanted in our drinks. Did not realize there were tvs with menus on them until after ordering. As we were only looking at the pictures in front of the register. Nice chill place to hang back and relax.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMjHVlSSGjs1EJp3YJv8-8js1tpDhSjYmtYR6u\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c3fcb803f5e5454"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Talid Jalbout","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXaUeHBH7AVJdkjB_vmutMGnZKiS_gwPrWTjeXNr8SoSvPSvNMCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lots of really great options to choose from, many unusual ones such as topped with icecream. The dual cup is a great option if you're indecisive, but the flavours are available for it are limited. Fun interior with lots of things to look at. A couple of big tables, but it's a tight space.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPymd6S7YXFBDBtwKtQh3zVP6XmRPssmkoRjsCF\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c3fcb803f5e5454"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Kevin Ao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkBvZ6ce_zHnWsLqA5ojfX0nMQ_CDE0WIX5k8yhZ46T8a1BLiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Bubble Tea Shop is great place for bubble waffle and boba. I got the triple decker and it was delicious. The mango drink was refreshing. Staff is friendly. You can also buy random stuff from the glass shelves. There are two entrances.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMV2PJxbPc_ZcdG6h_z5fqOZYoHrLxcEtNa1-tF\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c3fcb803f5e5454"],"When":"2023-8-22"},{"Name":"Jenny Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgIEDkB2PzsQAjZtJxzL5NwawLrCpei_X1mvBSmllmI0Q-tBD5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sweet shop that has delicious bubble tea options and dessert waffles. You can customize the amounts of each topping for your drink as well as your premium waffles. The reasonable pricing and terrific service make it a place we highly recommend! The matcha ice cream and black sesame ice cream complement the red bean topping and black sesame waffle well. We hope to be back when we're in town!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_ufQ1s6QFFTpYNPLMa2qJgenLVVe-uDkZyY2U\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c3fcb803f5e5454"],"When":"2023-6-22"},{"Name":"Brian Shaler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVanm_SU1M6cSuCRW78pg1T2oWnXPERDUCzn8bF70zKPszCwZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is an interesting spot.  On one hand I thought the BBT was good and I’d like to come back and try other flavours.  But unlike some others, I don’t like the location. If I’m not shopping at Superstore I’m probably not trekking through this area of town and dealing with this parking lot. The store is also a mess with signage and pictures everywhere as well as merch in cubbies. It doesn’t mean the place wasn’t clean, just a lot going on. I do appreciate they offer a $0.25 discount for bringing your own cup!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjola7Oq_SF8HpVqAwimnmHx_l0XsVI7KDgxBB\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c3fcb803f5e5454"],"When":"2023-8-31"},{"Name":"Paula Hlavacek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUEHsTUDREBV0VNUK6UGtTRNbBuCTOdBVYyLeZYC7hO1QTx25MLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place has such a good bubble tea and waffles! The bad thing about massive menus is you can’t make a decision! Everything looks so good! The classic simple bubble waffles are the best, can’t go wrong with mochi! Bonus!! They have lactose free alternatives, coconut milk, almond milk and one more.. I forget! Really great place to hang for a quick dessert and a drink!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNON2PxrfAsF8Tu6u0pcAcg87wc8CHoPMpyedQ7\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c3fcb803f5e5454"],"When":"2021-2-8"},{"Name":"Jonathan H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgzhgQVztAxyjnx8UlA7B3n_i6sm9N4u3qe72zv5RxG6qHFl07=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! The choices are endless, they have an extensive drink and dessert menu. The wait times can be quite long but worth it. The bubble waffles are my favourite especially the ones with filling. Will definitely be back soon","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMifl3G7zcwLilk6XVcBIXeBnBmqJay5Zx3I4WD\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c3fcb803f5e5454"],"When":"2021-3-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Linda Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbm_M2si7-dsNFtTgBoE8eRYCks0e8XBB8KkK-5UTqWxSb-GHz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were looking for a unique experience and enjoy afternoon tea, and 饮茶 Secret Teahouse made our day. They charge a price per hour depending on which package you choose. We loved learning how to brew our own tea and all the home made desserts were delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUk1JTmGpismrmU0LRpdOiUJinkYmIMRaRryQr&fid=0x0:0xfe083051e82ed0bc"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Lori","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIm53ImkpPw8OPxMf1q_PC5P_lZsAyuK0vCta5T0Kos7d9pSVe-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The dessert, the tea, the presentation, the atmosphere 😭 everything was so good! It was only $68 pp, and we had a private room for 2.5 hours. All their desserts were carefully thought out with an appropriate tea pairing.

Their server was also very attentive, and if you need any additional service there is a bell you can ring as their private room is quiet and relaxing.

It was a bit tricky to find as it is in an office space, but they will text you with directions before your reservation, alternatively if you are commuting you can buzz their unit number at the front door to be let inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV8xF8bupkU2NO93MbnWsautFdhFqV7Dh2vqel&fid=0x0:0xfe083051e82ed0bc"],"When":"2023-10-29"},{"Name":"SAM DC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqt6zne_OLRm_EHX9Mss54Yafr5P9qLv6FPY7uF9eD39sO3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"my wife and i came here on a Thursday afternoon. we wanted to learn about proper tea etiquette and possibly enjoy each others company. we did get a good experience but it would have been much better if the host stayed for the first 15-20 minutes to help educate us on tea varieties and proper tea processes. the host was very kind and showed us the basics but nothing more. and then she left us. the room would be much nicer if they made it feel less like an office room. they could have put on bamboo wallpaper or painted it dark. the reception area is very impressive but unfortunately it doesn’t go all the way into the room. again…nice place but could use some improvements","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgnlXeWS14uUC4XiXX8mz2Zn3yL1CNn0U7YaD9&fid=0x0:0xfe083051e82ed0bc"],"When":"2023-7-13"},{"Name":"私 游 乐","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY6ioqRwFom47g_FwrX8IIeJdJBfGe0EluWv8vnka2XlT0bz_3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing experience in Secret Teahouse! We spent hours here with friends. Filled with cultural and fine arts. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOwoWGCKhabUpPlSZQvP48z6PpoVue9x31cWEs&fid=0x0:0xfe083051e82ed0bc"],"When":"2022-10-7"},{"Name":"Alvin Loong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwpDmit_xk0xUxNZH5Vd0_hpCVPtVJcGYTyRk6fYmJ1yj2BA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Couldn't find this place after about 15 minutes.
There's a sign outside on the ground level, you drive to the 3rd floor of the parking garage, go up the stairs to 4, and need an elevator code to 5.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dr. Shazni Thowseen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpEfn8tcBpe5nEd6mww9vYyCNwSggls-Z6v70HvYkfGkhTWkl0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere and tea","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Axel Marini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4-B6TuGlYg4jsnb0r9hTV4Fdei0XrZK9Vzyt-ExHP8kWIP7SlTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'll definitely be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mia L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHioAbT9uGpakKD22BXEpRWrnQkG1cp4DnXAgjFlFE5OGsE3o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"摩登现代的写字楼中，隐藏的这一隅茶香，真的好惊喜。一进门的庭院设计，静谧恬淡的氛围感扑面而来，恍然一步踏出了尘世纷扰。古朴端庄的传统陈设，配上设计感十足的壶杯碗盏，既内敛又张扬，既写意又稳重。相较于英式下午茶，这样的中式风格与茶的气质更显相得益彰。很惊艳，很放松，值得一试。","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFUyumw55tzwShEhO8BaobiIzoKhef4UVWakI&fid=0x0:0xfe083051e82ed0bc"],"When":"2022-10-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alf Red","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFBRVE_0kuKe1gVf-xQjLxmyxbS0djZAFQ50MISo3lfpl9yJY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sunday 830pm. not much of a line. In and Out within 10 minutes. ordered their June special Mango Pomelo Sago, after 5% tip, it was almost $7. with 30% sweetness, i find it still a bit sweet for my taste. but overall it was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN45yGHlyFcFDtlJihf10l9ASYxadlmR2AFtllI&fid=0x0:0xf9c07ff088d04258"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Hana Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1kXW1WtOTsRsY9__tHnVU5fOiZU1-aPRGv3IffnZExODlHRE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I just bought a pearl milk tea (No ice) - Oct 2nd 17:35pm

I ordered "No ice" - they gave me with ICE and then I told them right away "No ICE" - BUT they told me "No ice" still cold ... actually, it still has ICE inside","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtzlCxXZcKH-YsPdcHP-ddiCgDq-bYzVmEWj4&fid=0x0:0xf9c07ff088d04258"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Ellie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzPXm7yzmjwIi7z40aX-XbcjL84D3EATyCX-2d4N01jMWZel46SQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Edit: Mon Dec 25, 2023

I ordered 4 drinks and one of the orders were messed up. I ordered a mango Yakult with coconut jelly and they put in pearls and fresh taro instead of coconut jelly for the topping. It made the drink very disgusting and it ended up in the trash.

**************

It would be nice if this specific store participated more in the special promotions that the rest of Richmond’s Coco stores promoted.

It would also be nice if there was seating like most boba tea shops. Clean shop, the staff are quick with preparing my orders and are generally nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjzF26o98-r-axaYA_KuQmV7Y7Lu79-zZkzKAL&fid=0x0:0xf9c07ff088d04258"],"When":"2023-7-8"},{"Name":"sara chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4nroOUjnePWbHPsr-Dz0tPqeKdCc9A_o2Icu7hUI_EHkZmA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great CoCo drinks, lots of discounts happen at this store. This time Mango Milk Tea at 20% off and Large Size upgrade","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsrV7Ei7WX4kV_Gfl_KTYNyPz6Ll5VY8EXw41o&fid=0x0:0xf9c07ff088d04258"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"从容","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGSCAEbXMBXO65SBTPUJ8tlkisrCMYagPKljHMyUuVf-cc1Qw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Lacking in enthusiasm and intelligence also looks severely understaffed (1 worker) compared to Chatime hence slow beverage production time. I think ownership is being cheap","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkhO9IHuA0qLijUzrfdVjUQD2lRcs3gmsi6t8DkSaddhH-7H44=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered the fresh taro milk tea through door dash. When I got it, it was pretty much just a beverage of milk. There were hardly any taro in it whereas the picture showed a cup with large taro chunks. If I had to guess, I probably got a tablespoon of blended taro at most so basically the whole thing was milk. Luckily door dash refunded me quickly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shaeli Finnie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9swc8R2K-WPKeSpodeW9gMPefWym8hWzzaxuYb_8dEHf-eO8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been in here once, it's clean, nice and polite people! Just up your customer service game!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwhlFiHPSDGYcBNEBZjiV401CUR-8LRwpy-nj0JN_nYZzCJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Got the mango slush with pearls. Was decent flavor and ok pearls. The grape dream slush was also good. This location is tucked in a corner next to the Freshco. Customer service could be nicer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOwA2N0HPcKzMa79o9sWdKgYMX24nyE7mu4WDe&fid=0x0:0xf9c07ff088d04258"],"When":"2023-4-20"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Isabela Padilla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiseaaPVTqUF22ybPl9wGUNgpkZUqpVkNJoV5Tz5RG5RK8fsM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My fave cafe to study at! They don’t have a wide selection of pastries \u0026 sandwich. Only few tables have outlets so it’s first come first serve. It can get very busy around 5PM-9PM so there could be little to no spots for studying. I love their panda bubble tea (Classic Milk-tea with mixed pearls). No outside food/drinks allowed. Washroom key needed for washroom access.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBql94pGgGscIoFxaEljSpAiwoi1Tav7bkkuEE\u0026fid=0x0:0x734c257718fe47d4"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Burda Sir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsf0IPgqxq1OwyAYZu8cuyHghh5nhV25m7lBd103ulFx5CbA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere here is absolutely amazing! Cozy, stylish, and perfect for relaxing or catching up with friends. The coffee is top-notch—smooth, rich, and perfectly brewed. The pastries and desserts are fresh and delicious, with a great variety to choose from. The staff are incredibly friendly and attentive, making you feel right at home. Whether you’re looking for a quiet spot to work or just a place to unwind, this café is a gem. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julliet Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0fWWKZlcih_MjuZ0MU7z0-AuxifGWoZtZtqffSbSecxpieQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really nice interior with a relaxing upstairs loft for customers to sit \u003c3 so many drink options and I tried there signature fruit tea👍it was good 👍  the staff are kind and hard working\u003c3","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhxGAQnktacM9EpBa6dD7cZ7qwRHEivXdGRbto\u0026fid=0x0:0x734c257718fe47d4"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Si Z.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7gLWIj8IqjPvI73xDmz2DmSJqju6RFiW9wQSZ86hR0FOK_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Busy bubble tea place in the plaza with seating on the 2nd floor(couple table on first floor). Place is clean and smell coffee/tea which attracts me when I come in. This is good vibes but be prepared it’s a bit noisy as everyone is here to chat and talk about life. I ordered their black tea fresh milk drink with pearl. I am looking for strong tea flavoured bubble tea. Their bubble black tea meets my liking! Good tea taste ( I chose black tea)! Will come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPhQtPNCsIXYTpmaAniFHImXEEKQC4MxhQxk5N\u0026fid=0x0:0x734c257718fe47d4"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Angela Guo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIu-tb9cNLJeLqrjquZmvrjqkHTOPu2M5JyP989DJnGV_marA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This milk tea shop is greatttttt. I like the store’s vibe really chill, and the clerks there are really nice, and the owner also treat us well. The drinks, especially, the matcha, taste amazing (not that sweet and bitter)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPs9EOdwdB5hmJep9gunR2ZtEqLRgpoRG5XBXBV\u0026fid=0x0:0x734c257718fe47d4"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Micchi Ko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_jAytrCj0QUWrI1BxBWThFjcG4rZpTg2wzV0v2RjVMzbZ6uZM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always try jasmine milk tea at new boba spots and this was definitely a memorable one. I loved that you could taste the tea and it wasn’t overly sugary. The atmosphere was great as well, I love the upstairs study area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8nAv3PGDgBegU9X1Y-Trc1SYMRWRobcSn54k2\u0026fid=0x0:0x734c257718fe47d4"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Chang Wun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXinnRETbtdmwq0G3dzHpocXq4c0y1kT8tCLTmXT5-MPrsCx3WH9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The atmosphere on second floor is good, quiet and suitable for study.\nThey also have good black coffee!\nHowever, the cake is a bit disappointed, so dry and the flavor didn’t taste well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWi7tIAIDyTeMwomaJOQLDHCWA7rWu-lGj8Xls\u0026fid=0x0:0x734c257718fe47d4"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Lebaron Westermark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6pqpzlyQ9QLlb5oJ2GeXW1fiVuVRljOdQ5nakAd-6LHxm1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a wonderful experience at this cafe! The staff were extremely polite and welcoming, which made the visit even more pleasant. I tried the Earl Grey Chestnut Cake, and it was absolutely delicious—the chestnut cream was rich and flavorful. The watermelon smoothie was also very refreshing and perfectly balanced. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for great service and tasty treats!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lissey F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_0h2gfDoKvqHrlczcNzuVcw6R82p4tFoqi1v6X-IZDmM6MIVL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice little bubble tea place tucked away at a far corner of the outlet. Steady flow of customers, but not overly overcrowded; plentg of indoor and outdoor seating for everyone.

Staff is friendly and helpful with recommendations. Price is reasonable for a outlet bubble tea shop, with most drinks selling for $5.99 to $6.99.

I got the lychee fruit tea with black tea. It's much lighter than I was expecting, and not sweet despite opting for regular sugar. Probably the equivalent of 50% sweetness for most other bubble tea places. Sadly the lychee flavour is too light that I barely tasted it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHBkLUWUEFBLoMXfU30su9j4srHKsuIEPGL7yE&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Theresa Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXXyx0R-aYhpdkr3rO8RWtdAne-P2jLUdoemlenmpZtWZUBqF5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We had a honey green tea and bubble waffle here. The tea was great but the bubble waffle was kinda meh. The shell tasted a bit rough and it was a bit too sweet. I'll come back for the tea but skip the bubble waffle next time I shop at the outlet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDEwOLLp6rzPsYFCc8a2Og3NBMxL28pxvW7JWv&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-1-5"},{"Name":"Lauren G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxuzD4dNBcnsFwfMfkGF5frTb1vGOSS2zVwisDrkV_gL4jEfjs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Do NOT order the roasted milk tea unless you have tastebuds of steel. I took one sip and nearly choked bc it tasted like lukewarm motor oil (and I ordered full sugar). But- they were nice about fixing it plus we also got a taro bubble tea which was very good. Just stay away from the roasted milk tea if you know what’s good for ya","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV-Lz5qD-QzNF_pawOu12zrzamVUYajefxIRep&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"kawaii hatchiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLtom4JJghW2UnkOsI7GKr-J96yxZfSX4SBdkTaAQaNBfKVBVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time trying bbt here, surprised by the reasonable price point. The employees were very professional and attentive. I did find a string of plastic in my drink. Maybe something got caught in the blender when they were making my taro frap. I was driving when took a sip and thought it was a hair at first.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYZLgAT90di9uY8UAjLQrI2dzT1CRRqr56mqPi&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"mochi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFJ3YzQy4Ek7Uv6iuvuDDt8SDrpfRq8OqiVFgoo79K5l16GqzX4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"[June 2023]

All round good new boba place. Fast & friendly.
Good pearls & good taste. Mango & watermelon slush are fresh fruit slushes. Bunch of random asian snacks are on the side as well.

[November 2023]

Today, we ordered the Blue Raspberry Lemonade with pearls and it tasted really bad. The pearls also had a bad, tough texture. However, service is still ok, so I'm leaving it a 3*. I probably won't be coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEkVKb8gvyJGU-RIvoA23YlrvgHesEqIWD8u9x&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2023-6-16"},{"Name":"Ghazal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUxPjakfUDfUlOphLX0NHrhY3j03bOfl1WB2qtK88VIEBoxSUc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We were waiting for a very long time to get our order and the store wasn’t even that busy. I got the milk tea which I would rate 5/10. I had way better ones in other places.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOb3PmURpAa5j4zpBldaJSJscO099MqKy1MQ5SO&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"Ben Moreno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbXIQA5QNY2om_rvFeJhZDcAcErydWjpf8dpxFoZ8JJurbSZgE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice store in the outlet mall, plenty of choices for drinks and bubble waffles, fast service,  nice outdoor seating,  very convenient for a drinks and snacks break while hunting for deals, well recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhtLakxU9Asm8keAnh3Cg0WUedQJiRkpZ8QStw&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"HJ Marshall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_gcI3vW3uepTT3i_wt2Vk_IaBu140gLQwAD0ak9Ec_xFAMNhXbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice recharging station from all the shopping at outlets. Their fruit juice is great, and they provide samples for you to try out first.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4f_mUjfBiasGEX_-DZW0HxLDzDPB-egV2z7MA&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2023-10-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eric Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0gr4FJwX7uSRsri_QKTlCpQ7fvNJyeLKgpN_dcfVlc_Ai-SsYtg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"to the owner: STOP BEING so cheap and hire more help!
I've always enjoyed the drink here. But today, I see 10 people in there waiting for their drinks.. 3 people waiting to order. FanTuan online orders coming in.. and there is only ONE staff killing herself trying to fulfill everything!

And I see one frustrated customer blaming the staff for making drinks too slow.. are you kidding me??

HIRE MORE HELP! this is worker abuse. I can see her stressed our so bad and still putting up a smile to the customer apologize for the wait. I don't know how much she's making but I'm pretty sure it's not enough to take this crap from the owner and customers...

I end up leaving without making an order because I don't want to add to her burden..

p.s the photo didn't do it justice.. I took a quick shot outside, not waiting to embarrassed the staff..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvNtSbncIYr7A9Jw9G3DNjMnkOEZHFw7sAdha_&fid=0x0:0xe3293ffaa12020d"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Gabby Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIPqXtJqAFqafWVPH-MyQnikQYtCheKO-2tAhYhJsEXhJvVA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A delivered “caramel cheese cover tea with nut allergy note”. Label is missed, pearls are missed. Your staff probably added their spit as add-on lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv5l2txn4_RgpmYzsW1ud-RubppGctRWPG8623&fid=0x0:0xe3293ffaa12020d"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Rita Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmc_NaSONkWIixJp0aIJfzEeUUaQ6ey8qO8GfZDB2BfmIgZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Had high hopes for the bitter melon lemon tea...but tastes bland; not sour and not bitter.  Also had high expectation of the most expensive fruit tea I have ever purchased @ $11 for golden oolong; it was ok...but definitely wasn't worth it; especially they didn't post the price!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNN62HS7Pz57D2kabUatr0PAljLAmuUxkfnaRhA&fid=0x0:0xe3293ffaa12020d"],"When":"2022-7-4"},{"Name":"Xing Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIBOKZ14mzARBkSp9aJIsmt32x8wQQ5ET7rRo-Ox44QI7wIgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Their food/drink quality control is poor. The pearls are very hard, it seems that they did not cook pearls properly. Sometimes drinks are too sweet and sometimes drinks taste like just water. 😅😢","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dana Meng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWns9Obqs0woSr1Ts68KiDwp_BFLjIHf7KQr8QzjN-qYhkyxpV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The fruit tea is not that sweet comparing to other bubble tea shop but the flavor is stronger as well as last longer. The price is friendly. The store is neat and clean. Fast service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv_cesqM00iEp_6TlNuMYS7xglXOFUJ1Lf8A-g&fid=0x0:0xe3293ffaa12020d"],"When":"2019-5-6"},{"Name":"mouM S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ687QwbQA9gexuC7VRPefDyGuARP3J2lpu8ur0yH5swSNUvg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I don't know how this boba shop survives where it is, in Richmond, where there is almost one boba tea shop on every block.

To be fair, the drinks are ok. I used the app deals, so I won't complain how expensive the OG prices would be. What upsets me is how undertrained and unattentive their staff are. My last drink was not even sealed properly, and it split in the car. Luckily for me, I didn't get burned because my supposed hot drink was barely lurk warm.

(Photo taken at home, after I cleaned up the car and cloth)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9vXbgRsnaZ35UM7zUK0COp-pJotJPIK5AQR1k&fid=0x0:0xe3293ffaa12020d"],"When":"2024-1-3"},{"Name":"Chris Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYQ1OJuiFutHEMWnE6tT2aU1ESP4oSs7OtdglaK0ViH_103ch2rw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Somewhat interesting cubes style instead of pearls.  There’s quite a bit of tea flavor to pick from but not my cup of tea.  It wasn’t busy and wait time was a couple minutes, which is bearable.  A small shop that’s not so busy, even though I thought it should be an unique bbt shop but there’s no tea scent in the shop that made me had any urge in ordering specific drinks.  It’s like if you go Chatime, you might smell some tea scent and made you crave for a particular style of tea, here there’s none of that.  The decoration is fancy, maybe a good place to chat a bit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7izNq_TVS5rK7EgdA_4j_JPUingXhiG5fyssZ&fid=0x0:0xe3293ffaa12020d"],"When":"2020-1-12"},{"Name":"Jennifer K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMkax_2fXXooiAm9665uAreOW8DfWCb1muQl5VZguzF-YboA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love their oolong milk tea cube! The tea cubes are kind of like jelly cubes but tea infused. Much more unique than the mainstream pearls.

I've been here many times for the past few years and the service is fine for me. So not sure why this place has so many negative reviews but I've always had positive experience.

Their prices are reasonable and they are well staffed so I don't usually wait more than 5 minutes on my order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipME70z3xdj1xwsFyf5gVwsqHyn5OLDpsR4iaL_U&fid=0x0:0xe3293ffaa12020d"],"When":"2021-5-10"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Brian Shaler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVanm_SU1M6cSuCRW78pg1T2oWnXPERDUCzn8bF70zKPszCwZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I didn’t think it was possible for a 1 star BBT in Richmond but here we are. My daughter has never said no to anything related to Mango. Their supposed fresh mango slush tasted like ice with a little syrup. My daughter took a couple sips and refused the rest. Their milk tea tastes like watered down milk. No tea flavour in sight. Sigh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZOOZWPV8dieZX6RqRLGSSR9aFivUShgpV1cqD\u0026fid=0x0:0x770487b67e433743"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Bernie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPXTBFQGy4UZogf6r0hGxUGZ8fvtwePPN5iicbAtQksaWtpwOP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This bubble tea store sells interesting deals of ‘buy one take one' with a choice of a house special bubble milk tea or house special green milk tea’. Last Wednesday (Mar 12), I tried their buy one take one deal. But having consumed about 1/2 of the drink, my stomach hurt and had terrible diarrhea for 6 hours. I throw away even the unopened drinks.  I will never buy any product from that store.  This store is located at Lansdowne Mall at the Food court.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4_nG7MkaKH9vwb1YRdUEy6u-hoEul5bFtFAnG\u0026fid=0x0:0x770487b67e433743"],"When":"2024-3-16"},{"Name":"P S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrlIUkf9-8ai951RwUCSGqhhYaXUNSSv7B1ujqMWgalt0mcA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Bubble Milk Tea impressed me with its well-balanced ratio of milk and tea, resulting in a strong and flavorful blend. The richness of the tea was truly satisfying. I particularly enjoyed the chewy and delicious pearls, which added a delightful texture to the drink. What's even more impressive is the affordability – two cups of this amazing bubble tea only cost 6.49! With the added benefit of a buy one get one free offer, it's truly a great deal that perfectly matches its quality. I highly recommend trying it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgRBMW-wBO9GiOV-HKjM-iEsOUvuHNaIETvO0\u0026fid=0x0:0x770487b67e433743"],"When":"2023-5-24"},{"Name":"VVitch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqMxih1XfAF_WQrph5bnMipJY4xoPnVDzNiNojijwKwtpO4zCG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent bubble tea!🧋One of the OG quality shops and glad they're still around. Drinks are always fresh and made well. Reasonably priced especially for the size. Staff are always friendly too, which is a plus!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo5sPZ67s_mnhJwZ79b2vBa8twlqYbk9eZujv14dBdLN9-xEyftw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Serviceable place but drinks are way too expensive for the portion size.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxgiZsGDEv2j5m2__VN4FLbg2Zaq3azeonmVQ0\u0026fid=0x0:0x770487b67e433743"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Riddhi Loladia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImighxSgff1MIlyfN936r-Mh_X7KdPqBsiGSGe2mNqIfWWBYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the cute cup of boba tea here.\nTry the thick shake with boba pearls.\nSpent $ 8.50 for the thick shake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHRnBe_Eoj1HmWvQmnuLQi7QHDQPfYj7GwXdKw\u0026fid=0x0:0x770487b67e433743"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"V Red","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTLtpK1Lv7LPRSNB4SuFi3hQqPQ74wbuEcFvIJoyuaNCyTJJFS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Avoid at all costs.  The cashier doesn’t know how to use her voice when she’s wearing a mask and hiding behind a cheap plastic cover screen.  Then when I can’t hear her I lift the cover slightly and she slapped my hand hard and starts yelling.  This is physical assault.  Then some man comes and tells me to go away because he said she’s not mentally stable to serve me.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sponge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlGr1jblLkC-D6XUiua3EIOrd2usQFerS-nLX_8FIvMVxotyo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Do NOT buy their milk tea. Very very rude staff 👎 There’s neither real MILK nor real TEA. The addictive-taste fake milk tea is made with chemicals imported from China.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN03O_edN6n82mukzA3Ac57lGjjx8Wvoac0T-s2\u0026fid=0x0:0x770487b67e433743"],"When":"2022-7-7"}]

The staff was very friendly, and gave me a great deal on 2 puerh tea cakes. The tea exceeded my expectations, tasted woody, earthy, sweet and many refills. If you are looking to try puerh tea for the first time and don't want to spend too much on one cake, do give this store a try.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Victor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkxqtcGXmOPYM4VdnBihzRqF3McQwie2ieRk7WpRaOPgQ66Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Favorite place to stock up on Chinese tea!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tara Hamilton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUW_9u9F87mi5-J51PATOnRFWlnYtdU9PtOxDzqFuQyulnGxz-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My new favourite tea shop. The employees were incredibly friendly and helpful, and I got a LOT of tasty tea for a very, very good price. I will be shopping here again for sure!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWndE2VYoepG6_8Kv-aHxUnokSdM-Uor-EWoc4UYyxBysDtMLs9pg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly employee, recommended for people don't know much about tea","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shane Doddridge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsKhM7eV5BQzzfSr7C-OyiwkGTU7C9tjZU_WAx-VTIiTguRVUS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Amazing shop - it’s a shame that’s it’s buried inside a grotesque shopping mall.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrea Jin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDttha4fwdBkAvqakZnlVn96tSuReDO1eIR82e8eFtzLbdawtu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dmitry Rechkin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDYsaijwOvBS5vXUJfZ6KAvQNSvgiMqK82A2LE84tfn_85djcEQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Frederick Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWs7M2VfDSE9NxC3q4SorFSSFe4VPn60GnkBSskWKVnLB3fk88P=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: 101 BoBA
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My family and I have been visiting 101 Boba on Cambie many times and this is one of our favourite ones. My top drinks would be No.8 green tea, Orange green tea, and passion fruit green tea. However, my wife loves their four seasons with mango sorbet, while the kids love the classic black pearl milk tea. This is in our top 5 bubble tea places in Vancouver.

This time, I visited this place in Richmond. Flavour is consistent and it didn’t fail me. Parking is easy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqPTir78kVPRrxId7WAguochXeqr_U20J9lfeC&fid=0x0:0x5b54166c32e18312"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Kaman Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTfY1lFx7N7LsexryuKa9Q76pyfiBSBOSe4KZKmNeoZtDKwC8s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is the third 101 Boba store I visit. Consistent quality! Really enjoyed the roasted oolong milk tea with boba and pearl. They have many options to choose the level of sweetness and ice. Boba and pearls are both very chewy. Might be a little bit too chewy. I found they are too generous on boba and pearls - 1/4 of the cup! The store is very spacious and clean. Staff is friendly and attentive. Overall a delightful experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsWkuLVhkD5bMJIjSEZWPfLq4ZZZgLfD3kruJX&fid=0x0:0x5b54166c32e18312"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"leesa tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWsWaHyhzcw7kKPh9V3HkvTK5TTa81TdmCDp9IylYllx4puXIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Event place to come for fresh fruit bubble tea! Ordered the watermelon smoothie with boba. Thought it tasted pretty fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsn4StMvRSV3L9bOAcbTM-zmxn6K5ivBcta59e&fid=0x0:0x5b54166c32e18312"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"crescent Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaykkKF0Vkef9j4VFu9ZoIZWZoC6b9Sb2cisgBaTfngEg8D7G0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I order drink from 101 boba a lot. But this time, the plum green tea I order is wayyy too sweet. It definitely isn’t 30% sugar","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJSs0QUo31fVZD5J_0dUlwbvtOKFA__w7xiE5M&fid=0x0:0x5b54166c32e18312"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Sweets Fanatic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKT4q9vq4bFnKURKLo-IuFZkNgSUZrYyHCHwVq7PvVTaTofHHc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's pretty good. I ordered a buy-one-get-one-free black tea  bubble milk drink and it met all my requirements. It's not too sweet, and the bubbles are perfectly cooked.

Haven't tried all their drinks to be able to give out a complete detailed review, but I will be back.

Food: 5/5
Price: $
Atmosphere: 4/5 (very busy and full)

Come back rate: 100%","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlHhKN3CqGVORwv7lQo-OLeGqAYhowqRdHV-kx&fid=0x0:0x5b54166c32e18312"],"When":"2023-4-13"},{"Name":"Tem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUY8WkettiZkqf386nn4K0CSlIudLAv_bK7jZjfgHouK7YVMH9s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A wonderful selection with fair prices! I love how they offer small pearls and their topping mixes like ultimate chew! They also have ice cream milk teas too!

Their green milk tea is my favorite as it has a very floral flavour. Definitely one of my favorite places!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSWNDDOKyEvtOZ-PtFqgGaUKC6D0g1C8bVE5BX&fid=0x0:0x5b54166c32e18312"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"Ann Tseng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVA_zf_5YooDT-l3fkXhkvK6zA1gOe7gRLX4x4Ri-M_afE98MoV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Oolong milk tea latte / less ice / 30% sugar / boba.

Good yea flavor, good and plentiful seating, clean with tall ceilings and tall windows for south facing sunshine. I would recommend to fellow visitors of Richmond, BC if you’re here for the weekend.

Pricing is steep if you’re getting speciality items. Just get milk tea lattes and prices will seem more reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQGa8TeE0V_SS6CYkSfNscl9ujtb4rCOGhXH00&fid=0x0:0x5b54166c32e18312"],"When":"2023-1-30"},{"Name":"Gabriel C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUu8OeUarJaPOMHbrOjB4FX58EsefXHkZGBeafjTsuN3yCQzDc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been really wanting to try this brand and wow it did not disappoint! Great customer service and fast drinks. Amazing quality! Well worth the price. Grabbed a kumquat lemon juice and four seasons tea w mango sorbetto. Very good! Love the interior! Will be back for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfXKT1rW8mMOqNpaEtKkBKD_wrAOV-5MG4iHHb&fid=0x0:0x5b54166c32e18312"],"When":"2022-3-19"}]

title: The Whale Tea 琉璃鲸

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Angelica Yee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcQojzbdV9sbLoihEwt6NQe8LJ9Oux6JR_irkYfLyJU1tPYS4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got a great deal because it was their anniversary. The grapefruit tea without sugar was really tasty and had lots of real fruit inside. I even got a cute free tote bag because it was a qualifying purchase. Really nice and clean inside, cashier was nice. It took a while for us to get our drinks but it was worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB-NpgUZOFONo5KpoQG9ZViySVMNx4mvIaTdO0&fid=0x0:0x3a7e88c1a4c81264"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"زينب الكعيبي","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVb47XFwH2jCgxUW3YstA9-FL7ObxWGu_B4ILoKddQtdD3arhF_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Paula is very friendly and professional. She help us in choosing our drinks we love the tea here. Very beautiful place very cozy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_ftagx-NCLNudEjq3WOJ_XoPu98BlJhLIy7ip&fid=0x0:0x3a7e88c1a4c81264"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We stumbled across The Whale Tea in Richmond and decided to give it a try. I thought it looked familiar and told my husband that I felt as though we'd seen one of these shops in Bellevue. He looked it up on Google and it turns out my instincts were right. There is one in Bellevue. In fact, after looking it up on Google myself, there are quite a number of The Whale Tea shops throughout different cities in the US, and even a few in the UK.

We ordered:
The Glass Whale
Cloudy Grape Slush

The Glass Whale had Peach resin in it, along with coconut milk and something blue on top. (The salesperson had troubles trying to explain what the blue stuff was. I guess, some kind of Asian ingredient that has no English equivalent?!) It wasn't bad but I liked my daughter's Cloudy Grape Slush better. I think I might even order the Cloudy Grape Slush for myself if we end up at this shop again!

There was a menu on the window displaying some cake and tiramisu desserts. They looked really cute and the flavors were tempting. I might consider trying some of those next time.

Service: Good
Parking: Plentiful and free
Location: 4600 No.3 Rd. Unit 131, Richmond","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO63pzqLgGYXWyJLxDLg8UolQTd8RDMKkF3zEX3&fid=0x0:0x3a7e88c1a4c81264"],"When":"2023-10-16"},{"Name":"Vic Yung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjSUFpvFSwHsCrywPzGZzN7WDhV8Ljlj3YECw07iwjqMR_leW5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went on a weekday afternoon and the place was not busy. There were one or two staff members working at the time and two of the three tables were empty. The occupied table had a few people studying and the staff did not seem to mind.

Ordered the strawberry black tea and glass whale (coconut milk and crystal jelly) and both were made after ordering. The drinks were made in good time and we stayed inside to drink them. The glass whale drink cannot be adjusted for sugar.

The price is a little high for the size and quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNv4h-p-65zm_1Bt3DnHw3oJUb2FZ_zSB2KVw8z&fid=0x0:0x3a7e88c1a4c81264"],"When":"2023-10-28"},{"Name":"Terri Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdHMQamP6ntk6cmD8m9VHj4cLgJWNXVSwfy5Jk1_ks8LpnASP1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First time coming here, ordered their milk tea just to test out their tea leaves. Pretty good! Hope it lasts long at this location as I was surprised Exposure closed down.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOynNG9plc6d1SFnqc0vsorXU0kCLpn1twtoiNm&fid=0x0:0x3a7e88c1a4c81264"],"When":"2024-1-7"},{"Name":"Vivian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaXYPh5pYgkRsWe7Cs0FQJL0iYYRhO278tNLm4SuuXsXrp2AM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Taste too good that I forgot to take a pic after my first sip. I ordered Peach Resin Grapefruit Green Tea. All ingredients seems to be fresh, and it tastes so refreshing😋. Peach resin is a bit chewy and not too sweet. Might be my fav topping from now on!
Menu has great variety of choices which are quite different than those you see from typical bubble tea shop. Worth a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIw3rfK4VkZ1wrxiJ4eSeCgbu2GcSQ4QE_2nd9&fid=0x0:0x3a7e88c1a4c81264"],"When":"2023-5-9"},{"Name":"Charlie Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoX0VKjsneyfoiTlNwruaLxX0ceCnjQvSPCMmg2bBWl9050yk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Staff who served us was busy but very nice. Delicious teas","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKEy_45_CKwGXRvKqIZRWFVhMAJoqrUZIxeKl8&fid=0x0:0x3a7e88c1a4c81264"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Hellen Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-y_eO46SNM9b3mPQmZlSn7gAXahgFhNK_L8JZc8YTHM11j4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrendous experience. We ordered 4 drinks and 2 of which were made wrong. This was after roughly 30 minutes. We asked the server to either give us a refund or remake the drinks. She said she wasn’t able to give us a refund and totally fine. We asked her to remake the drinks. An hour later, we’re still
sitting here waiting as I write this review. Terrible experience. Will not be back.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Dave Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL544JfNo-heg8UsP95fr9shcrTY9pTTKZqcIgOMgLc7F2usw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this little place, has various flavoured teas and traditional and modern teapots. Everything is laid out to easily find what you are looking for. Staff is very friendly and professional. Have been here before and will continue to return. Lots of parking spaces available but the mall is always busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJxRWOfvbQcdPmcWf6MY-SbGzX26fPucJFtaHw\u0026fid=0x0:0xd1e625f0470c729a"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Solo Traveler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr87C5ZtrKaCJ1bU-Y76KXT8unhcv_Tc0RyOk4ltjxvddrQHWC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"always loved this place, they have huge selections of fine teas. also tons of coffee stuff to satisfy your inner barista. glad i found this hidden gem.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMTxLVRZDZ7OsPrp40Kki1ovVgVP5tN7hAiZ0Q\u0026fid=0x0:0xd1e625f0470c729a"],"When":"2022-3-24"},{"Name":"JJ DD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFtcGTUOuSKpAZoEDDuRK5nwzYdHrMYXUbS8hDK0wH7ETg6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely a \"hidden gem\" I can't believe I've not discovered them sooner!!! I came to the shop to buy Tokoname Kyusu ( Kyusu sold at this store are mostly made by famous Kyusu master from Tokoname ), and discovered that they also offered high quality Tisane and Estate Black Tea ( top grade SFTGFOP1 Darjeeling ).  They offer one of the most extensive selection of Hairo coffee gear in Vancouver as well. I would highly recommend this shop to any tea and coffee enthusiast!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOd6UeefpWTkmCDEU6oAIJGjqHvac1tnunTkZzS\u0026fid=0x0:0xd1e625f0470c729a"],"When":"2021-3-16"},{"Name":"Lisa W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqFgROGOOvxKehUWjK63Nw6MxR1EliUz0UI4Todel3qaVnZ0E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good selection of teas from international origins. They have some very nice fragrant teas as well. They also sell Chinese and Japanese tea ware. Great local alternative to other major chain brands.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Glenn Nawrocki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbhS7iBBGhvU2hJ3UVPR3pfOYL3a4RbYbvQO3PGA7e-dvURgk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff are very knowledgeable, polite and friendly. You will be amazed by the whole body and smoothness of it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Crystal zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQVppiwDFFksjVDPDv0PPQ84ed163w4rewo9uLx4rrVpxHlg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"特别喜欢的一家茶叶店。主打普洱茶，茶的品质特别好，茶汤的颜色很正而且喝起来香醇顺滑。除了普洱茶以外，还有玫瑰花茶，是很自然的玫瑰香以及一些店家专门挑选的小品种的绿茶和红茶。店里还提供各种茶具，茶宠，自用或者送礼都挺合适的。茶叶50g起售，价格合理","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFggjdmSlVtwJBAqHWCoVJVALRf2cAXR51C_Jl\u0026fid=0x0:0x76794ec76b5b82e8"],"When":"2023-6-12"},{"Name":"John Feng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJv2MNofbig4WVJ6dDfoB3omUTF7k69PQ70aV5b03vaHRgJzA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0r1oDSOeHWKP3XyAuKJsr-5ol9xGD0niXGtZw\u0026fid=0x0:0x76794ec76b5b82e8"],"When":"2017-4-12"},{"Name":"王斯霖","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIEZTrODqEzrFXBv_CQqfCBvoCuoUOPXIlHFBvArFQAiiZE3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]
