about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"No-contact delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"renee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_WU070TGgPtW8TWSh1-x1L8TFwvHJh4FkvNUPfFWve6f_CnpE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is by far my favourite bubble tea spot in Richmond! The service here is always exceptional and I feel so welcomed each time ☺️The drinks are delicious and refreshing and the cozy clean environment makes it the perfect study spot! So far I’ve only tried the peach cheese slush and assam pearl milk tea but I’m looking forward to try more drinks 💕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfa57EWfs3MrIlSoOwlZmUjNp4zWBMGZMrV90t&fid=0x0:0xf1d9708e2616eca4"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Ingrid Wu (Miso_Miso)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgRJEIuhtghT7iVkULciqa6MDMg7BC9km5HTsNMMQUYPwzJz97=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Last Saturday, my friends and I ordered their pineapple lemon soda, osmanthus milk tea, and fresh taro milk tea with taro balls. I tried and loved every single one of them!
The pineapple lemon soda was incredibly refreshing and ideal for a hot day!
Osmanthus milk tea is the bubble tea that I always prefer, and they have created it with just the right balance of floral aroma and milk. I requested 30% sugar and it was just right, unlike some other bubble tea places where the drinks often remain  too sweet even though I’ve asked for the same amount of sugar. If you like taro milk tea, make sure to try their fresh taro milk tea with their taro balls! The quantity of fresh taro inside was extremely dense, and their taro balls were very chewy and perfect sweet!

They are located at ground level, outside Aberdeen station facing No. 3 road. It is somewhat  concealed near the bus station. My recommendation is to park inside Aberdeen centre when going there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNA4B8adqRDKlRtLpnXxOQ5WFOMBwFeI1Fzu9f1&fid=0x0:0xf1d9708e2616eca4"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Emily He","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURnqH_Lawdutczcou5wsiIPRF86K5yhb2vBurqT2FNA-yo4t5njQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am beyond perplexed as to why there's not enough rave for Pause n' Sip.

Their drinks are by far the best in this city, and being a local here for decade+, I don't leave reviews.
I rather just enjoy the good places I know. But this place needs its due justice.

Their ingredients sell out mid day due to demand, and my friends and I have waited for them to restock 30+ minutes several times now. In fact, we are waiting as I leave this review.

Personal recommendation: any soda drink. I've gone and tried each of them more than once all on separate occasions. Pinapple, pomegranate, lychee, you name it. Best of best.

Close friends rave their milk tea and pearls. One’s waiting for another 25 minutes for her peach pearl milk tea right this moment.

They do not disappoint. I've wished to have a bigger stomach so I could down 2 of their drinks at once several times by now.

I've ranted for too long. Honestly, go the entra mile if you must - to give this place a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO3KUr4Vefj7B5zJNzCz-4Kt5_Y8A8lAUcUgV0&fid=0x0:0xf1d9708e2616eca4"],"When":"2024-2-24"},{"Name":"Flora Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNs7etU0kW9GGBfwVoaBiTm6FX8c0FLo0Qg-rOeDW1bMeuJ0kA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I never expect amazing customer service from bubble tea stores but Pause n’ Sip is truly outstanding! The first time I went, the staff were so helpful in giving me recommendations after they saw I was having trouble choosing a drink (the menu offers more specialized / unique flavours than other places). I originally picked a topping that doesn’t go well with a type of drink I hadn’t had before and they kindly suggested one to make sure I had a good experience. When I came back another time to claim a deal I’d received, they were having issues with their POS system. It wasn’t a big deal to me at all but the staff were so sweet and accommodating and really exceeded my expectations again.

The drinks themselves are delicious; they taste as good as they look. The store is well kept, attractive, and is overall a lovely spot to hang out in. I highly recommend visiting if you’re in the area — you won’t be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOa4OJQHFz4K6e8pElRFMogMVXlwQC13h36fn83&fid=0x0:0xf1d9708e2616eca4"],"When":"2023-3-9"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There is fierce competition in the market, but this establishment stands among the top. The beverages offered here are remarkably refreshing and delicious. The mango drink, believe it or not, contains real mangos! The interior is new and provides a comfortable ambiance. The service is excellent, and I truly hope they continue prioritizing customer satisfaction because if they do, they will slay their competitors with ease.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP51IlCh21WMpNayM7Y_3PySSzj483y8udauUyg&fid=0x0:0xf1d9708e2616eca4"],"When":"2023-5-20"},{"Name":"Bianca Lok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLQf55yrLfuQpaVH5_PAPb-xLqdrIrBA83-7_og5_ndyF7MIm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This bubble tea shop is beside the entrance of Aberdeen Square on the outside, just beside the skytrain station.

The interior is aesthetically decorated. It is a clean and quiet environment, making it a good place to hang out or study.

Even though they have classic milk teas, their menu is quite unique, offering a different taste to what you would be used to when getting bubble tea.
There are milk teas, fruit teas, fruit sodas, yakult drinks, and more.

I don’t like milk teas very much but rose milk tea has me going back!!
The pomegranate lychee soda is perfectly tuned, not very sweet and very refreshing.
I also got to try their taro milk with oreo and purple yam. It’s a bit thick but worth trying at least once.

The staff and owner are all super nice, friendly, and accommodating. I went in once not knowing it was literally 2 mins before closing. They still took my order and offered an alternative topping as they were prepping to close.

They currently do not allow reusable cups. Not a crucial need, but would like to use my own cup some time.

10/10 would recommend giving their soda and specialty drinks a try. Their selection will definitely have you going back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkm2kHit9NLYg2IeE9GRmkdpfO-g3U-IwPkBIw&fid=0x0:0xf1d9708e2616eca4"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"Katie Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1s-9bqkqJTd232cNw3dAg2-iGz-_yFMyQQ-z97NTzxoPjZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friends and I had a great time here! We passed by this bbt shop on our last day in Vancouver and we really needed something to drink. The guy that was helping us with our order this afternoon was very helpful in recommending drinks to us, which left us very satisfied with our drinks. Very friendly staff and refreshing drinks. Sending love from Toronto!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEleXuMt2R75gOFT4NZTFcoRhmzZexG90aFvOy&fid=0x0:0xf1d9708e2616eca4"],"When":"2023-6-28"},{"Name":"James Kan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk_o12iCtyO0gE_QoPCj5qJ7UUQkuic2cEzUnsQvn8LpSf4EV-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fully load with fruit and real stuff in Milk Tea or Soda, refreshing tasting brings me comfort drinking experience.
Not like many milk tea drinks, after you drank you feel so rich and strong, but your body does not feel good.

The store is located beside the Sky-train station, not inside the Aberdeen building.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoXT0WgOfNJ7t_IzdLw6ns2WSvU3n_lTT9QMvd&fid=0x0:0xf1d9708e2616eca4"],"When":"2024-2-11"}]

Everything was delicious and expertly paired with the teas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vantastic Van","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLogsB3ONl4ztNPBCSoyUn-yQb_CYHMYMpRslOysPY__k3rTg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A dessert fine dining tea house that we have never seen in Vancouver. Finally have one place like here which is so elegant and relaxing for us to have desserts paired with tea! Will come back for sure!! Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anna Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRLX0mevn2vCPf3zwpDQa810IPsIsAPXr0wnodZ331wrt4Fxld=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"第一家中式茶馆，有麻将房，甜品，茶和餐可以选，茶室按小时收费，一个人可以选择坐外面。停4楼交钱后按指示输入密码，坐电梯上5楼就ok了，地方有点隐秘，环境好拍照出片，就是价格略贵，记得看价格表","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTAmdmDVDISuF9DelkNCNK92vwS345e-s159LL\u0026fid=0x0:0xe9241d288f944ca7"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"G G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-4CzU9ZaUebSovcKvHmyF0xdsZ642cUmfCfLHUqXxcJpvD9o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"甜品非常的棒！！很有创意，而且环境很适合拍照，放松心情，是一家别具一格的饮茶，品茶的茶馆，也是一家很棒的甜品店。","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORcDPQEsQkCdU6DcjOzTq8eNfrytXm1gNknXSv\u0026fid=0x0:0xe9241d288f944ca7"],"When":"2023-8-8"},{"Name":"Shulamie Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtB81aCg4AAdMLOwFvnHlpdLkbB43qZuPbkeepGzXQ192dANwppA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anthony Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjLBVGvYMuQ_7irAafqyFenF84IHbDebi7uNt8G5dE291E5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is good.
Lobster family meals are decent combos with soup and rice.
HK style cafe service. So don't expect friendly smiley servers.
Very busy on the weekends. Make a reservation.  Parking lot are usually packed as multiple restaurants in this complex.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRW84zjO1UIBCkVKowmTQZHlH8NNSGyRUB8ja7&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Bonnie Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnEc4L_oX33x1BIdSnyu3qIy05RmcbQP1bJwBirlW_Yv38YSLczA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious hong kong style Cantonese food
Hainan chic rice👍🏻
Stir fried beef rice noodles👍🏻
2/3 Attendents only , so busy n slower than expected but hardworking enuf🫶🏻👍🏻
Comfy atmosphere
Easy parking
Reminder: Fettuccine n noodles size r large for Asian ladies 😸","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9nQnzK_ArHkk8V-B_slQ3Cgt3trtQ1P-7ACDl&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Fay. H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd4mYlouz-Pj7R6TieEfSHQNydfMYBskXJxl4xfL_hV98dHHgm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This review is only regarding the breakfast menu as I only go for breakfast.

Prices went up a little. Serving size... Went down a tiny bit? Feels like there's less meat in my noodles.

Service is still great like always. Sometimes the kitchen mixes up how the order of eggs (eg. Scrambled VS sunny side VS fully cooked).

The place is clean and brightly lit.

The noise level is hit or miss depending on other customers.

Cost of hot drink with meal is free. Cold drink cost extra $1.50, but nothing is stopping you from bringing in a thermos with ice 😜

Will continue to visit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjChlAll89fJZj5h3vzzdYoeZnIT7WTd1HUSr8&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Charmian “Lola” T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgNIsycjAjzrvG8wivWZhPbw8cIcLPeWXd_RAmbJfEA0gUU6vQDA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My parents brought me here to try their lobster special set … soup and rice comes with it plus free flowing tea… omg the lobster with noodles was amazing , the halibut was to die for and the spicy pork with green beans was so addictive. Let me tell you this year alone in the last six months my parents have gone back at least six times and each time being more friends and family to try every single dish on their special set menu… We’re already planning to go back and try their crab set special 😂. It’s well worth the money, we had enough food left over to have for dinner. And the staff are amazing and quick and friendly ! Just go and dig in!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Johnny C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMH8aFZIGB5a7CFStbNQ6JGT0sYgxOttD7xMtIebcz8N9tnSzq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Another Hong Kong style cafe and noodle house combined.  Food was average.  I ordered curry brisket with rice.  I find the brisket to be too fat and not enough white rice.  Prices in the menu are on the higher side compare to other Hong Kong style cafe.  Personally I don’t think the value is there for the price of the food I ordered.  Parking lot is big but fills up quickly during meal times.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJ2WDCiItljI5MNQLQEwUyMfSAAoQkXqoGkeaA&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"William Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmQdctlbM12t5Occdf84xI_X4OatAdUnoO7Mf5nuujaBWYasmgPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Visited twice.

The first time was a really busy and crowded evening so I felt the tables might be too close together and the service seemed to suffer for it. Food that night was not as good as the Vancouver location but was alright. I heard the head cook moved to this location but maybe not by that night

This time was a less crowded breakfast so it was better. Food seemed better but then breakfast and dinner are different meals. Ordering 2 item combos is a good deal ($14) vs just 1 @ $10. Love that egg custard in their deep fried French toast. Congee was good too as seems no MSG.

Plenty of parking in their shared parking lot both times. Capstan Way street parking if the lot is full.

This is a fine location for breakfast if you are dropping someone off to the airport.

I'll visit again if in Richmond for the day and maybe I'll give more stars in the future after those visits.

Update: visited again another companion wanted to compare here with Main Street branch as she heard lots of staff moved from there to here. Still not as good, and didn't see any original serving staff from the  Main St. branch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFVie6NSUTF2QFafotn1WSRyhrzdSVmMC34J56&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2022-12-30"},{"Name":"t l","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIMDadAdXgjdCR9ryJtJHb7jNI1DR0yfUG8KK9xo-KtDDcIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"At present, most likely the best Hong Kong style cafe in Richmond.   A good balance between portion, quality and price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMaepUwzj4bLxHQf7zqvV61qcofwz86mnrhA8d&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Dan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6Vpad3zmd_bRS_NRyMDg5xHn355DE6cSY0nXB1CDQJfi5a5o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good portion for the food. Chicken patty is bigger than my hand! Average price for a HK cafe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNArnmeZxj9tvOMEV4c9Ga4WQRH2e11cYuR5EY9&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-6-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"BDub 247","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTG5NYTeVC-prr_d-bcu-QDkvwa3Gqy_E00b26Ty-0tmu9VN1_uw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried this restaurant because the one we originally had targeted was too small and too busy. We are glad we gavr this place a chance.  They had a good selection of Taiwanese dishes that were well presented and nicely flavored. We recommend the beef noodle soup, noodles texture was perfect and the beef well flavored and tender.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlHNt8eGS3sK8ch6YdEUqDpN_uCCVfwvUZph5M&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Edward Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYTrZ3y9H_TYChGjolO7g9aMfEV8hcGDsa4gSml3kZwLXszA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"the worst pork rib rice I've ever had in my life.  there's no battery at all not crispy.  an oil tastes very old disgusting. the broccoli's are all cold.  either they don't have quality control in terms of who cooks.  or the other location at Richmond Centre is better.  not worth the price I expected some crispy traditional Taiwanese fried pork.   well this week and wet thing that is completely unacceptable.  I will not give any start but I have to choose one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7tWHGYW-6H8-6wo-xsUMhXS0XlwNs_bgq_a2j&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Vivian Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-009goZzhJiHZtSwlU5S0gEdtD2DCLpJdWBJ-g_5KCcg2yKcLsg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A must try if you're in Richmond. Always a yummy time at this OG Taiwanese spot! Good for gatherings/family style meal or individual sets. Very reliable, delicious food and well crafted bubble tea, the boba pearls are always fresh. Fast service and friendly staff. The milk seafood hotpot is my favourite!!! 🤤💖","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8ukgGyU_KOPAG4P_UOD6ISfU0VICaj1kGDnsh&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"TERRY CHENG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsg-oI6sco7O5Go48_oGM2GdPS9ywAc_QfXDXDKM3uhrlF3VpMxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food is okay. Nothing to rave or complain about in terms of taste. My friend rice was not hot evenly through and the fried chicken nuggets were also a little bit too fried. The service was good, staff were helpful and accommodating. The food took a long time to come. Atmosphere is very Asian, IYKYK.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3HOC-K7J9L1_8eePywggkUoTIrcCYON0b-5Jv&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2024-2-24"},{"Name":"Tammy Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWn0N2I5STxk6Dw-kQhoKTxOlHlPrvcouHiB9OgzjAG84pt3M0D_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"TL;DR: bad service, big portions and mediocre food.

Service - 0/1

Servers were rude. It’s inconvenient that we have to order food through the phone especially since we have 2 older grandparents with us. We asked a server if we could order without using the phone and she very rudely told us in Mandarin you have to order through the phone. No one gave us utensils until we asked. Only one super kind server! He had a cap on :) Props to you for being the only server here with proper service training

Food Quantity - 1/1

Big big portions, my sister and I could not finish our foods and had to bring them home for dinner. Lots of noodles and veggies in my vegetarian noodle soup!

Food Taste - 0.5/1

Food is nothing special, pretty mediocre! Loved that the squid tentacles were fried in a thin batter tho! The squid tentacles won the show :)

Overall: 2.5 stars ⭐️

TL;DR: bad service, big portions and mediocre food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR9dcfsArxhRddMaGS7JoTDOtanN3X3Urm5dlR&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2022-4-28"},{"Name":"Grace Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2Gi0ImD_jtFaRjI_I4TvVHE6110eG-TPY1JG8d59XQJNTtA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was great, the service was fast, the only down side is that they dont take credit card. (Cash and e transfer only) first time paying with e transfer @ a resturant. Ordered the pearl bubble hot pot, to be honest, the soup was was too sweet. The 3cup chicken was really good though. Big portion that you will not able to finish in one meal. Also, orders are only taken by the app.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbkYIKElfqcf4oLssqlaMV3G_yp7qxrJ9WgwFy&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2023-12-27"},{"Name":"Phillip Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDxeRsOu_38Vanl3R1pdCGsmerEkppvahiUYpCxDQNLI-FIgqgQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They renovated a while back. This is some of the best places for food in the area. My wife loves it here. We live in Aldergrove and yes we would come all the way down here to eat. Food comes out quick and the staff is very attentive. Must try.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ronald Retandy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiVTWQFKjqXe4UnsBFRIZ7GxF9tGrva9JzQ7uYayyA9RXk6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing spot for good food and good drinks, never disappoints!

This spot has been our go to place for Taiwanese food for the last 8 years at least, and throughout all the revamp and the changes, their food has always been consistently great, with excellent service all around.

So many choices for food and drinks, and I think even after 8 years or so of coming here to eat, we have yet to try every single thing on the menu.

OG spot for sure, and we will keep coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP86gIJQNsMwvppMl42359O13vBEk7OV9IsKipn&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2021-8-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably the most expensive bubble tea I’ve ever gotten but I got no regrets! You pay for the quality ingredients they use - from the fruit to the milk options. It was delicious 🤤! I swear they used a whole mango for my drink 🥭. I was mango’d out after! It was a whole meal.  Oh and the strawberry one was delicious as well but I’d still go for mango again next time (cause it’s my fav fruit and the drink is amazing!)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPy36mPLGwELgLkojrn8k0rJc9dNsmxCvAkiKLu&fid=0x0:0x740035c02a0621d2"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Audrey T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVt7NSeCmrDxjN6eGFiHdOku-giePvd1JuUbLyAEp6odBtHY6vv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nostalgic spot for bubble tea in Richmond. Mango drinks are always a favorite here. On the pricier side now but ingredients taste fresh. I also enjoyed the matcha mochi egg waffle - came out hot and crispy with a bouncy filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_kxuioUaraVlLpEtXCiJwjLXtiC9jc0erglMN&fid=0x0:0x740035c02a0621d2"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for the ice cream festival.   The Mango trio and the Bueno Soft Serve was pretty outstanding.   Although the mango trio was a tad overpriced,  but it was well worth it.

The service was a little slow, but it was also because they were so busy as well.  However, the cashier was not the friendliest.

Plenty of parking,  so just need to watch out for the crazy drivers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOW4o_IKJD7SqufDrGkdYHzooWvSAja_hmtiprY&fid=0x0:0x740035c02a0621d2"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Edith Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJmOen6EtIl7Ej_JFqybjeY6J0ua3WQel6_FE_xI_4sbCJAgJF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The portions are generous and the mango trio was superb. I just wish the swirl soft serve was more creamy than ice-y. It was also quite messy, but that part can't be helped.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4QN5yWbL67m2ogX7IaLQahtRhtNl9V4Q4O8fm&fid=0x0:0x740035c02a0621d2"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Meiler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULwPxPWpWeXsZfCYlZ_s1SpG7BU2H42saEiEXpkixEPkQz42uk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very refreshing bubble tea place, I ordered the Mango Cubes Slush and it came with very sweet and ripe mangoes. Customization options for the drinks are amazing and caters to any preferred taste. The staff are also super friendly and are able to accommodate and recommend favourites.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOj3ncA2oiQqikJ6pjWJFCNXbco9idnu4b2Kn4S&fid=0x0:0x740035c02a0621d2"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"DANICA DG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj8yVKC3dNCSLVLekHGiPlGf0ppRbR1ZDLgf-FYq7onHLSuVle=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Real mango for mango cravings folks. Limited seating, the mango drinks were not as sweet. 4 of us pretty much shared everything and still had left overs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNY6PZlG9PeZgoFQ1PjNu4PLv18THQWkHv0VWbI&fid=0x0:0x740035c02a0621d2"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Bella McGregor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUetQrmjHmEpGufmH6WhVsO_zIhDzMNtz4OIwwo__pvQhdZPk0E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go to spot for mango cube slush deliciousness! Love the big chunks of ripe mango. Hubby loves the Thai iced tea. Been ordering from Bubble Queen for years, and they are always consistent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpkcy3Z92sZceDumIEr7fgSPCq-5GiLYkh-KIO&fid=0x0:0x740035c02a0621d2"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"L P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU42gHWE7kW5I8KmS2Ydkkt8bmnj0QmM6GEUt5AK_12URXrkQsGzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Wow. This place calling itself Bubble Queen obviously doesn’t know how to make bubble waffles.

On the 24th May,2024 at around 5:50pm i ordered a bubble waffle here with Portuguese tart filling. The damage was around $9.5 I didn’t have high hopes, but I didn’t expect the shells on the waffle falling apart, crumbing down the paper bag the moment I stepped out of the store. (See Picture 1)

“Oh well it sucks but guess it will suck harder as time goes by so might as well eat it now before it’s too late” I was chowing down the crumbling waffle shells and two minutes passed… the waffle got soggy (see picture 2)

I really hoped this only bubble waffle place in the grid to work… because it’s the only bubble waffle place in the grid! I’m writing this hoping you guys would make things right- do your job and give your staff proper training. I want to support this little store but tbh it will take one full refund and another test run to rebuild the trust in this place again…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiq8fCxTK3CzR3HvYh2cOi5T2uH6gpljESFdC3&fid=0x0:0x740035c02a0621d2"],"When":"2024-5-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"tianxiang wei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb8xsU81rKg2iqpGzBYNQS4BvEP37tR5OX4n7UcGaShd-kEEY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited lovin tea, and it was such a pleasant experience! The bubble tea was delicious and refreshing, especially the one I tried with lime, which was perfect for a hot day. The drinks were beautifully presented, and the service was top-notch. The girl with brown hair and a cute pink shark clip really stood out – her warm smile and friendly attitude made the visit even better. She was super helpful with recommendations and made me feel so welcome. I’ll definitely be coming back for the great drinks and amazing service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0CJ2Pqw2nA8LQKy5DheW8pckF9C1IH52xHy98&fid=0x0:0x3cf2be3d9c7ebea9"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Nana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKqOQAxmUfVdzjk-tbkVwReIRj5v468qo_Xam20oDVJ1vBsOjX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited this place several times and there is always that friendly and energetic staff who greets and recommends a perfect drink for me every time. I have tried a variety of drinks and they all tasted very natural yet flavourful!! This is now my go-to-store for bubble tea!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAT5s2MOPEGB6gM-XrNyKyxwoigfwpe6dwXz4C&fid=0x0:0x3cf2be3d9c7ebea9"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Daniel Yun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXMo9ew1gGupStvpSJYxLCnBdKDwZGN7o7ShX9eKiRjhhJmWEr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good atmosphere and really awesome drinks! Especially the girl with a pink claw clip was so friendly and extra helpful 👍!! It opens really late so I can go and get a drink from there anytime 😁.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBHU-kz5GPzCPcRvcfSnWIG8tf7L_LX18fFc9M&fid=0x0:0x3cf2be3d9c7ebea9"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Robert Crockett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSOgDhLDx82AU3iHLUB9sc6xmETcAGDc8XMnSk3WROlTp_NUs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The tea is very, very good. They use real fruit juice, not just flavored syrup. Everything tastes very fresh, and real. The flavor is amazing. The cups are very high quality. The selection of flavors and options is pretty wide. Most drinks can be ordered with less ice and sugar. Seating is a little limited, but I think most people do carry out. The decor inside is very nice. The tables and bathroom are very clean. Parking is limited.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODwv2ktgcA57ZgSSgTNaDhAXBfks-PAicpJf5m&fid=0x0:0x3cf2be3d9c7ebea9"],"When":"2023-8-23"},{"Name":"Danica Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLE9BjJzHgn7i0DdLFjFWJn1xKD5_RtpUHCGpvgYU2_2Hkm5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately, had a terrible experience with a group of friends. Our friend had wanted a brown sugar, milk tea , which they do not have on the menu along with no more pearls. We asked them what would be close to that in flavour after we  paid the server said that they actually didn’t have the recommended drink in stock either and recommended another one after doing so we tried bubble tea and didn’t like it at all. When we asked to change for a bubble tea that one of our friends had ordered, they were not willing to change it without being re charged. The server said not my fault I did my job and got the “boss” he had said the same thing we can’t change the drink unless he re pays. We ended up leaving without a drink after paying. The kitchen area is 2 times if not 3 times the size of the seating area, we guess they really don’t want you to stay. They are open later than most places but still wouldn’t recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAKiC5J1ql1LsLTTfBwgvAj6sVGUusHXghumDKVG9ZTQ8QjcD_1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered the Osmanthus oolong tea with 30% sugar. The tea flavor is not strong enough — tastes mostly like milk. And it was way too sweet to be 30%.

The interior and decor was pretty though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlkB90JvFAPYbL7L3sJ3aVRFOMParULHpZYk2s&fid=0x0:0x3cf2be3d9c7ebea9"],"When":"2023-12-18"},{"Name":"leesa tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWsWaHyhzcw7kKPh9V3HkvTK5TTa81TdmCDp9IylYllx4puXIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent place for bubble tea. I would recommend this place for people who do not like their drinks too sweet. The bubble tea place is super bright and pink!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsbI-5E5oOypWW8L0wArNZnCf6OQGq-YYFrDMi&fid=0x0:0x3cf2be3d9c7ebea9"],"When":"2023-9-13"},{"Name":"HSINGH !","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQ8YMEjYoQg32RDp65mjkNemUZxUxs-52HdUmA77pVl4ggSVsj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My disappointment with the service I received during my visit on September 15th at 11:55 pm. After ordering my beverage, I was informed a few minutes later that it was unavailable. The server offered to make a similar drink, which I agreed to try.

However, after tasting and mixing the drink, I found it unsatisfactory and requested to swap it for the drink my friend was having. The server consulted with the manager and informed me that I would need to pay separately for the new drink. Despite explaining the situation—that I had ordered one drink and was given another—the manager insisted that a new drink would require an additional charge.

I left the drink with the server, as I was unhappy with both the product and the service. I hope this feedback will be taken into consideration for future improvements.","Images":null,"When":""}]

Even though I ordered it with 0% sugar, it tasted a little sweet. My SO liked my hot drink more than his cold black milk tea with boba and that never happens. Their regular milk tea with boba is decent too. We came here twice to get their Thai tea latte. It is THAT good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3kf8vBtTvxOlkdLtNbJmakcuG8xN9prhOeWIu&fid=0x0:0x7bdc7ae802abb88e"],"When":"2022-11-28"},{"Name":"Xin L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDtoahV5z7ycUGBqSCkIQwW5Na4z-bIlO-DlrMaTOi1-vec-E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The drink has the nostalgic taste of Taiwan.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Robert Crockett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSOgDhLDx82AU3iHLUB9sc6xmETcAGDc8XMnSk3WROlTp_NUs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The tea here is very very good. Probably some of the best tea I have ever had. You can tell that the workers put in a lot of effort into making the drinks. The lime in my drink was freshly sliced when I ordered my drink. It took time, but it was worth the wait. The presentation was very nice and overall I felt like the employees took a lot of pride in the product they made. That's pretty rare nowadays. I would probably order a large next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs3ZNYTWex4fCPTaKiWeUFilfb5J2EDNJ_9dKX&fid=0x0:0xdc9c3910889f7edc"],"When":"2023-7-19"},{"Name":"H W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXexF1ppHhagktR0Lj8tfRndSZu99-g8j0KJdvC6dho4atqtz4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The location is excellent, situated at the checkout area of the T&T Supermarket. They have a lottery machine for entertainment, and the advertisements look very appealing. However, despite being in a Chinese supermarket in Canada and selling Chinese bubble tea, the staff only spoke English, which seemed odd. One would expect them to at least speak some Chinese.

Additionally, the bubble tea was extremely sweet, even though I asked for only 50% sugar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHc1BSXkf0SDK6nAgjf3Eh3UOz2VWIJKj0lGNu&fid=0x0:0xdc9c3910889f7edc"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"David Low","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkpc3i0EhqNBPlJnkSMEHMpro396LQMF6uOQ9XPiyoabidlekP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Favorite bubble tea place! They have warm,  hand-made tapioca bubbles with their thick creamy milk. Their fruity slushes and drinks are excellent as well. But if it's your first time, try the flagship brown-suggar milk tea. It's to die for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvMHbP2mzrBhKkwjALEc-n28FE4jmeSRspRo4E&fid=0x0:0xdc9c3910889f7edc"],"When":"2022-10-21"},{"Name":"WL T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrSvokGZUAKCFAXznZLlsa-ldSTjdtPYFzSjQWDQLOz8hz7ax9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Bubble Tea Latte warms me up on a cool snowy day like this. I ordered hot earl grey tea with no sugar added. I feel warm and energized. What a wonderful day!

Although there is no extra sugar added, the pearl bubbles have been cooked through with brown sugar, adding just the right amount of sweetness and aroma to the overall taste of the milk tea. The bubbles have an amazing chewy texture. I highly recommend Bubble Tea Latte.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN26-_RBUeuTIjlvvi1CLdbtOEVk_09EHYaemCr&fid=0x0:0xdc9c3910889f7edc"],"When":"2022-11-30"},{"Name":"Ruji Ssm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIi8Kz6bLD2JKuaITuLSQsnm1aGyJqOkhedoXiJamo8qcoKlc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very unique interesting tea house! Xing Fu Tang can accompany you by showing their traditional to drink a unique brown sugar pearl drink! That is kind of fun to do so!

When you wait for your order! You can take the fortune stick to choose what is going on with you now( kind of you already know ^^) that is also fun to try!

I order a hot drink and the taste is great it is not so sweet! The pearl is so delicious and chewy! It is also not too sweet.

Good taste and good try! You can chill out after the grocery shopping. They also have a promotion! Just keep checking it out!

Here is the location at T&T, it is easy to notice and you can sit nearby.

I know you will have a great time here! 😁🥤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-P4-tREL7Nqoh-TDnopGatEeBtB0V6is_k6_t&fid=0x0:0xdc9c3910889f7edc"],"When":"2019-12-9"},{"Name":"CY Siu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM3Ctylp7Mrn5uab0RojAoPMaVbcTi3Moq_j_tgDTvPUHYdsdr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Long line ups usually but you can get no line ups at off times. Good flavour and no aftertaste. You cant control the sugar content in the drink so it is a lot sweeter. The tapioca balls are softer than most places which makes it easier to chew. They also make them in brown sugar at the storefront. This place is located inside the t&t. Approx $7 for each one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1AQN8vGm6kSN-PDcM3XvIfYJN6DK1g1u8ypBP&fid=0x0:0xdc9c3910889f7edc"],"When":"2019-8-16"},{"Name":"Tom Hu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyyQ5KvmKl4Z33nT4wusvkCwA9Cr-xWhWOhejIZbkV4EKIng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Honestly I was quite disappointed as the pearl is a bit too soft for my liking.  I prefer more chewy pearls.  And the taste is a bit light. I feel like I just drank a cup of milk.  Since the price is  more expensive than others I was expecting more flavourful drinks and pearls.  I won't be going here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRPs4UvJ6FbeOyJY8lNU3_2eRPKq2SQepMX-Xy&fid=0x0:0xdc9c3910889f7edc"],"When":"2019-7-13"},{"Name":"Lavender Lemon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWN0wj2N2wIg71NPhMsxK7se4sX3WPt37nS9ic73pH4jbJGPLk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Xing fu tang is the best! I got the brown sugar milk tea and it was super tasty! The boba is still warm when you get your drink making it the perfect chewy texture! The tea is also very tasty and not too sweet! Service is nice and fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFp5ZIt0uHi36XUjjUyPi8fS4fu3p2Ub3okfAg&fid=0x0:0xdc9c3910889f7edc"],"When":"2023-9-7"}]

title: Tea Industries
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Curbside pickup","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jessica Qian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMPHnv5ykgYQs8zvHb-zflWJP4NabP5GUcTNQF5f9Hl7NQFW1S=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First of its kind, very cool! There is an automated voice playing on repeat in the background guiding you on the steps (pretty straight forward: you order at kiosk or counter, you get your receipt and a QR code which you scan to open the drink door when it’s ready). There are staff present, so if anything goes wrong, they are there to help. Since it’s still their soft opening, there’s very few drink options (like around 15).

Cute interior design. I love what they put up on their windows! When the sun shines through, it casts a crystal like shadow in the interior.

We got the Japanese milk tea and it tasted like any other milk tea you’d get at any bubble tea shop. Pearls (they call it tapioca on the menu) aren’t included so you have to pay extra 50 cents. Was pretty disappointed about the amount they put in though. I took 3 sips and all the pearls were gone, so I think that’s something they can definitely work on improving. Price overall for the drink is a little high, considering how much was given to you and how ordinary the drink seemed.

I recommend this place just for the robot haha. It’s cool to see how far tech advanced these few years and seeing it make your drink is insane, but if you are someone who cares about quality and uniqueness of drink, this place may not be for you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxjeLWIHy2zT0V1dtMsBQZX-V_dyZ33Glu0EZP&fid=0x0:0x79f4f57dbc4ac195"],"When":"2024-4-13"},{"Name":"Iris Ning","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCraymveV1wX7uPzS1g5K0OMWvA1AoM-RqYTNBw4DonPqzYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely loved the experience at this robot-run bubble tea shop!  The innovative concept of having robots prepare and serve the drinks is truly impressive.  The efficiency and precision of the robots ensure that every cup of flavored tea is made to perfection.  The variety of flavors and toppings available is outstanding, and the ability to customize the sugar and ice levels is a great touch.

The ambiance of the shop is modern and inviting, with sleek robotic arms gracefully preparing the drinks behind a transparent partition.  It’s fascinating to watch the robots in action, and it adds an extra element of entertainment to the whole experience.

The bubble tea itself has a delicious and refreshing taste, using natural ingredients, making it feel very healthy and safe to drink. The pricing is fair considering the novelty and quality of the products.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLcC2JpO4wWv-mnDzK2dm4acjYfywMQrT-8H3z&fid=0x0:0x79f4f57dbc4ac195"],"When":"2024-4-15"},{"Name":"Jade Harley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUs21sF4V7rkXqsEjOKv_ORqoPlBM1OUwAUegMCuWH-3x8LN2I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"super cool upcoming bubble tea place! worth a visit if just for the robot! menu selection for robot-made drinks is pretty small, but the store is new so i can forgive that","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHDZRu0Q5kuzJ28Cqw-eOGlh-XM18sGJxJ-5xV&fid=0x0:0x79f4f57dbc4ac195"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"mochi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFJ3YzQy4Ek7Uv6iuvuDDt8SDrpfRq8OqiVFgoo79K5l16GqzX4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Staff was super nice to give me a lychee drink on the house, which was good. However, the pearls and the passionfruit tea which I ordered did not taste good. Unfortunately, the tea was unusually bitter and the pearls were soggy. I hope the taste gets fixed.
The concept is super cool though and plan to introduce a new machine soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYpT9zb0nC52EhBYKpOjuNJmCDum0k3d1zdN16&fid=0x0:0x79f4f57dbc4ac195"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Tracy Cao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIB_l8AsPre1eQAMy5kX48UY2LTnUUf4dZ-OoXRxGpGkLPwDMY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you’re looking for a unique and innovative experience in the world of bubble tea, look no further than Tea Industries. Nestled in the heart of Richmond, this futuristic tea shop combines cutting-edge technology with the beloved tradition of bubble tea, creating an experience like no other. 👍😋🥤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKeh6hy11CNntrsWbZBU7f0l9OLjH5U4v3QZwI&fid=0x0:0x79f4f57dbc4ac195"],"When":"2024-4-15"},{"Name":"Sally","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYjadMy5T259gkmUlT3p9sRdMDrhLZLohAcAX0TlTZ6TSMTtRT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It's a pretty unique bubble tea shop. The indoor seating area is spacious and comfortable. However, it's a shame that the bubble tea isn't good; the pearls aren't sweet and lack chewiness.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4UAf6CCgD24OpYUDgPoqpr9QfvsKkP_wdAWjt&fid=0x0:0x79f4f57dbc4ac195"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"K L H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQFZJuD0_NE10o4xSC-XtXQSVqtA5ZrAaHnqFaD10csHc_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered through ubereats today while getting my hair done. The WORST bubble tea my fiance and I have ever had. We had the jasmine tea latte with osmanthus jelly. Extremely watered down, zero tea taste, and super cheap on the osmanthus topping (when we paid extra).

Do not recommend this place, there are way better bubble tea places than this one. i.e) Chun Fun How, CoCo Fresh, Paragon. They have almost a year to iron out their kinks, but so far no changes. I rather have a real human to make my bubble tea than a robot, such a gimmick.

So bummed as we paid a premium too by ordering through ubereats. Ughhhhh, never again!! You're better off drinking bottled water as it was similar to what we purchased today.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"leesa tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWsWaHyhzcw7kKPh9V3HkvTK5TTa81TdmCDp9IylYllx4puXIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Definitely a cool concept having bubble tea made and served by a robot however the quality of the drink itself wasn’t the best. I ordered pearls with my Thai milk tea and it felt like there were only 4 pearls inside. Also got no ice and the cup felt 80% full.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1XMKcCsnwKMqOzVK7RC-Bm02gXcvX5xkqLkm3&fid=0x0:0x79f4f57dbc4ac195"],"When":"2024-3-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kim N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbdjDpWyXnvjc80j1Uggeb1c_m_wfTt6lOvg1Z_TeE5AinsEnY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We tried the hot mocha and iced matcha. The mocha was very watery and bland while the matcha was wayyyy to sweet. When there was 20% left I couldn't drink anymore as it was mostly condensed milk. The girl at the cashier was so rude, as if I did something wrong to her.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMU_0bIDRG1eBP0wWRaOGV47F1QEa2ZZA6H6UeW&fid=0x0:0x2d8f0eefba320242"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Michelle L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsghbcXhR9v_PB3YrQkl4NjiOeWaPsf6r3DnHIYyxtrlCmqOse=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Food - 2 star for the classic HK milk tea. Worse than what I can get from Crystal Mall food court for 3.5$. Nothing compare to the ones I had in HK and China. The brand is ruined.
1 star for the bubble waffle. If you know what bubble waffle is, it’s not this. See photo for the bubble waffle I received. No excuses.

Service - 2 star for one of two ladies who was wearing a mask. Extremely cold and unresponsive. Maybe she was feeling sick? Or she just simply hates her job.
5 star for the other young lady who was much warmer and helpful when responding to my requests.

Atmosphere - a few tables but arranged in such way that my partner and I weren’t able to enjoy the sitting-down. Too messy and unwelcoming?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONt4qoPsnu47IselWmUp9PC0lEPUw7nPAqDL9I&fid=0x0:0x2d8f0eefba320242"],"When":"2024-1-8"},{"Name":"Peter Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLu0YJJe3nhlyAIPeX3ltU_n4sDFnWFsG2_v5wI3BSZDiWJuw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Nothing like the one in HK. Tea is weak and not fragrant. milk is not “smooth”   Lack two main factors that determine a good quality HK style milk tea   It’s literally a hole in the wall in the mall so why care about atmosphere   Service is average  wouldn’t goto a place with any less service anyways","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"K L H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQFZJuD0_NE10o4xSC-XtXQSVqtA5ZrAaHnqFaD10csHc_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’m so glad I got the medium HK milk for $5.93 and not the large as this was the worst milk tea I had. It was tasteless and no strong tannin taste.

Do yourself a favour and go to any of the other food court vendors to get a legit HK Milk Tea.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erica Yu (oRRRz)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAhLfdiW92_pMHIZpfW1jVkgiMgXpqtp8K_CejDLutMsGASQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Used to get coffee here everyday but think I'm gonna find a better cafe in the future.
This store recently hired a new girl that ruins every cup of coffee. I have seen this pink haired lady around this place for about 1 month, and cant believe she still give the worst coffee in the town and charge me almost 3 bucks. Guess the owner probably has no idea how to train their newbies, nor keep their regular customers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"BasiL C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOTb6hjUHVI4Nu6kNnwnz3wSdArPyBQHKwfRQQ-azRg0LR9Kndeg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"SCAM! DON'T PURCHASE FROM THIS STORE. It has been verified by many people on Facebook, other social media platforms, and myself personally from the owner of Lan Fong Yuen in HK, that this location has no affiliation with its origin from Hong Kong. Not to mention their drinks and food are horrible. Shame on the owner of this FAKE Lan Fong Yuen.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mia Riley Scott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWa8cFbCl4v2WH4VVanvbz69GsP9RG6uRtR6n7SZ-sfXnkm43s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered the chicken guacamole wrap for $7, since there was a photo of a lovely, fresh looking wrap with grilled chicken, fresh lettuce, cheese, and chunky guacamole. I got a tiny wrap with a single, wilted piece of lettuce, grilled chicken and no guacamole. I also didn't see any cheese, but there might have been a very small amount that melted in with the chicken, but definitely didn't taste like there was any. When I mentioned there was no guacamole in the wrap, the server said she only put a little bit in and showed me a tub full of runny, red sauce to prove it. She clearly didn't know what guacamole was, and had added some hot sauce instead. Although the chicken was tasty, it was very small and not what I ordered.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Siu W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNReSMAtiP8LvztQ4nWGiVTiUU941h6I15JZLCpR9aLawZz8wd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just had their “signature” milk tea, not only it tasted  no where near the real LFY but also nothing like a decent HK style milk tea. It’s watery and blend. Even the ones I had from food court vendors are 10 times better than this one. Not going back and wouldn’t recommend it.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Payton Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8F4gg-2HNfPwSNdsTL_8PpHFJfX5q2p3Q9gvsIXWVDne6TFNI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really liked the boba milk that I ordered. It was one of the best and one of the most tasty drinks that I have ever drank! It was a great experience being at the shop and drinking it. The service is extremely nice and the milk tea and boba was phenomenal. The boba pearls were extremely chewy and sweet that contrasted the nice and creamy and less sweet milk tea. This was one of the best experiences that I have got from a milk tea shop and the best service I have experiences, Five out of Five stars, 100% coming back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rae Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXludIfvxP0lSashqAP6J43sWBimKhhDxCMUWR6u1Oxcwk0m3TvVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"How to enter: it’s actually inside the restaurant called Tian Shi Fu.

Their honey pearls are really awesome and the taro milk is fresh and delicious 🤤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlj3cKWczKc3LU6TSE1iZaiFip8zymJhr7hr8g&fid=0x0:0xc2f5576ece57541f"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Sheren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwgWVtP6HKMkhFLCP4_q1L6Sudo7ufb7ryQD3i3kJwLQlCuUZm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They are newly open in Richmond for around a month!
Milksha located just beside Tian Shi Fu, it’s a good choice for customer to choose.
First try for their drinks, tried matcha with red beans and bubble earl grey tea latte! They allow customer to choose the ice and sugar preference.
They all taste fresh and taste good. But it’s a bit pricey overall...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmfVjSgZaop9a5RYAx_WLcOZfHu1xcIzBci5Nn&fid=0x0:0xc2f5576ece57541f"],"When":"2020-9-29"},{"Name":"Michele","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDlYg4xePwcg1uBJhwxHNnuv467vJaZyLRVq0VO_tUWQN0RWAK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried orange green tea for the first time and it was actually really good! The service was slow as only 1 person was working for this bubble tea place so they had to place the order, make the order and repeat. The honey pearls was quite good, forever usually I order 50% sugar as I was scared it was going to be sour. I ordered 70% and it was still quite sweet for my taste. Definitely give it a try if you have the chance for a different bubble tea place with honey pearls!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXhKAKg-se6sl5s9nqjbbDDlI3--6diLMg_0jO&fid=0x0:0xc2f5576ece57541f"],"When":"2022-6-7"},{"Name":"keroppiepie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlyA0G6ckmpYM3V7fjK20xEqK-e2Bs2017K9qHXYWuX5OmPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best spots for bubble tea around the Richmond Centre area! The honey pearls at Milksha are always made consistently and have the perfect consistency/texture. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joanne T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJIwVpeorL5z6Pkvd0BDuaF2nB_8arVN1j4shYRCjLwfeQXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really enjoyed the taro fresh milk!! The fresh taro bits were really good and you have the option for lactose free milk too which is always a bonus :) Service was quick and friendly as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORrl7zxu6h9dnObodl6CGgUvrDi9OgS3RcP9Ml&fid=0x0:0xc2f5576ece57541f"],"When":"2022-5-3"},{"Name":"ChiChi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_M4HYJril2pA7VKWbN7HQQosZVk1PvwuIKK5TjtsM_u2_fQs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"There is a piece of plastic in my drink!! I checked both of the lid where I poked a hole and the straw packaging, and this piece of garbage is not from either of these two places. It was inside the drink from the beginning! Milksha, please seriously check your production process. Garbage in your drink is just disgusting and intolerable!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKRYlKi5ggD4oP7M8k4kU4RZoZYl4j1KZ5iAjb&fid=0x0:0xc2f5576ece57541f"],"When":"2021-4-15"},{"Name":"ERIC LEE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaJovYZAgLzUeUNtNtg127bXJTiz29J3-DCzJEx2zxmWPGyzyC1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Taiwanese bubble tea chain. Known for its milk drinks. Uses real taro in its taro drinks. Although the quality is apparent, especially compared to other bubble tea shops, I am still in awe that I spent $7.30 on one drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdC-GCy72VV5Muj8Stsd-3kAjaIiE5JaDyN_vq&fid=0x0:0xc2f5576ece57541f"],"When":"2021-4-26"}]

Would be a great alternative to Egget house","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lily Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZaD8PwfirGi8j7cSR-cVUk_TQ683n1XbExDXAR_h3gLqI_dU6Kw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It smelled like it had durian but I could barely taste it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3wVVAuIi-y30ZVDm6h4GA8jWB-4vvKWM5YZSO\u0026fid=0x0:0x176a208c3665a2fd"],"When":"2024-5-7"},{"Name":"Zephyr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi0Xbpfu6tRkPw0IoGrJ0CmwuI_fq3bZplujLoTo1QVvPthPHi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"口味調配的不錯👍\n稍微做的久一些","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPq92_BHHgXyDPu1rH-oP_GibGH16LW9rW664a_\u0026fid=0x0:0x176a208c3665a2fd"],"When":"2023-11-21"},{"Name":"C T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW01kpsii2LCWO9OzW1o6K-iEbJnt66rXbZj5I8SnSYcKmXBcd2Sg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZapjdE3ExSeaz9U6Pr7L8AKc7sBom5bRXN99b\u0026fid=0x0:0x176a208c3665a2fd"],"When":"2024-1-29"}]

title: Choo Tea
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Linda Huynh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJULBJVa4IqPnZaoD2l1RctTtz9hoxAr_VwxVSsCLAJ5ScENQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Bubble tea place a bit tucked away from main shopping centre, but it's popular enough to have a small line. The price-quality is very decent for the area. I tried the mango slush with cheese, it's nice at 50% sugar, already sweet enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFCTnSdA5N4ad1MISNQC3lSyWkFtTyMGu09ei6&fid=0x0:0xd7406e9542cb6d47"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Jonie Hsiao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUIEyY3vYGt8sEJ0TFuEA4OUsuLCtJnKyQAD-xyeJmWwu_ZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It’s actually a zero if this is a option, their quality of drinks are bad, their milk probably expired or something and still serve it to the customer, soon as we finished their brown sugar pearl with milk we had diarrhea and stomach pain, we also drank out a piece of some kind of cardboard from their drink, also the paint of the sealing wrap slowly comes off then stick on your straw and make it in the drink, it’s absolutely disgusting. Their customers service are awful, definitely need more training on understanding what the customer are asking for, even with the mic the server still didn’t hear what I asked for and just randomly picked a drink for me and I asked her which drink is that, she just continue with the next question, did not bother to answer any questions, it’s ridiculous, don’t go to this store!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtE_8z9zsaZo01h9NI-l4xeKEgDjOSbuQZ1I_P&fid=0x0:0xd7406e9542cb6d47"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Lisa Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2hRhOWIQf2ren7p1R3F9BVnb3q6vzlyk-JCc_U7cm7KJ7rH11fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"this place has the best bbt in vancouver. i always try to stop by when im in richmond! i’ve tried their jasmine milk tea, oreo chudai tea, peach slush, and strawberry blueberry slush with salty cream (picture).

their tea doesn’t taste artificial at all and the sweetness level is perfect for me (i always get 50% sugar). i really recommend their salty cream and taro balls! the prices aren’t cheap but the taste is worth it to me, and the drinks always come out so pretty!

today there was no lineup and my drink literally came out within a minute of ordering. sometimes when there’s a lineup there’s a bit of a wait, but the service is relatively fast and the staff is really nice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuxH8hsxY4tvFpLcgnc0t84Cl1H8kvoDs1Key6&fid=0x0:0xd7406e9542cb6d47"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Brenda Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgB2uI7h7ia9TEwd76GKYpXlHoFO-6BuwCg5WaStCsq1dLXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This peach oolong cheese is the worse drink I have ever bought and coated me $7. The cheese was already mixed together with the tea when served, asked for no sugar and it was still so sweet that you can't taste any tea nor cheese in your mouth. I have never thrown away any drink even when it taste bad, this is the only time I threw away the entire drink as it's insufferable. never going back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiNP2houPieZ2f3kdK-piTMDvsHONpuhx3-P1F&fid=0x0:0xd7406e9542cb6d47"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Maggie L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKw7H0RChX7Mw0PyvQQHj7OhPWHAlbfJMDwatx6L9pmCQX9Ac=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My fav bubble tea shop in Vancouver! They use fresh taro so the drinks are delicious. Never ask for tips and always ask if I want to adjust the ice level :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sweets Fanatic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKT4q9vq4bFnKURKLo-IuFZkNgSUZrYyHCHwVq7PvVTaTofHHc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Better than I expected- the appearance was very pretty and exactly like how the image was. My problem was that it was a bit too sweet for me. Even when I asked for 0 sugar/0 ice. I had an uncomfortable throat - half filled with mucus, half with the bitter sweet aftertaste.

Note: I am the type to ask for 0/0 sugar/ice so my sweet taste buds are pretty sensitive.

Still- very pretty and has excellent salty cream.

Taste: 4/5
Cleanliness: 4.5/5
Price: 6.5$ + tax = 7 something

Comeback rate: 60%","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNprGFocSTEet03ngdqvoDEDh8R3hetXoh6ySAh&fid=0x0:0xd7406e9542cb6d47"],"When":"2023-2-22"},{"Name":"Dani H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWenaLps19-nFPAzbB8s4Dow3NptWvTGVS-POz8cPngTRqxrj34tA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This jasmine milk tea is the best milk tea I’ve ever had in Vancouver, period. So fragrant and not too sweet. The cream is also freshly made. Highly recommended ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDnbSr_2F66Mhlx0wNO3esH7R0BEY3I5bDE33C&fid=0x0:0xd7406e9542cb6d47"],"When":"2024-3-9"},{"Name":"Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpyR6lW9JHiyXGuG73lo5A19PTb1WXFzVLCnrO84Gv3hfeDE5c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Got the Osmanthus milk tea! It had what tasted like fermented rice, which was surprisingly good. I got it at regular sweetness, and it wasn’t overly sweet like at other bubble tea places. I’ll definitely be back to try their other drinks.

2nd visit: got the purple potato milk tea, and was disappointed. Like other reviews said, it was very bland and just tasted like regular milk - although the purée was good, the drink itself was flavourless.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFwNCOw4ktyU4gol0RJaumlhb3DlQseRm2CMG6&fid=0x0:0xd7406e9542cb6d47"],"When":"2023-1-23"}]

title: Chase Tea - Main Store
descriptions: Many teas, including bubble varieties, offered in a hip, brick- & wood-lined space with seating.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time trying this place out. Richmond has a lot of beverage competitors so it’s definitely tough to know what’s good and what’s not.

I ordered this using UBER and for the most part, enjoyed the flavours of the drinks. Can’t say it’s overly spectacular, but I was happy with the drink and that’s what counts.

My drink specific was the mango slush with the coconut milk.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM95uQLAg_4U0VFzpkFcSdzYR8-BEP860ybCUdC&fid=0x0:0x756a95a927fd6ce6"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Zicheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXH4M3CoqRmsv85ELZftV-B-5l29WeTGIBzCFhGOSDIxl7ZuF4X4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely loved this place. I had the Kyoho Grape Cheese Tea and Caramel Milk Tea with Grass Jelly. Both of them were amazing. The drinks are not too sweet, which is perfect and you can taste the quality of the ingredients they use. The staff were very knowledgeable about their drinks and provide phenomenal service. On top of that, the atmosphere is incredible, with small touches here and there to elevate your experience. I find myself spending afternoons here finishing my work while enjoying on of their drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT1h5Ep7Q7ITJqV4XrafQr7p-0rCQeHa-lrNlL&fid=0x0:0x756a95a927fd6ce6"],"When":"2023-10-29"},{"Name":"Chao Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKO0DIkYXFeTUB4t6rARDVXcR-EV7KLwekNpNbhy4SRhGWdKA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Order two cup of tea, one Peach Oolong Cheese Tea and one Taro Mochi Milk Tea, my wife and I enjoyed the tea a lot, and spent the afternoon there, the atmosphere there was so comfortable that we wouldnt like to leave. The service here was the best that I ever had, and definitely I will come again. However, the most important is the drink itslef that was made with real fruits. If there were an 10-star option, this store deserves it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyNzdHJNFyXd99PIVpmKhkrk6A0OOuSleXIx8t&fid=0x0:0x756a95a927fd6ce6"],"When":"2023-10-20"},{"Name":"Kenny Kao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW546LD0mJfl9BlUT0H3d6lxuos3DoY1_PcJJwc6GNPaJ339XU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good atmosphere and an amazing drink.
Got the #1 most popular drink there. A matcha oak latte drink, and its amazing. I would recommend the large size.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mark Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqELq_vZiyoP-YTtjCvZ023BM0HMq7aj-KaFZeBSqn4YfZtiVj_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The drinks are special, in a sense that, they are different from other "boba places". I ordered the strawberry green tea slush and it was pretty good. My wife ordered a traditional milk tea with pearls.

It wasn't that the drinks lowered my rating for this place but the service was horrific. The two drinks took nearly 20 minutes to make. While the person behind the counter was making our drinks, they kept running to the back and move a few things, then wash a few dishes, then take a few orders, and mix our drinks. Seems like you are either under staff or doesn't mind us waiting for our two drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPh4CgjW_JiH1bhcy0fPJTO-ccyfTVWvOy1k3Eq&fid=0x0:0x756a95a927fd6ce6"],"When":"2021-1-13"},{"Name":"Leo Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV85YDglYa0dqJZBoHypSMWRJhkQh84yAItH6UCoC2VEFpBBkAY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is as good as the true flavour / authentic BBT can get in Vancouver.

My girlfriend and I came to the restaurant because a friend was praising this brand over all other bbt shop in town. Quoted from him: “most bbt in town are using the 20L container to store the tea they cooked in the morning, and the quality start going bad after the first 2 hours; however, with chase tea, you can actually enjoy the fresh brew tea.  yes it does take longer time to wait,  but absolutely worth it”

So here we are, and just as expected
It does take nearly 15 mins to get our tea when the restaurant is not busy

The tea IS crazy good and fresh !  I’m pretty confident to say that I’ll start to be a big fan of this place too. Haha, great decor and fantastic tea quality !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0N16XK9ukQtDX2bciOfCH6mb80mzrqJEGzLiL&fid=0x0:0x756a95a927fd6ce6"],"When":"2019-6-20"},{"Name":"Jeanne Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJscJPI_e-NvrdBgpn9obpzFExUyC29OQRrk-Bq5Ht89c7KYfil=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great cafe atmosphere! Ordered their pearl milk tea which is a blend of different teas from their store.  My husband got their Peach Oolong  Cheese lattea (you have the choice to get either salted  cheese or sweet - the salted is more popular). All I have to say is that it satisfied my bubble tea craving! Check this place out if your in Richmond and you want a nice sit down cafe.
The owner was so kind to let us try their store made Macha green tea ice cream! Highly recommend! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOO9cCuV45psyUEp-FkSIOrhKo7NYnvm67XMjdq&fid=0x0:0x756a95a927fd6ce6"],"When":"2017-4-1"},{"Name":"飞行洋娃娃","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTOGPwG-PaEagTVDuLpHyF1osMdec_TYevPTo0bU9Pss8JfFw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like the afternoon time here with my husband. The drink was great, and I will come again. The atmosphere was so comfortable that I can relax.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfSvB7l52RbmDLSgCexmCHmFeHO5ErPDat09Ai&fid=0x0:0x756a95a927fd6ce6"],"When":"2023-10-20"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"明好來示範by徐馬力","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQLC5pMP0vC1AYCyqJ5brqSpWpkuxwsBGEUrhJd5QneW4K5pfE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super authentic HK style sweets. Walnut drinks、black sesames drinks、almond drinks are done perfectly, sweetness is done well too. 雪蛤 done it perfectly as well no stinky smell. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ben Klein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9R820F28I0t3X369CmfDuA-HVVZc86vM9sktLJOY_Gt7-9IRU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A Chinese herbal tea stall. I had to come to this mall for years before I knew what this stall did. One day I had a niggling cough and my friend recommended grabbing a tea here. Not sure if it really solved my problem but it was soothing with a better taste than I was expecting. Parking is available from each lot around the mall. Transit comes from the nearby Canada line stop of Aberdeen. There are also two bus stops nearby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxeqPySiGFWSSlrDFu5iUsqk_jLKD99T8MFmx4\u0026fid=0x0:0xff448238d8f2d629"],"When":"2017-9-14"},{"Name":"Marcus Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoNr03HVzKs6bc_7KJRO7N6Ii2y72eZpk6lZjF5N_krVQLbLXs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The tea there really made me feel so much better","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvPECwhaD0RfOxoJSA2Nfq7yacJxq0NZue8LxBFuMuUes53IG2xQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Decent food quality with a wide selection of Hong Kong herbal food and drinks.  Service is non existent.  Server/owner did not even acknowledge us when we walked in and just expect us to yell out our order.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sung Yen Tsai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3vw41zp-cQWDRnrfAr9vm-XZ0J33yYYVGY3o0C8euOOhkM-90=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I like my herbal tea to balance my chi.\n$6 only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7uFtRv0TgD8p2NX7jF2jZ2fU5gvRpbbaznXXy\u0026fid=0x0:0xff448238d8f2d629"],"When":"2019-2-8"},{"Name":"ちょべんべん","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDGmf_-XvBBiPYdyXAsbed7DCS9Y0qeAhbkRKLGuMqFE_F=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Bad taste, 16 bucks for a small bowl of plain jelly…..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"peter chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLK2ttLhdU5ebVZdOq5f9O_bbfHl0mKiSVY5fWeA6-ZgbkDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good herbal tea shop","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"xxdjkid the yt gamer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXu-T2cokKJXcpZ4ZWf3AMQb8zL6jbgeDzMzd2FJw6PnRN4KWj2iA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"還有賣涼茶、龜苓膏的没有幾間了，廿四味真的非常苦。","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMC5ifBIhkxTITe-aX605sAe2wm7eknBEKQ7QNY\u0026fid=0x0:0xff448238d8f2d629"],"When":"2020-3-2"}]
