user_reviews: [{"Name":"Ben Klein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9R820F28I0t3X369CmfDuA-HVVZc86vM9sktLJOY_Gt7-9IRU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tapio is a fantastic non standard bubble tea and lunch joint. The decor is very pleasant and eclectic with simple furniture and delightful centerpieces and accoutrements. They also have some toys and books for kids.\nThey have a variety of delicious recipes and daily specials. Their sandwiches are surprisingly good. The focus however is on their teas and their boba. They have a bakery of teas both cold and hot, as well as sweet and regular. They also have several different additives to enhance your tea. The boba is well made.\nService is friendly. They have limited parking and are only close to one bus route. You can work from a laptop here but they only have limited outlets. The bathroom is clean and well maintained.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaE1etRvIYAsDMY8LAjOR5JoleBGlx6ArHIueZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x3ac64c9904fb00f7"],"When":"2018-4-16"},{"Name":"Ming","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeCpwTq7vQtz1zEXOuxwkdhs4dU-qaK0-IZ01EkAr5sbXlayo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Large variety and fair prices. I’m happy with their take out supply and bbt tea powder samples, very helpful sales person in store. Usually can get next day delivery.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Munro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHBhLJOAD5UtcatOmAWVWA-INTmH6aoCrd5hxJS-NRSJsdua8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was hit by a delivery fan from this location, and they refused to take responsibility with ICBC. Do not go to this company as they don’t care about their community at all.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shannan F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB0AJBQbs1zEczOB_HDt40PiVEo3X8V7i2hXtyu71QXDsA7Twf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They were accommodating when I needed to pick something up urgently","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Explorer Webber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzICU4Wno25QN45N24vyKxA1B2RH3b1nDDMmbyY0Nryu9KB-Rz_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quaint little hidden gem in the industrial area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPwTypI7XzjJxzqzVGR7Y4Jpy-Jq1zwlfMnCyz\u0026fid=0x0:0x3ac64c9904fb00f7"],"When":"2019-6-19"},{"Name":"Brad French (b-RAD)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAQYgVIh72_9c-a4ibMD6ybcY6COfcD47NbzYs_tn5csjxlKLf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"They make a great bubble tea with freshly brewed tea. The tapioca pearls tasted fresh and were not chewy or hard. The inside of the cafe is a little bare and cool feeling. When I go to a cafe I prefer it to be cozy, this was not. I think more comfortable seating and being surrounded with more tea/coffee paraphernalia would add more to the ambience of the cafe. The server was helpful, friendly, and worked hard to make great beverages.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Todd Meyer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXC5sErzefQj7MXRSG_wnMDJTmqEWvIBhyow7CB0hwMjnn3fszi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Google Says cafe is open, upon arriving on site and walking inside I was informed it is closed (1pm on a Thursday) . After a 45min walk to get here kind of sucks to find that out.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ian Carlson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnxZ6V4E6EEt6CltImXXHG4g9GMFA75qMKyRSUNCjG_iK2QD3Ciw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service and very friendly staff. They are more than willing to make your visit enjoyable and the food is reasonably priced and delicious","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ben Klein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9R820F28I0t3X369CmfDuA-HVVZc86vM9sktLJOY_Gt7-9IRU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A pretty solid bbt joint. They use powders which usually gives a 3 but they have a number of variations so it bumps them to a four. They have really quick service and because they are in a mall you don't usually have a long line to wait through. At the same time, you can't sit down, so it is a grab and go place. They are super close to the Aberdeen Canada line. There is underground parking available (fills up in a huge way on the weekend). There are bike racks and bus route that brings you right here as well. Pricing is fine and the kitchen looks clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWN-q7x7rIPNlFq283X_IF0FwihURAuuwfznXV&fid=0x0:0x1ce2a74b971e2c75"],"When":"2018-7-18"},{"Name":"Wai Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzmH5OpJoM-hhDFEjmWs5pk92KWv4KTM3Z3pPRu01cSO_3zEyz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I tried the cheese cream milk tea.
Figured customer favorite.
I liked it.
Would order again.
I did no Ice with 3/4 sweet. That was perfect for me.
Service was eh. Not very chatty. Just there to get the job done.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmQir1OU3oE1tCG5ZgyIdlhp2GPRlGNF11OKSJ&fid=0x0:0x1ce2a74b971e2c75"],"When":"2018-5-25"},{"Name":"Ivy Suen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUy0uLSQMVjcge1v36DrFMwX7OKpVIO8EQQ-MlOkfz4Yr7cdUSp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Black Sugar Pearl with Milk again lol. Not bad but my honest opinion is I still prefer Yi Fang 😎. To give a better idea - the pearls made by Yi Fang are softer and chewier, and the milk tastes better (maybe because Yi Fang uses organic milk). The bottom is I will come back to Presotea again to try other drinks and I don't mind having their Black Sugar Pearl with Milk again 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIny4EFmLi8lP0NE_dEnQS0c_uTaB8BTV9YnB-&fid=0x0:0x1ce2a74b971e2c75"],"When":"2018-11-8"},{"Name":"Elisa La","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLE9uJHAXcbExsOUJ7Dx5y5jQTG1jvZhNRYOFD7uxmQW-E7fQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The service is bad and rude, I paid for my drink by cash, she does not know to do the calculation, after my correction, she throw the change on the counter no apology at all. Go home if you don’t want to work or have a bad mood! Don’t waste your money and time even give them a try!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brenda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwbIVWnhkgkW1vVSPc7Hi7rNeih1-rfkmik-FZ0TEby-aDTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I went here for a sweet refreshing drink , and I decided to get a Mango Slush ($5.80). It was good, but price was TOO steep for this drink.

I didn't have to wait for too long , and the service was okay. There were other flavours that I've never tried, but I don't think I'll go back there though. I'll probably stick to Chatime or GongCha.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alice Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6kmLBm-l0fKYauhLrXU_hg4awzQzHj653e_nW7zJbuIVhTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Because of we keep talking about bubble tea at work.. make me try the new place at Aberdeen center. I asked them, which one got strong tea favorite, they recommended me to try their oolong milk tea .. so I ordered one small cup oolong milk tea with mixed Pearls ,  regular sweet and less ice.. their pearls are too soft to me... I like shiny tea's better.. can't taste any tea favorite/ thick cream favourite more than tea favorite... extremely sweet for me .... their price is $1 more than shiny tea, not worth $5.65 for small cup...
The Male cashier was so rude and sleepy, why I asked for recommendations.. its end up the lady behind him answered my question.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYW3DOLganxi99oXxJtuNNb_fnsCHvZqBIMbXEzgLt2HXtdg8-Eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Mango tea sour and pearl very hard middle.
The website AND customer email isn't working. I called the Terra Nova branch and the poor reception apologized to me but it was no fault of hers. This is a very poorly run franchise!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jia Yue He","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx54uXe-He0rlsuFk1DklJmvfCOgMAoyMkQky6XiF5AYVmNoUN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was good and plenty of options to choose from. I tried most of the fresh fruit slushes, and the quality is apparent. Taste was excellent. Good for occasional treat.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fiona Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1WqgSxu82AHjlJWGEzWOZPg0BA-C5kZM0c8OMheD3CB_t_KdLEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food in this restaurant is of average quality, the prices are affordable, and the environment is elegantly decorated, where you can check in, and it's also a good place to chat with friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqLMJUHA008gAfXWqmFQjoaqtA-SMtohA3QjES&fid=0x0:0x743bbc3da8e10abf"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Jack Yuen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhRPpXHdrFGpSfFPj2Llvg9rACCkMWbpnKawexr7OBRxKhKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is so-so they should narrow now the number of choice and focus on few items.  As many people mention, it is such a nice place to visit but music is coming from a real piano. It is unfortunate that most of the music can't finish all the way to the end and immediate jump to next song. I also don't like their QR code menu order system that requires you to register your phone. I think this place is good for simple food during breakfast and afternoon tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_vYP3cykjtGLYG4eysdhxwMRQuhE_ADyv8ujA&fid=0x0:0x743bbc3da8e10abf"],"When":"2024-1-15"},{"Name":"Janis Chiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvo-S-6kGEPk0wxBMJ07JXObaf-TnNyuz93RFwSkutvHglDuY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is very pretty, good food, reasonable price and very friendly service. The only drawback to me is that the menu is too diversified. The deco of the restaurant is European and very elegant, so to me the traditional Chinese dishes (i.e.congee) don't match the atmosphere.  I hope they will add pastry back to their menu, then it will be a good place to go for afternoon tea too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiVFGw6P9hZ-hjf2Rsk4dprWpYBKsdHDNPxjHD&fid=0x0:0x743bbc3da8e10abf"],"When":"2023-9-12"},{"Name":"Posy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGs-08ciD4n9dcj2lgNB9owqim55DMZlkyK7AYMmaM13JUR6S98Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great and unique place to get Hong Kong style food. The food is cheap for a sit-down restaurant and tasted very fresh. The servers were very nice and patient when we were struggling with the menu. There are many options to pick from! The atmosphere is very unique and provides a more elegant experience.

My only issue is that they dint serve cake anymore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFQqfILI6C07eOAdbTeHmlzLktuQrRBvCPACzx&fid=0x0:0x743bbc3da8e10abf"],"When":"2024-2-28"},{"Name":"Little Journey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlNkzOJynLpgqJCrPnrmAAn5viwim-B3Uir-26DOWxIzwcnZ0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Serving Hong Kong cha chaan teng style breakfast @averyrestaurant kind of makes ppl feel a little bit out of place. The food quality is acceptable, the waitress can be more courteous, the deco is designed for selfies, and the vibe is perfect for chi-chatting. No complaints at all as we all enjoy the vibe very much 💓","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVw47Q75Rt3PRF16QQqLpbYihM6aYaJIMjoFoO&fid=0x0:0x743bbc3da8e10abf"],"When":"2024-1-12"},{"Name":"Johnny C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMH8aFZIGB5a7CFStbNQ6JGT0sYgxOttD7xMtIebcz8N9tnSzq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"HK style cafe but in a unique environment. The back wall is very beautiful and doesn’t look like any HK style cafe.  There’s a piano in the restaurant.  Plenty of parking available. I enjoyed the all day breakfast!  The decor in the restaurant was from the previous high tea restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdcPjFoMEsrCsEURVyZ9qo9geQPT7YdoAz4fou&fid=0x0:0x743bbc3da8e10abf"],"When":"2023-10-4"},{"Name":"A H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXL7NDL55nzugSZ5ygIgm81COgNwrrxjMsfhJRohKFEoMSS7Ge6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love the spaciousness and the distancing between tables. The lovely floral wall makes a nice photo background.

Lighting is ample which brightens up the place together with all the chairs being white.

Hong Kong style foods are up to par. My only complaint is that while the chicken filet (with ramen noodles) I ordered was very tasty, it was way too salty for my liking.

The female server could be friendlier.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSy3604gmhAogzpN4aK6GpyPBR92J-t1B4650V&fid=0x0:0x743bbc3da8e10abf"],"When":"2024-1-30"},{"Name":"Adrian Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRz_uEV8AM70-EugybmCMjVZLIi0OfMP3My2LKS1PidWwGuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The decor is white and faux "fancy" Elizabethan. They have an automated piano playing. Atmosphere is unique, a bit over the top, but nice. Food was surprisingly good and prices are a good deal.  Coffee and tea a bit weak.  Service was a bit abrupt, but ok. Parking is free for three hours if you register your car with the restaurant. If you treat it as a standard HK Style restaurant it's good. The rest may not be to your taste, but the basics are right.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2ZNRVuqT29lEeWvorLpjpAgPYRg53al9hQtlJ&fid=0x0:0x743bbc3da8e10abf"],"When":"2022-12-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Edgar Ignacio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7oexz4qXoBKr6ujKuYxwMvlf16ckv-ovFMKFmC4nzUqeMSoelFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently visited Daan Go Cake Lab in Richmond, BC, yesterday Saturday and I must say, I was thoroughly impressed! As a first-time visitor, I was delighted by how affordable the cakes, pastries and drinks were. It’s refreshing to enjoy such delicious treats without spending a fortune!

The ambiance of the bakery is another highlight. The cozy setting, paired with the high ceilings and modern, catchy design, creates a wonderful atmosphere that invites you to relax and indulge.

Every item we ordered was not only budget-friendly but also absolutely delectable! I can’t wait to return and explore more of their menu. Highly recommend this gem for anyone looking to enjoy some fantastic pastries in a lovely setting! 🍰☕✨","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZyZXaWRdB67m9oGc8cTFCqERECjeKpxQVTfCI&fid=0x0:0x53f926f181db5382"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Tammy Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWn0N2I5STxk6Dw-kQhoKTxOlHlPrvcouHiB9OgzjAG84pt3M0D_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"tl;dr: really pretty and creative desserts but it is way too sweet. For 4 pieces of cake, it was around 37$.

Food Quality: 3/5
For the cakes we tried, they looked really pretty, however they only tasted alright. They are extremely sweet and the cakes start melting and getting droopy after being out for a while. You’d have to eat them instantly or else they will melt and droop. Unlike most Asian bakeries, they make their desserts really sweet.

Food Quantity: 4/5
The cost of 4 cakes was 37$ which is pretty pricey considering they are not that big in size.

Service/Atmosphere: 5/5
Friendly and quick service. The store was clean and tidy as well. Went on a holiday around 1pm and there was no line.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgCQuDBmQ8-7mih0tY28u2Cw3OwHy2JPg0AMCn&fid=0x0:0x53f926f181db5382"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Sally","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYjadMy5T259gkmUlT3p9sRdMDrhLZLohAcAX0TlTZ6TSMTtRT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The strawberry matcha cake was super bad，it tasted old and the texture was off. There was some kind of grain in the cake, which made it really weird. The salmon cream cheese was way too rich. The only good thing was the chocolate croissant. Really disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONCqtdm0egDozA9XgkW-NcSYDKYFoFH_tZMH7f&fid=0x0:0x53f926f181db5382"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Ellen Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzoh866OovBfVlMHdFGLQnEdLyB97Utya-3yzGLsM4EYweL6y3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Adorable desserts. The bubble tea cake was good! Love that they have vegan ice cream (cherry blossom - whole tub lol). Would be great if they add more vegan treats!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN145sZOLa4kr1TJSbYsdppiWVwx-hFrMSExK0n&fid=0x0:0x53f926f181db5382"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Sam C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXxmKczYakFIxjwSYGS4UEC7Y5L-2m617P2sdy0kF-_IgbrA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered an Opera cake and are extremely disappointed in the result. We didn’t open it until we got home but we were shocked by its appearance. As you can see in the photos, the chocolate coating was cracked, the cream exterior was nowhere near smooth, and the entire thing was collapsing. There was what we can only assume to be water leaking from the cream, I guess it never fully set? After cutting into it the entire thing just deflated and pooled onto the plate.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2pcfGmZgfHLcw1Z9mVvasz5boLeyEWPdp2RoA&fid=0x0:0x53f926f181db5382"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Jessica Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOeC5VCbc6g3HH3dxXpDS9bE993HEKMDVI3SjHX2aNdHbQOJHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ah the Thai tea croissant should be more than 5 stars because it was amazing even with so much ooey gooey goodness and for me with sensitivities. It was nice that the person working there explained it doesn't need to be heated. The durian cake I had high expectations because of reviews on here but it might not have been as healthy. I wonder if it needed to stay in the fridge and not stay out for even a couple hours. There was a strange processed taste in the pandan macaron too. Pricing was reasonable. The packing was all really great and overall visiting here was worth a 4 hour round-trip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOydQrN_FtJeY7aVlgLHrFLtIGd_EayftpwYWwF&fid=0x0:0x53f926f181db5382"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First of all, the vibe here and the style of the shop is truly awesome. Totally jive with the cute and yummy theme! Also, the manager deserves a shoutout for amazing customer service along with the staff. We ordered the celebration pig cake for Father’s Day and it was a hit with both the kids and the adults! It’s one of those scenarios where something actually tastes as good as it looks!

The cake was beautiful and detailed with real burn marks and crispy chocolate skin to replicate a real roast pig. The cake inside was delicious with the cherry bits and cream. The quality of the cake was amazing. You totally get what you pay for here.

The macarons were the cutest and came in so many different colours and flavours which again tasted as good as they looked. The packaging was beautiful! Definitely worth a visit and one of the best places for cake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvCZCiJTqBHhivRGir29n2ZJjuNAHaE00b0Jg3&fid=0x0:0x53f926f181db5382"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"John lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHcEpe_rdGFT18X1xSq_zGAWTDJet6abEOGhjWIbqUaXkcOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The durian cake is flavourful and looks awesome. The cake is moist, but not the fluffy silky type. My wife loves the bobalicious cup -- the milk tea custard is rich and the faux Boba has nice texture (Not the chewy type). We also got the character macarons which were a huge hit in the family. Service is adequate, but a bit nonchalant. A smile would be nice for a dessert shop. Online customer service is very good though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQixf0bYaZmUAWZFmRoz09pE_1wCGIKASwpdK3&fid=0x0:0x53f926f181db5382"],"When":"2024-8-27"}]

title: Chatime
descriptions: A range of sweet & not-so-sweet bubble teas are prepared to order at this relaxed cafe.

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been there by coincidence and what a good decision to walk in. The cashier, he was really nice and polite. Clean and organized which perfect for us to dine in and had such a happy  relaxing time. Thai milk tea is always my favorite and they make the best here. Will definitely drop by again if we're in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKhySOxDXDO2o6PRg7Y0aUk08kdyQ99sR41pEZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d894e865e256e8"],"When":"2023-3-19"},{"Name":"Rosalyn L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPN_5czszz6__Y7uHNz5ajvleCb97h-ssOSaZruZT2VkQnv3o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered the ChaTime favourite. It had boboa, custard and grass jelly. Very tasty and did not disappoint.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLBvQGn-wo9rNunci7_9xswnoVM2RmbnKple72\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d894e865e256e8"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Aurora Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGRLQGGQUALeU-qgLfP9ZfVtHxHxiAcKE6odkfGBG0U0QSyWUW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I like that there are options for how much sugar or ice you like for your orders. The taste is ok, price is fair. The seats need new upholstery. When we came, the lady at the counter seem to be impatient, she sounded rushed like expecting that we have memorized their menu and know exactly what to say at the counter. That would be true for regulars, how do new comers become regulars? They were served nicely during their first time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpVJjfBPSEb0o3qKDjd6-ZY5l6LQV0_QH3zb_8\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d894e865e256e8"],"When":"2019-6-4"},{"Name":"Jimmy Feng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVI2sK_QIJ3xQqD4KedXy0JfUW0yeVIGkfEe_AisEOeGdCKHeLtuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"PSA for anyone ordering from Chatime, their “regular size” is literally half the amount of every over bubble tea shop out there.\n\nNone of their marketing material reflects the true portions of their drinks. I would not recommend to anyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1Kdbyr04LNurxNnQAxhM0Md3-bNm2kWkEodeg\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d894e865e256e8"],"When":"2024-4-10"},{"Name":"David Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBII3D955VAAnrAWPW9EH0opBtWWD8Py3qSdtRsCeqdIzfnlfi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a positive experience here. Order was friendly, timely, and the milk tea and fruit tea we ordered were well made and tasted good.  Mind you, it wasn't at a peak period on a Wednesday evening with most people watching the 2018 Olympics Women's Hockey Gold Medal game. Note, they used flavoured syrups for their fruit featured drinks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-9pFbN85w7m6LYaznOAUKVim-1GjJ9uxtrGlX\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d894e865e256e8"],"When":"2018-11-9"},{"Name":"Donna Adelaine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8MLPJVbzbAJZ1CVHMVv371-9n3oUk1rwRlDQK_QVDyOyNFWiD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The people behind the counter and the one making the drinks kept on giggling while we were trying to order. We had to repeat what we wanted a couple of times. Once we received our order, 3 of the 4 drinks were wrong. Instead of apologizing, the person on the counter just looked at the drink and said that they asked us to double check our order, insinuating that it’s our fault. No sign of empathy, zero customer service. The staff were just giggling. I hope they don’t do this with anyone else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Diane (Dineoutwithdee)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJfHVJSjIKAcPEXNIfUcWAtOeYHaXavqJYPtVJZ3lhCbCbpeo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went on a Saturday night and had a really nice visit. The girl at the counter was so nice and helpful! We enjoyed a couple of their special BT21 festive drinks in the super spacious dining area. The place was clean and the atmosphere was nice. I’ll be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDa1lEtbwpoE79st0DTX0urfxOnPoZLYOPDhVv\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d894e865e256e8"],"When":"2022-11-26"},{"Name":"Keira Klose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUApvkJkCdpIxxkIj5Wkvy1pRT7jdWKpuunqtaZRRehnGKMBemo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Staff was welcoming. The brown sugar bubble tea didn’t taste too good and when you ask for less ice they charge you more so watch out everything else was perfect i don’t know if I will come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMa7p-SNB02T2JhS6Sv_QcBCIMZU6a5jTT3y6fW\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d894e865e256e8"],"When":"2020-7-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ryan Dai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvz_7CRNc0uzQynlzLBSk6wo_JRdBk-3lTZRZl_hkyJTXWois=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A gem of a Taiwanese restaurant in the heart of Richmond!

Great value, huge portion sizes, abundant menu choices! We have enjoyed every menu item we have tried. Lovely atmosphere with great seating, though may get busy at certain times.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhTCaoJpA-M0W6K3o1lQ71UoLU4JIk9yAuZMk0&fid=0x0:0xf77e352828a627b2"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Byul Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNE3PndWa9cxtT27ptVuo9jPQ-levwM-0TYnqERYwzxSJLAKw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great dinner here, we got chicken nugget, hotpot and fried squid and they were all delicious! we also got the milk tea shaved ice and it was super duper delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvoN0u5wSLRk1eTStP-JLBq-5UTbES1eJlHEtl&fid=0x0:0xf77e352828a627b2"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A well-decorated Taiwanese place with an impressive menu selection! Their noodle soup was a very generous portion size, and their fried fish cakes were no slack either. I highly recommend their tomato beef noodle soup :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOu9dHIjYcajpHKUWE9ZVQrMYQq936Ccxva1dO7&fid=0x0:0xf77e352828a627b2"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"V Mary","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIxzj8Hnd6_pD-3vwyyJkCzFNEiYNQOMCJRilyFj1-V8wtiNjMzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you’re looking for the best sweet and sour dish, I would highly recommend this restaurant!!! Their sweet and sour fish was cooked to perfection. Fish tastes fresh, juicy and delicious. The sauce was the perfect balance of sweet, tangy and savoury. Vegetables were not over cooked.

We ordered the combo for two and it was worth it! The deep fried squid was delicious. Crispy on the outside but tender on the inside.  This combo came with a  few side dishes, pork intestine, cucumber, and pigs ears.

We will have to come back next time to try other dishes like shaved ice, braised beef and more.

Amazing customer service too! Very friendly and attentive staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNc6-7W3j9p6DKPJ5uhdfHYDZdq_iTAFEnbm3JP&fid=0x0:0xf77e352828a627b2"],"When":"2023-6-21"},{"Name":"Mars","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHtjcjaWQzqHOLzQxnithsAhAEbGsw7p50S0nVK1aNY3FFQevV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very nice atmosphere, we went on a Saturday night so it was very busy, there were many people who were occupying seats with finished food and just talking

I will give a lower service since you ordered using a qr code on your phone, they had a special combo and we ordered 4 of that, the food was typical taiwanese food but delicious nonetheless the dessert was the main star, a creme brulee bingsu was absolutely delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxIGahHNv9dK8jPIrtlRsRnsk97MPp-9za6SLc&fid=0x0:0xf77e352828a627b2"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"사나","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMbmUDVQfTxzETQuR30Jfhj-knaridLvlnF8Tun7PSh_otLw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered noodles and this shaved ice for desert. Of course tastes good. Huge portions. I would like to say that the customer service and entertainment was the BEST⭐️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCpC1Wq-3YsFG4JLJBNw0geTnLDc28Tb0zwpwM&fid=0x0:0xf77e352828a627b2"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Nicole Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLV8yqFhmOYgomRkRbkYY0ipHFRMqsfbx3xt0F2xJnnzsTV0YZG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Disappointing MSG combo for two...
We always see people lining up for this place and finally got to try out their food.

Very disappointing meal...
The deep fried chicken was so stiff and salty, doesn't taste like it's freshly fried. Very disappointed that such a statement Taiwanese item yet quite easy to prepare taste so bad....the same item in some food court in Richmond taste so much better....
We picked pig ear (too hard, maybe not blanched well before flavoring), marinated egg (standard) and pickled cucumber (standard flavor, but I wish it was the long slice cut)
The pork blood and intestine dish was the worst...it supposed to taste spicy like the menu indicates, but it's not spicy at all. And the whole dish is just too mushy...
We upgraded the rice to egg and beef slices don. The beef quality is not that good, and overly salty. No comment on the egg, swallowable, but mushy....
I have to say this place uses way too much MSG in their food...very thirsty throughout and after the meal...and we don't even finish the food...

Honestly, a combo for two for almost $50(before tax and tips) for this kinda of food is very very unacceptable... Knowing the food cost of these ingredients are actually quite low and prepping is relatively short and easy, for a meal like this, there are definitely many more better options in Richmond.

Service was ok, very fast serving, servers are quite attentive. Atmosphere is good, spacious and bright, quite a comfortable dining place, I just hope they focus more on the core of a restaurant---food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPClWbMvFUeURVF-nBMTk2dUH4CZVR0RDxTw9EL&fid=0x0:0xf77e352828a627b2"],"When":"2023-11-15"},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I think your experience here depends on what you order as some of their food is hit or miss. I absolutely love their “nuggets”, which are essentially Taiwanese popcorn chicken and honestly some of the best I’ve had. It’s super crunchy and sliced thing, would definitely recommend. The braised pork ear and the sweet and sour fried fish are also super delicious, not too much breading, perfect texture and amount of sauce.
I do not recommend their soup, it had that pork intestine flavour to it that I really did not love. Their Thai chicken is great in terms of how it’s cooked, but I did not like the flavour.
Place is clean and service was good, menu was a tad confusing. But overall, I would come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_K5r-oESuJKHzTTvVMbzsLQQe9w_6VAqeuK81&fid=0x0:0xf77e352828a627b2"],"When":"2023-4-7"}]

descriptions: Breakfast, lunch & afternoon tea are offered at this quaint place with housemade sweets.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Secret Garden Tea Company offers a delightful slice of tranquility with its charming English tea house vibes.

Celebrating its 29th year, this tea house is beautifully decorated with an array of teacups, creating a quaint and cozy atmosphere. It’s the perfect venue for special occasions like birthdays or bridal showers.

The selection of teas is extensive and impressive, ensuring there’s something for every palate. While the tomato soup was comforting, the scones stole the show despite not being the traditional British style—they were heart-shaped with a sprinkle of sugar on top, adding a whimsical Canadian twist. Absolutely a perfect spot for a relaxing afternoon filled with great conversation and even better tea.

Highly recommended for a girls’ day out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzhlOxcWIrVQ9IwYiUga9bS5zEOvj6MuyIsJC_&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Sherri Motohashi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvRir-qiHqz1peJ0G4WMMQ0hlpOVVItbdXigQEOIAYuIWjUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Charming decor, and i genuinely loved everything I ate! I just have a couple personal preferences that would make it even better for me...1) I found it a bit chilly inside 2) the scones sadly were too sweet and on top of that they were covered in a thick granulated sugar. Other than that, I fully recommend and will go again for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjhzyJJgQvxp-6V88nI1fVrb_mZofj42Z_8AJJ&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Lucy Animator","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY7brXamElnS01fAQfTXCPF3JSbsNMYZuWBhl1ILRqSsdPDqE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I really enjoy trying new places for Afternoon tea, and even when Secret Garden didn’t make it to my top list, was a nice experience. It’s a little pricy and the food is just ok. The service, on the other had, is really good and the staff lovely. I like the decoration and how the teapots wear cute clothes.

Another highlight is the tea, we can order different kinds included within the price. I specially enjoyed the Peach one, and their signature blend.
The experience was good overall. 🙂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOO54v3jhurud8RXPj5LdhYNRnbl1v6I2eTGlQ&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Clarissa Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVr7dmfW3DobMJyEWvg3_sJJkb8e9B-9LKRI5Rw6FsVvA9ks30j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The atmosphere is super cute, the decor and tea cups are exactly what I imagine what I think of high tea. The finger sandwiches were delicious but the desserts are very mid. Pretty expensive for the amount of food you get (over $100 for what’s in the photo) but I suppose if it’s for a special occasion it’s more justified. Would have rated higher if the service was better. The server looked like she didn’t want to be there- wasn’t rude but wasn’t friendly either.
Overall 3/5.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkeBNsDlVHIBDYrtzgaBpDWiN40UI66p1HQdiO&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Manda Chambers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFohUKYgZGmZEj6lUoEvwO4ebz26UsSIZe6Q3u3tamO6X6hfWxNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time here and really enjoyed it with a friend. They provided unlimited tea and you can try other teas at no additional charge. The pastries were nice and fresh. My favorite were the scones. The ambiance was adorable with the Christmas theme.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1usVSSllWtNHnyB1EaM78U9oXuZRCyekVyBDu&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Clinton Large","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3XxS0rHb5EQDNpn1Bi69Rgdxqapx3WvYAx0MWmqfySqKLvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve only been here twice, but every time I’m blown away. Getting a scone and a tea is so amazing here. I love the vibe and Jessica our server was so fun and kind. I will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI0Cc5eje5N3uLKPsH9OVjVn9ne2USdGeYkJs-&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Lin Natalie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqJfDRGhG3ZPhfEnz7_KEBsD0OoRIt3yNrzph8bSHnSOFgZoPg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s my first time to have this kind of afternoon tea with my bestie in Vancouver! We really love the vibe and food! The whole interior is so photogenic ~ the service worth a five star review! We really love the tea in the adorable tea pot!! That makes me really miss my grandma🥹","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLdt9B0WEmULx9ECHERkL7QqO_HnytD8whye0B&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Fei B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCSPR4b-Aju_3xzgvNmgK79_SKNPWkqhiQHmMJksqE4GdZMXE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely high tea locations, great for special occasions. Definitely make a reservation before - there were a lotttttt of people waiting when I arrived for my 1.30pm reservation on a Sunday.
Great little sandwiches and pasties, and each person in your party gets to pick their own flavour of tea and gets their own individual pot.
Price reflects the experience, in my opinion. It is about $50-60/person but this is cheaper than other high teas in the area.
Will comment that parking is very limited, as it is paid street parking. Parking directly in front of the restaurant is much more expensive than parking around the corner. Not sure why.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmk1r9eqLubdKRbKz7xxBC_bs6-6i8CdRT3CJZ&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-6-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dinah Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGkLXhNwc7nE9ODXqrgIHkcWSsSqdJ0ODEWEDr9vTIJOTJMA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They hardly ever pick up the phone or it’s attached to their fax machine instead . On the rare time that they picked up , I inquired if my package is indeed ready for pick up , they referred me to check CP website instead and hung up immediately.
When I redialed , the phone went straight to fax .
I wanted to check first before going to pick up as there were times that I passed by and even if it was  within store hours , the store had closed early . On another occasion in the past when i got the CP notice which said the my item would be  ready for pick up , my package wasn’t available yet for pick up.

To Canada Post , please choose well who you partner with . Could you forward my post to another post office instead of this one , thank you .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Siamese cats rule the world","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhIX5psAZ9h_Rwf2BE6bzqd5LbX6sAtkvjEf1lyHQbKRdTa_GT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Been a customer in that store for many years, as no other choice was offered by Canada Post. Here's why my 1 star review:

Several times, this place was closed when it should have been open. They make their own hours???? Does Canada Post know about this??? i hope they (Canada Post) select their partner pick up locations more carefully. In more than one occasion, the lady couldn't find my parcels, so i had to ask her to go check her warehouse again.

When the pick up option across the street (Paulik) inside Shoppers Drug mart, I didn't hesitate to switch locations. Was a great decision.. plus, i don't have to deal with the challenging parking lot in that complex!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lynn B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXbLigViFckKASz7koQeA6ZMjOgB-okjokw-tpMEVQzwCo8WpI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this post office!
I go here frequently for business and personal mailings -- Jane and her whole staff are always fast, friendly, polite, and happy to help!
When it is slow, it's great to shop for teas and chat with the staff. And when it's busy, they work hard and fast to get all the customers served efficiently.
I wish every post office was as great and welcoming as this one!
Keep up the great work!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kris C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKreAKn4vn2wDsLPPbr1-Tyj8LLPhAalhXSg1Lriconwhw0GQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very unpleasant experience with this location, I suggest going to the Canada Post across the street inside Shoppers Drug Mart instead. The staff here are rude and lack knowledge of typical post and mail procedures. They are unaware of shipping conditions so they just answer no upfront to any questions, which I later looked up on the Canada Post official site to find them inaccurate. They will also overcharge you for shipping a parcel if you don't know any better, proceed with caution so you don't get taken advantage of.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"cpc 1023","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIs2vQKj4Fs3wtyrgedpX1zMgeiXFzs3zFdK3ES5q1ayPRNUg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst ever!!!! I wish I could give 0 star. Worst customer service in town. rudeness and impatience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John m","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLO1kKqqe99FurjE_p_DvCpvHUsjNgWH3tsJ1HTu_MhSreyYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little post office, I get my items from Amazon sent their by default and pick them up. So handy, you pick it up when you have time, Amazon will notify  when its ready to pickup. Lots of free parking in the front of the building and on the street. Owner is very helpful and has a great attitude, she make's sure her staff is always on point. If you need to ship an item or get stamps, please shop local and take your business there. Haven't tried the tea part of it but she seems to quite an expert on it, something some might try and learn about the history and tradition of tea in Chinese culture. Always a pleasant experience when I pay a visit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rachel Berko-Gabay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvguVRhhcI_4cZpXcT2-jkM_sYIX3ib3Y1ddEetw_W-dV3BA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a refreshing surprise was the visit to this special post office which is also Jane's tea Garden.
Jane the owner, welcomes you with a smile. The atmosphere is so pleasant with a wonderful aroma of the tea. I couldn't resist and  bought a nicely wrapped box of Rose tea. The tea was so calming and tasty. Who would have thought that a post office can be so much fun!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK56IJyErpt0Sic7DDtH789tMsf1FDI1MS-KnjBs0egTxiHYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I leave a lot of reviews on Google maps, always trying to leave an honest review of an establishment.  Most of my reviews are positive so please take that in regard when you read this negative review.

At first I left just a rating , in response to Jane's comment.

I appreciate your reply and can respect that you are reaching out to try to improve. Your service is not bad in terms of being prompt and orderly. What I do have a problem with is the pushy sales tactics and the bad attitude I have encountered from you, and have observed during my short visits to this post office/tea shop.

I come here a handful of times throughout the year. A couple years ago I would come to send letters once in awhile, back then due to my own naivety and lack of experience I did not know the difference in price for sending letters. The couple times I had wanted to send a letter you took advantage of that and charged me for the most expensive option. This had happened maybe 3 times before I caught on.

I have also seen you been rude to customers for no reason, show an attitude, or simply be rude with no apparent trigger or warning.

I do not intend to offend, but to leave an honest description of my encounter.

Have a good day, thank you for taking the time to respond and read what I have written.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marisa Nu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp1lLf5AmycJn6Yltx7B7XJhorTHGMot-SHilz28mBIc65vg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You can make your bowl by weight or go with their combos. Even with the combos, they are very generous with the ingredients. Reasonable prices, delicious overall and staff are very friendly. Smaller ingredient selection than places like big way but far less chaotic. Would come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyQDTBTjJ9VJSJ2q9JCHNxlJDKukQRjNl0hLO_&fid=0x0:0xa2d61b33ce1893e7"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Ryan Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLen1El5S6hV5WASenIk3dUR7CAYnKTzpDsxfE3BtWS-yMN2AE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a fellowship with friends from church over dinner @ this restaurant. They are indeed the best place for mini hotpot and noodle soup. The server was patient with my friend who doesn’t speak Chinese and always checked in on us. It was a pity that we didn’t capture the fried skewers picture!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdCGvVmz8RPdjI__MECA86-fVTCFKLJHzCQZZT&fid=0x0:0xa2d61b33ce1893e7"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Tommy Byun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQhlW94B8T2fhww-HWh0iFh-RYIvFitfF4mjJX2E5t_heAv3Lb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great tasting malatang for a reasonable price!

The interior is minimal, nothing fancy, but the staff was friendly, explaining how to order.

I would recommend this place for a small group, as there arent too many tables here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbnOEbfLPCDxxvyxSOvWcx2M9fD5y5ak1qer9s&fid=0x0:0xa2d61b33ce1893e7"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Julie H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMPfD2ZwFG-YKfku0X66npWhqTiGAOemuza7tQ4QSYz6xOgnqq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In the past few months, I drove to Richmond from Langley more than 10 times just to dine here. I was thoroughly impressed by their malatang and now I can't go anywhere else.  The broth is very flavorful, always meets my expectation. The selection of fresh ingredients was extensive, allowing for a customizable experience that catered to all preferences.

The vegetables were crisp and vibrant, and the proteins were cooked to perfection. The staff was very friendly and attentive, making the dining experience even more enjoyable.

Ai-Boiled Restaurant is a must-visit for anyone craving authentic malatang. I can't wait to return and try more of their delicious offerings!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiL8PeiTBJN22S3Mc4-SX9LlCfZBtFeJhwKu5C&fid=0x0:0xa2d61b33ce1893e7"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Joanne Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLd04XEe24rKKcNkVAZi5lQsa11WHDkcQgaDPfFrJkgVwHC3Alt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my go-to place for comfort food. If you love spicy, you should definitely try their Szechuan style spicy soup base and choose the highest spice level. It is spicy but at the same time very flavourful. I like the pick-your-own toppings setup and I usually get the hand-pulled wide noodles with my soup.

Your order comes with a small serving of chilled edamame for you to snack on while you wait for your order to be cooked.

The staff are super kind and open to any questions you may have about their menu.

I definitely recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqQwrsfDU8j98fddeWx7pPAQJ3lUWArO7fL6M1&fid=0x0:0xa2d61b33ce1893e7"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Amy Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMShEyNaVyqkg_udSZIL6AtgBldvcAt4vOmvtftAdUJi-LcA7I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best soup noodles in Richmond! You get to pick what you want in your noodle (by weight), or you can get the combos. I love their spicy sichuan soup base. They have a government regulated scale, so you know that you are not getting scammed or overpaying for the food.
Staff and owners here are attentive and kind. Came here for noodles twice this week and will keep coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzTRU9yjSkQBwazBLr5BCo04xPgmuipS-oo5sb&fid=0x0:0xa2d61b33ce1893e7"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"Wheels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsz1Rg53Q2-m5JHAwzfaowNSrC2JEVYhO1hHp4iyxB4sDy77VI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice facilities, cool, chill vibe. Staff are very friendly and the soup base was so good! We like this place because they have different selections for soup base. I really enjoy the szechuan base and the numbing feeling! The other soup we got was a lighter and was also very delicious. The selection of things to put into you soup is fresh. We have been to lots of these places and this one price is very reasonable compared to the others and better selections for soup. It's is pay by weight so it's really up to you how much you want to spend. I definitely recommend going here, we will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvQXBgDTSO2zBFoDo1iy5GZvQHJcnZhDzEkUIZ&fid=0x0:0xa2d61b33ce1893e7"],"When":"2022-10-21"},{"Name":"Nicole E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVS7c-r86PTrcEUXG-lTevYMh99JAxbB0HQLG-WLyXOLYTgebOF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such an amazing experience. Great service and delicious food! We ordered fried lamb skewers and the combo for 2 which included 2 ice teas (so refreshing). The staff was super helpful with helping us decide what to order on their extensive menu! Our jaw dropped when we saw how good everything looked and how much food came with our order.
We ordered wide noodles instead of rice this time, which will be our usual order now since it goes so well with the broth!

Definitely be coming back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhax2l222rUI1j25IL5WnJkv6Tl-RWzvS3Ori-&fid=0x0:0xa2d61b33ce1893e7"],"When":"2024-2-13"}]

title: Garden City Hot Pot
address: Cosmo Plaza, 8788 McKim Way #1205, Richmond, BC V6X 4E2
descriptions: Relaxed restaurant with a warm vibe offering Chinese hot pot cooked at tables on flameless stoves.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Garden City Hot Pot
Address: Cosmo Plaza, 8788 McKim Way #1205, Richmond, BC V6X 4E2

Dining at Garden City Hot Pot offers a straightforward and satisfying hot pot experience, with a selection of well-executed broths and fresh ingredients. For our dinner, we decided to explore two separate soup bases—parsley and preserved egg for my friend, and homemade satay for myself.

Food

Homemade Satay Soup
The homemade satay soup was a highlight of the meal, delivering a robust and flavorful base. The broth was rich without being overly salty, offering a good depth of flavor that worked well with the various meats and vegetables we added. Its seasoning was balanced, making it a versatile foundation for the hot pot experience.
Rating: 8/10

Fatty Beef Slices, Beef Tongue, Meatball Combo, Spinach, Chinese Mushrooms
The quality of the ingredients was consistently high. The fatty beef slices were tender and well-marbled, offering a melt-in-your-mouth texture. The beef tongue provided a nice textural contrast, and the meatball combo added variety to the protein selection.

Rating: 8/10

Shandong Noodles

The Shandong noodles were a standout, thanks to their perfect texture. With a firm yet smooth bite, they held up well in the broth and added a satisfying element to the meal. They absorbed the rich flavors of the soup while maintaining their integrity, making them an excellent accompaniment.

Rating: 8/10

Deluxe Sashimi Platter
Unfortunately, the deluxe sashimi platter was underwhelming. While the presentation was acceptable, the portion sizes and quality of the fish did not justify its name or price. The cuts were smaller than expected and lacked the freshness and vibrancy one would anticipate from a sashimi platter at a dedicated hot pot restaurant. It felt more akin to pre-packaged sushi than a premium offering.

Rating: 5/10

Service
The service at Garden City Hot Pot was generally good, though not remarkable. The staff were courteous and attentive, ensuring that our hot pot experience proceeded smoothly. However, there was nothing particularly noteworthy about the service—while competent, it did not stand out as exceptional.

Rating: 7/10

Ambiance
The restaurant is clean, comfortable, and well-suited for a casual dining experience. The decor is simple, and the seating is comfortable, providing a relaxed atmosphere without the noise or bustle often associated with hot pot establishments. It’s a pleasant environment for both intimate dinners and larger gatherings, though it lacks any distinctive character that would make it memorable.
Rating: 8/10

Price

Pricing is reasonable for the quality and portion sizes offered. While some dishes, like the sashimi platter, feel overpriced for what they deliver, the majority of the menu offers good value, particularly the hot pot ingredients and broth selections.

Verdict

Garden City Hot Pot is a solid choice for hot pot enthusiasts seeking a reliable and enjoyable meal. The homemade satay soup and the quality of the ingredients make it a worthwhile visit. However, certain menu items, such as the sashimi platter, leave room for improvement. While it may not be a destination for those seeking a truly elevated dining experience, it delivers well on the essentials and is certainly worth a return visit to explore more of the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkwDrM4JqcVpTwAFZdHnfSYlR0PgcMoteGX7qW&fid=0x0:0x3db777204510de14"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Sinyo ganteng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK6DhObLW3StVcJ_e9Ph42mdmAq5cSoW-d536hao-jSu7WAn8I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food is okay, order hotpot and few dimsum. hotpot soup order sukoyaki mushroom, very tasty, meat was bit hard.  siomay is so tasteless. deepfried taro with scallops is very good. Customer service is good. they are so friendly.
overall is okay, price is bit expensive for the overall experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJVcdVzJZMLqZdMWdPIonHJr6xUZNJQj9w_9Ys&fid=0x0:0x3db777204510de14"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Y C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXms2sclWSEC3QGPeBjL-2kcGh7jSlO2Axdbzvyfen0VG-v--o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here with family for dim sum.

The seating is very comfortable. They have spacious booths and open tables. We were seated at the nicely sectioned booth today, with privacy and it was easy to converse.

The tables are nested with induction stoves, which is useful for hotpot and boiling hot water.

Best part of the experience is your own tea selection, where the tea is served traditionally in Hong Kong. However, if you don’t wish for this method, you can always ask the server for a regular teapot.

Food was ok. We will definitely visit again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRh9y3DTljnT6VQYfcaHhREU_E-fPCuUwRGxj6&fid=0x0:0x3db777204510de14"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"S H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJEaEUS1rKPUQqI-5muj1wBfBxSotijSfpk6Mu5w4Dwhojdx8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food quality and very well washed vegetables. Service also 10/10, they even provided me with a portable charger since my phone was at 5%!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCaClLGt0yWNSae4ct_VR5I2CFtTvsoiZK6WSE&fid=0x0:0x3db777204510de14"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Anna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL6Jv0SIE7U2g62ofpNZAredxyD6FpJeacw2Gk7xsqDBtUn0A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this restaurant so much. They have good service, fresh food and nice environment. Go for a try, you gonna like this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLBQjcVKaj1rR3BtzlO689VJbBAI6-2eWV1s5o&fid=0x0:0x3db777204510de14"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Yuxi Shen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2Gw6kUrFxn4dNMu4Ej1-sI6oSZJAbtOyAA1pssuFxG43wJ1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious cantoneese congee hot pot, great dining env, visited multiple times with friends and family, will definitely come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN60KBtJi8B6Wog8D5hQacrBeLupifazTV2k7M&fid=0x0:0x3db777204510de14"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We were looking for dim sum in early November and found out that Garden City Hot Pot had a dim sum menu. We were intrigued because you don't normally find dim sum at a hot pot place.

First of all, the complex this place is in seems a bit sketch (or at least it's seen better days). Once you get inside the restaurant tho' it's not bad. You order from a tablet and you can get both dim sum and other items.

We started with the braised oyster hot pot. We don't find this at many restaurants any more. The oysters seemed to have a bit of a pan-fried fried texture to the coating and the oysters were accompanied with slices of liver.

For the dim sum items, they generally came out to about $9/$10 per dish. The deep fried taro and scallop dumplings had a creamy filling. The scallop itself wasn't great but the taro to filling ratio was spot on.

The shrimp spring rolls had a layer of seaweed on the inside of the wrapper and turned out crispy. The chiu chow dumplings had a thinnish wrapper encasing the pork/shrimp and peanut filling and turned out nicely.

The honeycomb tripe was fairly good although some pieces were slightly chewier. Meanwhile the steamed tofu skin wraps were quite large and saucy.

Overall, pleasantly surprised at the dim sum options at this hot pot place and will have to come back to check out the rest of their dishes.

Update: Returned in December for dim sum. They had a discount for cash payment (think it was 20%)

Update: Late March 2024... finally came back to try out their hot pot menu. I like that you can either get a large hot pot or smaller individual pots. We wound up ordering the sukiyaki and pork bone broth.

They had a special where you can get a dish of grass carp slices for $0.01 if you post an insta story. I was surprised at how large the grass carp dish was. While some of the pieces had some fish skin on that was a bit chewy, it was otherwise a good dish.

Also got the veggie platter, fatty beef slices, meat ball combo, dumplings, and udon noodles.

It was a bit much for us to finish because the serving sizes are large. It would probably be better if you come with a larger party. We were quite full afterwards and had to take some home. Overall, good quality hot pot. Next time we plan to do one hot pot and add some dim sum dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjxkHGg54ddz4VqbiFq6tfDeQi-3kQKQixrMj2&fid=0x0:0x3db777204510de14"],"When":"2023-11-22"},{"Name":"Yolanda D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFx_59UN-u-qBUQeZeAmjyb4s7zOtkGAvBUrf6f0OniiuKSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best seafoods porridge hot pot I've ever had! The fish fillets go so well with the golden seafood porridge base, highly recommend! The spot prawns were also delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOckAG2-z3JDFT6Sgk01ZF8-HQTEARdZ3PTFbn&fid=0x0:0x3db777204510de14"],"When":"2024-5-24"}]

title: 茶宴 CHAYAN
about: null
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"PristineVIImages Photography","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGCgLiXlOaLAaKvqMsvgvGbp_5MSFtnUtOpoV6XZkTapQsj6oV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Chayan and I must say, it was a delightful experience! The first thing that caught my attention was the incredible variety of teas they offer, each more tempting than the last. I decided to try a couple of their signature blends, and they did not disappoint—absolutely delicious!
The prices are fantastic, making it easy to indulge in a few cups without breaking the bank. It's great to see a place that values quality while still being budget-friendly.
What truly stood out to me was the friendly staff. They were welcoming, knowledgeable, and eager to help me choose the perfect tea for my taste. Their enthusiasm for tea is contagious and adds to the overall experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpadWjTwKxiph38L5sjjqXP4KEsa7jVA0L2fsV&fid=0x0:0xb32a079f6dcca8ce"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Kathy “kaffinatedd”","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcrDLXIfqZKoav_gqwap05pzPuABQYLUmO7Wen0kkK2Sh2VrYrYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Popular in the UK they’ve made their way down and now have milktea that is brewed with loose leaf teas. This is a spot for anyone who is a tea enthusiast and cares about the quality of their tea.

The frappe is a little bit different where they have a salted whipped cream with the pecan chips that can be eaten separately, but if you let it seep into your milk tea, it actually enhances the flavour. You can customize the sweetness and the temperature of your drink. This is a spot that has sweet, but not too sweet.

I tried their two most popular drinks, the black tea, frappe and the jasmine green tea cappuccino.

Will you be checking them out?
If you do, you can get a tea scented air freshener if you like their post on Instagram, but you have to show it to them in person at the cashier ! While supplies last.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1F4YjVsPHjJigtqmEK1yFCxrF29sIB7fB_HYh&fid=0x0:0xb32a079f6dcca8ce"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Clarence Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHtOqf2gtYzBKQIwuVvsCF-9HPO2Lh2LpQE8bTKylJwpnM9QQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tea base was nice and cream tasted smooth. However, price quite expensive (compared with the market price), size too tiny (only one size available, that’s why they offer coffee straw), and ice too much (even we ordered less ice). We tried that since they did lot of advertising and kinda trendy in Vancouver. I’m not sure if I will get another one next time. It will take some time for me to consider.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUn6ZuG_mF0kmZl0KuVgRv7jNtM1m8u0V-afpN&fid=0x0:0xb32a079f6dcca8ce"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Skylar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwLcVlEB1fzIVq0YfsotiV8AWc5B0aQ2P-pMpAy6CzbSARJRc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

New opens and it has quickly become my favorite spot for milk tea! This shop brings a refreshing blend of traditional Chinese tea flavors with a modern twist.
What really impressed me was the reasonable pricing. It’s rare to find such high-quality tea at prices that don’t break the bank. The staff is friendly and helpful, making every visit enjoyable and welcoming. Whether you’re a milk tea lover or someone curious to try authentic Chinese tea blends, Chayan is the place to be! Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGbZTxVK2j8m9O3vWuP1Y6sl0oENRdfoQmfDeb&fid=0x0:0xb32a079f6dcca8ce"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Aung Zaw Myo Naing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwZ15xcUhuyZ-l7BGARFMqiuZOFIxADy6eXA7JBfiMHZ6CT5tA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service. Nice packaging and matcha was so smooth I had to get more for my family. This is one of those places the price and quality match. There is often a big line up and rightfully so. Definitely going to be my go to place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRKSufzIkB8euHLh_2BaXfO_ZhXIiOBidTsagI&fid=0x0:0xb32a079f6dcca8ce"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"waiyan phyozaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVyNgzKK3CRw9PEL7au-TgGlUpq85anx-Y_443W0FNiJeD6eo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I've been here multiple times and the experience was good before. I came this time for the Christmas promotion but found the experience to be subpar. We ordered a Oolong Chappucino with the Christmas Special Bottle and a hot Osmanthus Lychee Chappucino. We noticed upon picking up that we weren't given our special bottle (that we paid extra for) and asked for a change. After that, we were given the wrong order where instead of the hot Osmanthus Lychee Chappucino, we were given a cold Oolong Chappucino and had to go back in to ask for it to be seapped again. Throughout the ordeal, there were no apologies offered by the staff so we are thoroughly disappointed by the service. We understand the store is busy but this is not acceptable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2fSOiL6JDb2AKKRz-r0gPwMFtlNNcHIs9HhZP&fid=0x0:0xb32a079f6dcca8ce"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"bbb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKj2__ZHy5XZxHqv_NNvsCqSlgD6IdbtgqI_AEmaQKApMA0OhVk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"High-quality tea topped with whipped cream and candied pecans is definitely the new trend in BBT.

For those new to this style, here’s the best way to enjoy it:

1. Take off the lid.
2. Start by sipping the tea with the whipped cream layer.
3. When you’re halfway through, use a coffee stirrer to mix it all together.
4. Finally, sip slowly through the stirrer for a perfect blend of flavors.”","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO8OkToh15lneJzvIXt4YioPJNxbtCmVPUCh7j&fid=0x0:0xb32a079f6dcca8ce"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Y S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTmtWUtCZcs7qDdNKdjVbtcx5f5BcDfDU3YRp4zcFsXHKu1_WS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We came at noon and there was a line already. I ordered the Jasmine Chappacino with less sugar and room temperature. It was still quite sweet for me and it wasn’t at room temperature. It’s still a bit chilled. I think the taste is okay, nothing too special. The straw design is terrible and hard to drink from.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKZLzEn61NKPQ6du0xAwT-Ig8mEj6CHHX3wI23&fid=0x0:0xb32a079f6dcca8ce"],"When":"2024-11-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Louise Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdwxOP7IKmHv1pqr8CLOtOu012YQ5nKrrU0WlNL_Fs6Alv7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered the regular milk tea, roasted milk tea, strawberry yukult, and two bubble waffles. After I paid I noticed there was a QR code to join and earn points, so I scanned it and realized I had joined the rewards program before and asked the lady if I could get the points on the amount I just spent. Another lady named Alice, was able to help me and good thing too as it was 300 points that I had earned! Also I changed my mind after I had paid already, to add grass jelly to the roasted milk tea and said I would pay for it but the lady Alice said it was ok. Such great customer service from Alice! Thank you! Definitely recommend and will be back 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuRtOv2r27o0jJyR-FZTQvm5vWOFGfKUpL8Sty&fid=0x0:0xaea0f3e9c4762fe0"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Kaman Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTfY1lFx7N7LsexryuKa9Q76pyfiBSBOSe4KZKmNeoZtDKwC8s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was attracted to try their Ultimate Chew Passionfruit Green Tea. They have many options to choose from including the ice and sweet level. The store is clean and open. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The drink is tart with a lot of chew. Totally love it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_EWXWpso45lztlxyklnFbfH5-0SpxTBUPkASe&fid=0x0:0xaea0f3e9c4762fe0"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Angelica Yee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcQojzbdV9sbLoihEwt6NQe8LJ9Oux6JR_irkYfLyJU1tPYS4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve tried their bubble tea a few times but always forget to get photos! Their sugar levels are good and lots of options. Tastes fresh and I like their cute colours/decorations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBRbcm7P4iCSPfUY7Z96CRwrsrxUiDwgd6YSPd&fid=0x0:0xaea0f3e9c4762fe0"],"When":"2023-7-2"},{"Name":"Christine Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgg0Y15MEsjxq2QzSTxdqFpDiT8w1KrwkWPvi9snrvOl6KWw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wide selection of drinks on menu. I tried the oolong tea macchiato and grass jelly milk tea. The oolong flavour was strong and not watered down. The macchiato foam on top was thick and creamy. The grass jelly was silky smooth, not chunky like other grass jellies I’ve tried. Will be going back to try more flavours :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGqsSKvzyUQuGwWIrS0zp5A-H42q70S7pl16Xp&fid=0x0:0xaea0f3e9c4762fe0"],"When":"2023-8-3"},{"Name":"Umi くん大哥傻仔（Umi Kun）","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHZ1VDAWqtdD9wlfI-A3qUJM2ewVags0PJdeJOQSrn-bpWzQCZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"101 Boba 🧋 Capstan Way is beyond incredible.  I had the Classic Milk Tea, it was done in a couple of seconds!! So fast!!  I would definitely recommend this boba shop to anyone that loves bubble tea!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPewD0u0WR-CG4Ri4D_Y8E4r8b-rHF74lylgzCF&fid=0x0:0xaea0f3e9c4762fe0"],"When":"2024-5-11"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Waaaaaaay to sugary and no taste of tea. It’s mediocre at best. I usually don’t leave bad reviews but AVOID this place. If you are in this plaza just throw a rock in any direction and walk towards the rock and you’ll find another bubble tea or dessert place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM16_zBj1IsODg-YZPgrxoHf_WzLovNJmI36IAG&fid=0x0:0xaea0f3e9c4762fe0"],"When":"2021-8-29"},{"Name":"Erica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiBiehVBMqDRcQQk3J28lEnqLVQ-p5tIOA0Zlj3wvs65IUmg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Takeout only, plenty of parking in the plaza. Bright and clean inside the store, and the staff were friendly.

My order:

-Milk Tea
-Pearl Black Tea Latte

I like the tea flavour and powdered milk tea which is how authentic Taiwanese bubble tea is made. I prefer the regular sized pearls (they ran out, so I got the mini pearls). Still good, but I prefer the regular sized ones, so I can actually chew them instead of inhaling them. Definitely recommend half sweet for all the drinks. Drinks come in 2 sizes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkqRfrW9rS_37WLetcYA42A747fYDIR_f9sCjp&fid=0x0:0xaea0f3e9c4762fe0"],"When":"2021-3-8"},{"Name":"Eric Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ36z5tIs6i7llU3ZXmWLEMO0BTL8v-oC06M6WE8yvtasnDIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food/Drink 5★ : Delicious drinks, this place (originally Wushiland) is my partner and I's go-to favourite bubble tea place! Our favourite drinks are the black tea latte & recently, the oolong tea latte. The tea lattes are made with real milk compared to the milk teas which use powdered milk (according to staff). What really makes the drink are the topping selections: our favourites being a mix of the boba (mini pearls) and pearls (normal sized pearls). There is no extra charge for mixing the boba and pearls! The pearls are always nicely done - chewy, smooth, perfect sweetness, and fresh.

Service: Staff are fast with making drinks and we never have to wait long.

Bonus: they accept reusable bubble tea cups! You can save $0.25 cents by doing this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQDb-2dFPuWd-I9DBrkYGm592ymGGAZkqPKgh-&fid=0x0:0xaea0f3e9c4762fe0"],"When":"2023-5-8"}]
