user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_tT85lO7aZKFfq17wWpo8ldgI_n0GJFJfBhG1nWiEa2zXCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Average portion, taste and price. Inconvenient that it is cash or debit only, but I guess it is with most Asian restaurants. Items pictured along with a takoyaki rice came to be $41 total. It's a bit pricey for what was ordered, but huge parking lot with lots of space in front.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlhD8VzBvwEK7zcrOS0rLTTPJAsWx2-cCttAuT&fid=0x0:0x1b1773c3c1674f18"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Elva Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjLqGuj24STuLFG1rcmBlemveNCV4Ne13Lci-D6vBa1GByIg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Order take out and I surprised with the portion of deep fried fish cake, $11.45!!!! Don’t get me wrong, the food is great but with the price I’m paying for only 5-6pcs fish cake is insane. I called the restaurant and they said it’s the normal portion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuMzY6PmuHVkJEQZhXf3Fkxr66b1FmwN-GmKpA&fid=0x0:0x1b1773c3c1674f18"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Jason Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINRrpz_ZFL5JFOb0NsombclwxcncVYbA-CROh2LxR6y_gT5g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a chicken teriyaki fried rice, salty peppery chicken with noodle soup and brown sugar milk with pearls. Food was good, but in the drink, there was a screw in the bottom of the drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNh0s5iknNSbl_zoJTXq5Xt7ET3IPIE-u8HTXyr&fid=0x0:0x1b1773c3c1674f18"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Foodie Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6n06QAfqStqer1ZgBILsv-fiSHmrGRZuznSS1ny9iQFfb_Ognuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I heard that their egg pancakes are very authentic, and I wasn't disappointed when I tried one fresh out of the pan. It was crispy on the outside and tender on the inside, definitely worth a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBwqirfUq3zay9e7YRG2Q-GNZg132HdNNnW24y&fid=0x0:0x1b1773c3c1674f18"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wowza! Their milky hot pot broth is one of the best soup broths I’ve ever had. It’s super creamy and almost cheesy in taste. The personal hot pot had tons of hot pot items inside from veggies to fish balls and a protein choice (I went with lamb). It’s also affordable at about 16 dollars a hot pot.

Their bubble tea was delicious and better than most bubble tea shops as well. The taro slush with rainbow jelly and the red bean milk🫘 🥛 were both delicious and they used fresh red beans in the drink.

Worth returning for more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVl2WgTcZMC6zZFMdL2N7FbM96pvPfE8eZHQLK&fid=0x0:0x1b1773c3c1674f18"],"When":"2023-2-10"},{"Name":"Sisca Gunawan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTU--R0s_pOXpUMctBKBXVuvQ5Je7i65cJeGh1NtPNJIq6Cg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I go to this place quite often since they are around the neighborhood. Small business in the shoppers drug mart complex. So parking is easy but it gets pretty full during lunch time on the weekends. Aside from that, i will get a parking spot without trouble. Food is good and affordable. I think the food quality is better than before.  Bubble tea also pretty good. Winter melon tea, green tea, slush are pretty good. Fav food  so far are their Beef noodles and tawainese popcorn chicken. Takoyaki fried rice, pork chop, kimchi hotpot are also good.  They only have about 8-10 small tables. So during lunch and dinner time it gets pretty busy. Best time to go is earlier than usual lunch or dinner time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsTQvdmeL4hgkI1AShiKcMe09F51fvHxBOEjey&fid=0x0:0x1b1773c3c1674f18"],"When":"2022-7-30"},{"Name":"sng1002001","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTfKdGFrJyL8jc4znhIMXimj1BkuJ1S_SEthxZmoeo2Gf8Rg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place to grab a quick bite at Cambie Plaza. Service was quick. Food portion was just right for the price. Overall taste was pretty good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyC4z992GmjkHrt0lrM91MeOIYmZ-sMKjxv4lQ&fid=0x0:0x1b1773c3c1674f18"],"When":"2023-11-13"},{"Name":"Charlotte Yuk Yung LI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaERJivp5dKeihNPxYPlj6MB_ca84HDolsaKhCnz16QiNgtk_8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quite authentic Taiwanese food. Love their stir-fried rice noodles, deep-fried chicken nuggets and deep-fried squid tentacles. The whole restaurant can only serve <30 people at the same time. Reservation is recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVNmF_o75r6nQ4MpTE4EUWnWdpSbwImQUuk34n&fid=0x0:0x1b1773c3c1674f18"],"When":"2023-7-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The drinks taste good. Would be better if the matcha yogurt slush had more matcha. Service and environment were alright. Would recommend 0% sugar level as at that level it’s still sweet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPahW1uoYXgr2utb2HczAjvK5b474NTe3Z26WTZ&fid=0x0:0x53ed6c571370ff0a"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Charlene lian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4Db7EaA0oDe9YS5YVYc5bCpYcYPNb7jp-bySCrmQNRea_uQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been here so many times and always order for 6 to 10 cups. Drinks are so amazing. Really really like their mochi yogurt, always fresh, healthy. Service are good and staff are really friendly. The dog also likes it.
Food: 5 | Service :5 | Atmosphere : 5","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMwX8VLiCARjFcCq3auWEzsx2q5w1-ctYaD2_M&fid=0x0:0x53ed6c571370ff0a"],"When":"2023-8-7"},{"Name":"KT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMygczddxuI4a92C2Ugr42x635CpGtQdIDw3VekXKUfhJMpcZf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great yogurt drinks that we came upon on. Believed to be chain stores from China. We ordered the avocado and their signature rice yogurt. Both taste good and we got a discount of 25% because of their grand opening. I just feel like drinking yogurt is much healthier than boba tea. That was one of the reason we want to try out this place. There is one that we really want to try next time. Believe to be the peach with mashmallows on top. Service here is excellent when ordering. The guy explain so thorough and patience that we feel bad for taking a bit long to decide what to order. Highly Recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOF1YTytE5u1DeO5QU8WeJgrC9SZN5h5akz5OBh&fid=0x0:0x53ed6c571370ff0a"],"When":"2020-10-7"},{"Name":"Kathleen Fan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJix5mk4ZA1VeIzL-nKAr68rE3O1HbNmKZEl4HB2vLCK2NNZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Heard a lot about this place before, today get to try it out. It was busy at the shop, we had to wait for 15 minutes to get our drink after placing the order. There were too many choices, I really didn't know which one would be good, so just get the one that on the promotion poster. Price range from 5-8 dollars, no size choice, you can choose how much sugar you want from 0% to 120%. I tried the 50%, taste just right. We ordered the one has pearl and marshmallow in it, all tasted very good. The yogurt is very creamy, I loved it. No wonder they got very popular, will come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5bFTXFnwGyylHQVUb_sgeqGrRX-fgNForx1oX&fid=0x0:0x53ed6c571370ff0a"],"When":"2021-1-3"},{"Name":"Mimi So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTzU94uoxrnXt0Fgj4Re0V2eGrn5bqScOB5yV4niw3B9PkOxF7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wooow! Love it! First time trying this yogurt dessert beverage and it was ammaazzingly delicious! Wish there were more location in Surrey/ Coquitlam/ Langley. Had the mango mochi yogurt and the coconut mango mochi yogurt. Love the blended mochi and coconut pudding. You can choose the ice and sugar levels so it’s perfect not to sweet. Puppy also loved his puppy yogurt. Will definitely be stopping to get more soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUHs1h1W2t2Lb_PtSmycvDuprzPPUoba4O5eg5&fid=0x0:0x53ed6c571370ff0a"],"When":"2023-2-15"},{"Name":"Chelz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRg5U1kKHSKfBSAE6dIDGdM4dDh-WC-rGR8gyGTRh0aIxTO5-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The drink is okay, but the server was sooo slow! They have two people in there, one is taking orders and the other is making the drinks. There are quite a bit people in front of me waiting for their orders to be prepared. But the average time for ONE drink is around 5 mins. So guess how much time I've been waiting to get mine☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMg6FNDxyIAv6mnNyWPsGcRUB3Abe1GP12hyjPK&fid=0x0:0x53ed6c571370ff0a"],"When":"2023-5-31"},{"Name":"Amy Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvtm7hBqZHDYxXgP_oxkelx2FGhwfW-EuwTv9rdyjxo-_-_8Nq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The first time I tried this, I was hooked. This was the first rice yogurt I'd tried but none of the other ones compare. My favourites are the original with purple rice and the rose. Recently, I tried their special, mango mochi slush and it was AMAZING. I couldn't get over how soft the mochi was, and the flavour was amazing. I'm waiting to go back soon!

Edit: I went back 2 years later and it’s still as good as I remember. We got strawberry mochi and grape yogurt slush - both yummy!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOTj3F_F5UbdKvCXvQ2iY4l4o8Ttae8y9DNWaU&fid=0x0:0x53ed6c571370ff0a"],"When":"2022-4-26"},{"Name":"Ian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJWdFAhfZG3JHe26uvD-nO0yjLw_7ucqRBqARSwXmBPz5BVnxK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Great drink, horrendous customer service. Takes a long time just to order; the staff here seem to lack basic communication skills.
A simple acknowledgment of our presence would be nice while we stand here at your till.
Music was super loud and the staff probably can't even hear the orders, but they might also be blind because they have trouble noticing customers trying to order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNaNTApGoZWAmBoISxVAgB-ij4feTkwmkaN0N1&fid=0x0:0x53ed6c571370ff0a"],"When":"2023-2-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Melissa Meng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfi_MaQwJQjr5awFnfBadZv0UHcxu-wrWjT5PFn9oDD0gq0vU3JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My daughter introduced me to try, she order fruit and yogurt drink, taste good , spacious inside, there is second floor space for clients rest and meet . They provide some table board game in case you want to spent time here. They offer tea drink, fruit drink, you have choice on Hot or cold, sugar level etc. good place for young generation gathering .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOML5fBDypN4rxnxl-Jtn2omCFQuIEX31Lu-U3X&fid=0x0:0x8268838bca810be6"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Bobson Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDYUeTGt_ovJmK8sVYcrfRcRlsdPIGoa3QnI58tARi1i5j1n0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fast, efficient service. Dining area was spacious with tables along the walls and open space in the middle. Cute red bunny statues all over the counter.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaqQ1hUOladX8jfaQ06qa80dQCEJs7UZqd1CQu&fid=0x0:0x8268838bca810be6"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Zach Tam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAhnHIgzl6k-ciNCvpdP-9C-OSwn_NR_iwGmVIds80pTGwZVv-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The drinks were good, but I didn't quite understand why some drinks couldn't include toppings with their milk teas. My friend's drink had a lot of toppings, which is a plus.

Unfortunately, the place left a really bad impression with their washrooms. There's two but the ground floor was closed and the second floor washroom was clogged and had no toilet paper, no paper towels, and no soap. I notified the staff about it, and the guy brought some toilet paper and managed to unclog the toilet. But when he left, he brought the toilet paper with him and didn't do anything else. 🤦‍♂️

It looks like a great place to hang out, but what's the point when you can't use their washrooms? I guess you can just get things to-go.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lu Lil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoJ2aaTd-LLY6fPuTaoLHLccceyeUUT4iAgvkkg1ZR4Q4JU0Nf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I would give it 4/5 overall. The bubble tea tastes great and the price is fair compared to other bubble tea in metro Vancouver. If you expect a fill-up of cups and sweet drinks, it will disappoint you. I ordered Grape Fig Jello Green Tea (less sugar and reg. ice) and Jumbo Oat milk Grass Jelly (less sugar and reg. ice). Highly recommended both drinks.

I would say it is okay for the customer service. Everything can be done by using the order machine and there is no lineup in the afternoon. The staff provided some instructions while I ordered the drinks. I did not have much conversation with the staff but I felt that they are willing to provide services. Not that bad…

Overall the drinks taste good and the price is lower than other bubble tea shops.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7tPrEBJqWPNk3CMrRXz2L5bE-FVL3ny2_KRm3&fid=0x0:0x8268838bca810be6"],"When":"2023-8-4"},{"Name":"leesa tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWsWaHyhzcw7kKPh9V3HkvTK5TTa81TdmCDp9IylYllx4puXIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent place for bubble tea! The drinks are not too sweet. The layout of the store is quite spacious with how the chairs are arranged and they even have a upstairs for a group to sit at.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVphcKo5IELOjjnXd9Tzi5W7alEV3CwKcKL2nN&fid=0x0:0x8268838bca810be6"],"When":"2023-8-23"},{"Name":"Marilyn Mok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUikqrTCDS8NJxP3Hkk4jQDiHEi8RL4gQluQjwU1f2e462S8t3D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is not the place to go if you're looking for bubble tea as they do not have many tea options. What they do have is a wide array of fruit drinks that is done in a similar fashion as bubble tea. The fruit and boba that is included in the drink is half the cup, so you're really getting the bang for your buck.  They have extra seating upstairs if you like to hang around and the whole place is cute and funky.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrTNxtKf8Nwd7sGcJiIkALNP0eRJ8wlT7gxhWF&fid=0x0:0x8268838bca810be6"],"When":"2023-9-4"},{"Name":"Alson Niu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwOqUddIK3qtB-eNteoM7OdctKAOqO7ShPKiKz4ByZXpFsNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a drink with less ice but ended up with a drink with 80% ICE . The employee was nice however he could not do anything as that’s how it’s “supposed to be made”","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_CPfvH9BUMXn1RvXm_-ecz0hvxk0Uw8MXBeHp&fid=0x0:0x8268838bca810be6"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Danielle C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgCIgxpPquepVMectm-OHxxrwY9ipLgT5AAcBYENulsrIsYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shuyi is a must try drinking shop and I’ve been there several times. It’s a decent place hanging out with friends.  This new edition-Charon black oolong is definitely worth the price! The quality of the oolong tea is better also rich in flavors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9Zs8m094qCxnSFb-E_RePL2Dn3e9UvO2SNzFF&fid=0x0:0x8268838bca810be6"],"When":"2024-6-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Wyn Maison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0SeJTwieW_zPau37u6LbDiWy7BKR8u4fY5VroAlmi0U01KqI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently had the pleasure of enjoying brunch at Yandoux Patisserie, and it was an outstanding experience from start to finish.

Ambiance:
The atmosphere was warm and inviting, with a stylish decor that made us feel comfortable and relaxed. The seating was cozy, and the flowers decorated added a pleasant touch to the overall ambiance.

Service:
The service was exceptional. The server, I can’t quite recall her name. She was attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable about the menu. They made excellent recommendations and ensured our needs were met throughout our meal.

Food:
The food was the highlight of our visit, they were delicious and beautifully presented. The flavors were well-balanced, and the ingredients were fresh and of high quality. The portion sizes were generous, making it great value for money part.

Drinks:
We also enjoyed a selection of beverages, The Peach Apricot tea was refreshing and perfectly complemented our meal.

Overall, our experience at Yandoux Patisserie was fantastic. The combination of delicious food, excellent service, and inviting atmosphere made for a memorable brunch. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a great brunch experience. We will definitely be returning!

Thank you Yandoux for a wonderful brunch!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmXEcsntTzpAkDB84zmP-hetzZ7B5nkA6IUR0v&fid=0x0:0x8ab573618998f0b4"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Hazelle Qiao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLyhW0wC-ysXS2qLQ_H2iWGRaX77GIYAX8ArTB4Jf20j3y4kg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been to Yandoux Patisserie three times now, and each visit has been something special. The first time, I ordered a birthday cake, which looked amazing and tasted just as good. On my second visit, I tried their high tea, and more recently, I checked out their Halloween menu. Every experience has been a treat!

Their cakes are the real highlight. Not only are they beautifully presented, but they’re also perfectly balanced—sweet, but not too sweet. It’s clear they put a lot of thought into both the look and taste, which makes each bite worth savoring.

I’m definitely planning to visit again and hope they keep coming up with new and exciting cakes. Can’t wait to see what they dream up next!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSDv350iaeVQGStKZRkP65L66qe-8khUrKXc4b&fid=0x0:0x8ab573618998f0b4"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"E Maw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKcKp8HPnwcd7ytVX5_G__oZpEopqrzOk6yHhaNVjvkYkOy72YF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were delighted to be the first to try their Holiday Hightea menu. Mulled wine is a must! From comfortable seating to warmth service made every bite even more enjoyable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoFBbKkAcCowOj0h2MRSaIfhnV2Mqcvc8Xqm7P&fid=0x0:0x8ab573618998f0b4"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In love with the new Yandoux in Richmond! This new location is more spacious and a lot prettier than the original location. The seasonal afternoon tea menu was also amazing as always, everything was carefully prepared and both the presentation and the taste was very unique. Definitely the best in town!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkXS8KfcX4SW_aKXVfrcNNDhC0cRGE2YEFFd-M&fid=0x0:0x8ab573618998f0b4"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Janet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDfclxt7Zsaaq_HaPyo0JfsxVuRUKjVdnclvt6lC7TSgWvYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"7/10 for overall delicious Halloween tea set and atmosphere, cozy spacious seating and modern interior design; would come back to try their regular menu. I like that they have more savoury items than sweet, but both are done well. The scones are a highlight and freshly baked. Favourite was the sablefish and salmon oshi. Desserts were not overly sweet, very uniquely made and all the flavours came together.

Cons are 1) teas are very lacking, don't order the Earl Grey Green tea, never had such bland tea before! even when l asked for a second bag, there was no flavour... but I appreciate that the server changed our tea after we requested a different one.
2) Service and timing of the food coming out was the most disappointing. We were 1 of only 2 tables and it took almost 40mins...
3) the kitchen is an open kitchen and noise from
what theyre preparing in there can be quite loud and distracting. Also it didnt help that the other table that was close to us was an extremely loud group and really hampered the relaxing atmosphere.

4)Server really needs more training, it’s like it was her first job. She is not attentive. I’ve never gone to an afternoon tea place and been given our tea without any cream/sugar or a tea spoon until we asked…. she also can't speak English well so
she had a hard time describing what we were served, 2 instances where she did not know what the particular dish included. I ended up asking her to speak Mandarin instead. Please train her to understand the menu better. It’s a $65 tea set per person so I really expect better than this, considering your price point is only $10 less than an afternoon tea at Five Sails.

The restaurant is behind Versante Hotel, and there is no free parking ($3 for 2hrs). So park on P2 and take the elevator down. Best to make a reservation online or call them in advance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyxTWRFBCRnnlYqb09IMaetxOubDLbhdGgKlLO&fid=0x0:0x8ab573618998f0b4"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Erin Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNddZXBvjo1lM53d1JsGHCCAsJEWmjzWHaoOXhqaaioyHgIgaf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for afternoon tea with a group of my friends and had a really lovely time. Parking is street parking around the corner, or paid parking in the parkade. The restaurant can be a little confusing to find because the only signage saying "Yandoux" is a sidewalk sign that leads to a very dark nameless door on West Road. When you enter it's a dim lobby, and Yandoux is on the left.

The space is bright, nicely decorated, very clean and quiet. Afternoon tea reservations are allotted 2 hours of seating time, but it was more than enough for a leisurely stay. If you are booking for 5+ people, they will call you for a deposit that you make via e-transfer.

There's a sizeable list of teas to try. I ordered an Elderberry tea, and while you can order milk and sugar to go with your teas, my friends and I found the teas fragrant and sweet enough on its own without needing to milk/sugar as we usually do. Our server continuously came by to refill our pots with hot water and that was very appreciated.

The photos show food for 2 afternoon tea sets. Everything was really nicely prepared and tasted wonderful. The sablefish, and the prosciutto burrata were my favourites of the savouries. The desserts all tasted really good, and not too sweet. My only complaint was that I found the sable in the lemon tart to be overbaked and very dry.

Each tea set is $65 excluding tax/tips, and while it's a little pricier than other afternoon teas i've experienced, the overall stay and food is worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJwvQwGo7QQZ8eYri63cHMWy75Uyz-OAhhBJiO&fid=0x0:0x8ab573618998f0b4"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Angela Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb_531iDFVKCasGm6UvuKw9uZaENkT6KFE4j7gJIfH4GYfpwM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely Delightful!
The set was stunning, with a beautiful selection of desserts and savory bites.

The ambiance was cozy and elegant, and the staff were attentive and welcoming.
A must-visit spot for dessert lovers or anyone looking to enjoy a relaxing and luxurious afternoon. Will definitely be returning soon!!!

Make sure call them in advance to reserve your spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOP92dmY01xegf6piReVDphBwkIY-esHhXnTHv0&fid=0x0:0x8ab573618998f0b4"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Kitty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhMuwg_tl1TRTc24JxH5iTo3OJVTHqCQijM2P6PldLkYJ1Idkn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful location along with very delicious food! It was approx. $65 pp before tips and taxes. It was a great experience.

If you park inside the parking lot, look for the west tower and it’s located on the ground floor. The opposite side of Bruno.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvAo1QAkG4avsj6jCXJt29Rvb6CEXLEIEyPtBm&fid=0x0:0x8ab573618998f0b4"],"When":"2024-10-8"}]

title: CoCo Fresh Tea & Juice
descriptions: Minimalist Taiwanese bubble-tea chain outlet specializing in milk teas, fresh juices & smoothies.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Gender-neutral washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Arda Altinay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAbfrlgm3hTWel_DR5NfVRDeqcXm5zDZTUqB4HEYpYcJ8uAP83=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good interior design and bubble tea good quality that we already know from other coco locations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO35bWISg9QT57Vzb9sMZMBennaHTYKXOysoDes&fid=0x0:0xdfa373960922536b"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Brent Bridgewater","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3dLa7yVKNZzFej3RLyMr1X47mnQwfu9mNGJWGv3u2VBAx5sBk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It's happened a couple times again, they don't have medium cups and force you to upgrade and do not honour the medium price for the large. They also will not put a medium amount of tea in the large cup to make up for it. I don't know why but this feels like it's breaking consumer right laws. Anyways they also use paper straws which is awful to drink from while many nearby shops have switched to bamboo and sugarcane straws. They also don't use real frozen fruit for the slush unfortunately.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1UZ09Td3--5cSABxBOWrYQ_8c7pKYUkee8bpg&fid=0x0:0xdfa373960922536b"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Tario Sultan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs5egw4ytTDIua69pxGET59kVTaWgbfGJaRgqyQl37e1dCXZiC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Variety of bubble tea options and the staff is super friendly and helpful.

They also carry:
Latte
Fresh Tea
Salty Cream
Slush
Fruit tea
Yakult

For milk options, they can do:
Regular Milk
Fresh Milk
Oat Milk

The drink is tasty and delicious!

If you live nearby, highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaOFYm15Kv1Un4OWASS6LvwteV8_nbMxwDR3vV&fid=0x0:0xdfa373960922536b"],"When":"2023-6-26"},{"Name":"Nikki c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTEI07jnFTAEaLsFO0c2_mPPfnmG0XKKHuolSSFqT8Xlgj-nIi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Put an entire chunk of honey jelly in the drink…when I first put the straw in I couldn’t even stab through it. Who does this? Please scoop it into smaller pieces like at least 3 or 4. This is difficult to drink, don’t do this just because you use paper cup now and think we can see inside smh","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMt82_YKzgoB5cVOf9C3-8-Ce2hsEFwiJoreE3h&fid=0x0:0xdfa373960922536b"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"BEST COCO EVER.
This is the nicest CoCo I have ever visited, it's awesome!! The joint feels brand new, excellent upkeep, cleanliness and tidyness with great facilities. I cannot wait to come back when we can sit in again post COVID. It would also be great if they could offer outdoor seating during summer.
Staff are super friendly, approachable and helpful.
We got the Roasted Milk Red Bean Matcha Tea which tastes incredible, so yummy I could drink this for my 3 meals of the day, I love Coco!! I haven't seen this on other menus so not sure if it's specific to this chain (I hope not otherwise I'm gonna spend a lot of money on gas), nor have I had my Bubble Tea made with so much flavour before!
I also HAD to purchase the eco friendly reusable sleeve which I haven't seen in any other chains, it's great! Pair this with a reusable straw as we all should and we can make such a positive impact to our planet.
As all Coco chains, they also make their delicious milk via powder which is dairy free!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6HPL7MuMe1cMV6bmT-BXK_SUWT3fTwpxb8qH_&fid=0x0:0xdfa373960922536b"],"When":"2021-3-22"},{"Name":"Skylar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhNzOaOjMb43nf85BivkH3Wec5sF-cDQQApys03UJtrlGhIxg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Asked for double boba, paid for double boba, but did not receive double boba. Selfish with the toppings, staff was not particularly nice, but the tea and boba tasted decent","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ben Klein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9R820F28I0t3X369CmfDuA-HVVZc86vM9sktLJOY_Gt7-9IRU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A very welcoming bubble tea cafe. They have seating for small groups of four or six. Maximum capacity is 27 people. Staff are friendly. They accept Wepay, debit card, cash. Parking is available from the strip mall. They are on two transit lines and very close to the Aberdeen station Canada line. Flavors are good, fresh fruits are the best for healthy choices. They have a wheelchair accessible bathroom.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh608oe0tC9Bf13O4dDo9nwZtc12frsYcMyD4N&fid=0x0:0xdfa373960922536b"],"When":"2018-1-21"},{"Name":"anna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeJu1YaocM7YygVndc1KYMey6yL_yWAKowrNfydwOrQ8G5JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Coco’s drink quality is always consistent so I always come back! However, I am a bit dissatisfied with the customer experience in my last visit.

I ordered a milk tea with 30% sugar and regular ice. Unfortunately by the time I looked at my receipt and I realized it did not say 30% sugar the drink had already been made. As I let the girl with the glasses and claw clip know she said “but it’s already made, so it is it okay?”. And then I kindly asked her to remake it because I was sure I asked for 30% (I always get my drinks 30% for health reasons) and she looked pretty annoyed and said with a straight face “but you said regular sugar and ice”. To which I kindly said “oh I did say 30% actually sorry”. But I’m grateful she asked the barista to remake it anyways.

What happened was after I ordered, there was a lineup behind me so I wanted to quickly leave the counter after ordering. It’s definitely my fault for not double checking the screen and properly listening to the cashier repeat my order. But even if it was my mistake, I don’t think it warranted that kind of reaction from her. Remaking a regular milk tea takes less than 30 seconds and doesn’t cost a lot of money at all. I didn’t understand why it seemed like such an inconvenience to request the drink to be remade. Again, I’m grateful she did end up asking the barista to remake my drink (she was also really nice when I was ordering) but this experience did make me a little sad and I felt bad for being troublesome.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rachel Keery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7HrRs2lYWD-a0OMwYD8hcg13jIWjm47WrdDcC3B391YGfNtPv3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Randomly came in here while walking through Aberdeen square. So worth it !! ordered the mango pineapple fruit tea and it was probably the best fruit tea I’ve ever tried !!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCLBYAK_WnzB2mrZQRF7oN2iKHiEIwjlfZNkGY&fid=0x0:0xd4a3860c86ee30e8"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best fruit teas ever is served here. It's literally a sweet tea beverage that also serves as a fruit salad meeting your daily servings of fruit as per the Canadian food guide . All the fruits were fresh and not frozen and it had fresh slices of mangoes, oranges, lemons, limes, strawberries, blueberries, and kiwis! That is 7 fresh fruits in a drink! It tasted delicious!

I also had their Taiwanese club sandwich which was a homemade burger patty on sweet bread with tomato, egg, and singles cheese. Very tasty too.

Their fruit tea is a must try and I'm surprised people are not lining up for it. It was great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpFkjMrwLz465KmTWaFuxfWeDg59Bj0xHe20lo&fid=0x0:0xd4a3860c86ee30e8"],"When":"2022-2-16"},{"Name":"Ang Xue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7mPLBA9i6TwjRIRic3AD873AgR0eqhzpx4ngGIFeGWmnrRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite cafe in Richmond! Addicted to their avocado 🥑 coffee! Love how it’s not too sweet and taste so smooth! 🤤 Best Taiwanese club sandwich with homemade Pattie! They also open earlier than most stores in Aberdeen square, so get your drink and food than shop around. Love supporting local businesses like this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlqFMjaGftiTBfANXbhYIqygzNoHdfqqw_SNw1&fid=0x0:0xd4a3860c86ee30e8"],"When":"2023-2-11"},{"Name":"Vanda Florist","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjSVJadDCE_Xg1f0dSaC3zahd253j2uT5iK4yLJwe2Za4cdKRB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Randomly found this place for a coffee, surprisingly good! Lots of healthy food and drinks choices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmkbRvk0OIpgBjzt1Dph6MsFmGDjugzeeQI4gh&fid=0x0:0xd4a3860c86ee30e8"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"F Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLN9YFqPNQC-8D2WCySWFEp0AvnaStwnjE3nmdrCL3sh4hGuRK7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I've been going every Sunday this month...I love the quality of the food and the atmosphere.
For long-term business, employees must be replaced.  She was rude... yelling at customers when they tried to order.
However, I managed to put up with it because I needed a quiet place to kill time between transitions.  This week, the staff member came up and asked me to leave the cafe because she needed to go to the toilet.  I didn't understand at first...because it doesn't seem like a common practice.  I still have half of my meal to finish.  I understand that this is a basic human need.  But she was rude when she asked me to do so.  This just ruins everything...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjHr8NeE0ModZrIQl7YZz6qfv5M8TYL2teFOr4&fid=0x0:0xd4a3860c86ee30e8"],"When":"2022-1-30"},{"Name":"Afreen Shaikh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfTOe1btAJlwzxmmY_Um5PnVVnGzOAvCxU1srO_gwHRizeO4s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cute little cafe tucked away in this mall. We had a Sicilian and an avocado coffee both delicious! The Sicilian coffee has a hint of lemon which was so refreshing and the avocado coffee was not too sweet. The person who took care of us was really gracious. I will definitely be back for more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORxesiERSUAuE181Rd6RPpwU-yIQ6LBwAfwnQl&fid=0x0:0xd4a3860c86ee30e8"],"When":"2023-7-15"},{"Name":"Debbie P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4C5xruKQ5o6viohHClLtBI51peBi4oJ3xbenMJNl6Ni-0vA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They put a crazy amount of fruit in the special fruit tea. It’s so good! Not sure if you can adjust the sweetness, but I did end up finding the drink itself a bit too sweet

Lots of house-made treats for sale as well. We went in while they were baking cookies, so the smell was absolutely delightful.

One star deducted however, as the drink did end up taking a while to make, despite only 2 of us in the shop. Lady who took the order was also chatting loudly on the phone during the whole process","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqsVu_b5qxM62Qsm7XBgoy1frUfOfTawNrCSLW&fid=0x0:0xd4a3860c86ee30e8"],"When":"2022-10-16"},{"Name":"Sushi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhzBcE0QBehKmo-4odRXDw3twMFs9YwER2LQ_zgov7_LH30Zs1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice music and lighting, really good fruit tea (made with real fruit wow), service is really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOl41EKpo0BFWSArZBRBMdX0D7DF0f7niel2T-&fid=0x0:0xd4a3860c86ee30e8"],"When":"2024-8-1"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jordana Stern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6H_Beuvsoj46nQ9BVFsUF_8W_hjuxc2pr8bb7S9hb3EA_QV44=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Favourite bubble tea shop. Passionfruit green tea with pearls and jelly is my staple drink. I come here way too often because it is that good 😊 tea is brewed fresh in front of you. Highly recommend!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgYpgTdwWTgnjBS3hcZUNaxNjKyQv_066JgT5o\u0026fid=0x0:0xdb0559ebf44e58f1"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Eugene Gomez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_PjcKjwf8u1SiJJ0a1ZqCA_t-xRWrg0598OXUYUr1lyyGYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in this afternoon, ordered four signature fruit tea. Only one lady was working, very efficient and quick service. Unfortunately, there was no mango slush. However, highly recommend the fruit teas.\n\nDefinitely coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZrRKnOdmxcaD2XUmm0zXfWl4fxWBrbMWQ7I_-\u0026fid=0x0:0xdb0559ebf44e58f1"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Vinnie Yuen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJM2VkQq7-nqE6_6199IHyP3S_y8SM0ZQ61OlY6nyj2DizJ-c=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Really wanted to get bubble tea yesterday (Wednesday) at 1:45 pm but the store was closed (despite the sign on the door saying open 12 - 9 pm). Don't trust their listed opening hours! I've gotten bubble tea from here before a year ago and it was decent, but because it was 1 pm they did not have pearls ready yet.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Standard average bubble tea place. Tried the fruit tea which was good but only had apples and oranges in it. Other places usually have more than 2 types of fruit in their fruit tea. Service was good though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrY60y28ypqRy8ZtTDPfjE7awj7kuEHXaZ4_aB\u0026fid=0x0:0xdb0559ebf44e58f1"],"When":"2022-7-31"},{"Name":"Jackie Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkpScVqwsqD0j_S9nau5e87dyCpIjjQvMcvLAqHRJudVNh1Rw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in the afternoon today and tried the peach oolong tea and brown sugar pearl latte. Highly recommend the teas at this place because they’re brewed fresh.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ken Gee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9uN1yjXYWnOjTEMicxTIu3UVIXdKBV9cVXuDeo70f2Xy29x_y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Inconsistent customer service, sometimes the service here is great but on my recent visit the staff’s attitude wasn’t very good. To top it off, I ordered less ice but I got basically full ice and maybe more, my cup was half ice. Also, when I shook the cup it leaked and spilled on my jacket. The peach oolong cream cheese tea wasn’t that good, and overall I think that the milk tea is inferior compared to some other bubble tea chains. The pudding is also not the best.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP00N_MrxNN1AgN055Hjssge3iXJm4KJqBFEqTe\u0026fid=0x0:0xdb0559ebf44e58f1"],"When":"2019-12-1"},{"Name":"Sanford Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM9xZMssfnzjoxDk_lE7GV5HXfXnHzYNMx4GiFw0W5okfRWfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of the best, if not the best milk tea places in Richmond. I loved my drink, it stood out from all the generic flavours in Richmond, and the price was very good. Highly recommended, I'm really glad I decided to visit here when I was in the area. I would come again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEo5Tf61oGER1AClvm0mMI7isYQwjmILW4axR9\u0026fid=0x0:0xdb0559ebf44e58f1"],"When":"2018-1-1"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Located in a busy mini mall in Terra Nova. Had the fresh mango slush and signature fruit tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpVUDgHfZsbWl2q4WuWXgQaasHXUVMZAMJxnwj\u0026fid=0x0:0xdb0559ebf44e58f1"],"When":"2024-1-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fresh Press Coffee Bar is a small, cozy coffee shop with only 4-5 tables, making it an intimate spot to relax. While the selection of breads and cakes is limited, the staff is super friendly and welcoming. It’s a great place to meet and chat with friends in a laid-back environment. The iced Americano is excellent—strong and flavorful, served without ice. Perfect for those who appreciate a no-frills but high-quality coffee experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgvULm6KW7HGHHIs-RRWmijS9e1gtCjRw8pdrz&fid=0x0:0x3f4bee2892bdb814"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Kevin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxvGWHzty62wmu2rgWrgLMwpjq1Hu5-aBq1q1sn2-6u6hihjlf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute cosy coffee shop. Perfect stop for a rainy day. I really enjoyed the matcha latte and their waffles ! They put a generous amount of matcha in their drinks so it feels a bit more premium!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDR11-KKOymjyDnOL7fsdvdlDbsp-cUCtd8CFE&fid=0x0:0x3f4bee2892bdb814"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Timothy Chan (TimTim)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURIoSl-5oBZzcRd91bCuWm5mXoW-rsGa8ZawpNSjddYI4bCo-k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent desserts and coffee, always! Their unique cookie boxes are best for gifting and I always buy it for my students when they finish their course. These cookie gift boxes are handmade, which is something unique that they cannot buy anywhere else.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJUDyEnCNEvQqYFWOS4Sb0IFATy4LpkDFH-29K&fid=0x0:0x3f4bee2892bdb814"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Nav Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpOkQtsUC22WCPGRCMmg57CDBnQpd4cvYOpO1Jwd0uVmfb_aFM2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely little cafe in Richmond with a great owner.

I ordered a macchiato and the owner, Jen, recommended the caramel one.

Jan/Jen was super courteous, told me about the cafe and business surviving Covid19 and still running successfully.

She made recommendations, and when my guest didn't like how bitter her drink was, Jen surprised us with a different drink at no extra cost.

Thank you, Jen! Blessings and great luck!
Navjot Gahley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6R27gRhVGCoueGr3BzPn_l_hbDbRUNDrytdpW&fid=0x0:0x3f4bee2892bdb814"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Jenn Charlebois","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKRrj9O2TC4Z43Klxsjk99MP2rrYMQXqnf50KZjyWmfrAj08VLNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just wanted to ride my bike for coffee and picked this place because it looked simple and cute. It is a small coffee shop with not a lot of seating. I loved their selection of unique drinks and pastries. I will definitely be bringing my girls back. The 2 women making the drinks were friendly and kind. I had their homemade iced salted caramel machiato (not sure if that's the correct spelling). It was delicious! So much better than starbucks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaZaCukjXkSW7w1oZQ1I3cz2VaOGPKdcJvnOv-&fid=0x0:0x3f4bee2892bdb814"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Gurv","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhwceJhFcjYo11eH0UjktVpbt4vgW7SS5aHechrSipNjogSGM7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had some time to kill while in Richmond recently, and popped into this quaint little coffee shop. The barista was friendly and created a nice flat white. Price was reasonable. Place is a little tucked away. Seat isn’t the most comfortable and the shop is a bit compact.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8XxTJHFT0upHx_RlHTMQ9iUOV4fU2SZoBPF0Q&fid=0x0:0x3f4bee2892bdb814"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Michael Walsh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXf-RHCWsSL2gHl89Wr-twYc-9P7esLzzR5WoMGY6_n-m_AFSao=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update: I came again two years later and it’s still amazing with lovely service!

First time visitor this morning from Victoria. I love supporting small independent coffee spaces especially when the owners really care — like Fresh Press. I had a wonderful triple-shot Oat Milk Latte (I found out after they make their own almond milk which I will try next time.) Their in-house almond cookies were exceptional. Thank you and look forward to seeing you next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6inkRg34OXxO4M7a1a8tQnEJZOypppsWKV-G9&fid=0x0:0x3f4bee2892bdb814"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Rose Kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQ5BkGWS5p3ZTOvHrPnu2rKTCvYS8W1e5KCNPC7IuXTcdkMWSu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have been wanting to try this coffee shop for awhile and it didn’t disappoint
Enjoyed the most delicious Vanilla Latte hand delivered to me while sitting outside on the cute bistro table with my puppy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNg8TpRbIw2G8vij5_2PDeCcTuzNEUvMFnEwtZX&fid=0x0:0x3f4bee2892bdb814"],"When":"2024-10-2"}]

title: Song Tea
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Foodie Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6n06QAfqStqer1ZgBILsv-fiSHmrGRZuznSS1ny9iQFfb_Ognuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My 5-star rating is solely for their fruit tea. I wouldn’t recommend the milk tea, but their seasonal fresh fruit tea is always as delicious as I remember. What really makes it special is that their preparation method is unique compared to other milk tea shops, which sets them apart. Even though the service and atmosphere are pretty average and nothing to write home about, I’ll keep returning for the fruit tea alone. It’s consistently refreshing, and the use of fresh, in-season fruits really makes a difference.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkrT1duI4OJPaVtvWHCp32VnWyQFUlEYqwHgUm&fid=0x0:0xf44a2108b895cbaa"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Zoe Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxnDqCXJVxPBWrW9VdUfhMX864_7j0UperlDmg9Leu362EqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Called to order while I’m on my way, because I wanted to save time waiting, and was told by them that they don’t do preorders. But when I show up in the store, the staff was talking on the phone taking orders. Beside this, wait time is ridiculously long. Waited more than 15 minutes after the order number before me took their orders. And I only ordered 2 drinks. And I’ve told them I’m in a hurry at the beginning. Will never come again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Henry Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcTlx45tkivdnVyW4B38kXt4WHZXtLMp6yRttTlIFdf-1gou8R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A whole new level of naming their bubble tea, really creative names!

Not cheap, but arguably one of the best shops in whole Greater Vancouver area!

Service is subpar, and only take debit, no credit. I guess when your drink is so good, you can do whatever you want lol

I can definitely drink their tea every day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9_2SqFe9AJLo6eJtrzRJiLpXD9y4PFuNSev9U&fid=0x0:0xf44a2108b895cbaa"],"When":"2022-6-11"},{"Name":"Judy Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKV97FGp6pvH2GB0Sbbd5vzH4RVaCgHQ1POlgKRZoLObEp2Qw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst bubble tea that I’ve ever tried. Basically tasted like water.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpV7FYa4xt2Xr49_NZi9-zU9PuedmfZc5D-BrR&fid=0x0:0xf44a2108b895cbaa"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Anita J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK13EckJ3mAFnbZspC6goEzwRBXkC9Pu3kXkD-XUnJ3T3FS6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"it’s really good! even regular sweet isn’t too sweet like other bubble tea shops. the cream is waaaaay more creamy and not watery at all. 10/10 would come again. if there was a bigger size it would be better, considering the price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNh1Hm7jpJUzQLOQzvn9yA2Vkek1vAZFdt37pMn&fid=0x0:0xf44a2108b895cbaa"],"When":"2019-1-16"},{"Name":"S H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJEaEUS1rKPUQqI-5muj1wBfBxSotijSfpk6Mu5w4Dwhojdx8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go to place in Richmond for bubble tea. Great refreshing drinks and friendly staff. Keep in mind they are cash or debit only. I highly recommend the grapefruit or grape tea with sakura konjac jelly. The konjac jelly is a great alternative to traditional pearls as its just as chewy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMioC25bmDKA1Cp4-V-HK8I8Ai7gPqZ2jhMBJL0&fid=0x0:0xf44a2108b895cbaa"],"When":"2024-1-8"},{"Name":"Debbie L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKt0Ud6bYDq5PA1WgYc1LOExus3xcphfDBr8g_1AIWhX_M9pj_i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I got their mango cheese tea and I would say it’s nothing too special compared to other places. Their prices are on the higher end, ranging from avg of $6-8 for a drink. I do really like how strong the tea tasted and was very fragrant in the mango cheese tea which was unique compared to other places. I would recommend getting 70% sugar or lowering the sugar content cause it can get a little sweet or I recommend sharing the cheese tea as it can be heavy as well. Other then that, it’s expensive! Service can be a bit slow as well during peak hours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmqM4Q7jpQjID9pu0SsTspyWhocYaj3ikVfLBU&fid=0x0:0xf44a2108b895cbaa"],"When":"2019-7-22"},{"Name":"Ziying Bu (Alan)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtRFunkMDwpGKIGt1cePSR3UdjOMkEHUzkJeZ9utXmNubsQVV8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is the BEST Cheese salted cream, that I have never tried it before, which is so rich and smooth! They use REAL fruit to make drinks. The mango flavour is natural and fresh, but it might be too light for someone who loves syrup. I would say well done and highly recommend this bubble tea shop if you prefer to have heavy salted cream in your drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzDbpurO-gBqvKwbOrJXOV7sDLkbyhkRQLx63-&fid=0x0:0xf44a2108b895cbaa"],"When":"2019-1-3"}]

title: CoCo Fresh Tea & Juice Richmond Oval
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Henry Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcTlx45tkivdnVyW4B38kXt4WHZXtLMp6yRttTlIFdf-1gou8R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Good: super spacious store, with modern and sleek interior design, a really lovely place.
Drink is not bad, but other Coco I usually go to seem to be better in quality and flavour.

Bad: there were 3 staff, everyone seemed cold and indifferent. I literally stood in front of them for 10 sec, and they were just talking to each other without acknowledging my presence??!! I had to ask if they were able to take order or not?
No smile, no greeting and thank you, just lack of very basic customer service and manners. It also seemed they didn’t want to talk at all. I think they should be working in the back of house if they don’t like to face customers.

Anyway, except the terrible customer service experience, everything else was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzmy76sxP3egBymU89aXQ7ZI4Tgl8vbUuYvyZH&fid=0x0:0x231b350488fbed2c"],"When":"2023-3-4"},{"Name":"Y Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWuvJh-CGtJ2WYmSmlYQSR9LMDPm6-UYDIRhhudEOoc-6g-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is pretty good. Not sure why the ratings are low. The sugar and ice levels are consistently much higher than what you will ask for. I would say 30% is more like full sugar and low ice is average ice.

Portion for Toppings are very inconsistent. Sometimes loads of Toppings and not enough tea or the other way around.

Taste is on par

Sometimes it's confusing because the lights are off but they are actually open","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTVZoUV8yQPj_UnCrzOY0Pv6RluHVBxGj6CfKh4fNkyDfhtw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Probably my last time going to this location, I buy from coco 1-3 times a week.
ordered a latte and it tasted watery ( similar review from other).  Staff unwilling to exchange  to another, which is fine, but I don’t appreciate the look they gave me","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The grapefruit yakult drink is delicious and refreshing here. Love how they use real freshly squeezed grapefruit juice and mix it with 2 real small bottles of yakult. Great for summer :) Clean and spacious shop too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqRmQ96xjidk6j6JAjnYM3ET6BLwXoh2Gt-jGN&fid=0x0:0x231b350488fbed2c"],"When":"2023-5-26"},{"Name":"Tyanna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8rdzNBrSIofc0hGezVelyQH7jPXtnkA1dZajzOa-EesstOivu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Been here several times. Always disappointing. Never enough pearls. And most of the time, they are out of pearls. Drink is good, but I don’t want to pay $6.40 for juice. It really bugs me. I am within walking distance but much rather drive to Blundell for Coco’s than support this one.  Got coconut jellys since no pearls and look at the portion 🙄","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZCjjI1nytVFfqoqkhTvjtATgBBcFLJyYTVAw-&fid=0x0:0x231b350488fbed2c"],"When":"2022-11-8"},{"Name":"Raven","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK9wUVoBq1hiWG_J1cPBfoE3RmHq3xsP-RLkHlIf6B_Ec0IJUZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Whoa no wonder why people are addicted to this place!! I got the brown sugar milk latte, and holy smokes it was delicious! Very fast service and clean spacious environment","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_YKHICpTtl3x0hDNVeOSuK_GOd3YYBWuT3uqe&fid=0x0:0x231b350488fbed2c"],"When":"2024-1-24"},{"Name":"Felix Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX26coa_r82O0Be1gdUTfIYQLjWozUkeZNkVGb3nzc1sbcR40oL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely adore this coco! The music they play is incredible; they create such an enjoyable atmosphere, which enhances the deliciousness of their drinks. My experience at this coco exceeded my expectations, and I will definitely be coming back for more :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matthew Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKoclNIMgrIB8eZI9be3YXBQ45hWfDGedZOGFGYFVAnxa0JjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A milk tea chain franchise shop that is always sold out of milk tea and its condiments at any given time of day happening on several occasions. The experience is always 50% hit and 50% disappointment.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good place for a quick lunch. Entry from the superstore parking garage. We tried crispy roast pork and duck along with sides of rice. The pork was excellent, duck just okay. Portions were a good size.  Service was very prompt and friendly. The visit to HK BBQ Masters was like being in a crowded Hong Kong restaurant for an hour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoEDI7G_1mFML639xnFAiBtAKFk_BGNRNIkWzW&fid=0x0:0xb050f1400f8a2d33"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Hung Do","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU97mpWni6hYlMOFamrkAWxpjDrzI4CjYuf3tuqzHM44ftqh6JV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Place is very small, prepare to wait but it’s worth it & the line moves quickly. Short menu, just BBQ meats over rice. Steamed veggies & soup of the day, that’s it.  Cash only. Parking garage available for customers (free).  The soy chicken & cold salted & boiled chicken were perfection. The crispy roast pork was on point. The BBQ pork was good. The white rice was perfect. Steamed veggies (2 types) were good. Soup was on the sweet side, no MSG.  So so good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnm1HKMEUW-aEix5nSJ6HobuWcNYlHjPExC62Z&fid=0x0:0xb050f1400f8a2d33"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Thanh To","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVd1WYJP1UmnIbSg76XorhMDMrCl48AkAncBIVkE7p0lcIIllbB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food is good but does not live up to the hype.

I've always been a fan of Chinese BBQ. Seeing all the social media contents about how cheap it is, I had to come to Richmond check it out.

The roast pork belly and duck are good, but you can find better in Vancouver.

However, we had to wait 20 minutes to get in. The price wasn't that great and the portions were small. It was cash only and we didn't get our change back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB_fh1pSxO022mkGwsCTR_Bds7ZWfha0jColO7&fid=0x0:0xb050f1400f8a2d33"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Lucy Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuwCjTEBDQem6hcfmmxSA0I0nNlJPkS88N0KyjwlMUZAjI_Jdm8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is so good!!! It is always so busy but the line moves really quickly for dine in. Their line for take out is even longer but it also moves very fast. Both the bbq duck and pork are so yummy and affordable. A combo with rice, meat and broccoli is around $15. The soup of the day is also delicious and I think it’s most of the time boiled from duck bones, as they have different soups everyday. Their milk tea is really sweet but yummy. Also be aware that this is cash only!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPG9MDLTIKgJE1LgeKEDsc264WitCCiiJFs17nn&fid=0x0:0xb050f1400f8a2d33"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"HK BBQ Master is a must-visit for BBQ lovers! The BBQ pork and 燒肉 are both delicious, with a perfect balance of flavor and texture. The 半肥瘦叉燒 (half-fat half-lean char siu) is especially yummy—tender and flavorful. The daily soup is 真材實料, full of real ingredients and rich taste. If you’re looking for authentic Hong Kong-style BBQ, this place won’t disappoint!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjMZO-Z-GWwExQQ4aCZvhFbx45SVXaXLtw6UUW&fid=0x0:0xb050f1400f8a2d33"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Royal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIE8-P_rSsN5YnwwsMB_lRDuUDhR2CQbcnGIW45Tididjjs3IpZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always a long line but so worth it. They have a separate line for take out and dine-in, so if you’re eating here, make sure you get on the waitlist.

Service is fast, and this isn’t really a place you go for ambiance.

Get the soy sauce chicken and bbq pork combo. Rice is also cooked very well, and goes so well with the sauce, which you can ask for extra on the side along with chili oil. The Hong Kong milk tea is also good.

Portions are smaller than from when we first went here, but that’s really a sign of the times.

Cash only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR4QTKLViOmPqjDm1b9bUIizs6ZSICbzA9aeI1&fid=0x0:0xb050f1400f8a2d33"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Colin Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7h35ZtHaveCK9eq8-mDb7BmK8EeHfVN1usnvgcw8J_phkrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very popular restaurant with delicious BBQ meats!  Popular items sell out so go early to ensure you get what you want.  Free parking underground.  Friendly staff.  Lots of awards proudly displayed at entrance near the washroom.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNF3iwl1wIIy4ylhJ20HkNVjBF5YSFEFkC5gfX4&fid=0x0:0xb050f1400f8a2d33"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Jay Son","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn0RkZudJ2rqo44cPCXRGdjl8jGgyzJ1HQ4rCm07nKJ8WlmMkc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The roast pork was definitely the best out of the town items I got. The meat tender, the skin was crispy, what else is there to say? The char Siu on the other hand was alright. Half of it was dry and hard as a rock.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMok1enFreJYpm8dEuvGQl_9x5-Pnz_e-6Mo_N5&fid=0x0:0xb050f1400f8a2d33"],"When":"2024-12-24"}]

descriptions: Celebrated staple for classic Chinese fare & inventive, daily dim sum in a polished dining room.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jordan Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmTQBIm2OM6W1aLWh5GpdrAdYj_-8r3HQ_rOC1_Hl_KwVo3wPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The dinner set menu at Kirin Seafood Restaurant was impressive, with outstanding food quality and excellent service. We enjoyed a set menu that included creamy butter crab, steamed fish, soy-marinated chicken, roast duck, and soup.

The soup was a flavorful start to the meal. The creamy butter crab was rich and indulgent without being overwhelming, while the steamed fish was tender and fresh, highlighting the natural flavors of the ingredients. The soy-marinated chicken was juicy and perfectly seasoned, and the roast duck had a smoky aroma with a well-balanced texture.

The service was attentive and professional, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable dining experience. Kirin Seafood Restaurant’s dinner set menu is an excellent choice for family gatherings or dining with friends—highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5V8uqSHYXbEVPqOTwvxJY-VP1Dm8NJaBhiGgY&fid=0x0:0x73b53554bbc907d9"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Charlie Te","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM3tcz74rJ0DuYDDGqeapmHdklqGqUrrA6BTCZLUf9O7D5dKDG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When in Richmond BC, you need to hit up a dim sum spot at least once. During this visit,  we visited Kirin. It's probably been a very long time since I've been here.  The atmosphere is nice and packed with people. The quality of the dim sum here is great and there were unique items that I haven't seen before.  The service is top notch and attentive. I liked that they offer two sets of chopsticks, one use for getting food from the center of the table and the other for personal use.  They also order two tea pots (one with extra hot water). These little items help make the experience enjoyable. Their deep fried taro was exceptional great.  The exterior had a really good texture and taste that I've haven't experienced before.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXBs4Iv9DpPtmdTZ_GjRs6NeZyNDfIb6Er10my&fid=0x0:0x73b53554bbc907d9"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"B Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwarR5PGt8X1gY8l9e6oQCW93EXXYWw_piwecz6ZJmgcTZUxfv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for their Abolone and Lobster Special Menu, which is $68.80 per person. Had it once before earlier in the year and was very impressed so decided to come back for a special occasion.

The service here is always amazing and very attentive. Everyone that works here is super courteous and gives great service.

The food is also really good. Each course is cooked properly and is delicious. Ingredients including seafood used are very fresh. My only tiny issue is that the dishes I had this time were all a tad under-seasoned compared to last time. Otherwise, this is a very nice restaurant with good food and fantastic service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMO0HqxiHlVlmgsHh8xpYHRh8qmVZK1hezWtiKl&fid=0x0:0x73b53554bbc907d9"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Allen Leung (World of Dreams)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQht9b4jSIeenG9TN7w3QVslyw-01-MFtynT8i4Z196ngTkCIcpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for dinner and food was well presented and delicious.

The servers are very professional and always come to check on you to change your plate when it's dirty or to refill your tea.

I would definitely recommend this restaurant to anyone who enjoys Chinese food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZJMeXcpOhsyIHiuxkUcJQuZBysi3nSvk4vhqY&fid=0x0:0x73b53554bbc907d9"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Brandon Mai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu7HSg9rVFi4fBa6rqAdcsv_NNoqgP5xxmEHC91yIPMnTLgSKt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Utterly ridiculous and completely unacceptable.  To start off, we were not greeted , there was no service to say the least. The attitude of the staff were unbearable, as if they hated their job. Simply, “when asked to changed a cup filled with dirty lipstick from poor restaurant practices.” The cup would be left on the table like a relic, as you can see in the picture. Having asked several staff or waiters , even the guys in the suit , I don’t know but the attitude we received was disrespectful. Before the food even came, we had to order food multiples times to fulfil our dim sum order and when we asked if they knew what we ordered. They did not have a single idea.

Now the food,  for this level of restaurant . I would expect the food to be good. However, every dish was small . The rice roll was nasty , the shrimp and the doughy texture of the rice flour was like food court quality. On to the duck feet, with a single coriander garnish. The food lacked presentation , but what bothers me the most is that nothing was edible . Truly disappointing.

I would rather eat in the mall food court than to eat the food from this restaurant. To say the least, we left hungry and humiliated. Perhaps , a restaurant like this is pretty normal . But with a reputation like that, I would strongly recommend the owner of this establishment to review there restaurant practices if they want to compete in todays dim sum market.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML8tqARJVOpwulRK81ECKHyq87B2MUAuXnS6B_&fid=0x0:0x73b53554bbc907d9"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Rae Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXludIfvxP0lSashqAP6J43sWBimKhhDxCMUWR6u1Oxcwk0m3TvVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The dim sum at Kirin Restaurant is exceptionally good! Every item I ordered was delicious and exceeded my expectations. The shrimp dumplings were perfectly steamed with fresh, juicy shrimp, and the siu mai had a great balance of flavors. The beef balls were tender and flavorful, and the highlight for me was the pork belly with preserved vegetables – it was simply awesome, with the perfect mix of savory and tender. If you're a dim sum lover, this place is a must-visit. I'll definitely be coming back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoEkfPJh7AxAVn9sFSp8zvSptZxCE1JTP6ylyi&fid=0x0:0x73b53554bbc907d9"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Surprising good dim sum
Restaurant opens 10 am on weekdays and so many people reserved table and line up
Service was good and servers attentive
They use silky chicken for the chicken dish caught us by surprise
It was so tender and juicy and very rich in flavor
Rest of the dishes was really good too
Free parking but must register your plate # on the book next to reception area
Must park in spots says Kirin","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuLX_LdRfDMWmuuchi9AuPeY7hM8x40TjukVdO&fid=0x0:0x73b53554bbc907d9"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"benita1009","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWt670YKXkZ3s6sN3Rt-nG_APDk6eG0MT62TK7Y561S3IDX7xtS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They are very good at meaty dishes. Vegab option slight plain

Came in as last reservation spot and only had chance to place order once then reach the last call.

Garlic pork ribs very tasty
Shrimp dumplings fresh and delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdKeM8gbCPixd_Lu66Lmn_BZI_9a_P3BDe2J7z&fid=0x0:0x73b53554bbc907d9"],"When":"2024-6-21"}]
