about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bernie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPXTBFQGy4UZogf6r0hGxUGZ8fvtwePPN5iicbAtQksaWtpwOP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Real Fruit Bubble Tea store is at the food court of Richmond Center.  Bubble tea choices have interesting flavours and they also have fresh fruit smoothies, fresh fruit slush, sherbet,fresh fruit juice, specialty signature drinks, milk tea, and fresh green tea. I loved the Mango Diamond Slush and the Avocado Smoothies. It’s amazingly refreshing with generous amounts of fruit (mangoes) and real fruits are in the drinks not powdered. The Taro bubble tea with green tea and lychee toppings is delicious.  Their drinks have excellent quality, and reasonably priced. Must try their drinks, you will not regret.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVtZlQnhVTCF0OAiEOP6GMtpq717mBqKfF656U&fid=0x0:0xf2983cf29a7130ed"],"When":"2024-2-9"},{"Name":"Brian Shaler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVanm_SU1M6cSuCRW78pg1T2oWnXPERDUCzn8bF70zKPszCwZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My biggest concern is their lack of staff. I’ve been twice and walked by several other time and there’s only 1-2 people working at a time, which could pose a problem as they are conveniently located inside a busy food court. The product itself is good.  Their self ordering system is seamless and I heard rave reviews about the mango and honeydew slushes, which use real fruit!   The milk tea was okay. I’ve had better but also worse.  Definitely going to come back again to try different flavours, I just hope I don’t have to wait too long.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwtrkHS_V2f8gAy1SY1ChfHvFnmE6v0WhgZ9QG&fid=0x0:0xf2983cf29a7130ed"],"When":"2024-3-31"},{"Name":"Neri Matrixx","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEAsQwNwiH4aesUxpapeB6lMqfjR6zx9Ff1axtQeydaL4OQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to CF Richmond center today and was planning to get a DQ shake but saw  this place and decided to try their juice. I got the small Mango diamond, about 2 hrs later I went back for the large Mango diamond. All I can say is it is SOOOOOO DAMN GOOD.  This brings me back to my childhood days in the Caribbean where we had unlimited access to REAL fruits, all NATURAL juice from any fruit we desired.
It's summer and it's Mango season in the Caribbean, this juice makes me feel like I'm not missing out. I had to call my mom in the Caribbean and brag that I got REAL Mango juice. 😁😁😁😋😋😋
It's a good thing that I work from home, because I really would go to this store EVERYDAY, I would develop some form of addiction.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSS_fvuFUP47W9ozPOuvJBfg1pduNtGtfWpWkn&fid=0x0:0xf2983cf29a7130ed"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"rocky constant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWszrstfNu5K6Xj-WLZqVyyZPrK-Lb_17AjfYlder_AeIBKxyoLZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yo! I'll tell you Real Fruit Bubble tea never disappoints.

Just trust me on this one.

If you're new, this is your plug + go to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2HtAvaY_V42J2c5LyzFEyVM4FOBWZk2CjdnDH&fid=0x0:0xf2983cf29a7130ed"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"mochi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFJ3YzQy4Ek7Uv6iuvuDDt8SDrpfRq8OqiVFgoo79K5l16GqzX4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great bubble tea! The self-ordering machines are convenient and there are plenty of topping options. The large size is very large! They use fresh fruit for their smoothies and the sugar level, toppings were perfect. This will be my go-to boba place in the mall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWqIIOg8YYLCMfMDL4JnH4zQI532DUqUm8RjMT&fid=0x0:0xf2983cf29a7130ed"],"When":"2024-1-23"},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Enjoyed self order screen with all options. Ordered mango slush. Wait a little long. But drink very delicious and you can be sure it is real fruit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXzlhany7gA3Whjfxkkwyf66XCgPQ_DmREKkKm&fid=0x0:0xf2983cf29a7130ed"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"imroze immu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMxLPq21vpmQp9MB1Qb7CO-nLtZ2t3-ugJh3dZtF0zetTFEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"i usually buy real fruit but never had this problem
on Nov 22nd that friday , i went to them and around 8:50Pm and order 7  medium mango diamond slush
usually they taste sweet and bobba are very tasty as well
but on this particular day it was sour and no taste and even bobba was raw
please dont change your taste 🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"vikashni nandni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrPidSkTC4NpXCDG18JDr174XKKyNwOEfaIHAe7ZrsqIJdo1bSvg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was at the Richmond Center food court today(August 02,2024). My daughter ordered bubble tea and were waiting for the order with other customers. Our order# was 120. Orders #119 and 121 were already handed out and we waited patiently for our order. The female employee totally ignored us even though she saw us waiting and the rest of the customers had left with their orders already. She ignored us and started washing lychees at the sink.When I called her to ask where my daughter's order was, she asked for the order # and I politely told her that it was #120. She seemed to be preparing the order so I decided to give her some time. By now there was a big lineup of people waiting for their orders. She left our drink in the machine that seals the drink and started preparing drinks for other customers. After waiting for about 7 minutes, I called her again, and her question once again was what's your order #" I told her the order # again. She did not make an effort to leave what she was doing and look for the drink. The male employee heard me and went to the sealing machine, and handed us the drink. This behavior of the female employee was unacceptable. Either she was a racist, as I noticed all the customers were Asians or she doesn't have common courtesy. I would not recommend this place to any of my friends or relatives for sure. To be honest, I have never experienced this bad of a customer service before. Totally unacceptable. You just lost a customer 😕","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jamie Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtljnytP9MzUubS0BzVaokol6FP4pb2PNW_RabgrCbwau3ZWO-YA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We came here because the other restaurant we wanted to eat at had an hour wait.
This was a great alternative!  Portions are big, price is right and food is good.  Service is fast as well.  Cash or debit only.
We ordered too much for two people so there was enough for both of us to take some home.
The seafood pancake was crispy and full of squid and not mainly batter like most other places, would recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkrLsC86OrYZN66JW-MT2woVLzUln6tOYUr_TF&fid=0x0:0x50a9c0649affa346"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Kevin (KC)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrZpzDcm4xbgvb_oOynyP_bQvwIe7l-wMoPIs8L4UeVZ-waBkO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the more affordable Korean restaurants in the lower mainland that offers excellent food and a cozy homie atmosphere.

We ordered the following (group of 4):
- Bossam (small size for sharing)
- Big Don Pork Katsu x2
- Cold Buckwheat Noodles
- Bibimbap

Each of the main dishes ordered was only $17.50 each and they all came in huge portions! The bossam we ordered was a size small but it definitely filled up a group of 4.

I can't speak for the other dishes but I had the Big Don Katsu and Bossam. They were delicious and the portion for the Katsu was huge. I also like the side dishes like the Costco fries. The Bossam was also very tasty.

One con I would say about the Katsu though is that they could have been more generous with the sauce on the Katsu. I also wish they gave out more napkins.

Overall though, for the price, this place is hard to beat. Korean restaurants tend to be on the pricier side of Asian food here in the lower mainland. So it's nice to find a decent cheaper Korean restaurant in the lower mainland. 🇰🇷🥗","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNW2BiePGgO92-k8aicvvWOFSUDQc5-ca7WfeK8&fid=0x0:0x50a9c0649affa346"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Jennifer A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVD3-LwjnLM0C0--yWQi6QqQvRFDZ-klJnrpWnkkMyFTpqeBQvx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I've been here before and enjoy the food. We got 2 appetizers (small seafood pancake and small sweet and sour pork) and a main (pork katsu) because we thought that would be a good amount for 2 people to share but the portions were so big, it was great! The seafood pancake is so good with lots of octopus pieces, and the pancake was crispy on the outside while being soft on the inside. While the katsu was cooked well with the crunchy outside, the sauce kind of just tasted like ketchup and it was really thick. The sweet and sour pork was yummy and more on the sweet side, but was a little overcooked so I prefer their sweet and sour chicken. The service was friendly but the location is on the small side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPG1P1OLovNBZjVpYvUUE62gdJwlzF1QaZBsw7T&fid=0x0:0x50a9c0649affa346"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Murphy Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDfKuZjftw89mqrvlKuskYd5Z-ul1jjz8yA8K3j8TOKqpDHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best beef tofu soup EVER! I’ve never got such great amount of beef from any other Korean restaurants EVER. The flavour makes me want to go to hell. It was as delicious as hell! I will never ever go back to this place again, because I will save it as my last meal so that no other places’ food will taste like hell to me anymore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNo1XRwQ_rDkagicK9WX0F1tlmfQ4ZmndFr0HQi&fid=0x0:0x50a9c0649affa346"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"ss LL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMYYWumBgWvAniHumATIi4AoBjcinbRrRvRVLOCBt7NFws2b2Oig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Portion is way too small (Togo orders)
Not even got side dishes.
Bowl of rice (togo) was just so much frustration.

I had to order pizza after finishing 2 bowl of rice (For Kids !?!?) and the dish.

Taste is good tho.

Don’t care much for the price.
Should I order 3 or more dishes for myself?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFMtnQXp1njz4pXAukz987xNdOL3iGwG2VfD2Q&fid=0x0:0x50a9c0649affa346"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Avery Carmichael","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVCgHf-yv12L3ZHEkVUN55ICZNsuUQkkgZqLca__LapnX-_D88=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here with a group of 5 a couple nights ago, happened upon it on a whim and were pleasantly surprised. Everything was delicious, flavourful, and served hot. Portions were huge for the price, we were all starving before and couldn’t finish our meals.

We ordered pan fried dumplings and kimbap for appetizers, both fantastic. For mains we ordered japchae with beef and rice, the pork wrap special, chicken katsu, beef bulgogi soup, and spicy beef soup.

The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive. We had a great night :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMP-RRvMfT5WpmxA7FkarYiIa-mG4_OTd7-V8CC&fid=0x0:0x50a9c0649affa346"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Sads A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8tdvByj2hpBY6ftj-Hx5puWe0JkxOvssLuSvEccJOMruKd0ms=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We were looking for affordable Korean food and stumbled upon this place. The place has a small simple vibe. We ordered their bulgogi which was delicious. The rice cakes in it was a good touch (I need to ask for more next time). The beef kimbap was also yummy and not dry. However I do not like their kimchi or miso soup. Do note that this place does not give more Side dishes like rest of the Korean restaurants do.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlJs9QxKmFJ2rYsuhbYc1kyx2uxhLktEHrf-Zx&fid=0x0:0x50a9c0649affa346"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Tommy Byun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQhlW94B8T2fhww-HWh0iFh-RYIvFitfF4mjJX2E5t_heAv3Lb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good casual Korean food restaurant in the heart of Richmond. The building & store itself is old, but the food makes up for the shabby interior.

We ordered the don katsu & fried dumpling & dolsot bibimbap. Their portion was massive considering its price (all in $10s pre tax & tip). They taste pretty good as well.
The fries that comes with the donkatsu had a string of metal scrub stuck to it, so we let the server know, and they did not charge for the donkatsu order only & apologized for their mistake.

The staff was friendly and the service was pretty quick. Hope they are better with the hygiene next time.

I would come again in a small group (4 or less) early for lunch time, as the parking could get crazy here with a lot of other restaurants in the plaza sharing the parking lot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNO5-V1l4ER2moV0bs25G4TyWK6tYlaoWVo217a&fid=0x0:0x50a9c0649affa346"],"When":"2024-5-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shery On The Move","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmAA3VItm5d-LzZjMzSS_FZs12aHSse1X5w-nXQqVmdbUvhBBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I'm a regular customer of this store. I don't have a problem regarding the food, drinks or service.

One thing i want to highlight is about the cleanliness. Everytime i come, i do clean my own table using napkin and my own hand sanitiser.  Whether it's busy or not, please make sure one staff available for cleaning the dine-in area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCcj9Uoz26MhD4Mlj7mnG1pkF_iKjn65ev3Cl9&fid=0x0:0x8fa6a3d6a117bf8c"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautifully designed interior with lots of seating both inside and outside. Right at the corner with a view of the waters across the street. Order ahead on the app was easily to do and we were able to get our drinks rather quickly. The design of this location is rather artistic with wood panels running across the store and the ceiling. Good vibes and very clean. You can even grab some beans near the door to smell.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqn4XKeHy1Id8Tfy-1Gv6pbf7COA0Jy6QW0yRO&fid=0x0:0x8fa6a3d6a117bf8c"],"When":"2023-9-9"},{"Name":"Jerry Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzcwAbf8_tnSAivbPavx6Qp0oAb2ANZwbv-A8Wr8ztzPwQLDkJYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service is always good. Organic coffee and Swiss water method decaf would be a tall order for this coffee chain.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObBsHVQ5L7duVlOBUgD11hPiSXOa9Ktflq63_u&fid=0x0:0x8fa6a3d6a117bf8c"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Chris C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8-tyUKCo3kF5n88D9uMEUPAiaN0wSbvlAHi7hWElJIFFRJstt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"On vacation second time being at this Starbucks, the first time was perfectly fine. Ordered the same. Three drinks and mine did not come with a lid. I asked for a lid. The gentleman with the curly permed hair told me that the lids were behind me get it yourself I thought OK no problem and then standing there seeing four orders with lid I asked why didn’t mine come with a lid? Oh it’s new policy but then why do they all have lids? Oh, I’m so sorry. I asked what was my tip for are you racist?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hanna Perez Ishikawa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK58YSfVd-8gBZ_er2wZo9xWiyxNEogkklkwRXlujwKg6ygTw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I go here Atleast three times a week skinny  fake blonde with nose piercing and tattoos rude a couple times which you know fair maybe a hard day? Went this morning don’t know what was up her royal petunia extremely rude. Shouldn’t do morning shifts it ruins peoples days lol","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wayne Chiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYJe72DcjmqASUSjpjI5JL7dnJnwTirAXf2MKMUKOdQmIR9RjU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"On July 19, 2024 8:00 am, I ordered 2 coffees and 2 bagels with 1 cream cheese. The young lady with tattoo on her arm failed to put my cream cheese in the bag. When I asked for it she said I didn't order it. I showed her the receipt on my phone but she refused to look at it. Just threw the cream cheese on the counter and said she didn't care. I don't know whether she doesn't care the customers or her job?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-q9dSqwMYpi4Vh6Ta7Vidw94TMKyAfzTlL55x&fid=0x0:0x8fa6a3d6a117bf8c"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Nicky M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzeS4qN8hp0aA0dJCRbv-FZ2oYnG_l6MJBY-rXmvJwZoIOYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always order Double Chocolate Frap or Chocolate Cookie Frap with extra whipped cream and extra chocolate drizzle in different Starbucks locations. However I always get extra whipped but no chocolate drizzle, or the other way around. Its just unbelievably hardly get the drink I ordered.

Steveston location is one of those who read customer orders carefully. Even though I sometimes get my order wrong too. (Once I got the Christmas coffee bean instead of the Holiday one I ordered that I had to drive back and exchanged)
But this store has better chance of getting the exact drinks I order. It’s one of the locations I go often.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODOZkexW_nmHaqbj7esL_MJ8wZZVW2Jld2e7Pe&fid=0x0:0x8fa6a3d6a117bf8c"],"When":"2023-1-17"},{"Name":"Bernell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxrE3y9NqM5w3NUCaD1WqV67H3AH69RTThmhOSYMBS9pdJnFXVSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pumpkin forever!! I love the pumpkin spice latte. Sooooo good. Great service and atmosphere. Clean and well staffed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjTgJWej4rtUctHmvyoRYaJeJYqG2n9d859vMb&fid=0x0:0x8fa6a3d6a117bf8c"],"When":"2023-9-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"C T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgS9_N3RvGRzjGP4q0CjRyk4CzxkTzB4cNEPmyEXeU-p7IBoH2mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This matcha shop is an absolute gem! If you’re a fan of matcha or hojicha, this place will blow your mind. I popped in when they were featuring a black sesame latte (yes, it was as dreamy as it sounds), and it quickly became my go-to drink—smooth, rich, and just the right balance of flavors.

Now, let’s talk about the hojicha mochi bubble waffle. OMG, it was perfection! The hojicha flavor was subtle yet distinct, and not too sweet, which I loved. It’s seriously one of the best bubble waffles I’ve ever had—crispy on the outside, chewy mochi on the inside, and full of flavor.

The shop itself? Adorable! It’s got that cute, cozy vibe that makes you want to stay forever. The minimalist interior is super welcoming—whether you’re chilling with friends, enjoying some “me time,” or bringing your laptop to get some work done, it’s the perfect spot. And can we talk about the customer service? They’re so patient and friendly, always ready to walk you through their menu and make sure you get exactly what you’re craving.

It’s become my must-visit whenever I’m in Vancouver, and trust me, you’ll want to keep coming back too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEHA6YJVhoceFj6end3lccfCIjcq2JsFKRrlrP&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Clare Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk8vaI8odicOm4apSk77_C5_lBI2gd1LxngMFranmQFokEsPvD-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The fall special hojicha with the black sesame/salt (?) rim was nice. I liked the hojicha itself though next time probably will forgo the salt rim as this was quite heavy. Will be back to try more of their drinks!

Also bought a bag their dark roast hojicha and the flavor profile definitely came through when i brewed jt at home. Strong and chocolatety on its own hence their recommendation to add milk.

Not much seating though inside","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPdzNU1O5C31s8OqpzflonWlwAs807-kgMBNDR&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"CHAN256 Family","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNqzBCXUvFYQA3YSmfJ_Vr7L6z3p03v_VYUa3Nh9nZ5zWGdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can’t find same quality tea latte elsewhere. The genmaicha tea latte + jasmine jelly was so good! Bubble waffles were super good too, even better than most I could find in Hong Kong. I tried chocolate chip & cheese mochi and they were gone within minutes. Hope we can try all other flavors next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzhYyGImC_w-Ch6lP8HDzZTR38n2e-POnmmFRr&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Eugene Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmM27LVAwUnjsRBLpVGHAAi1QmWt1PlTco9Nls_u7lduyoXIjq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic no frills matcha shop. I got both the matcha latte and mango hojicha and both were made to order with the utmost care. Drinking both you could tell the quality of the matcha power and hojicha are top notch. Both had oat milk as the default, tastes great! Some tea shops that have oat milk result in the oat overpowering the tea but this was definitely not the case here. Worth a visit if around the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqrRu0ATLHsKBGoM1QXHHPgcE7cGHk2MQhHP5x&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXclLzFOZebBq0D1P6DXbTNuAdCFzeYlMZFVvgi1A5VbWvym50Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"saw this beautiful store on tiktok a while ago and always wanted to check it out. I've never had hojicha oat tea before, so I didn't know what to expect but it was amazing! the flavor was perfect; not overly sweet, yet it had a very nice flavor. the pearls were also perfectly chewy!  we also got the matcha chocolate, and it was delicious.
another thing about this place that I love is how beautiful and aesthetic the interior is inside, and how nice the overall presentation of their food is!!
i love this place, it's definitely worth coming back :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKykzQkyK1LglVH4_8XgmdKtOxFCbTYI24LaKn&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Ting-Yu Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlodVKIQ8_dmfGPXSY9bPBrYe1KhcRgWKeM1WOBzrhDpGlDdnb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go-to tea place😍here’s my top 3
1. Thai Tea Oat (cold)
Best Thai milk tea I’ve had, usually it tastes more milky, but this one has strong tea flavor! I asked for 3 pumps of sugar only.
2. Hojicha Oat (hot)
Not many places in Canada has hojicha. You can find it here. Hot hojicha tastes stronger than cold one.
3. Matcha Oat (cold)
It tastes good but standard.

I personally don’t recommend to get pearls, they’re too soft. Also don’t get the croissants if you don’t like too sweet. Thought their bubble waffles with mochi are worth to get🥰","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONGFVJntsSTaPXCr6yZM2SsxOzNe8-ofLO2zh8&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2023-7-6"},{"Name":"Chloe Chloe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIb0YSa6wZyDpN6F0vZFHOWjsTJMmhw-oInA8MulhfzrZVG9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"this is my go to place whenever I have a crave for matcha latte. wish they had an option for dairy milk bc I'm not quite a fan of matcha with oat/soy milk. maybe they do, I was just lazy to ask🤷🏻‍♀️ I personally prefer their iced matcha than the hot one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwlQRsNe2kvoJW88K7ECTF5mi7LD_75VtqNxWh&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Dahlia Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuQgMiJgQQUWXUpX_vLBTDbbMkB1XyhSnpGj8rW2JxPqajVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the Thai oat milk tea with pearls and the black sesame mochi bubble waffle. Very yummy! I don't see many places that have Thai tea so as soon as I saw it I had to get it. The flavor was great and the pearls were good. I got less sweet and less ice which is nice to have adjustments. The waffle was crispy and then the chewy mochi. But not too crispy or chewy, a nice balance of both that was not overwhelming. The black sesame was also good.

Staff are super friendly and not long to wait at all. Atmosphere is cute, limited seating but cozy. I will come back here again to try their matcha!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOq5fyMbAH7jv4KHKkTSPwO-UL-HekI-viQNK2e&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-7-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Bubble Waffle Cafe in Richmond Centre offers a fantastic dining experience with its delicious and affordable combos. The boneless Hainanese Chicken with rice is a standout, priced at only $14.25 with a drink included, making it a great bargain. For an additional $1.50, you can enjoy their original bubble waffle, which is a must-try. The HK-style lemon tea and milk tea are both excellent and pair perfectly with the meals. Their Angus beef dry noodles combo is another highlight, packed with flavor. This spot is a go-to for quality food at reasonable prices, and the service is always friendly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYj2lRgszn_GA21_a0tKTcsoIGTkLkJlwDLtZj&fid=0x0:0xdb7a641b6d97199d"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Use the app if you haven’t. I highly recommend it for ease of comfort and finding a table first.

Chicken wings and Taiwan style fried nuggets are good. Soup noodles are good.
Nothing fancy but it does the job and you’re stuffed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMB0MgOICpxyGsbWdymmmCv35vWFODkrV1Rvfe&fid=0x0:0xdb7a641b6d97199d"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"After shopping at CF Richmond, Bubble Waffle is always our go-to spot to satisfy our appetite. My favorites here are the Hong Kong Lemon Iced Tea and the Bubble Waffle, which never disappoint. For noodles, I love the Laksa, while the kids really enjoy the chicken.

Located in the CF Richmond food court, Bubble Waffle’s rating is based on food court standards. I’d give it 3 stars for the food—some options I’ve tried weren’t as outstanding, but they were still good. I’d definitely come back unless a new and better option catches my eye.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlSKR5JmAArVU-06ZRkoUDWgZ4BCZMi0dQ7k0Y&fid=0x0:0xdb7a641b6d97199d"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Ed J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXeZmUHGpsrfi3qr7xoyOiGCM-NR4m4LSiZMraZ406FGQqkvSO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered the veggie rice noodle soup with a fish soup base and it came with Chinese milk tea. ( this was excellent) . There were only two people working so service was slow, if in a hurry and wanting for a quick bite. I suggest trying another place. If one wants there specialty which is the $4.75 waffle delights. This may take 25-30 minutes.

The noodle soup with rice noodles were good but portions were small. The price for the noodle soup and Chinese milk tea for $14.49 is fair.

Bubble waffle cafe is located in the lansdowne food court. T and t supermarket also has a smaller food court that isn’t bad to try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGFco1TW2mswc2soOuoAHeQVab6UMoQay8xtwO&fid=0x0:0xdb7a641b6d97199d"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Sarah Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8KBPpeKqlJnSuV_v0mI5I480kovh7Z9l9T0oEWz8g_Y724-M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am a person who doesn’t leave reviews, but I feel like I have to leave my experience for other customers, owner, and employees . I ordered a bubble waffle and a few milk teas through uber, and as I was eating, I bit into something hard.

To my shock, it was a stapler pin embedded in the middle of the waffle. I checked The packaging didn’t even have any staples, so I have no idea how it ended up “inside” the waffle.

I’m deeply concerned about the safety standards in place, as I can’t imagine what would have happened if I had swallowed it. I hope the management takes this seriously and investigates how this could have happened. This incident has left me feeling extremely unsettled, and I would appreciate a response from the staff or owner.

+

I had almost finished the waffle when I discovered the stapler pin.
After the call with uber eat customer service, I’ve started to feel a sudden, unusual scratchiness in my throat.
Right now, I’m seriously worried that I might have accidentally swallowed another pin. I hope it’s nothing serious, but if any problems arise, I’ll go to the emergency and get a medical report, which I will formally submit to you.
I checked another review said he or she found a staple in the soup.
*Please understand that you’ll need to take responsibility if something happens.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6YMH4Z0-awFgNJ59keeaOKw7fqmuAjIRWVp1E&fid=0x0:0xdb7a641b6d97199d"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Veran Starre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVW9RcPsbcHdTCg-Pcdf0x9DaHA5Fm0DE1X7hc4ZnA2VPIIWs8F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Bad service so don’t expect a good experience. The manager is quite rude. The food is good value but watery. If you are willing to put up with the service and wait time then it’s a decent spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAiL-ns6s_vsn2m1apYObUv_lwdW3G8MKLNDqD&fid=0x0:0xdb7a641b6d97199d"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Amar M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBQWZODVOR5EgW_ud4WGBoPZzS3E7_T_DuyVRfFsnuGSHVIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The app and payment options are great - nice and convenient.  However was not completely satisfied with meal.  Spiced boneless chicken was a bit chewy and dry.  Wings were good and relatively decent value at $8.95.  Inconsistent across locations makes it hard to know what to expect.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angelica Yee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcQojzbdV9sbLoihEwt6NQe8LJ9Oux6JR_irkYfLyJU1tPYS4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I wanted to give bubble waffle cafe one last chance, but I regret it. Like I mentioned in the Marine Dr review, I feel like they used to be better when they first opened all those years ago! I ordered the fish soup with rice noodles and I don’t mind the price being higher, but it just doesn’t taste good. It took forever (25+ minutes), noodles were over cooked, broth was flavourless, and for the price and wait I could’ve gone to a real restaurant on the other side of the mall. If you’re really craving bubble waffle, go ahead and visit - but otherwise I suggest another place within this massive food court.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvBPCJR3Lm0GOFeJS3UrhJQ_tMfGK4IUE5x9S_&fid=0x0:0xdb7a641b6d97199d"],"When":"2023-7-4"}]

I recommend visiting this place. and be sure to reserve a table in advance for any event.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5EnzoByn0L6kipSEabDDRP950fLxC2oXh9J8R&fid=0x0:0x6eed9e4aeb7a659"],"When":"2024-3-6"},{"Name":"Little Journey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlNkzOJynLpgqJCrPnrmAAn5viwim-B3Uir-26DOWxIzwcnZ0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food quality is not very impressive. The lobster with noodles was just okay, nothing special. Overall, it didn’t live up to our expectations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVSkPzrarWbDbXizKXf0Sw0dR26BU76aOWlsVw&fid=0x0:0x6eed9e4aeb7a659"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Sally","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYjadMy5T259gkmUlT3p9sRdMDrhLZLohAcAX0TlTZ6TSMTtRT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The chicken in the black truffle was served before it was even fully thawed. The turnip cake wasn't that fresh either; it tasted a bit sour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO36NoVR0DsiyhAy5o5ZnDt9ymrO5CxSiEG1bv1&fid=0x0:0x6eed9e4aeb7a659"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Kenrick Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4Qlr-7avGGG_gw-sdMVAbZ5vTLZXDpwcJ4A7g2sjiGekUnOtm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I heard this was under new ownership with a new chef as well. Other tables around us were trying the other sets options with crab. I would come back to try the other dishes in the menu in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-zI-TEMftNO4oJ1I1i92r7SOIWG5UcwbgwVZe&fid=0x0:0x6eed9e4aeb7a659"],"When":"2024-1-19"},{"Name":"For a Whale","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-cTfUA5JBJ4hR1wpe8dpL4JdFOXm9hQIvDN1B2StFNy3uPW9xcg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ok food, there’re a lot of better dim sum place out there, don’t think I’ll go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtAXAWpTBXepbd_k5LryScFt6zjfQwi318g4cx&fid=0x0:0x6eed9e4aeb7a659"],"When":"2024-8-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Lu Charcoal – A Cozy Spot with Flavorful Skewers and Sports Vibes

While searching for a casual dining option in the area, we came across Lu Charcoal, a small Chinese restaurant that piqued our interest. Drawn by its inviting ambiance, we decided to step in and explore what this skewer-centric establishment had to offer.

Upon entering, we were greeted warmly by the waitress, who quickly set a welcoming tone. Despite not being entirely familiar with the setup, she kindly and thoroughly explained how the dining process worked, guiding us through the skewer selection and offering recommendations.

Ambiance

The restaurant’s interior reflects a casual, sports-themed atmosphere. Small tables and simple chairs provide a functional setting, while numerous TVs—including a large screen—play various sporting events. The sports-centric decor suggests that the owner is an avid fan, and while the setup may not be overly sophisticated, it creates a relaxed environment well-suited to groups and casual outings.

Food

Lu Charcoal’s primary offering is its wide variety of skewers. Diners are invited to peruse the BBQ display table and hand-pick their desired skewers, which are then grilled to order. We sampled a variety of skewers, each prepared with care:

•	Lamb skewer: 7/10
•	Beef tongue: 7/10
•	Chicken gizzards: 7/10
•	Pork intestines: 7/10
•	Spicy beef skewer: 8/10
•	Pork belly: 7/10
•	Fish skewer: 7/10
•	Beef skewer: 8/10

The skewers, while on the smaller side, were well-seasoned and offered a satisfying blend of textures and flavors. Notably, the spicy beef and regular beef skewers stood out for their depth of flavor, and are highly recommended. Do keep in mind that a minimum of two skewers per order is required.

In addition to the skewers, we sampled some items from the main menu:

•	Squid Teppanyaki: 8/10
The squid was cooked to perfection, with a savory teppanyaki sauce that complemented its natural flavors.
•	Tofu Clay Pot with Rice: 7/10
Served sizzling hot, this dish offered a hearty and comforting flavor profile, though it could benefit from a bit more complexity in seasoning.

Service

Service at Lu Charcoal was prompt and attentive. The staff ensured that our orders were handled efficiently, and the waitress provided helpful explanations throughout our visit, which enhanced the overall dining experience.

Rating : 8 out 10

Pricing

Pricing at Lu Charcoal is reasonable, with the portion sizes justifying the cost. Given the quality of the food and the variety on offer, it’s a good value for those seeking an enjoyable, low-key meal.

Verdict

Lu Charcoal is a solid choice for those looking to indulge in flavorful skewers in a relaxed setting. The variety of skewer options, combined with the friendly service and reasonable pricing, makes it worth revisiting. We look forward to returning to try more of their offerings.

Tips for Dining

Parking is limited in the area, and it can get quite busy during dinner hours. Making a reservation is recommended to ensure a smooth dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMY6_q3NGSgsTVzdh2o2eQqzN0GntP3-Z0v_QEy&fid=0x0:0x18a4ba66dfd32b4a"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Megan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICR0jGe0k5gDisGrsljCpTwrEFG4uY-dATldnb1oklvcbtqVSd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love to come here for breakfast. Good hearty meals with similar authenticity to street vendors in China :) One set on their menu is definitely enough to fill you up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIfbIw4WNS6RGsqYBhtsclY5Kj9NrL8uU-cvvd&fid=0x0:0x18a4ba66dfd32b4a"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"John L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFWSJOJXURL3JBAAGk5uglgi9vPsEwfaL_BO6u2VXlAXY4ep8z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Don't come here just for BBQ, come for a good Chinese breakfast!
I haven't had their BBQ here before, and I plan to come by some day, but the reviews on Red Book (xiaohongshu) by mostly women of Asian origin were correct, the authentic Chinese fried crullers (youtiao), pancake (jianbingguozi), tofu and Dongbei grilled cold noodles hit the spot, washing it down with their sweet soy milk. Same for their buns. Highly recommend, good value as well. Came up to around 38 CAD for all the food! Polite waitress as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXgl6C_fJYMj8BQjAGBSFdRVdoC0J8PzJ7HN7D&fid=0x0:0x18a4ba66dfd32b4a"],"When":"2023-8-20"},{"Name":"Lance Hang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfUg8b-I2tLJMSoL7Xf0ARb8bhTX0tdM1v7Sz3aqE4Qqi6tQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came in pretty late (around 1150pm) but the staff still welcomed us. The food was amazing. The meat were so well seasoned and they melted in your mouth. The rice dish was good but I find that there is a bit too much rice in comparison to the meat portion but overall they all tasted delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2LUYZKw53N6SqG_0tgj4hJSruuR5rM_suskbL&fid=0x0:0x18a4ba66dfd32b4a"],"When":"2022-5-27"},{"Name":"Melissa Meng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfi_MaQwJQjr5awFnfBadZv0UHcxu-wrWjT5PFn9oDD0gq0vU3JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A tiny and clean local Chinese traditional noshery, I love “jian bing guo zi and Doufu nao “combo , there is roasted cold noodle I loved. The food size is enough for brunch. Price is reasonable. If you have a long time didn’t have Chinese traditional food, missing the taste, you should try this noshery.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9IrsjkUI_zUxHJUbMuQ_s-uHv0UHY1HHXZoLh&fid=0x0:0x18a4ba66dfd32b4a"],"When":"2022-8-8"},{"Name":"Robin Soon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVA_NgT1X0ay4VvNJA_SxxTxCxbCtmY_KSjnbh1FLaXu59YOyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious Northern style Chinese breakfast. The crepe and salty tofu pudding was spot on.

The service we received was really good as well.

5/5 would come again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8kXbfJH4LHp3jvKIPe2J3uoQyV5RuNcq-N55D&fid=0x0:0x18a4ba66dfd32b4a"],"When":"2022-6-24"},{"Name":"Tony Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMAOIBXBPyzLtUiZF7JVBpE-nVHTmrkvNxNOElHTdYMnT0YSfH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic food, reasonable price with large portion, and good service.  A lot of pay parking (before 9pm) on the street.  Definitely will return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-KL1i4ORs-q0wQOJb7bwaCTTHST0wfK0ETSTm&fid=0x0:0x18a4ba66dfd32b4a"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Nina Monnikka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDVBurTUfguvZQ_ETpdJP0Qx9KXejHHpaCUitQirLuRGAdnj8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came for breakfast and it’s super authentic! 煎饼果子 is a big portion and one order is good enough for two people. We also got tofu soup and fried doughnut - all are really good!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Tian Shi Fu
descriptions: Airy eatery serving up Chinese standards like Lanzhou noodles, dim sum, spicy skillets & more.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"MM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWf_eoAUauVhquyWtQ9QCgJ9L_ZlIXkQA7BSOgd72aI4sVlf0M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m very happy that I have stumbled upon this place. I was looking forward to visit Richmond as I missed my Chinese tasty cuisine.
The waitresses were all very friendly and helpful. I even witnessed them handling an irrational customer. I thought they handled really well especially being a business owner in the customer service industry myself. I really a great service.
Besides from that, Good alternative for late night Chinese food cravings .Service is fast and Price is reasonable. Staff very considerate and accommodating.
So the current rating doesn’t do them any justice. I hope you will enjoy your meal as much as we did.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOznK8cTGW6AfoNNcMYp-XAx2qfb9ROiamsvP8&fid=0x0:0x68ee75196974714a"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Henry Ngo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLoExKSqpSbyfyvYgTq3fqEe_ockflW881rnW5F49P7mwcYWQ0F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was my first time trying this place, and I was pleasantly surprised! The restaurant is very cozy and clean. Parking at the back was limited, so I parked at the nearby mall, which was also convenient.

I ordered a few skewers—the beef and lamb were a bit salty, but the intestine was perfectly cooked: soft, fatty, and absolutely the best! The real highlight was the dry hot garlic noodles we randomly ordered. The homemade pulled noodles were incredible—perfect texture and well-seasoned. The saltiness of the meat was balanced beautifully when paired with the noodles.

Great experience overall, and I’ll definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOeLR5kmaozryhJwsdcpBR0jVdzXTI2sLCzc7j&fid=0x0:0x68ee75196974714a"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Carolyn Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZZCzio9ynHd-pLBYTPO5R-o1l1kYM9CokdbNRkFf7Rt5zPl8P=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently dined at this restaurant and was absolutely delighted by their sliced pork with pepper on rice. This dish is the best they have on the menu. The pork is tender and flavorful, perfectly complemented by the peppers. The portion is a lot, and it's priced very reasonably.  There are many other options available too, but I highly recommend trying this dish. I'll definitely be coming back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvHoSqVpG0pcnzs2ey--Rnunp15VSakA1DfwL1&fid=0x0:0x68ee75196974714a"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Nathan Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULis9x-C7u8jouJ6bmV-m7Mb2r-esn5uJaOqGwjwAA9z2MADUV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the best places to get real food late at night. I usually get the Lanzhou noodles but I went with the spicy garlic noodles this time and it was great choice. We also ordered some skewers as this place recommends them. We didn’t get the buns this time but I highly recommend as it’s crispy but soft at the same time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDBRgSibQzKRrmo9kN2lO6tNt7r_vvfCVZopyV&fid=0x0:0x68ee75196974714a"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"James Zou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZXNcKaIpr_fSn1yuMa9ZZj9ocKraGg-BFlJngx8qdo5PIeg0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The skewers here are really good and the spice on them is not super overwhelming. The brisket soup was pretty good and you can tell the handmade noodles were fresh and grasped all the flavours of the broth. The soupless noodles were kind of disappointing and the garlic really overwhelmed everything else.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkGu8qWn1Db_VNR_P6iAkhLOIgbta8pjvcaVw3&fid=0x0:0x68ee75196974714a"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"Jaden Chong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxiEpWCCqGrGOiGV5wADT3owpZsVsxzQyxA8S-mFA9W2DfOWE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I got the Lanzhou beef noodles and my partner got the garlic oil noodles. We’re both chinese and the flavour was a bit underwhelming for sure. The broth was not that rich or flavorful, but the noodles themselves were excellent in texture. The lamb skewers, however, were exactly as I remember they were in Beijing - super savory, salty and satisfying. Not a terrible experience for the price but I would probably try a different place next time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Philip Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpYXilAvDr-q9W7S9ULcRN-Z-GtZIqTHaUlmM8DUY9Lc6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered the beef noodles and other side dishes and they were very delicious! But after I wiped the chopsticks with a napkin, I found that there was a black residue on the napkin. I wonder if it is caused by the black chopsticks. I am a little worried... It would be better if they could change the chopsticks to stainless steel!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONDYbDRQJNYLERRYHgU3yLB0VQ-11hL8PMDMo&fid=0x0:0x68ee75196974714a"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Donny M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdvBJdv09zgXFys-Ng_7XSd-Zq7kEO43o8FW4cI1On4St0UM1f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Prices are very reasonable with a lot of takeout and delivery pick-up action.

Was there once around 3:30 p.m., and the restaurant was 1/4 full with good turnover. A few other patrons were solo, and saw they had the braised beef on rice.

I shared the curried beef on rice and the Lanzhou Beef Noodle Soup (noodles made fresh to order) and had it medium spicy. Both were delicious with delicate flavours. Loved the broth.

Wanted to try some skewers, but they aren't served until dinner after 5:00pm.
A good FYI, this restaurant opens until 3:00am.

Addition:
Came back for dinner to try some skewers, and TSF did not disappoint.
Had the pork, beef, chicken knuckle, and lamb skewers over several visits. They were tender, spiced just right, and had the perfect amount of millarding on the edges of the meat.

Also tried the braised beef on rice. It's just as good as the curried beef on rice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfYVINCKC1dWWzjzLJuplheRhOZQGO7pGQ_zry&fid=0x0:0x68ee75196974714a"],"When":"2024-1-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jeffrey Dignum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBcy9wgOwUkphKaqP4bahnJB4Lyue2aCceXAC-n2AHGbEzZkBt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m not usually leaving a review but this person has beyond my expectation! Kudos to Glen who took our orders! My son’s keep changing their orders when ordering in the store. he managed to work with us professionally and patiently to settle our orders. Even his manager or supervisor asked him more tasks to do while taking orders. Thank you for an Awesome Customer Service Glen","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNc5lf0g3EwLuBVOa5u2KhV2PVeFUsX8ky8A6bp&fid=0x0:0x3205ba13c25f482a"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Daniel Coronado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7Wok1Lbp5ZwkPDltYCf4EbML5IK2dF9W9g4ARthOrTXxgOkax-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped in while in Vancouver to get some of our "Official" Canadian stops out of the way! We were pleasantly surprised by the coffee, food options and of course the different types of donuts available to us! Not to mention the cost, two large coffees and two donuts for about $9 Canadian which was about $7 something US, I believe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPxsVUOxabwkbTerKff7q8yGC56PORGDnB-TMs&fid=0x0:0x3205ba13c25f482a"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Amelia Glover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPzbKvPKixw2fn2bhrmZMSrYCMzRxDkdSWGi9Jb05c5s-R=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s a very busy Saturday especially since it’s almost lunchtime, but the staff are doing their best to serve everyone. The little lady preparing our food was very friendly when she asked if she could replace our sandwich, as they had run out of biscuits. She worked very fast despite the hectic atmosphere! Kudos to this store for providing great service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Diana Ortiz (Nana)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd7UoDX_Ek-Akz7kCAus8GC8vLoXqsxTHIG36bj2PGLMQa60O6Cg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fast service, good customer service, delicious cold drinks (we didn't try hot ones).

The donuts are delicious and we tried the garlic ones with fine herbs, which were delicious.

A good option to share and chat with friends, family even by himself","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPY_r_yjItmSI31XHP73boy_SJOeHy-5bNu2fJz&fid=0x0:0x3205ba13c25f482a"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"O B S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5-acwaSzcuibtCxkLzYSF1VQcKmzy0DgJzLAVRn0lDfG5uHfFOw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I controlled myself before in giving a bad review about this location but it happened again for the 3rd time.
I usually order online for pick up so when I get to the store my order is ready or close to being ready. The first 2 instances my order has been ready but no one called my name or my order number. We kept on waiting for my name to be called but nobody did which made me decide to come to the mobile pick up. There I found my order , coffee getting cold and no one bothered asking me even if I was already standing by the Mobile Pick up. I will be forgiving if it was crazy busy but it wasn't and staff were just chit chatting. Today, went straight to mobile pick up because I'm not sure if the staff will call me. Waited patiently and saw my order being prepared. (The counter order which i think I was about 5min ahead since I placed my mobile order was served ahead of me) I was standing there waiting for the staff up call or ask me but my order was just placed down and was left beside the machine. So I need to ask if that order is for me which was definitely mine. Had I not asked even if I'm standing there for the next 30min or an hour nobody will bother asking if I'm waiting for my order etc. So different with RC which I think is way busier that this location. Bridgeport","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"rae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXE2Ll9j7SH2Pv2LKZOOu1a9vVzagDBBZrAzHXMr1Z03rXNhk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of my favourite Tim’s I love how they offer drive-through pick up and in-store pick up. It’s great if you have a car or just walking to the bus stop. they always have everything in stocked only during the nighttime they have less baked goods which is totally understandable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was near my house I used to live so I’m always glad to come back and have a quick lunch.
Employees are always friendly and fast with orders and I like new stuff on menu like Cilantro crispy chicken bowl 👌🏼
All recommendations for this Tim Hortons restaurant…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlxYkYCfw87UmHAHrlVu3UUDC_7e3eBAs6lJjs&fid=0x0:0x3205ba13c25f482a"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Reg Belyea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLXkwhPLhl6PTOpWtztQvj60Mca6EyvG5NHU0tbTkXJ6YbgXc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped for a coffee and breakfast sandwich, as usual the meal was excellent quality!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP49MLlu4z0AjVG8WS6bvfGxWjkf_8lOkoro4n2&fid=0x0:0x3205ba13c25f482a"],"When":"2024-8-18"}]

title: Panda Pod Hotel
about: null
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jaehyun Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXe_0Yo5wEEIseEj6UUFQaV8Get5GAxTMNlwABSW1Bj2Ca4Qa6sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an unexpectedly pleasant experience! The rooms were SO cozy and clean, and the shared showers and restrooms were also well equipped and clean. Friendly service too. Great for a layover! The lack of changing rooms is a bit tricky, but you can easily change in the shower stalls because they have hooks and racks you can use.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8H5mGCguCI1BTqlqWbziTmSES9FfKci4OKN0vLbROFEIypy2-Xg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a neat little place if you're looking for a bed for the night. I needed a place for one night as I had an early flight the next morning, so I booked here. Overall, it was as I expected. The room with the pods was quiet, and they turned out the main lights at 10pm so it was nice and dark. Of course, you can leave the light on in your pod. The staff was friendly and helpful and they showed me around.

A couple of downsides for me: navigating the shower situation was difficult as there were no counters or changing rooms in the washroom. There were sinks with no counter space around them, and stalls with toilets, but nowhere you can go and change before or after your shower. I didn't want to put my clothing on the floor, so it was tricky. Also, I had a large luggage, and it wouldn't fit in the locker under my pod, so it was stored for me in a closet by the front desk. I had to get items from my luggage a few times, so it was awkward to go and open it up and take out what I needed right there by the front desk.

Overall it was a decent place to stay for the price, and if I need just a place for the night and am in a pinch, I might stay here again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carina Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSkoPKoCHLIZQpF1cK6kRvaubKyMmoX6eVM_bztS_dpi1Y9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service! It was a perfect welcome. Angel was seriously the best!

Clean premises. There was someone making sure the bathroom and floors were clean all throughout my stay. The common area had tea and coffee.

Cozy pods. A nice spot to sleep and nap. Definitely grab a pair of earplugs by the entrance because fellow guests come and go often. They had a very organized locker system. I wish there were changing rooms available besides the restroom - but for the pricing it was great.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jackietwolives","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXH9iJ8rQevpE2tBD4VHOxAuZpUBYqv7IXJyokkvVBKXRaBT8M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Panda Pod was spotless. The sleeping pods were comfortable. Safe and secure cupboards for my belongings. Lovely shower soaps and everything was so clean. The general quirkiness of the hotel was endearing. Had a lovely evening chatting with the other guests. I’ll definitely be back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joel Campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDuEAYlcV72r1tDYkjHapIA085dUJ9yL2w3eP0XgEhBc1k7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I have stayed here a few times now while travelling through Vancouver.  Pods are basically the size of a double futon (the bed is a futon mattress) and about 4' in height.  There is also a luggage locker under the pod and a backpack locker in the entry area, all are locked using a small FOB. Perfect for a simple overnight stay while transiting through the city.
There are common washrooms for men and women with showers.  All seem to be very clean and well maintained. There is also a small common area with some tables and coffee.
The Canada Line train to the airport is about a block away.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kels Debree","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAT4hv57FMx5BJa7H81WK2Rwnq3J7_agO1QLVr7fat5vkGs7Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stayed here for the Taylor swift concert, it was super clean and nice. I would stay here again in the future and would have stayed longer, but was disappointing to have inflated prices due to the event. Overall great for solo traveling with friendly staff. I only wish the towels and showers were larger, maybe a change room of sorts. Loved that each pod had a mirror and fold down table with outlets. Great for 1 or 2 nights.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"P C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1Em8_9puFevz314L9wr-AwEwD7sgKV5KFmDHJdsCv0J2qldgc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's about time a city this big got a pod hotel like most cities in the rest of the world. The concept of this hotel, I believe, is needed and brilliant. The people that were on staff when I was there are second to none. Both the daytime and the nighttime front desk people were helpful, and I thoroughly enjoyed my stay.  The pod itself was a very decent size and comfortable.
Overall, the whole facility was very clean, and I love the concept of having to wear slippers throughout the hotel.
The only issue was that the room uses only a pull-down blind as your door, which does not create any sort of soundproofing. The good news was that during my stay, everybody was respectful and quiet. The other issue was with the location of the hotel. The hotel entrance is situated on alleyway, and the businesses surrounding this hotel have placed their large garbage bins in the alley, which does create quite a smell during the heat of the day, as you leave and enter the hotel.
Overall, I would recommend this hotel to anyone who would like to experience a pod hotel and save money while creating less of a carbon flip print.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harley Shanks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3yuM-hEEIFUQHj0zIAEyDtTuhtIXJopYc94PFEB0I1Rb5f1sT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This pod hotel was fantastic. I arrived later at night to check in and the front desk person was very helpful, patient, and kind. I was given a brief tour of the space and shown how to use their locker system which felt very secure. I was also given a bag with a towel, shower slippers and a bottle of water which I felt showed great care and attention to the detail. The whole facility was very clean, from the common areas to the bathrooms to the pods themselves. The linens in the pod smelled freshly cleaned. The mattress in the pod was on the thinner side, sure, but I didn’t find it was uncomfortable. However, if you’re used to an extremely soft bed, you might find it uncomfortable.
Overall, Panda Pod Hotel not only met my expectations but exceeded them. It was perfect for my needs: I really just needed a place to sleep for a few hours between a later evening flight and an early morning bus. I wish I could’ve stayed a little longer just to use the facilities more.
Shout out to the front desk guy who was there that showed great customer service. I didn’t catch his name but he was a tall Black man. Thank you for working the night shift! Late night travellers such as myself truly appreciate it.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joanne Julia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJm_tXiOF_L1HYwmfioWTODaQDMOM4FYl_6EM6B5LJU8NK_mDCK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What can I say about Timmy‘s? It’s a great place. I love going there. I love the coffee there atmosphere they have good choices of food. Great donuts to die for and really good tasting coffee, steep tea and hot chocolate.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sunny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9fyAKm7pFni1MIgaaYssJ4Y49Mqp9AnfHXff2ge3FLPxnk4WY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Missed Tim Hortons so much! The staff is very friendly. And of course, the coffee, donuts and bagels are amazing 😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtlH4CexMas0vSBWl6GFRAfcmuXclChhNIZpzF&fid=0x0:0xb9974c1195cc5010"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Jason","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUu-aRF10e9Dcl6PcvyE1SSiwi_0uOZJ13HX4ywADoFPUAyzzs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not happy with how this Tim's operates. I've been coming to this Tim's for a while and most of the time, I have to wait a long time to order anything. The managers here don't seem to understand that it's particularly busy this time of year. They shouldn't be having one person taking and filling orders when there's 20 plus people in the lineup. It's bloody ridiculous having to wait almost 25 minutes just to order one thing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_tT85lO7aZKFfq17wWpo8ldgI_n0GJFJfBhG1nWiEa2zXCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This review is for Sheeba, the 4'9 Indian female supervisor.

I called to check that they have the Timmies Timbits pool floatie. Spoke to Sheeba, the supervisor. She had no idea what I was talking about. She kept asking me how many flavor Timbits I wanted, even when I emphasized that it was a pool floatie and a Tim Hortons merchandise. I asked to speak to someone else who would know, but she insisted she was the "only one here" when I knew it wouldn't be the case.

I told her I had seen it on the shelf, above the coffees. She tried to tell me that "it must be there still if you called to check 8 hrs ago and it was still here". I requested she check as I had only seen 1 when I saw it yesterday, and it could be gone by the time I get there 9 hours later. I was also driving from Vancouver to Richmond, and I explained that I didn't want to drive all the way there only to return empty-handed.

She promised she would put one aside for me in the office and even asked for my name "so I can pick it up anytime". When I got there to pick it up, not only did she NOT put one aside for me, there was literally just the 1 with a dented box. I was so disappointed since I had called several Tim Hortons that didn't carry it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsX4p_Scfw0dnL8dPrwf1uOYXVKYRVVUkIlIl2&fid=0x0:0xb9974c1195cc5010"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Yashwinder tungal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-mW4khkKySXGfLrhXDOK_LLBvy-RCpWsuuSL39zsNO3AjfuQC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Two girls ( Naaz & other ) simply deny to warm my food and they don’t know how to treat the customers.
Instead of service they focus on talking with each other.
Baddest service i had today from Tim Hortons locations.

Request to management to communicate with them and train them how to do jobs in food industry","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Juan Velasquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUIxcI_7xSrQjRQCJLWV31nhCAJ9HvOJF_qNkUFjpw6nlnJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's hard to mess up Tim Hortons.  Really.  This one was very conveniently located (two blocks away from my hotel, lots of parking).  No drive thru through.  My food was fine, it was a donut and coffee so easy to make.  It was odd to see that there were like a dozen and a half people in line to order with a person, and no people to order form the kiosks, so I ordered from the kiosk and the food came out very quickly.  A+ service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Deep Taggar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXT1_qCqtQFsW3fScB67Ym5eyohlA3AJaqmqgHN3Q28zagMLWFb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We went to grab coffee this morning and placed a mobile order. We waited 15 minutes and asked one of their rudest girls if our order is ready and the way she answered us, she should be fired right away. She yelled at us for no reason and ruined our whole day. I would suggest her to leave the job if she can’t even speak nicely to their customers. She has zero customer service skills and an abundance of bad attitude. If you work in customer service environment, you should learn how to keep your tongue under control. I would never suggest this place to anyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jagdish kaur Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITbgtxTMg1F6OS8WaXxCPImr-aXMJKU-qEcNyoMDWDDALQUA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The worst service I can ever get is here specially from Punjabi girls working here. They think they are real canadians and behave like they hate us. Have some senses girls and please be nice to customers and give correct orders. Complained to manager still the service is worst.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Michael Pinto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuUsiVNLyl32V5PHFxoU1ZgfDBkILgdRcPKRZMXgA47puRaTghfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stunning heritage property. Well taken care of. Beautiful Flowers & the Vegetable Allotment was the best we've ever seen.

It's a Must Visit on your to-do list.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeQfr0f_qZKf-JL4wHfneHqItVwXPYuuXxTo-o&fid=0x0:0xd501c6d26081f82c"],"When":"2023-6-29"},{"Name":"EA “#vouali”","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUF831oIrUuYcyVmu56pi-UxHRTe_duu-UHaqjsVN-rDY4cw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The farm is a nice place to visit. The old house has been recovered and is so beautiful now! We were welcomed by a lovely staff, who kindly explained to us some details about the farm's history. As the tea service isn't available yet (it'll start on June 20), I bought homemade grape jam. It's easy to get there by public transportation.

After getting out of the bus, you walk 1.6km while enjoying a beautiful landscape. In addition, that part of Richmond is appropriate to ride a bike and walk.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0TRvPiva3Rv7gNy89D9X5fVMFUQPDZkdxwIsH&fid=0x0:0xd501c6d26081f82c"],"When":"2022-5-29"},{"Name":"Anabel Pachano-Arismendi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdXXx5i129KgnE-BKBqfWbRLidcBLtoDq1qhlViyAG_LAKsOebZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful and well preserved historic house. Quiet and relaxing surroundings. Free entrance","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjzUDeOVYSqL8Q75bp_x6xs0m4CcZ9lQtCHkfm&fid=0x0:0xd501c6d26081f82c"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"cindy amimer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdhaRRjdt2F95Hg33YJHglY92Y6uThZ_6pLriCJEAXRUwgip8-DA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"London Heritage Farm is still a nice place to visit  during Covid 19, though the tea house is not available. I enjoyed the heritage views and atmosphere there and took some pretty photos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNUw9BVzIoQlFdMm2OVXUYyekkuBRcbBmDgjAU&fid=0x0:0xd501c6d26081f82c"],"When":"2021-6-3"},{"Name":"Hans Peter Hess","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXc3rLOGt4ryjOZ8LqO_2XZwUzYmlfB2spmHT86Pu9w39d7dpPL1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good afternoon tea. Very nice old heritage building. Friendly, but a little bit slow service. The actual afternoon tea is as so often is not very much and more like some snacks. We really liked the atmosphere, so definitely worth going.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFjlDMPoeQZ-K72wCdy3vEbpDinj8mEf1hd_fE&fid=0x0:0xd501c6d26081f82c"],"When":"2019-2-17"},{"Name":"Arlene T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbTNVrpbxBImb8CldrGy9HtKAiw_2Nh7ygv1QX4sgBaNCNNfxF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice little place with tons of outdoor area including a gazebo ( not furnished) and some picnic tables, no shade.

Washrooms available on site.

Farm has a lil house/museum and gift shop inside. Free entrance.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lucy U","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwzyj544BOdJ82iBBgbxb7agLnQwTT-DKuvRWd6v2OyEhybnHiuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"London Farm Heritage house has plant sale every May. Flower gardens open to public to browse throughout changes of seasons. Not sure if teahouse dining open again but gift shop should be open.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMg0NLbe4Vp1Xb_fReijeKyUGAq7a2vbM04F7xi&fid=0x0:0xd501c6d26081f82c"],"When":"2022-5-9"},{"Name":"Christian Metatron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbB71b_6BYyu3cZ6xoveog7lX2YqgJi2mdnK2HUb7ekKzx5V6I1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful beach area. It over looks the water. Gorgeous view in the summer and late Spring and early and mid fall. A great place to walk and unwind.","Images":null,"When":""}]
