user_reviews:
[{"Name":"ITwins (iTwins)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUfk9fQ2wnUPyx22p2MtHChD4th8SauoOfDx9kxsrTGIv_31wePQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"[Update: Oct 19th, 2024]

- we accidentally stumbled into their Burnaby branch at Crystal Mall one day and ordered a delicious $17.49 "Yang's Braised Beef Brisket Hand-Pulled Noodles" (quite a mouthful). It was amazing. We loved it so much that each time we returned to our home base Richmond branch, we always ordered the same selection over and over again.

- It has lots of beef brisket and, quite surprisingly, stewed just perfectly. It was always tender that required minimal chewing.

- the noodle version costs $1.50 more than the rice version - handmade noodles, they say. Apart from that, both are the same.

Highly recommended!!

.

[Dated: April, 2024]

It was fairly cheap. Food was delicious. Services were exemplary. Waitress refilled our cup of water 3 times in a span of 45 minutes. Each time we were there on weekdays, we always arrived with empty tables available but not so lucky on weekends, though.

.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIX5Vh0mRZpNfdMEkENquIHvS_VA8BoUhKdm6g&fid=0x0:0xbe71682797b46ae9"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Paul Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn3m0AZWl28VYBOwUKfmGVllVddsvt-pe4tcU6-ebIHORKGYiIPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tomato Rice Noodle Soup with beef and Enoki Mushroom is tasty. I am surprised by the service, the details in customer service here are top notch. Not usually expect this level of service In a Chinese restaurant. Overall I am pleased with the quality of food and service and will be coming back soon.

::Debit and Cash Only::","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9qk5xKORgaKZegRMJ4aY-QkUpuJOVRCV9C0sW&fid=0x0:0xbe71682797b46ae9"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Sandra Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS3d7aZA4lMhkB4lrjOTrDjB_p6PvngmeWQeM0VFHPfzqli2Uc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Our Sunday lunch here was very enjoyable. At 11:40ish, we four were the only ones there, so it was nice and quiet. Even so, we had to constantly wave to get the waitress’ attention. My bowl of noodle soup was delicious; I especially liked the spicy broth and al dente rice noodles.it was a plus to be able to get free refills on the noodles (unlimited!). The chicken gristles (cartilage) were tasty, too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7cmBduAA3wD2-juoSr5fIWKHuxLy7xtxP5sNO&fid=0x0:0xbe71682797b46ae9"],"When":"2024-3-19"},{"Name":"Thomas Zhong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJh5siSp545z2EPajiJk5Qi6-aK-HYVJRjIbiNZYJrlpVeS3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A gimmick promotion that you have to spend $120 to get $20 off. In addition, there are lots of conditions.
Ordered a mild spicy chicken noodle, tasted nothing but extremely spicy. I would give them zero rating if there is one. Will not return.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michelle Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrZc4FOCz7AcGuorZE4SGdMyBNzLpAyMERBSqnXndHoxWZ5T_e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I order a spicy noodles 川味香辣米線. Good amount of spice. You can get free extra noodles (definitely get them if you have a bigger appetite!). I wish there are more meat/egg in the soup.
Service is super nice!
Just under $20 with tips. Not the cheapest but a good mixian spot on campus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlmxcwXPcKzAeI2WYTDwgMU4TYSV1TgUuEHXH4&fid=0x0:0xbe71682797b46ae9"],"When":"2023-9-15"},{"Name":"Zhuge Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPo5epQpB8uJydI3sToJa66foIacZBCLIBYQ-6Z79DDQxjMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"- Fried pork ribs: perfectly seasoned and fried to crisp 👌🏻
- Spicy sliced beef/tendon/tripe: flavourful and opens up the appetite.
- Braised pork ribs: the 🌟 well-seasoned and off-the-bone riblets!
- Braised chicken: same sauce as the ribs, but hard to beat pork in terms of mouthfeel 😅
- Original soup: disappointingly bland; guess it's a balancer for the other heavy dishes.

Service was prompt and could've been friendlier...a smile doesn't cost a thing 😆","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGB2dW1R3ADXRe0HM4cwZgTPleBHZgYZVsyGlK&fid=0x0:0xbe71682797b46ae9"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Helen Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKI-mzgGlleZ4ePt7mDYbQ4Gabh9zw-OBKk6bKlySQQQboerA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered 酸汤肥牛米线 (sour broth fatty beef rice noodles), and it’s delicious. However it only came in very spicy, and there’s no other choice for the spice level.
Update: Today we ordered 原味猪肉米线 (original pork rice noodles) and 番茄猪肉米线 (tomato pork rice noodles) , both are good. It was quite an experience that the broth was still boiling when the pots were brought to the table, and we were supposed to add the rice noodles to the boiling broth by ourselves. We also got 炸椰奶 (deep fried coconut milk), which was also good, crispy on the outside and gooey and sweet on the inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvF3LtfOJ8ZpoqhVBYJfE471RW88LqtY2OQ1HQ&fid=0x0:0xbe71682797b46ae9"],"When":"2023-3-6"},{"Name":"Ala Baker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_9oiITvJR02vGYJsiWXvdL2jGdASXuH-QNdl3tY4g7ZphMlfGzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love it! Super delicious ... Super fresh. Good portion. Enough for big guy like me and the service was quick and easy. The best part you order online and they will bring it to your table.
Reasonable price 😁😺😺😺","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5d0hiuAr2nIT85ujfi3y8vT47S10uv6l6rtjo&fid=0x0:0xbe71682797b46ae9"],"When":"2023-6-11"}]

title: Quality Hotel Airport (South)
descriptions: Simple rooms in an unfussy hotel with a free airport shuttle, continental breakfast & parking.
about: null
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lisa L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QdVsxDWqDDLG62Q3M3dmLlHORJs5jz0NWRJO3cP21KtRNPfosO7RpofjnbUgpyNjOTDew=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"If cleaned up and made to be like the location in Levis Quebec it would be great. So much potential. The location beside the beautiful park is awesome. The view from our room was great. The rest of the interior hotel experience was not so great. Really needs to be renovated completely along with the purchase of new linens. Ours were stained and a little gross looking. The airport shuttle was good and on time. Way overpriced at $300, but I was overcharged with the employee not helping. Hopefully management will make it right. ||*Caution: Best price guarantee not honoured. The website had a lower advertised price and the employee at the front desk would not honour. I found that unexpected, but I should have cancelled and rebooked the night before. I was surprised that I would have needed to do that.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jose Oncina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOPdPWEksonVGpC3UoaQ4q3NEABdi0vHzCdLaCA-xakyspnqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Find an alternative hotel
The hotel is very tired. The lobby is in the process of being renovated. The reception attendant was unenthusiastic, not rude but not welcoming, and had little knowledge of local restaurants (this town is known for its great asian restaurants). The room was very dated and unmaintained, the bathroom door would not close in its frame . Many scuffs and dents on walls and furniture. While clean, the bathroom had mold on the ceiling. We had an early morning flight which is one of the reasons we booked the hotel because of the complementary shuttle service. We notified the attendant regarding the time we needed the shuttle and she acknowledged and noted it. The next morning the shuttle driver never showed up. Fifteen minutes after our requested departure time I asked the front desk for a status and he told me there would be no shuttle, as if it was a common occurrence. He wrote me a taxi voucher and told me to call them and that they "should" not charge me for the trip. We did get to the airport on time to catch our flight. On the positive , the hotel was clean and very well located. We paid close to $325 Canadian, it wasn't worth half that we do not recommend this hotel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuuTPp3CizvGomt-jbnMdYJHpSK65lrTu2YnXF&fid=0x0:0xb741f76f8bac8ee8"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Carol F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeYuXGoFc9HnT35lAJ46cKDIsHY7nNIKUKz_f8yINNlqyrU48jCx-4ctPzihRKgde030w=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Wanted something close to airport for when leaving BC. Our room was one that had some updates-bathroom was nice/bed was comfortable. It was also very noisy from being on ground floor street side(not noisy from airport) Room was supposed to have hairdryer-it did not, but I had my own so no problem. I believe tho the place was a fire hazard! We were going to take steps to go to garage, but a sign stated steps didn’t go to rooms-then while in hotel thought about taking steps, but another sign on those steps stating no access to upper floors! You would be better to jump out window than wait for the one, extremely slow & small elevator! The number of items that were plugged into the power strips were somewhat alarming! Breakfast was something we should have skipped-the sausage had zero flavor & the “egg” not sure what it was!! Overpriced for what you got. The good-very nice park behind it to walk & able to walk to restaurants","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nima Daneshvar Baghbadorani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIqCsUFEccCC7ZNaHn1Ln3OWivwuZMd2oKJ5jknWN6gAgSmA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Writing this review as a choice hotel employee in another province who stayed here one night, Room cleanliness did not match choice standards, If they have really changed bedding and pillow cases, how come there were lots of hair all around the bedding and pillows, The duvet cover had old blood stains, and they are still using the cover, this is not brand standard! More importantly they tricked choice system to not send me the survey email to not allow me write a review on choice hotel website, simply they remove email address before hitting check out button, then check you out, In this way you will not get survey email. What a big shame","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRLv1Y6zVCb-yDoPrtTw68lhoHmOAsLmDX_SQO&fid=0x0:0xb741f76f8bac8ee8"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Ranilo Cariño","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdk7oCs1zHaTc4Q8q5KUTvWBYcW6t4ZDgnEmL9w25Bv988qRmyHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Service, was poor!!, front desk was playing game on his phone, he is soooo much focus on his phone playing games, prioritizing his own personal gain , rather than the guests, not good. Do not use your phone in the front desk!! Take care of your guests first!!! Tsk tsk tsk.
Room was okay, breakfast was okay, customer service bad!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anne W. Law","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5PJpXxaw_sKN5DNzuGgFjmnkgzES2jNT10RrARy11C0QVu0x8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's definitely better than the one next-Door vancouver airport hotel with a bad/shitty attitude, never going back there ever again. The customer service here is super nice/good/friendly/quality, me and my partner knows the front desk manager for a long while now she is very helpful and respectful, generous enough to be life long friends always come back here for sure. One of the budget affordable detox relaxing places other than Travelodge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOc-LGHtUK9ZozItWqq9Dpuv16_aAfjkWOXsO1K&fid=0x0:0xb741f76f8bac8ee8"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Vijaay Kanna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIC3GiQ2Oz13IOWkdF7d7ecBroYgVUEvaxUHqcr1oF-oZ9A9g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent stay for one night.  Breakfast was so good with lot of items to choose from. It is a very clean room and the staff are very polite and helpful.
The Supervisor Hetal is a customer oriented person and she helped out immediately when we had a small issue in our reservation dates. Thanks to Hetal and to ever smiling Anitha the breakfast girl running around all the time taking care of the people at the breakfast area.
Lobby decor is very nice and bright.
Thanks for the memorable stay.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"surabhi patni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVhtbAAVI372avr07WYUsIqcj48fMVn5eB7etD-tE_-0Phvg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I wouldd not recommend this hotel to anyone. The reception person two of them kept on promising things while did nothing about the issues raised. The rooms acoustic were horrible ...on complaining The hotel manager was not even ready to talk or compensate by another room. The room given was next to laundry room where it continously noise and road sound was completely audible. It was a bad experience. Dnt take it. I had to request 3 times for room cleaning  but no one turned up. They said we will come but no one turned up. The breakfast was bad no options of veggie at all. And very noisy place while there is nothing like customer service. Dnt book it.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"David & Patti Ens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCrwxnBL2_VqJnEgLg0JtK_fNSDOCo9bnsDqabFska_Kpl4DON=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We stopped in after being picked up at YVR. Parking was tricky, but we were fortunate and a space opened up for us. We decided what we wanted, but no one was there to take the order. After a while a young lady called "next", and we placed our order. She got it all correct and we waited for the food to come up. It took a long time, if I'm being honest. Finally we got what we ordered and sat down to eat. The table was a bit sticky and the floor needed a mopping. We finished as quickly as we could and left.
Please go see how it is and write your review. It is not a bad restaurant, it just has poor management. That can be fixed if corporate knows it is substandard.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMk0V6D0JpAMFWauApruPp89QKNMI7S1V5haym9&fid=0x0:0xedc3ea1afde82514"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Kvlifestyle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHnupsYENa5rrbmom6kyQufxUA2ehJgar9AgudaDl3GplDeAs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I GOT ROBBED BY TIM HORTON's staff today....So today Wednesday August 07.2024 approximately 11:23am I was in line to place my order. I ordered the fully loaded cilantro chicken wrap. I have ordered this many times before at this location and other locations. The cost was $7.79 + tax = $8.18 as you can see in my screen shot from my debit transaction.  I was on my lunch break. I stood on the side waiting to pick up my order like other customers. My wrap was ready and I grabbed it, even said thank you and  off I went to my car. As I sat in my car I opened the wrap to take my first bite like I always do. Then I realize today's wrap is totally off size!! But I was on my break and was in a rush back to work (cause to have to clock back in) so I didn't bother going back inside with a long line (lunch rush) I took my first bite and had to take another picture of my wrap. I kept shaking my head saying, "there is NO WAY this wrap I ordered should be under 4"!" Then I took few more bites and my wrap was finished. I got back to work and told my manager and colleagues. Everyone said why didn't I go complain. Told them I'm on my break on the clock. So my manager approved me to go back and complain. Shortly after I went back. Waited patiently for a staff to greet me and i nicely and calmly asked to speak to their manager. I greeted the manager and she greeted me. I asked her what is the size of your cilantro chicken wrap. Tim Hortons manager replied, "our wrap comes in at 10". When it's folded it becomes about 6". I said ok sounds fair and I understand. I then showed her my photo of the cilantro chicken wrap from earlier. As she was looking at the photo I asked her "does this look like 6" ???" I then said it's like 4". She then said, "sometimes our wrap comes in smaller size." She never apologized. She never offered to remake a new wrap or refund. She then asked me," how did it taste?" I'm shaking my head and said, "taste the same like always but that's not the point here." She then said, "thank you for showing us this and I will let my staff know to wrap it better next time." I'm standing there still shaking my head?!!!!! And just walked off. This manager obviously thought nothing was wrong. Didn't care to apologize or remake me a wrap. This is unacceptable!! $8.18 for 3.5 bites of this 10" wrap or 6" wrap. Here are some pictures from today compared to what Tim
Hortons advertised. You be the judge for yourself. She said it becomes 6". Ok fine I respect that. Well here's my 4" wrap......","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNP-IepIKudCJySajvIS7RQo477KMJN1oigKTFY&fid=0x0:0xedc3ea1afde82514"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Abhinav Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6TogcalTUutmcqpgYDRoNZ4Emh_MwgLC9v6JmLIsKq1iFoA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Asked for large mocha iced cap without whipped cream. But they give the order with whipped cream and when I asked them that it’s not the correct one they just simply remove it like this as shone in the photo. This is really unprofessional. I paid full price. It’s not fair.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjVRRcqEzGKMHfwzu2hZII27AoSVc-_2DmG2bk&fid=0x0:0xedc3ea1afde82514"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Mehran bakhtiari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX52_I8QBEvpbwP2DsvccLDQ1hUjTB0qEjwNL_660Q7Wjozcaqk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"What is the criteria for hiring an employee at this Tim Hortons branch?
Being rude?
Being nervous?
If you are nervous for any reason, it is better not to be a cashier.
Customers are not responsible for your discomfort if you want to speak badly to them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrkFzbLwIJZs_lsHa_31cbhvm_jZHjE4123CuY&fid=0x0:0xedc3ea1afde82514"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Khaled Hussein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJCznp-SUGeE-QfkhbPEIky56rNsjMQDyj8ID8pF3EEbpwxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always pass by this branch during my work hours, and I’d like to mention that I am truly impressed by a girl employee named “Muskan” (I asked for her name during my last visit so I could leave this review). She always carries such positive energy, greeting everyone with a smile and remarkable patience! From what I’ve observed, she is the most professional employee there and should be in a position to teach customer service to the entire Tim Hortons team! Thank you to Muskan and to everyone like her! She should be rewarded for her excellent service and professionalism in preparing orders.

5 starts just because of her!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKFVokNn1sh194MVvRIlaePzNe5f1mJ96xYLw&fid=0x0:0xedc3ea1afde82514"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"harman sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiVtcZxfVNfYIl2d6MPEDh1SWP8IKkWsLT_d4eakXsTk6vig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the food quality of this tim hortons. I believe this is the only time hortons in Vancouver where they maintain quality of the food.
The staff here are so welcoming especially- Tamanna, Tanishka, vanshika.
So keep it up guys 💪🏻💪🏻💪🏻💪🏻💪🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_4yTWq4BRg86B4vJXorx4K2cx5FOtlmSPCmZC&fid=0x0:0xedc3ea1afde82514"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Santhosh Vijayan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILVlpBBDKLiwk83UIhNGb4rS53yC_2WSVVrNouvnltY1vogQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice service providing so far. Employees are really nice behaving. Clean and well maintained restaurant.Fast service 👍 They are well trained I think. Belpreet is very smart and deal the customer good. One of the best Tim Hortons in Vancouver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gurek Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOepGwFvzCj_BQJz6pq8drkuNvXemSg0-Z0fB5BUJOamdNHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered a everthing begal  tosted with butter and  with chipotle sauce
I told to night shift girl  to put sauce extra because last time nobody can put sauce inside my begal
I don't know why but she put like this.
Why she doing like this
She is in night shift","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv8TX9VHD02nGvXnhCi4B17oHgi5pv7dEocwvD&fid=0x0:0xedc3ea1afde82514"],"When":"2024-6-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Melanie Tam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOnCXlUyDGCRthUKehak0_GUp_az2pTQqceWOyRQ-aAN0D6lJP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Upon landing in YVR, the plan was to pick up our rental car and drive to Whistler. But, we needed lunch. When I saw that Richmond was right near the airport, we decided to make the Richmond Public Market one of our stops. It was a Thursday at around 12:30. There is a free parking lot with various levels, which looked pretty full despite the market seeming a bit empty - but it was easy to find a spot, and people are always leaving.

I think I expected more of this market and was a little disappointed. On the lower level, you have all of your groceries like produce, seafood, meat, a few bakeries, jewelry stores, kind of like a mini Chinatown. Upstairs is the food court. I was hoping there would be more of a variety, but most of the stalls were just selling pre-cooked Chinese food - the ones where you can pick a variety of 3 or 4 dishes for a set price. None of them looked too appealing. We ended up picking some rice rolls and spicy intestines from two of the stalls.

If you're staying in Downtown Vancouver, this isn't close. So I would say it's not really worth going out of your way for (unless you have a car).

Tip - a lot of the stalls are cash only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCib6uiLCSXy2KnxWb_CY7brwooKDYmTfzBhGY&fid=0x0:0x865d6e6fc9ea4f5f"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Jay C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJloNfeeRcOpx9qptklkDJcpi7A9Xac_yEGtO84jM7bmJ0Y3rE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Chinese fast food galore! Among other things.

If you've checked out the Richmond food scene you've most likely heard of the Richmond Public Market. I have not been to China, but from what I hear, being here is much like being in an authentic Chinese market with many vendors crammed into it. Along with that comes the street vendor, hole-in-wall vibe. But that is part of the charm and you are not coming here for the updated, modern ambiance which is not here.

The bottom floor is mainly vendors selling groceries, clothes, etc. But you are here for the 2nd story, where all the food is. Be sure to bring some cash and if you don't there is an ATM so you can pull out cash. Most places are cash only from what I could gather.

I went with what I'll call the "authentic Panda Express" for my meal. It was a 3 item combo with chow mein/white rice. You'll find more than 2x the entree options that you'll find at Panda. The lady who helped spoke enough English that I could understand her. I was trying to order orange chicken as one of the entrees but to my surprise, 3 options which all resembled orange chicken were all pork dishes. So I went with two of those along with a tofu/veggie choice. Also had to get one of the crabs that are on display in front of all the entrees luring you into purchase.

One of the pork entrees was really good & fresh while the other seemed like it had been sitting for a while. The chow mein was quite bland but the food had so much flavor so it was not too bad. I believe the crab is coated in corn starch and then flash-fried. Went with the spicy option which is basically chili & garlic. It had good flavor but it would probably work better as some type of sauce. One win though was the excess garlic & chili tasted good with the chow mein & white rice.The 3 item combo was a large portion but since it was my only real meal for the day I finished it, but was very full.

There are many other options, such as rice rolls, wheel cakes and drinks. It's a pretty big place but still small enough to check it all out pretty quickly. There is a parking structure which is great, but it was very busy so be prepared for that. Also, there are a good amount of tables in the place, so once you grab your food, just find an available table.

Have I had better food before? Yes. Was the food tasty and a good deal? Yes. Do I plan on coming back? Most likely yes.

Cheers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMks4TxA6aEKeAtyfHxjjRcYK8MmWCwW7Y9KgdH&fid=0x0:0x865d6e6fc9ea4f5f"],"When":"2024-2-23"},{"Name":"Pat H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLG-dNH_dxDe8COit03Fl-sr5emXwBhh0GmEAMKf9ggoHF2Jw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was surprised by the size of this market. On the lower level, you'll find a wide range of shops, from fruit stands to lottery ticket vendors. Upstairs, there's a full-scale food court where you can try a variety of dishes. Enjoy your visit. (August 2024)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCh3DxOmHCQiHMIddPSx6XhVTdTkX1QPNxLNSk&fid=0x0:0x865d6e6fc9ea4f5f"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Jonathan Erler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpp-VXD9c_3f8T0yVvw-ZvxiPTC5bPtTn4yXBQaN-7fc9BT6QA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Following the paper signs stuck to the parking garage walls and stairs wells.... I wasn't sure what I was getting into.  Then I discovered the best Asian food court I have found in North America.  I've been through Hong Kong, Beijing, Shanghai, and so many others.... This place is still better and a lot shorter travel.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rosey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKc7OTYUmBTlg7Zzd2R8gq8JOtHKn1zyKrieLmmPEH28sb1-2u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I gave it 5 stars because it looked great, but most stores were closed. Food court looks delicious Every. Item
Stopped in just to check this place out.
Huge free parking parkade","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwWFLBy1amcz-czLDytLz7TbCLCAXgGR6HkF7J&fid=0x0:0x865d6e6fc9ea4f5f"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Ed J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXeZmUHGpsrfi3qr7xoyOiGCM-NR4m4LSiZMraZ406FGQqkvSO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This public market has been establish for many years. The market shows it needs some cleaning and renovation. It has some nice shops inside that o would recommend, bakeries and frozen wonton to take home to prepare.
Overall, the Public market is close to many strip malls, lansdowne mall and the upper scale Richmond mall.
Everything is within walking distance from both the Richmond-brighouse and lansdowne skytrain station. Check out the photos!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZ4ONdA_GinBUUK_qmfv679teAzFbQSJn-FrG_&fid=0x0:0x865d6e6fc9ea4f5f"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Murissa Shalapata (Foodietown)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_vV6I4_5znOBNQ9R9iItCyliYfBCLvqjnc1DVDtCt_8XH_Jnb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I really enjoyed my visit to the Richmond Public Market. My sister and I visited one morning as all the stalls began to make their fresh food prior to opening. We were exploring Richmond's Dumpling Trail and this was listed as one of the stops. It is well worth it if you are exploring Richmond or staying near the airport.
Some stalls are cash only.
Many stalls open around 10 or 11 and there wasn't any coffee options available during our visit at 9:30 am - although parking is super easy at this time.
If you don't make a game plan you could be waiting up to an hour for your food so make sure you know which stalls you want to order from.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rongting Luo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoUuPmBkCCZ4u--x14TLCOW3fVhRv0PFZZ3T-BSlj2I0mcMQMi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to purchase Chinese groceries, there are plenty of veggies, fruits selections, live seafoods all at the ground floor; food court is locate at second level, reasonable price, authentic Chinese foods and huge potion. Cash only so remember to bring some when you go. Public market is my favourite place to go every week.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Aberdeen Centre
open_hours: {"Friday":["11 a.m.–9 p.m."],"Monday":["11 a.m.–7 p.m."],"Saturday":["11 a.m.–9 p.m."],"Sunday":["11 a.m.–7 p.m."],"Thursday":["11 a.m.–7 p.m."],"Tuesday":["11 a.m.–7 p.m."],"Wednesday":["11 a.m.–7 p.m."]}
descriptions: Big indoor mall with diverse Asian retailers & eateries, including a dollar store & a food court.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Arcade games","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"wah chi yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKBykHMUbkrtJ4cwRRXsjOnAzAcOzwrpq-XVjovUt6A3trFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are a visitor and interesting what is a modern Chinese mall looks like, you should not miss this big Chinese mall.
There are a big food court locates in the third floor.  You will have lots of choices of Asian food. The food court are big clean with high ceiling.  You can sit there comfortably enjoying your food.  The prices are still reasonable since you can get one main dish like fried rice, noodles, BBQ pork with rice for about $14.50 up with a free hot drink.
The mall is clean and well kept.  The restrooms are enough for their customers even on weekend.
There are many good shops and good restaurants too.   Take your time to browsing in the mall.
The parking is still a big problem if you go there on weekend.  But you can take the sky train getting there, it takes only 5 minutes walk from the Aberdeen Station.  You may also explore this area with many Asian malls and restaurants at the same time if you are using public transits.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPw8mCCiLpP0wUVSdempvZROoKQyDiC37UlEKHk&fid=0x0:0x2f3ab080afe6ad25"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Linda Huynh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJULBJVa4IqPnZaoD2l1RctTtz9hoxAr_VwxVSsCLAJ5ScENQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice shopping mall, feels comfy and clean. Food court seems very popular, but for sure compared to the older a-bit-run-down food courts in Richmond, it's more expensive. Convenient free underground parking connects to Aberdeen Centre and Aberdeen Square (less shops and more like offices upstairs but I recommend the food court over there to just sit and relax, next to train station)

Note: Aberdeen Centre washrooms don't have water fountain, I haven't seen any water refill station, which is a shame as most modern shopping malls have them now. If you need to fill your bottle or sip some water for free, walk to the Aberdeen Square through the connected pathway!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm3EGx3Ubo6iRKSksrrR-eQD0XK22dzy4qVtSV&fid=0x0:0x2f3ab080afe6ad25"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Ritika Taneja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0HNAqLaWKhHgkSFVq6yJKFz5k5tMGB377eM-hS0pBO8WrYQHcVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful mall! Has a lot.of cute shops and good food options! The decor is sooo festive and good 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOq6ypc-_0Scigec9Na_hI72NCtQgRWXxLfgyzh&fid=0x0:0x2f3ab080afe6ad25"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Anne D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcpvA-h-AyBmANCHdhhrDOmLepgyc7gk09U5rqfGXZ7NBfzhU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful Christmas lights and decorations make this the perfect place to do your Asian grocery, Asian dollar store, enjoy some ethnic cuisine, and check out some high end luxury shops. Free parking in the parkade.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPmgiBqVEUufUxGghkYmpqJfbwgzTyLcqkmZqP&fid=0x0:0x2f3ab080afe6ad25"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"QF Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxVFu2GV-3lcGmaVFO7eJzGdUzrPHDYs1sBILXh6RFcx1iwQi8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s a fun center with fantastic food options. I simply want to complain that there are many cash only vendors, while there aren’t nearly money exchange services. There’s one inside Aberdeen square but it was not open when I went there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNO6Rlo4AqaiEBCm4DExGUgHsYIjzhE4o76RPmP&fid=0x0:0x2f3ab080afe6ad25"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Joy Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWC-_yA3p_X742W41EdNrtxi3vJwE-8nzXlxcJ1ULn4Y4bOuMMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everytime, I go Vancouver must shop and eat something at Aberdeen centre because it is always new shops opens. The food court selection are good. This time, I tried the spicy beef potato noddle soup, loved it. The egg waffles with the Yuenyang Coffee with tea must eat! The bakery place must buy some buns to bring home. Hmart gets some fruits and instant noodles. Kids love shopping at 3rd level because candy shops and toys shops. It is good place to spend half day there. The parking is free. There is a 3D screen before entering parking lot, so cool.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwvzM-o80s5_HTnc2eRpgxD0EERuXzNKkvdcqO&fid=0x0:0x2f3ab080afe6ad25"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"S L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV3dRExUU6CcyKh7lSLVNfnclkZ3QvSxHjyu6gjmW4Ii5hPUY7lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"There are various shops to explore here. While there are definitely more options for Chinese items compared to Korean or Japanese products, it's still a great place to visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgkyCTbUvGS5ILFxiGDJang0kp9BcT4-TajvGL&fid=0x0:0x2f3ab080afe6ad25"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Lily Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-PysMooNl0NOXwWvZaR_vpt1ZigxXRTvikyLo1-sZfXup7eaaKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lots of stores, especially Asian ones, with all sorts of products and clothing to shop through.

Food court upstairs! Mall beautifully decorated with lights for the holidays and huge bear downstairs for pictures.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9qr3VpiyC-xFDFdst-ZnVwDq3PUzfRhd4B6C5&fid=0x0:0x2f3ab080afe6ad25"],"When":"2023-12-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Umi Japanese Eatery & Udon Bar in Richmond Centre's food court serves up some fantastic sushi options. The Alaska & spicy combo Maki are both excellent, offering a great balance of flavors and freshness. The yam & avocado roll is a solid choice for a light and tasty option. The beef California roll stands out as well, with a delicious twist on the classic. Overall, Umi offers a satisfying sushi experience with a variety of options to enjoy, making it a must-visit spot for sushi lovers in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGj3dPbWWNBMQ6jaQmTejtO39FqZSzIOZRjU_k&fid=0x0:0x2f3cba47cc116ebd"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Lanie Zulueta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIjacOZZNFIlv1T1yr25Te9nNNi1G78MhV6gOT7cCRO1Lr8sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tempura was okay. The rest is average. The usual food you would expect from a food court. The taro bubble tea was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQEXpDcwN_v2yH7hUQe433-ylisLvX6BD9rHMD&fid=0x0:0x2f3cba47cc116ebd"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Misaki S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjyt_oYyUqtrdwnuinykeMh-EqFySwbtCNJyjvywQIqJYE0FT6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a beef bowl to go. This was the worst beef bowl I’ve ever had. Beef was really smelly and bad taste. The full meal was not even cheap (comes to $40, not worth it at all) I was super disappointed how bad quality of this food was. I ordered assorted tempura as a side order which I didn’t even need it ( same reason above + I got some tempura-ish stuff in beef bowl. It would’ve been nicer if they mentioned it at the counter. 😢","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvyAUpieAurlvSvPsNYgIOPsmHlhl-ixlbaJq9&fid=0x0:0x2f3cba47cc116ebd"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Elizabeth Ayre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiDpPhqvi7dbdrvRS3cHHRTjZkHjOUPyHr8lAvApRm9lB-qo4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Do not order food from this Richmond Centre Food Court. The place gives Japanese food a bad name. Ordered Kappa Maki and the cucumber was soggy - they were selling yesterday's stock. The first assorted tempura was burnt and the second was not much better. How can the vegetables be doughy and overcooked? Service was dismissive with little care for customer's satisfaction.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nick Stage","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXt6lv6ikwFMvEDiYe4yox2-Nh__NTbs8a4Z__k0HsqPakq40U=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I asked before buying whether this dish 🍽️ LAKSA was spicy, the guy said a little bit I asked him again how spicy it was, he said it was very spicy.

I didn't know what was wrong, but I couldn't even eat one spoonful because it was very, very spicy! I went to the cashier and said again, you made me very spicy Laksa, is there anything I can do¿ The older woman suggested diluting it with water, but unfortunately it was just as spicy!

The result was hungry and stayed hungry
I asked if we could somehow resolve this issue.

They answered me. No we can't!

(I took it back to the cashier on purpose and left the order that I couldn't eat because it was very spicy)
I was not offered another dish 😒.

This was my first and last visit to this place!

People are not nice!
The attitude is terrible without understanding!

I could have expressed my opinion on my Instagram. I do not want to give them negative publicity.

One star ⭐️
NOT RECOMMENDED🤢

Sincerely
@nick_S.T.A.G.E 👊🏿

Dislike 👎🏻","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"KentTa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9sDh51B2GR28uJKshUftP6vtMtumYW-ozVd4mMEHsPMyVCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The bento rice was okay. It was served hot.
Sushi is fine.

It was just a little bit too expensive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCI-n0xAAT5kZ0O_SkbuvkRqouvXLP7gNsmyWQ&fid=0x0:0x2f3cba47cc116ebd"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"jake tsui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpVYRgSx-5b0oECCSwthhXIG9ckJ_me0SnyWBRL1WBYBAB62Rtog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Zero to One star. Take a look at the picture. No, I haven’t eaten it yet. That’s how it comes .   It is not even half full looking and does not look appetizing.  Should’ve read the reviews first . This was $13!!

I walked by here all the time and decided to stop here today.  I won’t be stopping here again.

Ripped off","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPptk7H5AYvooNrfbxJ1iamaEUvZg7jIbHeGY_i&fid=0x0:0x2f3cba47cc116ebd"],"When":"2022-12-31"},{"Name":"J Edwards","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwsvPUWpWykBXHFHKokFEUVcz6yp3KnFSm5wlIqwHS3PPP9lyjyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The chicken here was piss poor quality. Tasted like it had been frozen and reheated a thousand times before it got to me. It disintegrated into paste in  my mouth. When I opened Google and saw the 2.5 star rating it was already too late but it made total sense.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Executive Hotel Vancouver Airport
descriptions: Traditional accommodations, plus a rooftop gym, a heated indoor pool, dining & free airport shuttle.
about: null
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Teresa P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeCck1CfANpZm9bBk3PHtP97Kh9k25HZfvq9yAWlN3BaIyjSHUPEfWkhAJmuYiJsH-_6g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"If you’re looking for a place to rest your head without any distractions—like functioning showers or a courteous front desk—then the Executive Hotel is just the place for you. However, if you're expecting a bit more from your stay, prepare to be disappointed. I've stayed here more times than I’d care to admit, mainly because it's the designated spot for our sports team. But after two years, I've learned my lesson: next time, we're booking elsewhere.||My optimism for improvement this year was, at best, cautiously optimistic. Spoiler alert: things have not improved. The shower heads in every room (and I’ve been in many) still leak like they’ve seen better days, and that’s assuming you even get hot water. In fact, we've had to switch rooms twice in one evening just to get a bed that we didn’t crawl into after midnight. The first room had no hot water and a shower head that looked like it belonged in a bargain bin, and the second? Well, it had hair on the bed, grime in the shower, and stains on the sheets. Not exactly the luxury experience you'd hope for after a long day of travel.||Now, let's talk about the front desk staff. To say they’re “not exactly customer service oriented” would be an understatement. They’re defensive, impatient, and seem to be stuck in a never-ending loop of \"Sorry, the manager isn't available,\" which is probably their catchphrase at this point. Meanwhile, complaints are piling up faster than a leaking shower head. On check-in day, I witnessed a call with another guest on the courtyard side struggling with hot water. Thankfully, I had the foresight to book in the tower, which, although pricier, actually delivered some working hot water—assuming you can get it through the dollar-store shower head.||Ah, the Executive Hotel: where the check-in procedure is as perplexing as the state of the rooms. You haven't even set foot in the door, it's the day before your travel 'BING' you get a notification that your card has been charged for your stay at a hotel you haven't even arrived at.. but then you arrive at the front desk, tired and hopeful, only to be told that they also require you to pay - up front - the remainder of your stay plus a $150 damage deposit (I don't think the $150 is going to do much for these rooms kids). That’s right. Not only are they charging you in advance, but they’ve also managed to perfect the art of making you feel like you’re staying at a place so shady, even your wallet might hesitate.||One can only assume that this quirky prepayment tactic is their clever way of avoiding those pesky “no-shows”—you know, the type of guest who might flee once they’ve seen the state of the shower, or the bed with more hair than a wig shop. But really, it feels more like they’re preparing for the inevitable moment when the room’s plumbing fails, the bed feels like a slab of concrete, and the shower turns into an indoor water park—all at the same time.||It’s a bit like booking a dinner reservation at a restaurant and paying upfront for the meal before even looking at the menu, but with the added excitement of knowing your meal might arrive cold, undercooked, or covered in stains. A great way to avoid getting stiffed, but also an excellent way to ensure your guests will definitely not be coming back.||As someone with over 30 years of executive-level travel experience, I've stayed in budget motels across the globe that have been more modern and better maintained than this place. (Yes, Motel 6 in the USA—I see you.) The ownership really needs to step up their game. I’m not even talking about a major overhaul; I mean the basics. Fix those leaking shower heads, re-grout the tiles, re-caulk the tubs, and for the love of all that’s holy, level the refrigerators. It’s not rocket science.||And here’s a thought: maybe hire a night manager and a maintenance person who can actually fix things right now instead of offering endless apologies. A simple “I’m sorry, let me get this fixed” goes a lot further than a weak “I’m sorry, but…” when you're a weary traveler who just wants to take a hot shower and collapse into bed.||I am only giving 2 stars, because at least the ceiling didn't leak.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kathleen R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QdCjMUwIiBikRhCLHgN_0vyGAo1GvT8DEukiKQb1ujC_eFsFjYrQ0OvLoSxPtqmCdgvFA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"The room was clean as was the hotel.  It is a lovely hotel and we would stay there again.  The price was reasonable and the hotel staff were very friendly and helpful.  The hotel has a lot of character and is nicely decorated.  The bed was very comfortable and extra pillows were greatly appreciated.  |We arrived late and left early as we were just traveling through to return home.  The only drawback for us was the hotel-airport transfer does not run after 12:30 am and our flight arrived at 1 am, so we had to take a cab.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Heather M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QdcKHisBXAOJmIugCgnKbcAscQkQI1t40WdQAMXk1g3ttzWj18FtKnHxNeSUm5OfHPMtQ=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"We came into town for Taylor Swift and this hotel did not disappoint! The staff were SO friendly especially Vinny who upgraded our room to the penthouse suite and was so so accommodating! The attached free bird restaurant was amazing as was their staff and the included breakfast was absolutely delicious! Pillows and bed were super comfy and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christine P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeYuXGoFc9HnT35lAJ46cKDIsHY7nNIKUKz_f8yINNlqyrU48jCx-4ctPzihRKgde030w=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I should have checked the reviews before it was too late to cancel. The room was 50 degrees Fahrenheit when I entered and took over an hour to warm up. The floor was sticky so I kept my shoes on or scooted across the floor with a towel. There was visible mold on the bathroom walls and shower grout lines and the bathroom door does not shut. Honestly, the breakfast at the attached restaurant was the only good part besides the friendly airport shuttle driver. But you get what you pay for I guess.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Blake M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QfHhPp0vyvo1Wo3WY4NH1G5QOPAHGBMv_XiebXLZtHzVwVa3wkRhb3dykyKrUCZPlawDA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Everything was very nice - exactly as advertised.  Front desk staff was friendly and helpful.  The room was clean, and the cleaning staff replenished what was needed.  The gym was well equipped and the hot tub was a nice touch, as it was cold the weekend we were there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Garry A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QdHDxxyBDO6igPA51sqxYAI1TTeuGvapT1sWSCJfPSgzOZltNlMhWmUDpj2A3v7zAw89g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Great service great people. Always a pleasure work with such a great group of professionals! The front desk greeted me with such warmth and the event and catering staff were always there to assist me with my needs. Everyone is so welcoming and eager to engage. I am looking forward to future stays.|Garry","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hank H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QdcKHisBXAOJmIugCgnKbcAscQkQI1t40WdQAMXk1g3ttzWj18FtKnHxNeSUm5OfHPMtQ=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Very efficient and friendly front desk staff.  Clean and comfortable room.  The in-hotel restaurant and bar was also very nice though the food was slightly over-priced I thought.  It was also great to have the free shuttle bus to and from the airport.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emily S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpYy7CKQzmREOYPUafOz73WoBx3VEC-079Fy9mLCaqZrQQdqqSAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very impressed. My partner stayed here for two nights Thursday-Saturday, as she attended a concert. The airport shuttle was on time and FREE. This was a huge plus. Also we opted for the breakfast voucher. She had supper and breakfast at the restaurant which was delicious, the portion sizes were huge. The room was one of the newly renovated King Suites, it was beautiful. The room was huge, the bed was comfortable and clean. It was evident there was pride put into preparing the room as well as the front desk staff were welcoming. We will be returning to this hotel whenever we are in the Vancouver area next. It is also close to shops and the sky train which was a huge plus. Strongly recommend this hotel!!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Sheraton Vancouver Airport Hotel
descriptions: Unassuming rooms & suites, plus a bistro, conference space, an outdoor pool & a fitness center.
about: [{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"LGBTQ+ friendly","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sara Shen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKf3okGBgXbWxqqK-5KgUs4lZ5EjKmj9Y9jEefSBTWbN073jEIJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice hotel, very accommodating. We arrived 3:15am, and front deck gave us late checkout 2pm.
Had a brunch at the Restaurant inside, chicken wing is tender and delicious, like the butternut squash soup, bread pudding.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuvzZkgpyeJlHIXQI5a_gcHxsjIZ9ejqKu41yX&fid=0x0:0x490b7f4e91d53016"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Michael Louie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7g69eq-5K41lTnfpoaiwBtzwqTuk6axTScV5ZkBAZcyTx44WZsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had a hockey team stay here with blocked rooms. For some reason we were put in the south tower and the rest of the team in the north tower. Our 11 year old daughter was quite emotional being separate from the rest of the team.  We attempted to move and they said the hotel was at capacity and couldn’t move us. We arrived at 3pm on Thursday and many of the team later that evening. I know other teams in the hotel came Friday and were mixed in both towers as well so could have easily had us in the same tower as the rest of the team. Brought up our concerns a second time and involved a manager. The manager said they could move us but this was at 9:30pm and was a pain to move at this time of night. Hotel was okay but definitely cannot handle a capacity load. Pool was out of towels on several occasions and our team couldn’t get out of the pool and had to wait nearly 30 minutes for towels. Wouldn’t stay here again, especially if full and/or with a team.
Rooms were dated. No fans in the washrooms so the rooms are very humid and eventually start to smell. Balcony door was very hard to open and close and lock. Not great value for the money.  Expected more and better service and common sense putting teams together especially booking that far in advance as a group.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Howard Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsAfm3230w0dAJLBZ8o_p2XLMkilppW9IqfpzIAqGS_PMu1RRt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm so glad they are back open after many months of labor disputes.  The staff here are always friendly and accommodating.  Rooms are spacious and clean. Everything you need is on site. The restaurant Harold's is fantastic with great staff as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBgaY9yQOhlcgjeXFEhR3-pxu0K00Yej44eQmZ&fid=0x0:0x490b7f4e91d53016"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Jody Lauzon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIeyf8AqL7MwIx78ctMQIhrJjhGEj0uMD_KxjS_NYyLlStj8A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Marriott Elite member. I don’t put in reviews but I have to share, parking is terrible, restaurant has good food but the way they seat their customers is a managers nightmare. One person in a booth that sits 6-8 people. All the booths had one or two people sitting and that’s it. Scattered all through the restaurant. I was so turned off that I left because there was nowhere to sit with my colleagues. Power outage for 3 hours and they couldn’t get the generator running. Cold, no lights or food. I put in a 12 hour work day and came to the hotel to relax. Instead, starved, froze and could not sleep. Also, my room has a sliding door that cannot lock and wind blows in on windy nights.
Staff was great and the restaurant food as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Justin Were","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWowWirZKVDq5SAE93oFokfBoyfocqPefuSmWd1E7dgO5lTxvHI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very nice hotel. Our room was clean and quite big. The guy at the front desk could have smiled a little more. Dinner in the restaurant was kinda expensive, relative to other meals we had. Short walk to the sky train, so easy access to downtown.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matt Sergent","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaHV3UUKhRbixYd2btsO5IzT47ZfskfJV3SYuMy3rmMhZBltF4sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service is always great here. Rooms are starting to fall behind but they have one of the best media options on the Tv around. Unfortunately the mall across the street feels empty and some surrounding restaurants have closed.

The restaurant at the hotel is fantastic.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Margot Haldenby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIK1cgdqELuN2pxslImFk9JjUTe5UDJWFXg41qaCtw6oV5XZ2E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When Air Canada cancelled our flight from Vancouver when we were AT the gate and couldn't get us on another flight till the following afternoon, we thought we were doomed to a night in the airport.  But, no! They gave us a hotel voucher for the Sheraton Richmond and we were very impressed with the experience! The hotel staff were friendly and very helpful, the breakfast (also on an AC voucher) options were many and the eggs we ordered were very tasty! The outdoor pool was great, if quite small. It is set in a tranquil, treed garden with vivid blooming geranium planters sprinkled on the c property. The room was basic, clean and comfortable. Please add 1-2 outdoor chairs on the balcony.  There was no furniture to sit outside on and enjoy the late-evening summer dusk and mountain silhouettes.  Otherwise - perfect.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JW P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSEGTLYjcYOjcWO30EpJfVKjHgA9RgPTzI0mfyWj3lL-ZPbTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very warm welcoming staffs at counter.
Nice in room condition. Temperature is perfect and absolutely cozy(If you feel cold, turn control panel to warm mode).

Location is perfect, as big mall is 1 block away and nice restaurants around the hotel so no need to worry about food.

Uber drivers came right in front of the door.

Satisfied with everything and overall service.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Patisserie Fur Elise
descriptions: French pastries & other desserts along with afternoon tea in a Victorian house from 1893.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Just Me Traveling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX18amg9WNM9rF8Fs9axj8FE9tNtrVpXPgaMIl0yMbfuZ56ahzt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went here with a friend in a weekend. It was a nice experience. The place was not that big but it was cozy and nicely decorated for a tea time atmosphere. The service was great and the staff were really nice. I enjoyed the selection of the tea time items both sweet and savory. Initially I thought it will not be enough but we ended up taking home few pieces as we weren’t able to finish it.My favorite among all the items is the panacotta. It was so smooth and creamy, the panacotta that I’ve tried so far.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYH34p3QsdjlvDK-acGyCkQFQnrfQtYPLkArM_&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Lucy Animator","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY7brXamElnS01fAQfTXCPF3JSbsNMYZuWBhl1ILRqSsdPDqE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Omg! I can’t with the beauty of this place!! We had the high tea experience and it was amazing! The food is delicious -everything so tasty-all of it!-, the decoration is perfect, the atmosphere so enjoyable and the staff do a great job! I really have an incredible and dreamy, amazing day with my friend. The music is pleasant and at great volume for a conversation. We enjoyed the downstairs store as well, everything is so pretty!!! 😍
I’m in love and definitely will be back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmdY1jFbLnA_1y63RI44_okSEwhX9KcYA5mZc&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"leesa tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWsWaHyhzcw7kKPh9V3HkvTK5TTa81TdmCDp9IylYllx4puXIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little place to come for high tea. Love the exterior of the building as this restaurant is basically located in a house.

Overall the food quality was decent for the price as it is cheaper than other places. I liked the teacup pots as well. The peach tea was my favourite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYCHI_Ln4imSRzm47Xen3BHj7iBlS8K1NaP_Ih&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"Kwong Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRNhrcdIOQyhkpCbdjoUSwC0OqkPEp5C09o-KZX9pyAsIQioX9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"🍰☕ Enchanted Afternoon Tea at Patisserie Fur Elise with Family 🌸👨‍👩‍👧‍👧

🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 Our family's weekend afternoon tea at Patisserie Fur Elise was like stepping into a storybook. The Victorian ambiance, paired with exquisite pastries and teas, made for a magical escape in downtown Vancouver. Each treat, from the delicate sandwiches to the sumptuous sweets, was a delight to the senses. The kids were enchanted by the elegant setting and the delicious selections tailored just for them. It was a memorable experience that blended sophistication with a warm, family-friendly atmosphere. A perfect blend of culinary excellence and ambiance that we'll treasure. 🍴💖","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5OpGh-Q-O2VsOAsybvKAsddu1fiZqSEuYMOBz&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Juliet D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnoiyKu2IE_QmMxqN8laqTB256R_5tMjahRejoR1AKjSVbkXHS9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very aesthetically pleasing place to visit for afternoon tea! An oasis of Europe surrounded by high-rise buildings of a busy city.
Good service, good tea, delicious food. Not like a luxury high tea experience from London but more like a cozy afternoon tea with your grandma.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMn_jhtqS54pV8SdhFNEX2aAyrO3T9LDfD9c3tf&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-5-7"},{"Name":"G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKy_RY7OyFpWDMGpBPfEcNdhNvd_Bt7gU5qWs4wH5XumgCFAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little gem of a place. Food was good, not amazing as other high tea places I’ve been to but not bad by any means. Service is lacking for sure. I’d definitely focus on that sore spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9yH3CvLCkxI5RVd3r14sF1t5LBQbjWhP15FPl&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2023-11-30"},{"Name":"Ananda Enkhtur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkkmVVa6j0bCuttopPInRikVrpr7LXYSHoZtWk3dhng__J_lZi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Incredibly disappointing experience, even giving 1 star is generous!
We had high expectations for this place from the pictures but everyone in our group collectively agreed with how bad of an experience it was. The lack of decent customer service and hostility is a start. The lady with her hair tied back was very passive aggressive and rude with us, almost as if she wanted us to leave the moment we entered the place, which made us really uncomfortable! The atmosphere and the interior is nothing too special, there are other high tea places in Vancouver that are far better than this one. The tray that is shown in the picture is shared between 3 people but is 60$ after the mandatory service fee and taxes. You’d be expecting a lot more for the price you’re paying but sadly the tray only included 1 sandwich per person that doesn’t even taste good and the sweets were either too sour or too sweet. First and last time coming to this place!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcVdOrQNlM_2uKWafjxgLu-J5wDwi2Bnahdsb7&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-2-20"},{"Name":"D D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn-HmKGkiEXpPYEJdaFnX-Wk9npBuMky8Sv8ZSJcapzQOOPiN3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute and charming afternoon tea in a heritage building with gorgeous decor. 1pm on a weekday we were the only people there.  Food was delicious.  Service was a bit of a miss this visit ... the first server was lovely but the second server was not attentive at all.  After 2 hours we struggled to get her attention to pay for our meal as she was on the phone with someone trying to plan a large gathering.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2OxlfzKkRS5I_bv3f5wczsc2eIOij2B0R5L6w&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2023-4-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rana Minab","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8osZbV1VtasJDtJxiKFG30x1VvN7FT221sOkNz7n1clpPWain=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a wonderful, family run tea shop. They are very knowledgeable and friendly and have fair prices. Lots of different options for teas that make great gifts as well. I’m excited to go back and get more tea once these run out.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Timothy Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLM6BteENFFjJECr5q4XM115MILipARHB_TqdKJGOZYMglXRg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owners really know their stuff! They have a wide range of oolongs and puerhs. I went in not knowing what I wanted and came out with high mountain Taiwanese oolong

Thanks Dominique for guiding our tea tasting","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmPgKstYO3LHXsWVf0uNknO2UrMuNOeUcdSwLf&fid=0x0:0xa60da8233fb802ab"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Hannah R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfnAphU1SUXdC5G6gX2NYm214dsxQptJ3YH3z68mmnXkQweKUMHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Aroma Tea House is a hidden gem that offers an unforgettable tea experience. During our visit, we tried the Jasmine tea and the Da Hong Pao, both of which were exquisite. The highlight of our visit was undoubtedly the exceptional service provided by Dominique Yan. Dominique was not only personable and funny but also an outstanding host who made our visit truly special. He served our tea at the perfect temperature, ensuring that every sip was enjoyable. His Chinese tea etiquette was impeccable, adding an authentic touch to our experience. If you're looking for a place that combines great tea with excellent service, Aroma Tea House is a must-visit. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCBSPG37DZ5J_6-AIExsyboq40ojhQqPKU6TFn&fid=0x0:0xa60da8233fb802ab"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Disha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLehHjACGHxXk84KqsAE08mF0CnzmfwwLWI49W69Yp6LKS-FA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I walked into the store, most often having drank bagged tea, coffee and milky drinks from Starbucks. With very limited exposure to loose leaf teas, I did not really know where to begin. But Dominique's attunement with tea helped me discover teas that were *just* right for my palette. It was in my first sip of the first tea that Dominique introduced me to where I had that Aha! moment. Drinking tea with Dominique was more than the act itself, it was a glimpse of a lifestyle, which was truly refreshing for the spirit!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bianca Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjlIiSla_YfmuKaJiceOLXQVdHyC1ne2upZrkSAFv7b4f4CX5J=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Short version: This is an amazing family-owned authentic tea shop. They have over 200 types of teas and they have another family-owned shop based in HK. Ask about their speciality teas because they are truly tea experts. Don’t just get the basic stuff!! They accept all types of payment. You MUST come visit if you’re in the Vancouver area and you like tea.
—
I grew up drinking tea with my Uncle as a kid in China so I’ve been a fan of Chinese teas for a long time now. As an adult, I’ve been learning more, but shops like these intimidate me because my Cantonese/Mandarin isn’t great. When I came here, I was greeted kindly by the shop owners’ son. He was so welcoming and let me try all kinds of new teas. He explained the story and history behind the teas, his family’s shop, and gave me tips about Vancouver too. I learned so much and it felt like chatting with a friend. Later, his mom stopped by and she was super nice. They love sharing their knowledge and letting you try new teas.

I’m sad I don’t live in Vancouver, but I will purchase their tea online from now on. I will be back the next time I visit this city!! This made we feel welcomed in Vancouver as a visitor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOH61IKMFdbY_SChWEa60KFJech4HanryxNi2KB&fid=0x0:0xa60da8233fb802ab"],"When":"2023-9-24"},{"Name":"Kenneth Xu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkHG-YZJT1A0e2r160McuRKbbS6ZTSYWzOKOG27DL3MM_qD5au=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favorite experiences at a tea shop. The selection of tea was very wide and at a fair price. Dominique also provided excellent service, allowing me to try out several teas while at the same time teaching me about them. Although I am not local, I look forward to ordering from their online store.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Simon L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWC0zQL6UZOSMX25id4oWvss3Ml7IDzVRG0Otr-hJf-87BjawWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As someone new to Pu-erh tea and from Toronto, I wasn’t sure where to start, but Eliza was incredibly helpful! She took the time to ask about my preferences and guided me to Bulang Mountain Raw Pu-erh, which turned out to be perfect. You don’t find this type of personalized service in the city, and it made my experience that much better. Highly recommend both the tea and the exceptional help!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fabiola García","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCUCLEe1zYZQS5kprWcaPTt_To3IXLv1rv1lztD1OaGm2aBcnR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I traveled to Vancouver from Mexico and I had the opportunity to try this exquisite tea. I have to say that I used to be a coffee person but after trying different teas and because of the patience and knowledge of Dominique to offer exactly what I needed, I’ve become a tea person. I can’t wait to travel again to Vancouver and try new types of tea from this place!!! Strongly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Butterfly Tea And Dessert
