user_reviews: [{"Name":"Bridgette H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRuBIdlotS2aMsoe_Jizf_DQ_CDwtpvFqL7RgLCIsvMlK4drGqfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a fabulous Bubble Tea place to celebrate kpop and different kpop groups! The drinks were  tasty, and the drink names were so cute. This location even had a \"Draw TinyTan workshops\" for people to attend. I enjoyed my Love Letter drink, meeting more kpop fans, and enjoying the different types of merchandise you can buy of your favorite member (Suga ❤️). I definitely recommend this place because the owners are very friendly and attentive, I've never met such nice owners until coming here! Definitely check it out, I will be back! Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVUNhFwLL1Bs6PwQTS-xJYbXcQNWYkSU5koTd7\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e38f7cd955faa42"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Ananya Ganguli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjiw3IStZFPmsvz7lWeBHDuLLWteB1GY36TEB5CjIpTpVRo6KLYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for bubble tea, meeting more folks who love k-pop, or simply meeting new people. The owners are amazing people who are kind, warm and super welcoming. I have made some really great friends here!! Highly recommend a visit here, especially during one of their special cup sleeve events. The activities are super fun!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_PCJz4EB8HnVbbki8hPcmzmx0DAWgpcL78FW3\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e38f7cd955faa42"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Ricca lorraine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdxC64NIk4pwSQkRh22dNWBLtlGhl52MzXJT_5uKEI1Ghxmw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As an Army, I feel really welcome! Delicious good and drinks. Very nice people. Doesn’t take too long for drinks to be prepared. The owners are very kind to allow us attend our online classes in their shop. We really enjoyed the event! Will surely come back. Many freebies too!! Affordable drinks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3NeTjBdt0aUbrXMD5ZCXbi6wwaWTrdUP8Zj1u\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e38f7cd955faa42"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Lucy Lei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWqMDQPy8Rdj2ck6AFqBEF6oKEHn-aaEjadtV4H6wI1nduavxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely owners running this cute shop! We were pleasantly surprised by the k-pop decors and themed-drinks. We got the fresh peach slush with agar pearls and it was delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLxA-siQc3VWVVeAnKcQamMoPYyV9RzydtcNIm\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e38f7cd955faa42"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Dee Dee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDibdoqzPqSAOO5o2CHGhWRvYBKUw4cYIh69IhKASqhxbJnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My absolute FAVOURITE place for my bubble tea fix! There are always new flavour combinations to go with the different feature events that are hosted! The owners are AMAZING!! They are super warm and welcoming and make you feel like you’re family. Butterfly is a spot I appreciate especially because of the efforts put into fostering a community. The owners are beyond generous and I would highly recommend visiting!! Chances are it’ll become a second home like it’s been for me and my family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIB-IzvtmSfGwe4x-OplTXE1sheh0wr0OyGWlk\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e38f7cd955faa42"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Maya “LeeFelixBbokAri” K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYBnEsSq1HexhyCxFWK00eZtS7dYSP5VDiGKWsfPAOPV24urw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"GUYS 😭😭😭 this is literally the best boba place I’ve ever been to it’s not even funny. I left the shop giggling and jumping up and down I was so excited and happy especially since the whole place was K-POP THEMED!! 🙈 I was there right before they closed and the staff was so sweet they even gave us an extra drink which was very delectable. I got a BTS magnet, a Jungkook photo card, and a BTS photo for free. They had this really cute spot in the shop where you can take pictures with BTS props and a background I loved it SO MUCH. Stray Kids is my favorite K-pop group and the owner said that they were going to have a Stray Kids event in a few days and I was absolutely heartbroken that I couldn’t go because I’d love to see it. Also, I felt really welcome there and I felt like I already knew the staff because they were so kindhearted and lovely. For the drinks, I got a passionfruit black tea with mango popping boba and coconut jelly lychee (WHICH WAS THE BEST BOBA DRINK I EVER HAD), a passionfruit black tea with mango popping boba and mango stars (really delicious and cute stars), a passionfruit green tea with mango popping boba, and two mango smoothies. Everything was so yummy. Also, the staff is really generous with the amount of toppings they give which is 5-STAR (Stray Kids reference) behavior right there and that’s one of the reasons why I love them. I’m gonna be honest I never write reviews, but I loved this place so much that I just had to. By the way, they had LE SSERAFIM, TXT, BTS, ITZY, seventeen, and other K-pop group themed things. It was so cozy and adorable🫶🏻🫶🏻. All I have to say is that I COMPLETELY RECOMMEND THIS BOBA PLACE BECAUSE ITS THE BEST ONE EVER!!!! 😘😘 this place makes me want to live in Vancouver 😛","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDPoJ_UbLHHm9n5q97c0bkyvmDKPpsZ2uTDQjH\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e38f7cd955faa42"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Moses Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqP9o2Mxh1TbUgGeu8SzUgOoEYSltQvoNI1vKtAa_4jpobxCL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great bubble tea spot!! The owners were lovely, drinks fresh and delicious, and lots of comfortable seating. My girlfriend and I loved getting the specialty drinks 😄 Can't wait to come back and try new boba drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPk7c17C0Ar84BlU9HcTGfFUqkaNJrmrXiijnSf\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e38f7cd955faa42"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"JP MSanchez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwCsyCTngmvgtII5Vy6yHPjOAaFbc6157t7tjFNjsLT68PH67uRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a cute place, came here for a BTS event.  Loved the story from the owners why they have this shop.  I love family small businesses.  Loved the special drinks for the event.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOVYHulaGJMQAnrMDjRgB1_vNzdBhnU2D5BvCh\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e38f7cd955faa42"],"When":"2024-6-15"}]

title: Snackshot Marpole
descriptions: Basic dessert cafe whipping up imaginative Hong Kong–style treats, along with sweet drinks.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"In-store pickup","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Erica Ngan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxiFAMX-8U6Hf7I7ySV2AT1mYgYdeBidCPp2cDYnZKccTLsR17eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's a fun place to go if you want late night and food you can take photos of. First saw this mahjong dessert at night market but found this shop here close to Richmond. They have a few fun things to try and I'll definitely return. The price was a bit high though but late night the parking is easy to find.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHGdmL-IKBhdncXem8nYqHn1UhIPxClmergyGB\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Calvin Kuah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqbTsBWnCBursGa27KALU0xx_nKsfLzVcv66Os3FNgNZjIgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a really cool place to have some dessert. I got the cold coconut sago with ice cream and mochi and it was amazing. The perfect post dinner dessert on a summer night. We ordered through a web page and it was easy to use. Our dessert came quickly as well. The shop was perfect for hanging out with friends and family as well as hanging some alone time and enjoying a nice dessert. Highly recommended for Asian dessert.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZHopPV0nonPooC2c-omnbiKWxg-UTvCIeEESv\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"JCVN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSLVtszyROwrIXO23Ocf7-_nm0i3o8Ra8Lq_5zV146VQ8GAlwgoA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For casual-hip Hong Kong style desserts I'd highly recommend visiting a Snackshot in Vancouver. They have a couple of locations and this one is conveniently located on Granville close to the Richmond/Van border. It's casual and family friendly but at the same time a fun date destination after dinner for all age groups. Checkout their refreshing drinks. Our group loved the signature mah jong red bean coconut jelly dessert and even tried bites of the HKD and USD cash made of rice paper. Owner came out to say hey and introduce himself, he's from HK and puts his heart into the menu and atmosphere here. He's having a tonne of fun running the place you can tell. By the end of the night the place was packed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKU9ubRAikeOn7s1o-aYcq7pDamV4tmmhXAbL2\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"charles bai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVivIWOvTOamsgiucoqI5EKukhiOsZqTk7nog1iV-Y1Xav6PIczow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Don’t think you can go wrong with any of their Asian desserts - just depends on what you’re in the mood for. The items we got had great flavor.\n\nJust stay away from the savory items… I ordered the popcorn chicken expecting Taiwanese style fried chicken - fragrant from the white pepper and basil and perfectly crunchy, chewy and juicy. Instead, I got a big Costco frozen food disappointment :(","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAsZ9DU5rg-WSHAgWM7oFIuvdGvr-JMOWzyKUf\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2024-4-15"},{"Name":"Auroraz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVS-aCDJklElvz2PfUhMx2uJHhCa1H4sW7TaJqX4aV6_Xjb3kaU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Snackshot in Marpole, BC, is a culinary gem that should not be missed! Their innovative take on Asian snacks is a delightful experience for the taste buds. The unique flavors and creative presentations add an exciting twist to traditional favorites.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMr34hBojxJK8dnN80cUf_cDde4oJZ5qH4Q95VR\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2023-8-21"},{"Name":"Jenny Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMGE3dR7QUUqRQ0H3D-H0cCDxLqPkeDZ7z-mFJ8SO_PBwrcc46=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The tasting platter is SO good! My friend and I liked every single dessert in the platter. We ordered the hot one and loved it. The Majong dessert (they make a limited number each day) is hilarious and so fun to take photos of. Highly recommend this place! The ambiance is nothing special but the desserts are great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8QJSKHZjxrwNuTnNydjhQlqQWSxQoTYmQkwKH\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2020-1-2"},{"Name":"Kathleen Fan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJix5mk4ZA1VeIzL-nKAr68rE3O1HbNmKZEl4HB2vLCK2NNZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"HK style desert place, famous of their platter include 9 kind of desert combination, good for more 4-6 people to try. Warm service, waiters very patient explaining the dishes, they also has created a web page for the platter so you can easily check out for the flavors. Generally good experience, will come to try other deserts next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTm0FEac8g0LYvgbdUoFE0o-ndGe2hj6oM4UmH\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2021-12-2"},{"Name":"Jen Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaL0RdeXtgs5sep6RZAPEECCWEbBdPSjyPl2-XazNd0JVBT_pLjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The barrel tofu is lovely. Very well presented and cute. A bit on the pricy side and you'll want a friend to share. Other items seem to be good as well. The buttery sweet milk toast was great - not too sweet. Decor is cute as well. During popular times be ready for a wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfviHYYW3UwvIxWvw9T1GC1EqTY7X2K8PJU-68\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2017-10-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Vancouver Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8w6jkWQhHhs1Z246avVvoKQqrR4N6KZDvvFaklq629YACSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered two all day breakfast combo.  We had to wait for long for the food to be ready.

The food was a great portion but the taste of the soup noodles was very salty.

The thing we liked most was the cold drink. It's very large drink with $1 extra on top of the meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfz2yjVm5Sb0pUPxuXtma1ZB-FT_12s3ly-lgs&fid=0x0:0x8f70de3bf32a358"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Solid classic Cantonese cafe classics like baked tomato pork chop on rice and mixed grill with spaghetti or rice and the sauce of your choice. Tried the mixed grill with cream sauce and the portion was good and the food was tasty. It comes with a hot drink but to upgrade to a cold drink it’s a dollar extra. Essentially it’s good Hong Kong cafe food in a food court setting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-EWEKmXL_FSqCEU0JquBwlVif5YQlNNMZ6MCA&fid=0x0:0x8f70de3bf32a358"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Kalvin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYzAZd-0_JeniSNljNxgImCwzlXWbe6PzaDeAXT6_nhg5vP5E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good price for the big portion you get. The bake pork chop on rice lack a bit of flavor but over all worth trying","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGMM6MbZ57DDBDb1gYS31PllylFmh_G6XXHABC&fid=0x0:0x8f70de3bf32a358"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Solo Traveler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr87C5ZtrKaCJ1bU-Y76KXT8unhcv_Tc0RyOk4ltjxvddrQHWC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best HK canteen style foods in Richmond. Never disappoints, great quality ingredients, authentic taste. The black pepper sauce was prepared separately for each order, best texture and flavor ive had. Food court price, but restaurant quality. Awesome!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJptxQgHgK9w2DF9feGeclFHB8ZJsGvy907tJv&fid=0x0:0x8f70de3bf32a358"],"When":"2022-5-18"},{"Name":"Audrey T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVt7NSeCmrDxjN6eGFiHdOku-giePvd1JuUbLyAEp6odBtHY6vv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent spot for a quick lunch. Pork chop and steak were quite tenderized and went well with the black pepper sauce. Cold milk tea was awesome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRflbaxIcp4BMJmUesuIItq4Gu1VJ_bgCE-J38&fid=0x0:0x8f70de3bf32a358"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Bernie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPXTBFQGy4UZogf6r0hGxUGZ8fvtwePPN5iicbAtQksaWtpwOP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Their menu is interesting because they have a variety of Hongkong specialties and Western food. And so, tried the Stir Fry Flat Noodle w/beef and soy sauce for $14.75 combo with Hongkong Tea.  The beef is tender, not flavourful while the noodles is too salty. Also, I got the Chicken Macaroni Soup w/ham. Soup is tasteless. I’m not coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfWCrdZMXwJZXWhkX_PSEghiYiD99OWOrPJkjC&fid=0x0:0x8f70de3bf32a358"],"When":"2023-8-14"},{"Name":"Sheren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwgWVtP6HKMkhFLCP4_q1L6Sudo7ufb7ryQD3i3kJwLQlCuUZm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Finally tried this shop at Admiralty Centre in Richmond!
I would say they are 70% alike with Hong Kong style food!! It’s good to change my friend’s bad impression towards foodcourt 👏🏻👏🏻
What surprised me is that they got at least four tea pots for making the drinks, feels like professional.
Overall cost us $23 for all this! It’s absolutely a fair price with good quality!
Nice try and will go to visit again~","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGv1A7gWFGLAbj8TzIs82Rj8w0iok8bYZ5lOpv&fid=0x0:0x8f70de3bf32a358"],"When":"2021-1-7"},{"Name":"Jacqueline Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJbuQkKj36SZRWCdKhTowdD9owAvXlFynPEJYwgMWIvXqXxIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Good prices, no line, easy to find a table. Simple HK breakfast that hits the spot. There could have been more corn beef and egg in the minced beef sandwich.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlPl3teI8wEEow6F4v_rYHMW9nhesQ3jBg9kk4&fid=0x0:0x8f70de3bf32a358"],"When":"2023-10-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mary Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiKKbpCTVhcz_y_fNyQu-j4XW7z41NJ68114jnZUzxHfn-OA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can't believe I never reviewed the Granville island Tea Company since I have been shopping there for tea for ages!  A nice, no nonsense tea place.   Tea leaves of many flavors and varieties.  Great quality and very reasonably priced.  It is a fraction of the price of say David's tea.  The staff is always friendly.  Last weekend the lady there recommended Ice Wine black tea and it was wonderful!  Some of my favorites are rose tea, Christmas blend, apricot and peach, and lavender earl grey.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxr1Tbb6a5YzoSj-_76gpUcY63ck2_xBJ9MfrX&fid=0x0:0x115e94efc36441d2"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"y sa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFngQqa2F90OIpbxkUL3vQVcASx5xoE2gyFjE4kMR1ydjk_2M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered an Assam tea latte, and it tasted amazing ( especially on a cold day!). There are so many types of tea to choose from that I always have a hard time deciding, but they all taste good. However, the store tried to separate the lines for those ordering tea to go and those buying loose leaf tea, but the staff stayed behind the counter, so the lines ended up being a bit chaotic...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvd3QQyR-Eao0oMJfWuPqPKdoEsZAkGfEVNCIa&fid=0x0:0x115e94efc36441d2"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Joshua Ding","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZPE1MNTiSYW266d26gwdTqL4M0B5bgmlpc2q-RY2uO7CjIFtW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"December 2024

Wonderful tea selections in the market. Great job featuring different teas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWwQBxLLZUj0I92YOsvBgFXQYr44B_9IRTcCLd&fid=0x0:0x115e94efc36441d2"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Ruth-Ann Reich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNuIp4IGKm_eGnDIlRJWk90ZMo4fRS0hKtWlmUF6MNYuWBpF9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The team at Granville Island Tea is one of the best! They’re always friendly, inviting, and go above and beyond to serve their customers. I really can’t say enough good things about the customer service here.
Some of my fav teas are Fruit Basket and Double Cream of Earl Grey.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ina Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqIKozAx8ntjuj5oZw4droqBVtaUlTOcOyWdmvwutABHppGwO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We didn’t wait that long to get accommodated. They have tons of options but I’ve opted with my usual Genmaicha. The look of their shop looks good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYo3WJjeag_NI_nYMRWtc2KVob6vCY1WiLH55q&fid=0x0:0x115e94efc36441d2"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Justbeing Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM9hiJK-AfVP-qSHlK2ogC-KKU9aHv9jB-f8Zpy8fNkox9PG5e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Absolutely loved my visit to the Granville Island Tea Company! The raspberry and peach teas were delightful and bursting with flavor. The customer service was incredibly friendly and welcoming. A must-visit for tea lovers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAzm0UBko9poJKS1oC34ATjigwr9W03vvYbsMk&fid=0x0:0x115e94efc36441d2"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"Simon Reed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqDrptZk5K8r7cAAASAK3dUxXTVH7GnPDIaXKpcuAnggfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing selection, staff know what is and isn’t in stock which is impressive considering the stock. Great menu to pick tees while you are waiting in line. If you don’t like crowds get there as soon as the open because they get busy very fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQKWA6mcFFXH6GK_4xbDGG0MQU7qnhZC0OJiw&fid=0x0:0x115e94efc36441d2"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Kwong Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRNhrcdIOQyhkpCbdjoUSwC0OqkPEp5C09o-KZX9pyAsIQioX9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"🍵 Steeped in Delight: A Cozy Cup at Granville Island Tea Company! 🌿

🌤️ On a bright Vancouver day, I wandered into Granville Island and discovered the charming Granville Island Tea Company. Nestled amidst the bustling market, its quaint and inviting atmosphere offered a peaceful retreat. 🏞️

☕ The extensive selection of teas, from aromatic masala chai to unique blends, was truly impressive. Opting for a creamy, perfectly balanced masala chai, I was delighted by its warmth and rich flavor. The staff's knowledge and friendliness enhanced the experience, making it not just a visit but a journey into the world of tea. 🍃

📚 The shop's setup, reminiscent of a cozy library with teas lined up like books, added to its enchanting ambiance. I appreciated the chance to sample different teas, each brewed to perfection, allowing for a personalized adventure for my taste buds. 📖

💼 Whether you're a tea aficionado or a curious newcomer, Granville Island Tea Company offers a welcoming space to explore an impressive range of teas. It's a must-visit for anyone seeking a serene sip in the heart of Granville Island. 🌟","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLU5cAHvnlFZBHN1b_gDm3wbNOVnHancIgqo99&fid=0x0:0x115e94efc36441d2"],"When":"2024-3-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"kawaii hatchiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLtom4JJghW2UnkOsI7GKr-J96yxZfSX4SBdkTaAQaNBfKVBVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tiny bobba shop. Not much seating. Came for take out. My honeydew slush was yummy! The milk tea was dark in color but lacking in flavour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcwXvreKs7wG6N3uEdcMPvQdZOGawP0AuTvNq7&fid=0x0:0x31c16daa911d75a"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Lula","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAeQ_Hs9cwuPyhi-73bw2Qbv72Usyy_Q6MsvDfswOfmjI1q7Wy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I LOVE this place. I usually get fresh watermelon slush, in the winter it's not available but that's ok because they have plenty of other amazing drinks. Staff are friendly, prices are good. 100% recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"leesa tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWsWaHyhzcw7kKPh9V3HkvTK5TTa81TdmCDp9IylYllx4puXIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"One of the smallest bubble places I have ever visited. Very tight space and no room to really walk around inside. It would’ve been nice if they had a little space to take pictures of the drink since the cups are cute.

I ordered a peach slush and it was decent for a slush. Wasn’t a huge fan of the pearls.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXwMVp00vHxw0j9NRg-z-LqWabs--nYjVloAp_&fid=0x0:0x31c16daa911d75a"],"When":"2023-12-21"},{"Name":"Pearobearo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJytlYP3krNLbRwHHThbPHsotJR7HIGvSdTdRI-mBoQ7I0EO4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Even after covid situation improved, they didn’t bring back the seating area. It’s fine though but they blocked the place off in a way that’s not very welcoming. Pretty cramp in there now, you have to wait for the person in front of you to order and grab their drink before you can go in to order.

I only like 1 drink here, Oreo taro slush with Pearl (sometime Pearl is undercooked tho). And I like their pork wonton in chilli oil (the first time I thought they were too strong and taste kinda funny but I’ve been addicted ever since.) They taste very different than other spicy wonton and is actually spicy! Very addicting flavour!

Sis like fresh honey dew slush with milk but we learnt today that they no longer offer the fresh fruit option of this, just powder. Since cantaloupe is on recall, they recommended papaya slush and it was pretty good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhsZ3U8OGmCIhcKWhexRbW6uykoSTBgfgXhEPm&fid=0x0:0x31c16daa911d75a"],"When":"2024-1-8"},{"Name":"Eve C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3TRd28YHMD0xZgG9Qff6WuaVQUBD8KHHFSJUDtDhJtE0o6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Cups are too thin!!!! When stabbing the straw, the side of the cup cracked open and milk tea exploded everywhere, and I mean everywhere. Our pants, shirt, shoes….I’ve never had this happen before. We lost more than half our milk tea, and it was too much of a hassle to go back to the cafe. We drove somewhere else to enjoy the tea, and had to go home immediately to change. We were also too afraid to stab open the other cup until we got home.

The milk tea was ok, price was cheaper than many other places. The cafe looks family owned and I wanted to give it a try and support local. Reminds me of the old bubble tea shops that used to be around Vancouver. When I walked it, I was surprised how incredibly tiny the space was. Also felt like they really didn’t care how the shop looked like to customers. The  space was covered up with mismatched plastic white boards and peeling tape, so we can’t see inside the store.

If you’re looking for cheap bubble tea, the price is great. But be careful of exploding cups 😟","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbFZT43tfJ0iNo0i_1HOVaVLNb3oUwzuqLxWrD&fid=0x0:0x31c16daa911d75a"],"When":"2022-10-1"},{"Name":"Elena Malkova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW602f3KiOlmq-3RVv1uCfJgeL2LrWPFJevDjC7s8eC3p665BY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We’ve been going there for years. This place went downhill. No more seating area, just take out from the window. The place looks like a hoarder house behind the counter. An owner asked me not to take pictures inside. They have a camera pointing straight at you so every your move is well noted. I’ve never seen anything like this. Usually personnel are quite happy if you take pictures for further review.
Despite of the above, bubble tea is still ok.
Wonder if they clean their machines well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0adPOpryaREC0YoTKDykaClbGDLz8VQOn7T2_&fid=0x0:0x31c16daa911d75a"],"When":"2023-4-16"},{"Name":"Google Guide","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNuhwlIn4-plqHLGD0QCOZgOCtCWh2WgE75DMJxjiWfmTWyXU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They have an incredible amount of different drinks on their menu. Their prices are reasonable for a good drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzfh63MiWgCc9QEC0uwiAWpel_aB9FASKyABD8&fid=0x0:0x31c16daa911d75a"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"Shi Pas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURjuQPhgJgCTjHIv1pd5c26u6-i36QWy_79xLM8rX3t7berL0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Reminds me of bubble world. Very yummy! And cute logo. I got the mango slush with mango stars and pearls. A customer; a French man we met there said he loved the food there and really recommended it, so I’ll be trying the food next!

This is just a hole in the wall; no inside seating.

The 3 stars is for the rude lady who works there. Not friendly at all. Very cold and rude. Please work on your customer service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtgp6c2dJJlzDx-MICoe2VM-yR9jqf2W3mWJq9&fid=0x0:0x31c16daa911d75a"],"When":"2022-4-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tina S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXW45-HgdTYMsROA974XLtQz-u0papEwxoo-3ThkTBJz_gb-Dek=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Hidden family run restaurant-cafe upstairs in Central Square. Twinkle is one of the best late night (sometimes open to 2am) places to chill. My friends and I like to order their Oyako don, Garlic Chicken & Rice, and Satay beef with udon in milky soup. Some things on their menu is quite delish, especially if the good cook is there. Others, like the ham & cheese sandwich are just average.

The atmosphere is really nice. This is the only place in the area I know of with an upstairs outdoor patio. If you're a smoker, they let you smoke on the patio. But if you don't like smoke smell, this may bother you.

Its a super chill place, quieter in the afternoons, sometimes a bit loud in the late evenings. There is a play darts machine. The owners like to sit at one of the tables and watch tv.
If you're a member of the LGBTQ community, come and get to know the owners. They always make my partner and I feel comfortable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNtQ5GQF7M_02F5NdEKrYH23964bnKLplRClBI&fid=0x0:0x2c89c698b55b9399"],"When":"2018-8-17"},{"Name":"Ken Leong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkcBnCzNWoskspBq75bEbSl0RQW0PfirIdNShwElc5BGNVUnY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food and drink had large portions sizes and tasted like home cooking. Good location right next to Aberdeen Center, had a nice lunch here to avoid the crowds at the food court in the mall, and we could walk over right after to do some shopping. Owners were friendly and chatted about their prior location Twinkle 1 before moving to the current one, Twinkle 2. 😅","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMp8Jxq9icEW6Z3IKlYu7OuFKcX4DeTvq7SRGY3&fid=0x0:0x2c89c698b55b9399"],"When":"2021-2-1"},{"Name":"Clarence Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHtOqf2gtYzBKQIwuVvsCF-9HPO2Lh2LpQE8bTKylJwpnM9QQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"A very long journey waiting for food arrived on the table. Very dark atmosphere with non-stop blinking lights, unfixed toilet, fair food quality, and almost zero service. I’m trying hard to find a reason to be there again, but sorry I can’t.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt_yLZntmVIo0RoFjGFp4oUmo16_fpCPpBiR8d&fid=0x0:0x2c89c698b55b9399"],"When":"2024-1-14"},{"Name":"Karen Kwan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHMLiRr23eJa87Yq7GzJlUJeyhHFPMObdx1d4tfCdwd7QxUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food and drinks! Place is nice, cosy, washrooms are very clean. They have lots of board/ cards games to play with and my kids also love the dart machine. My kids are very entertained.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOn5722BO0Qh2LKCwsIuEaYCrI6Y4U_ab0Mnt9e&fid=0x0:0x2c89c698b55b9399"],"When":"2022-12-16"},{"Name":"T D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLSyeKhD__uPlI1its_EDVwX4U973zjMQXltoKzX4xFUyrOcg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty food that you wouldnt expect from that price point. Definitely should support them. Haven't tried anything else but would recommend the Tonkatsu bowl for under $10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9gcW_n56HxlCrtD9KAOpbVui20fgyKqP8CvgR&fid=0x0:0x2c89c698b55b9399"],"When":"2020-11-30"},{"Name":"B Dot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCx6snNN5EZ49VFj-2b_LUCtpthOM4wCb7zXBU0PetSqF0hnV4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered my vermicelli noodles and they canceled it when my favourite are noodles and the only gave me my rice and pork dish overall really think they should just make some noodles","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3qReUW3INzhVgaZVaaFvZfcaPy1QrJkvOkopF&fid=0x0:0x2c89c698b55b9399"],"When":"2022-2-26"},{"Name":"Long Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXASYE4PxN6JW3fd6dFmHy5rnptnC1Bc1x4ZYGO6MJ631X23ddi7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a gem in Aberdeen! The menu is full of delicious Taiwanese and HK snacks and meals that taste as good as it sounds. Fun and cosy cafe with a great outdoor patio where you can play electronic darts live with people overseas too as well as mahjong. The owners are super friendly and apparently you can rent out the space for private functions too. Definitely recommend checking out. What a find on our way to the airport!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lucas Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAR40X-qBdYx3r2f0RRAAwrVYzEfPOZsVpyFJlPc5UBiWoI-Ok=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A very nice and sweet place for Taiwanese and HK style home made cuisines, their owner and staff here are super friendly too. Offer dine-in and take-out, providing some worth mentioning delicious items on their menu like salt and pepper popcorn chicken with some other specialty drinks. due to the size of the shared parking lot, I find it is extremely hard to find a parking spot when other businesses are open. A recommended visit will usually be late to midnight. Or online order for just a pickup. On a recent visit, staff hinted customs can give a call if just downstairs so they can open the back entrance to F2 for a shortcut.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tony Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXc90aCqGfybQjMtalVDUPiMHQBVUCO3Sk-HudR9HLYHT15iJK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Discovered this store in Dec 2021. 3 years past and still consistent good quality. Better than other franchises. Only choice for tea shop in Vancouver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brenda Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgB2uI7h7ia9TEwd76GKYpXlHoFO-6BuwCg5WaStCsq1dLXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I don't understand how this place got any good reviews. The drinks are mediocre, ordered the peach slush with yogurt, taste like just a yogurt drink with syrup. also ordered taro mochi, the mochi is not smooth and texture is like it's not fresh. tons of other bubble tea places have way better drinks. got scammed","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"William","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURvDqn4h0VQTFi8f--ERfGmtXi6j7M0wy9rsyzir1PtOucQNGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The momono slush was amazing! Chose less sugar on both drinks but they were just enough for us. Would love to try their other drinks too! Haven't had anything quite like these drinks here in Vancouver. Would recommend! Their shop is also nicely decorated too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOufCxSbeooxiV26zWzp6zv5EHXwq7adZkV3qKX&fid=0x0:0x431f9055759212b7"],"When":"2021-7-19"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Momono Tea Shop serves a variety of unique Bubble Tea flavors ranging from simple slush drinks to more sophisticated drinks such as Milk tea topped with Creme Brulee. I ordered Creme Brulee Milk Tea, Sweater of Winter and Grape Jasmine Tea.

Creme Brulee: I was bringing these drinks home for my family so I didn't try this Creme Brulee drink until I got home. One thing I'll say for this drink is that I was impressed with how solid the big chunk of Creme Brulee sitting on top of the drink was. For reasons beyond my control, I didn't make it home for another 3 hours. By the time I got home, I was afraid the Creme Brulee might have completely dissolved into the drink. To my surprise, the Creme Brulee was still in tact!

Sweater of Winter: This drink had a big swirl of whipping cream on top with lots of crunchy little chocolate balls dispersed throughout the whipping cream. It came with a lid that had a sliding window on it. The little kid inside me fell in love with this lid. The mini chocolate balls were fun to crunch on as well!

Grape Jasmine Tea: Grape flavoured Jasmine Tea with a couple slices of lime, white pearls and some kind of white jelly at the bottom. The Grape flavor was delicious and I enjoyed the texture of the white pearls and jelly.

My daughter wants me to bring her to Momono Tea Shop so she can try the drinks right away next time. I enjoyed the drinks from Momono Tea Shop so I will be very happy to grant her request!

Thank you Eric and Momono Tea Shop for a unique experience that had "fun" and "yum" all rolled into one!

Service: Good
Parking: Paid parking on Granville St.; free parking off Granville St. but make sure to heed the time restrictions on the parking signs.
Location: 3010 Granville St., between 14th and 15th Ave.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSoGpfLWm7bfTmZm6sfCYK4IDRGjd42f8LVwM9&fid=0x0:0x431f9055759212b7"],"When":"2023-1-31"},{"Name":"Joel Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUfAEdzikN4KnruRBVXiiAAknuHWPT8Shf2wOdQSd5PONn8wss=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A small locally owned shop, delicious drinks, and recently started selling these small cakes, which are also phenomenal.

Been back here many times now. They’ve been introducing new drinks depending on the season and availability of ingredients. Every single one has always been a 10/10. For me though Momono, their signature drink is the must try.

Wait times could be longer for orders depending on the day and time, as it’s currently only run by the couple/owners themselves. But they are starting to hire extra staff given the growth and popularity!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwtrqUfE1GNqMZbE3U1D23B7Jsd92u1QihiEck&fid=0x0:0x431f9055759212b7"],"When":"2023-1-15"},{"Name":"Amy Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvtm7hBqZHDYxXgP_oxkelx2FGhwfW-EuwTv9rdyjxo-_-_8Nq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was blown away by the artistry of my drink! I got the purple yam soy milk. The owner carefully decorates the inside of the cup with purple yam paste, it was mesmerizing to watch. Drink was yummy too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1TFMvyWu_hMMa1yS1aFBFUA-qZJ8icegxhxEk&fid=0x0:0x431f9055759212b7"],"When":"2022-4-26"},{"Name":"Max Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuLGOuETFmfg4RN5329HUMcHH0JD-OApDMnBCQDkIFIzVsuVDKjA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"mango carnival is a very unique drink. happily, it doesn’t fall victim to many common pitfalls of boba-ish drinks, such as too sweet, or gets diluted with time, or wrong-textured boba. highly recommend — cheers from someone who took a 30 min bus ride out of the way to come back here.
cute stickers too!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The cups are really creative! You’re able to open the lids, and you’re able to scoop the whipping cream or ice cream inside! But to be honest, the taste is just alright, nothing spectacular. The shop is a very cute, and their menu has some overall fantastic options for people with different taste buds :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNcFWo9jC5kKumCHTNLeqZbOonBlqh8wzwv8Yz&fid=0x0:0x431f9055759212b7"],"When":"2023-5-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lucy Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuwCjTEBDQem6hcfmmxSA0I0nNlJPkS88N0KyjwlMUZAjI_Jdm8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We stopped by here for a dessert because we were craving matcha and it was good!! The matcha tasted strong and the desserts were delicious. We ordered the shaved ice and matcha float. The only downside is that both of the desserts melted really quickly, and the desserts were on the pricier side :(","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5UDcEfot109eEb6sGTZEK1yP2qcbuAjrjkDYw&fid=0x0:0x601b95f2c392e685"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Lingke Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTGjGc9uF2gtSPT6Ruf-AqFHfSmQVzYkYHiq1BNnXXBKS0Og=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Staff are so friendly. I got my free birthday ice cream and it is very delicious! The taste of matcha is exactly the flavor I like. Their black sesame is also good too. Thanks for the ice cream and will definitely visit again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODECWKbCKYxZBKfjIdnVBKBJkh1nHJnFu9wc_D&fid=0x0:0x601b95f2c392e685"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Irina Chua","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGx9EyU4vITyOUzUv3iP99dTnYs7cyTGqXbuJ5Z_iHvAv7BCfvHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't believe it's been 4 years since I started visiting this place but I've neglected to review it.

This is one of my favourite dessert places in Richmond to visit. If you love matcha, you will love this place. Their soft serve is delicious, although my favourite item is the Maiko special as it's a decadent treat with lots of ingredients inside and soft serve on top. They occasionally change up soft serve flavours as well, so I've loved the hojicha, ube, and yuzu flavours in addition to the usual matcha.

Service is pretty quick and smooth. The atmosphere is lovely as well, very warm. My only issue is that there's hardly any tables/seating inside, so if it's full you have to wait or go outside. In the summer/warmer months it's a great option to visit the playground/park outside the Richmond public market, but not so in the colder months.

Shoutout as well to Bryan who helped me figure out the new rewards system. As I've said, service is great and the staff are nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFcw36bK6JNIfk8EguN_BYuByIzs4aTYmjkFPd&fid=0x0:0x601b95f2c392e685"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Melanie Tam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOnCXlUyDGCRthUKehak0_GUp_az2pTQqceWOyRQ-aAN0D6lJP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in for a pick me up before our two-hour drive to Whistler. It was a Thursday just before 2 and we had just beat the rush because a few groups came in just after us. I had the hojicha iced latte, which was perfect. I didn't want anything with too much caffeine. The roasted flavor was very nice. Hubby had the matcha latte float, which was also very good - but I wasn't in an ice-creamy mood.

I wish we had something as delicious and reasonably priced in NYC!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGuTNS_TpwHmAoqM10oUSw1PWm3yiwxN5gN9O6&fid=0x0:0x601b95f2c392e685"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Tammy Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWn0N2I5STxk6Dw-kQhoKTxOlHlPrvcouHiB9OgzjAG84pt3M0D_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"tl;dr: hojicha float is a MISS, definitely try something else the store offers! not huge portions and workers are friendly.

🍦Food Quality: 3/5
We ordered the hojicha float and we were quite disappointed. I would not recommend the hojicha float because they add very little matcha icecream. We made the mistake of getting it iced because it was 50% hojicha, 25% ice and 25% icecream. For ~8$, it was not worth the money because it just didn't taste that great. I think their matcha icecreams are probably a lot better but it was my first time and the hojicha was not good. I would come again and get just the icecream.

🍨Food Quantity: 4/5
The hojicha float came with 2 mochi balls, hojicha and a small dollop of matcha icecream. I mean, this is an icecream place, cmon!

❣️Service/Atmosphere: 5/5
The employees were very kind and friendly. The store is quiet and spacious but the tables were a bit sticky probably due to previous customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf_CR9OkjHeCBdC-ZWlJFEEgHxVw7TKZphrU1C&fid=0x0:0x601b95f2c392e685"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Foodie Zhen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdVrItxlQusWp3ETEL7NhYfMWl2gqDZyecxR3J7ul6ce7cG2tr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hard to find parking around the cafe, but as a big fan of matcha, loved to try the matcha ice cream. However, some flavours are only for summer, will come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNM9dRMqHHBI-uJmD71kkemQ-MErRIHWk5DD77R&fid=0x0:0x601b95f2c392e685"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Khrys Burden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLZn9q35VDgCHOO8Jp2vSx9zNhESZQLmPGDnMXvFiAf8ERA2-v=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the Matcha Float with matcha soft serve. It had matcha tea as the base which I thought would be super bitter but was pleasantly mild. It goes super well with the soft serve.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwkCXCN85lj2P9MFxOsQ3qfUGzltJeLaHNpCav&fid=0x0:0x601b95f2c392e685"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Ginny H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcHEodXIJ0P8yOKMmLFZPfzdWgFxq2sxo8ivTOo8lLJUVIfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite matcha ice cream place in Lower Mainland
• matcha and kinako mixed soft serve in a cup with cone on top.
• topping : anko , a must get. Also recommend the mochi balls.
Parking : paid street parking
Store: slightly small with limited seating
Staff : always super friendly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwZAVCVOyQdDL-EJ5RWDsMO7YDton-AU1ebCs9&fid=0x0:0x601b95f2c392e685"],"When":"2024-7-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anna M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU48hiBvIFSAsXdHntyHjnNKeVE_TyzARTji1gSS_WwcZ2us3xN=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Many of the teas have artificial flavour but it isn't clear in the store. When I tasted the teas at home it was noticeable (peach rooibos tastes like fake candy) and found on the website that artificial flavour was listed as an ingredient, very disappointing. The all-natural teas from here are good but make sure to ask about the ingredients before you buy. Good tea should speak for itself and not need to rely on off-putting fake flavour.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"GundamPriest","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH0Fv4ruJmCwa3Ie25f9xveBGpCuoas0vl_mhNEeQ13MV0MEFs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in to check this place out after leaving the bookstore across the street and was pleasantly surprised!

A cute nook of a tea shop selling dish towels, tea sets, cups/saucers, taste samples (boxes of 10 tea bags), loose leaf as well as larger assortments of teas.

They had a lovely Yuzu black tea on taste when we came in. Sadly only loose leaf at the time but tasty nonetheless!

Made a couple of purchases and had a nice chat with both the cashier/tea connoisseur behind the counter and a local customer who gave me some recommendations for the area based on personal interests.

A very warm and welcoming shop with prices you’d expect for a specialty tea shop (with delicious teas - tried the ones I’ve purchased and all of them are so good! Lemon and Noir, second selection was the Canadian West Coast blend).

Highly recommend a visit to this shop and their knowledgable staff. 🥰

(A blueberry and lemon biscotti from the shop pictured with my review - these were so delicious with my Lemon and Noir tea). ☕️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNO465WMfQGUm-XRNBwDWgNEgVs8HvxsYtCsEio&fid=0x0:0x52102297bf8eaf38"],"When":"2024-3-16"},{"Name":"J G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJo6mqpgXqGRdRRzZjYx2mcFdlLVZ3SJzS6e99Xh6_16KhNIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited Murchies this afternoon looking for a tea themed gift. Despite being an avid tea drinker Murchies has such a vast selection that I would have found it rather intimidating, that is if it wasn’t for the employee who helped me. Susan calmly talked me through their options and helped me craft my own bundle. She knew things about all of the teas that they had, their strengths and flavour profiles. She gave me a sample of their earl grey tea and let me smell countless others. Whilst Murchie’s has a well deserved reputation of great tea it was Susan’s knowledge and attentiveness what made this visit a memorable one! She is a fantastic ambassador for the company. I am sure to return! Thanks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA4CkbFbMvN2s_CiMZt88r4jETfWlmI5BVYTs6&fid=0x0:0x52102297bf8eaf38"],"When":"2023-9-11"},{"Name":"Patrick Rmeily","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuoyPX1eipgRnmgoTTomQfDArfFIPbrqENrLKXHHpR2lyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My co-favorite tea place in Vancouver. Such a wide selection and am yet to be disappointed by something I have tried there. The black teas are amazing, love their peppermint herbal tea. And they have many cute teapots and mugs made of fine bone china!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"KK","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGysH_xbsdewKy7VY7NbphumTPkqAe4-bpnwD3iZ3YYrzAfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dropped by to pick up a gift during my lunch break. The person who assisted me (receipt says Auphan) was so helpful - she recommended some of her favorite teas and was so knowledgeable about their selections. I ended up picking something up for myself as well. Will definitely be going back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"cherie booker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiykqRb4CoJ9h9tK3rGpPsp87bYY1klyn6wFcMRDg5rP1omzS3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Smells wonderful in here! Staff was very knowledgeable and friendly","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer McKay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgKq-7O6PkoUuMNyUcE3Y6EjSlJPGWDKtNmUC11J-hR2ztZoo4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good service, excellent black teas, and love trying the samples in store. The seasonal white cranberry was super delicious. We are constant consumers of their 1894 Orange pekoe, so we go here often. I also just tried their chai and it was smooth and spicy. Yum.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mary D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKchaUbF_sXau0NH_NVJD_-nSH_NlJn-hSrZdLFeoNk0uPMdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here twice so far. Love the teas! High quality, fragrant, and tastes wonderful. Customer service was great too. Auphan (name on the receipt) was really friendly. Can't wait to come back for more!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Grace Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJv2Qb5BK8BlHD8B-fNqpMIiwBP96of3n6s7qsHpu4xPXVSJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Smoked salmon on an everything bagel! Perfect place for a brunch date! The food was a bit pricey but I felt like it was reflected in the quality of the product. The staff were friendly, we dined in and had a great time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7WAzukkZhnO10WGnYjZXhjYqVgOU1zeU103U5&fid=0x0:0x7f4ac9ac429b2ab3"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"DLH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNxoVJChN19TlxEyh2PqXcySZWcsWGp-pw0aGewSStRgeU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"What am I missing here, was it an off day?

My friend invited me along to this Montreal-style honey water boiled, baked in a stone-hearth open-flamed oven making the outer layer crispy.

I bought 1 fresh Rosemary/Rock Salt ($1.95) and from the day-old bin, 1 dozen ($10.95) which is a good price.
We did a squeeze test to compare freshness and didn’t feel any difference between the two.

Cream cheese selections were very limited considering the long list posted on the counter with only 1 Spinach/Feta and no more available from the back of store.
Price for flavoured cream cheese: $8.95/200gr.

I had a couple bites out of the fresh bagel in the car on the way home, it was chewy but not crispy.
I had (the remainder) for lunch upon getting back to N.Delta with a smear.
I had high hopes for my first Montreal-style bagel, unfortunately I felt underwhelmed by all of it and it’s not enough to  encourage a return trip.

As mentioned by others there is a sign posted on the door as well as at the till “Debit or Credit Card Only….No Cash”.
I find that odd.

Located in a shopping plaza with plenty of parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1Jke4C71uKmZV981zgd-9U-5I2lHc96AS5tU&fid=0x0:0x7f4ac9ac429b2ab3"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Albert Luk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaD3o96lx5KFqGPVNTfbIw-nZHFFA950dd8GZz9qbGbOe0Sjog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"3.5/5. Hastings Sunrise breakfast bagel review with signature Rosemary Rocksalt bagel: small amount of food and expensive for what it is. Tiny portion of smoked meat, meh eggs, and seems like processed cheese. Avoid the coffee: weak. Recommend just having a bagel with butter or cream cheese.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJkW_xbHmncDubnCvMLI41-JNpp_TQg3OAHbR8&fid=0x0:0x7f4ac9ac429b2ab3"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Victoria Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnCpSANfEAxNFydcSQd0MMqdR55AH3KrnFZDH8jiUz-K7sHa40=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s a Bagel shop, it’s pricey but good. It more for grab and go than a sit down. They don’t take cash only card so keep that in mind before going.
Be specific about what you want and how you want things, they’re willing to do that for you.
If you come in here expecting anything else you’re dumb. It’s a bagel shop not a coffee shop. The cream cheeses are nice. Try one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiORap_csuY_828mUjEe7XLsPhLp1ZOBFXmuAT&fid=0x0:0x7f4ac9ac429b2ab3"],"When":"2024-2-2"},{"Name":"suman bilkhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIEAc81ORva2b5wIuWh6RFZz_BnlpNbMQe1iawoib5pAtd2Gw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I’m a little confused about how I feel about this place. The staff is super friendly and the variety of bagels is awesome. The seating is stools and metal chairs so not too comfy...maybe they don’t want you to sit around or hang out for too long.
I was hoping they would have something other than bagels too as my little one is not always a fan of bagels....but no luck.  I order the “rosemary rock salt” bagel with the vegetable cream cheese, my daughter got the plain bagel with the plain cream cheese and we got a bowl of the “tomato roasted garlic” soup. The soup came full to the brim and steaming hot just the way it should be-and it was delicious!!!
The presentation is great.
The plain bagel I thing tasted better than the other. The rosemary bagel itself was good but the vegetable cream cheese tasted sweet and as if it was vegetables mixed into salted margarine..I would like to come back and try one of the bagel sandwiches on there menu but it seems a little too pricey for just a tiny bagel sandwich.
I think they could do much better if they added just a little more variety to there menu so that when family’s come with a picky eater there are just a few more options.
Maybe a grilled cheese or muffins.
I get it-it’s a bagel place but it should really expand the menu just a tad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzMe-XVxomb9fCxNNp5Cvnl6HRGRyCqB96OuQu&fid=0x0:0x7f4ac9ac429b2ab3"],"When":"2018-5-18"},{"Name":"Hardev","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVioI76T16utuNqtfSmdtejt-4wYHrD-9idqbyMl6GNmlkdyFV55g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They don't accept cash... But they have a cash tip Jar?

it's cheaper for a business to accept cash and puts money back in the community quicker.
Rather supporting the community, it's supporting big banks.

Definitely won't be back to this mismanaged shop.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Naumann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSqHdPVDLr7nLtDUnE5vKc93YTqnTvOv5M73le5mndP1fkkVul=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came by to try a bagel with butter. Had the Everything with sesame,  poppy, sunflower, and flax seeds, barley, oat, and rye flakes, and onion, millet, and rosemary. Lightly sweet outside, and nice and chewy inside. The baker told me they boil the bagels in honey and water first. We've bought a few 12 piece bags of 'leftover' bagels, and cut and froze them.They tasted absolutely great. Got a bag of Everything this time to take home and have with smoked salmon for NYE.
These are smaller than the bagels we usually get from a grocery store but Rosemary's are Montreal-style. I like all types.
They do have gluten-free (we prefer regular), so if you grab one of the bags, ask if they are gluten-free or not. We've had all but the cinnamon so next time.

*Sorry, I responded 'No' to a question if Rosemary Rocksalt delivers. The correct answer is 'Yes' you can order online for delivery.

To add from my last trip, they also have other products they see in a cooler next to the cash. They sell their own cookies and pickles that are made offsite.

Daniel","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBQKqD3AHSaMPHelRfhNM8-fiY5AlNRHX49Jxn&fid=0x0:0x7f4ac9ac429b2ab3"],"When":"2021-1-3"},{"Name":"Merlin Jose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcYx_3Zvjc8iJkthMK_lV6pMFulyPn4wKtWzuvrlUZ1YHIl40JLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Montreal bagel shop!!Bagels are good!!they have so many different flavoured cream cheese.Staffs are friendly!!Fast service!!bagels maintains quality
Will visit the place again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7Fyw6nSmWBw7o8cDut3z5AXhzlpRQebsiJgfo&fid=0x0:0x7f4ac9ac429b2ab3"],"When":"2024-2-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Enjoyed our lunch on a Saturday, where we had the noodle in fish soup with fish cake and Vietnamese meat, bubble waffle, and deep fried bun.

Everything was made fresh. And we didn't have to wait for a table. You won't have to worry about parking either since the Ironwood mall is big.

It's also not as busy as the mall locations in Aberdeen, Lansdowne, and such.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuzBedDJyd2MYCAs-ijwgNngI1ldHysvDS8JDA&fid=0x0:0x41b3f1d6aef11787"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"James Kan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk_o12iCtyO0gE_QoPCj5qJ7UUQkuic2cEzUnsQvn8LpSf4EV-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is amazing big serving with high quality. The bowl is fully loaded stuff and delicious taste, enjoy eat in all Bubble Waffle.
Lack of service from waitress and waiters, this is only one drawback I found.
As a cafe, no fancy design, but it is clean.
For a quick or nice food dining alone or with friends, here is a good option in near around location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGuxoYhYDl7d4r0b8ZuM2bAOlZUCeyhIOc1HVN&fid=0x0:0x41b3f1d6aef11787"],"When":"2024-1-6"},{"Name":"Nathan Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUqhHViBSLtdHMt4mH88tGeHDX5eWyDyhqv_seE1JhPaXLyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here tastes great and is always freshly served, so it's always warm. I often will get the teppanyaki, but the soup noodles are good too. Servers are friendly and the restaurant has a good atmosphere. Only drawback is that during peak hours it may be busy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danny De Dios","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKVJwf1Ex29tGQ785s07hX6BKrba7ETM1DrwOJxxOK0qUhNwI6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After grocery shopping my daughter and myself decided to go for snack. I ordered spicy beef with dry egg noodles and daughter had Spicy boneless chicken soup combo. Both are spicy but not super spicy. We love it!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTY8uxIVMag-WF3Yj383Adu2w-2gAOknr520l1&fid=0x0:0x41b3f1d6aef11787"],"When":"2023-3-26"},{"Name":"Andy Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKWeDyoIw7IK_VqaIoj_0v7_OdbrNd8MW5QegRs4TuCA76JU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Somewhat salty and the soup noodle wasn't cooked thoroughly and the noodles were too tough to chew. Having said that, staff was actually friendly and asked how come we didn't touched the noodle and offered to re-cook. Most servers probably would not give any concern into why customer didn't touch a big portion of the food. The attitude earned them a 4 star.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFAddQdwNgljfvZlOJ-15v9R8c_tytDiVas4Z2&fid=0x0:0x41b3f1d6aef11787"],"When":"2018-9-11"},{"Name":"Yi Choi Fan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvz4rIlrXldaobEcKVbU3LH3vHbiebZchpYKi96-P3qiff2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered larksa noodle soup and found a piece of LONG HAIR in my take out. Please pay attention to your food and make sure it's clean. This is unacceptable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsBUGqpfiJMUNjvLayEq48qobMw4eo503Myv0G&fid=0x0:0x41b3f1d6aef11787"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Kasumi A. Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7_0dE4TBrW-eazsY9gh6IEHsIYux8SX4ecNQs4YyVQn_4oH7I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We are the only customer during dinner time. Their services are same as last time, no greetings,
no smile, no thank you,
not following instructions,
rushing us to take
orders and ignoring us whenever
we try to ask for napkins, we need to use our own.

​2 of us had tried their....

smoked duck on Ramen with
tom yum kung soup
--- it's not spicy, only sour, not much ingredients inside..

pork jawl meat and sliced lamb
on flat rice noodles with minced
pork fish soup
--- way too much deep fried garlic inside the soup + soup base was too salty
--- they put shredded lamb,
not sliced lamb
--- the soup base taste different than the Richmond center branch

2 ice lemon ribena
--- i asked for less ice, but they gave me less drinks, only 2/3 full..
---1 of them half glass of ice inside..
--- it's tasteless with a lot of lemon seeds inside.. I almost choke myself

Original bubble waffle
--- i asked for extra crispy, but it's
Soft and cold

They charged me $1.20 + $0.50 more for the drinks, without let us know, while we ordered","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMH7LA3kc4DGRNL6NH0KWU6TwJ0FwgkIRxhwe0T&fid=0x0:0x41b3f1d6aef11787"],"When":"2023-9-22"},{"Name":"Jenny Hsu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJ3B3cWAsgRgXTco-R3FJMTFASfCKF9nFd4zjcNQ44iK-prg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The menu price here is more expensive than the other locations.

The food here is better than the Blundell location but definitely worst than both Lansdowne and Richmond Centre.

$11.50 for rice rolls and it came out room temperature.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5C4-3hHFFdw8mI5xxPG5vdUJy9x2tZVHLlqW3&fid=0x0:0x41b3f1d6aef11787"],"When":"2023-8-26"}]

owner: {"id":"102308844584412014901","name":"Fresh Elements Bubble Tea \u0026 Juice 鮮果鮮 (Yaohan) (Owner)","link":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102308844584412014901"}
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"holly cat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJ1a3KyJ0KtKku-78Dbns25qUhzO6-KsMA693CnuFufp4_pQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We've purchased bubble tea there several times over the course of the last 8 years.  The 2 for 1 bubble is a great deal and for the most part, have been satisfied with their drinks.  Last Saturday, we did the 2 for 1 and asked for zero sugar.  The drinks  tasted watery and had little tea or milk flavor.   We took the drinks back and the employee that served us told us the drink is exactly the way it should be and the reason why it tasted  this way is because we asked for zero sugar.
I feel the real reason the drink tasted this way is because they used too much water and made a weak tea.  She reluctantly  gave us two new ones,  but the problem is, the same weak tea was used and this time around, even less dairy was added.   At this point we just said, "Whatever. Not worth haggling  over the 2 for 1."   Just by looking at the drinks and it's color, it's very obvious it was not up to it's usual standards.  And the fact that it was zero sugar does not explain why the tea flavor was so weak.  If there was sugar, it would of just tasted  like sugar water.  Mistakes happen and people have off days, but what bothers me is the worker's belligerent attitude in not accepting any responsibility to fact that the drinks she made may not have been up to their  usual standards and  adamantly insisting  we were  the ones that have a problem.
We'll go there again because of the fantastic  2 for 1,  and keep our fingers crossed  hoping we get our  usual drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEJzWTgWGAkzSZPimbpgtI1EdZ-1kFew-_N-RQ&fid=0x0:0xee63b21b6caa9bf1"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"celia ungkana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWF3YX-oRLysTPL72fAkad3W3ufI7ieLSWLyw29lkrZSYjRn98=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If I could give zero stars I would.
Ordered two lemon tea from one of the food vendors who told me to pick up from this place just a few stalls over.
There was no one when I got there and spoke to the elderly lady and gave her the tickets from the food vendor lady.
She accepts them and from what I assumed , started to make my drinks.
Few min later another lady came, maybe put in an order online but it took awhile
Then her drinks finally come after standing for 15 min.
I am still waiting for 2 lemon ice tea.
This lady doesn't communicate on wait time , won't make eye contact.
And then proceed to take new customer orders.
My husband had to eventually step in and ask for the vouchers back so we could get refunded from the food vendor.
And she had the audacity get mad at my husband.
We got our refund from the food vendor but after all this time waiting, our food had gone cold.

Maybe we weren't chinese enough for her .
I will never go and support that business ever.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjGoTKuLxnFju6oLQgQ3hiT4QJ6rQH6ANzZNSa&fid=0x0:0xee63b21b6caa9bf1"],"When":"2024-4-13"},{"Name":"Jason Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo5sPZ67s_mnhJwZ79b2vBa8twlqYbk9eZujv14dBdLN9-xEyftw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered a purple rice yoghurt drink. I rarely ever order drinks like these because I simply can’t justify the $7 price tag for a tiny drink. The drink itself was decent enough but the rice saturated at the bottom and I ended up trying to scoop up most of it after finishing the yoghurt. The service person spoke too softly and it was hard to hear in a noisy food court.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3o6TeneZa1tKWaPWnJrUSYCAiFyCLSedOSTeL&fid=0x0:0xee63b21b6caa9bf1"],"When":"2024-1-31"},{"Name":"jenny karishma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8rzuFhMPke6-P5quYHMHhIcXc_a1YKPdAiwfB8Rtj8gwVISFm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered Oreo crunch milkshake, was yummy.
They have buy 1 get 1 offer on their special Milk Bubble Tea ☕. Next time, will definitely try that one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvWas_N217cKCSCYex60ieZnpVyfntAQdl_Tok&fid=0x0:0xee63b21b6caa9bf1"],"When":"2022-4-17"},{"Name":"Ben Klein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9R820F28I0t3X369CmfDuA-HVVZc86vM9sktLJOY_Gt7-9IRU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Two for of milk tea is pretty great. They can also make a black lemon tea which is very tasty. Staff wear plaid and are younger but friendly. They prepare quickly and you won't wait long. They have take out bags for multiple orders.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6TKN-zzFfnMgmARYzouFIzmJUKX4BIpTgEKYu&fid=0x0:0xee63b21b6caa9bf1"],"When":"2017-9-15"},{"Name":"This That","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL6F5AHDQn37CfmO-nfVFhgeXPU4rFxZmXf4hfub8wsphVb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I would give a 0 if I could. The server was super rude. He was very impatient when I asked him a question. The Mango Pomelo Sago had no Pomelo. Mango did not taste like mango and the sagos were frozen. I would not recommend this place at all.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nyet Yang Siow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmfdOCqMR804R7MBJTFIpN0T11CJTLdbScn4sw5Z1S0HMz1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I wished there was an option to give zero stars. I ordered lychee slush and they gave me slush. I told them it's missing the lychee flavouring. There is not even a hint of lychee. The cashier insisted there is lychee syrup and refused to (a) remake my drink and/or (b) give a pump of lychee syrup. I paid $8 for literally ice and sugar. Disgusting drink, disgusting service. Do not go here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sanjib Dutta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWw2UQzVMg08L2KlqyJldyN2-qj_iv7J6NsohwFtBAmN_272mwS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They sell delicious pearl milk tea and a whole assortment of other teas. The place is cash only.

Photos © Sanjib Dutta","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7S5jj0-Jkx73OfFOHbm8ZKllu_GAfe1zdFqQs&fid=0x0:0xee63b21b6caa9bf1"],"When":"2020-8-19"}]
