user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joel Chamorro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqxP2bWIn2UNWnJeEqa2NfwY_uXQTca_R9eYt8xs_aya6Ii1k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice place, pumpkin-friendly. The staff was really nice and inclusive with the pumpkins. The food was nice and the new autumn drinks really tasty. You should definitely bring your pumpkins here. My pumpkins had a really good time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtLvDKyhc-yASlrK6PvAAa9VuUZG1s66dXBJiG&fid=0x0:0x3babce2dbc82d074"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Ramandeep Aulakh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxF_1WeJuVLn9Xg5wIUKt16c8fkNAuY9QMcIYIlGJhB-7AOMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to this location from last couple of months. They greet me with such a charming smile & my order is always ready ahead of time as I often do mobile app orders. Staff in here never disappointed me.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J.J. LaRocque","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs1wnHH1wE-6ehYO1ShgkgKN3A6ZFemN0kZy8RwdiX8HwJ30lb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This location has incredible customer service. The manager and assistant manager were extremely helpful and assisted me when I had a missing pound of coffee. The vibe has amazing music like Frank Sinatra. Lots of parking, patio space and easy access from the highway. Great for client meetings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPofO6UPuvIjuS0fJNi81e1BWxayd7nLjXU7sbJ&fid=0x0:0x3babce2dbc82d074"],"When":"2024-2-1"},{"Name":"Urmi K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDUjBHPIqI2TwbtxQkFaLgs4Y6Bxg-0_jMi5kUQw1trs5979aHLA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered 1 latte which took 30 mins to arrive. If it was going to take so long I would have appreciated a heads up while ordering. Definitely not returning to this location again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike Jack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfoMVgqBdGzj8XotTXWU8qwMsJC8JLF_30D_dYm_2wy23w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a Decaf Caramel Macchiato sub w/ coconut milk. I thought I tasted dairy milk, but looked at the label and it said Coconut Milk, so I drank it. 5 hours later, upset stomach and using the toilet. It sucks when you can't trust workers to FULLY read the order that came in before making rather than look at the name and think they have the recipe memorized. Don't know what to say to warn anyone, but maybe ask the barrista that made it not the window person if your order is correct","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nigel Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZB0kfIdbnJQYSnT3G7QQ5mj6T-ot6hoR28bIZoawzq-ibscr2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today was best star bucks breakfast ever i was greated  with warm welcome be Emily who took my order notice my star buck mug need bit of rinse emily just did best thing by cleaning up and made best coffee these things and service that keeps people like keep coming back for more and more of star bucks great service wokers such as emily should  not go on notice by higher up today i       felt like emily done the outfit proud and 👍👍👍👍👍 to staff at ironwood Star bucks  .

DR.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vanessa Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxzhWNUyhs2y4pDnYHt5zo9EDT5JatwPzQXjeIGopqU7G3axmbaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Waited about 20 minutes for a mobile order.  The staff did call out orders that were being made. The combination of drive through, walk in-s and mobile orders was too much for this little store setup. Had I known it would take thos long I would not have ordered in the first place. Please include a cancel button in the app.
Also the staffing arrangement seemed off, all staff members were quite busy except the person taking in-store orders.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"V. Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtxytIAcHJPU2kvIbnWlwWBNj4S9Hgy3_cHs6Uah-waKkl2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Last 2 times I’ve been through early morning drive thru at 630am service is slow. The line ups during drive thru have been slower than usual. The attendant at drive thru does the bare minimum and gives no cutlery or napkins when food is ordered. I’ve seen the workers wipe the top of my cup with their hands which is completely unnecessary and unsanitary. If you go into the store, service is quite good but I’ve noticed service goes down when you hit the drive thru.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sweets Fanatic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKT4q9vq4bFnKURKLo-IuFZkNgSUZrYyHCHwVq7PvVTaTofHHc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Note: this place is a canteen.

To people who are curious about here, this is located inside the building. You can ask the front desk and she'll direct you towards the area. Other than that, this is more of a canteen rather than a cafe.

The prices are great- 9.50$ for pasta and the portions are pretty large. A dish plus coffee is around 13.50$ and is enough for a single person. The cook is extremely nice, bringing all the food to your table and it's very empty during the day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwCLdsusfWm7EmhFeaJ4scZrQuVuCAEtB9lXaF&fid=0x0:0xa0e0e69c36f1056d"],"When":"2022-9-2"},{"Name":"Yi_ J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHUXHovF57HcrSFDyXujlPq3t3zLZCyvg_2vlqvtyKyTzEUi0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Clean and nice place
Price is great.
Around $12 for one person for the lunch
Coffee is from Pedro’s Organic Coffee","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOSIVeFEW1EdjhiSRBLF7X2KtbAgTdEngPMsun&fid=0x0:0xa0e0e69c36f1056d"],"When":"2023-9-15"},{"Name":"Petr Yan-Volkanovski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmwdQPJePPvpk70RoeGwUbkonpEBcLlkVqVZXU6pQ9_d9bVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a local hidden Gem! Great food at a very fair price point. Bolognese pasta is the best must try.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelly Henderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0NMQRsnCmQ5CzLv7U3dYAYMasCpYKEnyAL1koo1E6BnIhLrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I used to frequent this place nearly every other day, however, even though their prices are unbeatable within this area, it obviously adds up. I still make an effort to hit it up on my lunch break at least once a week and am NEVER disappointed. The portions are huge, the prices are more than reasonable, and the ingredients are fresh... not to mention, they make the burger patties in house.

Great and friendly staff who really accommodate your every request with a smile.

In my opinion, these guys set the bar for local mom and pop run joints for some great fare!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zach Holt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXERLVsgo4CCvD1x1hPc-62goI9Azy8MpQa30rq64_qCLX6Bw8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered a burger and linguine Alfredo.
Burger was ok. But the linguine was spaghetti… and the Alfredo was water from poorly drained pasta with creamer and maybe .05oz of cheese so I ate the burger the threw out the pasta after two bites trying to give them the benefit of the doubt. Doubt won, there were 4 people in there counting me.
Good prices. Pick off the menu wisely.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris Gigliotti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEmcKv4pqJ9onKpSJLGgpnJSmyJooI7FSpr1wMj9DrWqutZD_JHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best comfort ever! The meatball sub and beef dip with fries are simply divine, as are the the various pasta dishes. The turkey club, however, is my go to favorite. Service is always prompt and friendly, too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"brandon doupe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX26WWKFgigUYYQnTm37hvIu7ZRWnQeqMiXrn-20kX4_LJNWCM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The London Cafe is a little gem of a cafe.

I've been there a dozen times and have great food and service everytime.  There have been a few different faces in there over the years but they always seem to enjoy what they do and that helps in my opinion.

The Super Chicken is one of the best sandwiches I have had in a long time.  Great pasta and cheap drinks.

Decor is in need of an upgrade, but its a dinner... that's how they are supposed to look.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christiane Boyce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUk8rdRFmJ1KM7ygn-HJiAzOBfXcFMVGJJGIJ0MnvNC2qPJoLti3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I used to own this place so it will forever hold a place in my heart. Their food is for the most part homemade, very tasty and healthy. They have breakfast and lunch, take out and catering, salads and daily specials, and friendly staff!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lissey F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_0h2gfDoKvqHrlczcNzuVcw6R82p4tFoqi1v6X-IZDmM6MIVL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Small store front, sadly no seating (as of yet). Menu is slightly limited due to soft opening, but will probably increase with time. Friendly service.

Unfortunately the final product (Mango slush with coconut milk) is not quite as pictured and a bit watery (instead of the creamy yogurt-like consistency I was assuming from the menu picture). Couldn’t quite see (or taste) the coconut milk either. But I did like how you can taste the mango, and how it’s tart and not sweet even at regular sweetness.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkh4GGgwjEsASfSZHyuvY1BmZ_CN8hs2n43W7P&fid=0x0:0x897052be9cd67784"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Juston Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVAYC5afCmPwosxYjKpvQBOhWlOXQMR2Uh3uL_8gJcR0rRYyPd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute place with great options! Service was kinda slow but they were under staffed. We order a variety of drinks and enjoyed them all. Apparently they are know for their mochi drinks! Would recommend the coconut pudding.

What we ordered:
D12. Fleshy Mango Slush with Coconut Milk
A13. Flesh Strawberry & Peach
D11. Coconut Pudding Mango Coconut Milk
E19. Mochi Roasted Milk Tea","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgmM7Lhez7lAGPL-eeMF6L6v33op3aOqUKRnov&fid=0x0:0x897052be9cd67784"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Steve Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJL0RjsrOlzpEGWPHTtGVBnzxg9_uzeaMd5fBXngEdoTt8WbA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Very small but cozy store, I tried their famous Flashy Mango slush coconut milk. Something that was supposed to be a smoothie ended up to be more like a juice. The original from Hong Kong was supposed to be rich and loaded with chunks of mango, but there was no mango chunks at all in mine…","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tiffany Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1YywraeXMY4XXJs7P6PntZ80pyOUMXRTydUWue495u_LuaLeC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite bubble tea in richmond! The staff is always friendly and they open late at night!

My go to drinks are:

Fleshy mango slush with coconut milk : when theyre in season! Plus i get it in mega size!

Or

The oreo mochi milk tea: the mochi is so good, they make it warm so its easy to chew and is just a unique and yummy topping.

They also often do BOGOs on uber eats or a Tea Of the Month which is fun to try out new drinks.

Ily suntea never leave me","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bryn Hsu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3deuRx_RaL57qxeVIaQMLs7wAs5RCo1M-oXoecHiGsWP3Ng=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tea was tasty, the service was mediocre. We got our drinks and lingered in the empty shop for a minute to poke our straws in. Before we could throw away the packaging, the server yells “bye bye” for the second time. Was that necessary? Telling your customers to leave?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Siya Peng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrqWOR1cKwJJxScV2ekupSJvcP1HSTEd4-fX2IdjHuAYS1oQU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the fruit tea and it tastes good and fresh. Serviced quality is also good. Will definitely come back to try all other drinks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Phuong Phan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvFaJt8OfgGtvgzAhTC09yRapp93Pf8DohyLOqNLwavI-WKyPEkg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Grape tea has a great taste with chewy grape.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCQzlh0eadx4oIq-P4rkqEUa9J3UNzix5OApX_&fid=0x0:0x897052be9cd67784"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Ann Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKoA9yoyVtmRo8ZN0m4nxiMPd9jWw_AsFaXm3fYcZY5BwOSyw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love their fruit tea！They have buy 1 get 1 free promotion now！","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9cbMbWtJ3mr-VwYVucNLAgibcwf1LNnCnVImJ&fid=0x0:0x897052be9cd67784"],"When":"2024-7-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anastasia S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKmU4HF29m4UZt-guLfk9QmXVe65ucp_36afrM47KqSB4Sa3Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This store has beautiful ceramics, glassware, and accessories for tea making. Delicious selection of teas.

The staff here are very friendly and knowledgeable, despite the fact I'm only able to speak English here.

There is a bigger selection of tea ware in the store than what is listed on their website, so each visit is a surprise on what you will find.

I highly reccomend this place to anyone who's a fan of Chinese or Taiwanese tea culture, or otherwise just want some tasty leaves to brew at home.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rachel Hamilton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwRB0OM_6Em8DZsgfhViwVbK0RQmHzO6apzoO20MLe_R4oRDbm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The tea and tea ware here is amazing! The customer service is very sweet and knowledgeable. I will definitely be going back when I need more tea :))","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robin Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2llVeKCzayYRBbZdxjMCmNg9ty9A-qCT_YshiCQZLvWwoeA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly owner, and good tea","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"W Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUt_928Xn618oJ2kdF8LiSj-Quv8Q-bkQO89QmsL2vJk3r9vEP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"老闆和老闆娘非常熱情。如果對茶有興趣，特別建議來這家茶店買茶葉或茶杯。我從溫哥華背回家好幾個茶壺和茶杯沒有打碎，因為老闆和老闆娘很會包裝。下次回溫哥華我一定會再來一次！

Great tea and store owners have great hospitality. Totally recommend! I hope to stop by again soon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sibyl Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYnTGUAL9Rz8P3i6i05xI22I7SVaHBeFpOviNBAmEcgMobQ0y8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"老板娘很热心，茶具选择很多，专业知识到位，推荐喜欢茶文化/对茶文化感兴趣的茶友来这里看看。","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shishi Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhUvRyzWJsfEOttMvy8BxbuCQMSAZVTWx6sa5SPji0OC72rA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"老板很亲切，东西很正，价格合理，还有好茶免费品尝！","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashar Siddiqui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJq49dUPsRt4ZwzMT06JIIwcWf4bFb0oYqIAPWPUOiovEhR6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"盧水車","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFsLRvf1nDmgd7IPhX2RK-ry_HWydqqACp6_4PucrLya9zpA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sylvia Lan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZOrignIxZtNQr5fqOb9lpoqxcw0LTJa79u5ODK0MTYwholQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Expect to stand in line for 15-30 minutes to order at the cashier, then another 15-25 minutes of wait time for the food to be served. This place is always packed and seating is limited at this food court.

Cha Kee is famous for their creamy scrambled egg sandwich, but I definitely won’t wait in line for this again as it’s not that specialty to worth my time. On the other hand, satay beef on instant noodles was good and scallion sauce chicken on rice was even better! They were both flavourful and very delicious. We’ve ordered less spicy for the curry fish ball, but it was still very spicy and the spice overwhelmed the aroma & taste of the curry. They’ve increased the price recently, but it’s still worth the visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuNLkI001Rgb-0Q2ZGthWZXY1TnQ663cnLNh50&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Colin Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7h35ZtHaveCK9eq8-mDb7BmK8EeHfVN1usnvgcw8J_phkrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great Hong Kong style food court joint.  In the corner beside washroom.  Large lineup on a weekend morning, by far most popular place there.  Take the FF elevator to reach with a stroller.  Menu flashes too quickly, had to take a picture to view properly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxDKB8WXhc8twOkMgwWfmraZ2QYhTp6FkW6-uY&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Jaz Cheerios","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWSsqMl_UJjmJASBF3hbFK4Z9HKEEe-XSiGeuCWW8bRGEK2Y5Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I’m impressed. The siu mai dumpling was super soft and tasty. I’m normally not a siu mai kinda person but I had to order to try because that blew my mind away being super Hong Kong authentic. I used to go to the other hk style cafe near by in the late 90s-2000s. After coming back, that store wasn’t as good as it used to be so that’s why I want to try something new and came across this one.

The Fishball was great but the chicken scallion was a little less impressed. I felt the chicken was a bit soggy and not completely crispy and not enough scallion sauce (Personal preference) Nonetheless, I think it’s not too bad.

And too bad the satay beef noodle was all sold out. Will come and try again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgMsrGDaBOxFcrKPk19tY0sOKob_0ZLc9S8Q2R&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"K’s coffee lover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-385uQOflrqOxsV0QWsdIyhv-rxdZ7rLwLnLPmzpfPGzr9P6Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place truly brought back memories of Hong Kong! The satay flavors and the soup base were both authentic and satisfying. The scrambled eggs were smooth and hearty, and the Hong Kong-style milk tea was perfectly up to standard.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIGFzDmYj2VBw7MXVRDSojMwkKD_7RdihefMn4&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Jason Au","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuQkBpFBNxfDVCdPMZPlKNkod3AabrNZg7qk8g7qYjlMsYKR78=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place to grab HK style breakfast and lunch. Decent prices and the food is delicious. Would really recommend the pork chop. Food court can get very busy on the weekend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA8mlfsfq_OmMNBlQBrEsv5hhWiqsYBEkBl57R&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Smore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjSaUf7vOl2hGYXhAgxREDrK4inMpSiptrY_i_pmB_G1dvx0aI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you’re craving for cha chan teng breky,  this place will really hit the spot! No fuss, just order their signature “Satay Beef Instant Noodles Combo” with scrambled eggs & toast.  Their cup of yuan yang is ⭐️!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDZNQZ-s3k8absdLcAzobDefw40JNjgCiP1hDh&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"X C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWDLyl13mprvEmj4FbFEB0vsaF1P1nXZvaRVd_9Tu32pZ9oQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Needless to say, it was a big rice dish with lots of meat, rice and some cabbage at the bottom. (See the mountain of meat and rice in the photo). Expect at least 15-20 mins wait for both ordering and getting the rice dish.  I think this place is cash only.

The only inconvenience would be the food court itself. It’s very busy with tight seating, not a lot of tables. Parking is a bit tight as well. Beware of questionable drivers 😅.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPEspEYxkxoYVdrd4uYcZuE_CpzvGz_LFT4JiO&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Clement Chew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwKhl3mEn2gCZF6VdKbi7gB6oYfqEyv4ScXRvTHDS2H04sB70nmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I finally had the chance to visit the famous Cha Kee. The chicken with green onion on instant noodles was incredible—truly a unique dish I haven't seen anywhere else. The creamy scrambled eggs were the best I've had locally and are definitely best enjoyed on-site.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSN0pW9uWmqqp8K0okVp3yj4MCuqQ_7LvFeuHq&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-5-24"}]

title: Kong Tea

about: null
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Clarice C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrdWzy0Zz--pUp78fGbRh0SGJ7awWu81LKc6BVoicS6PSlgEmp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently got to try out Kong Tea's HK style milk tea and was pleasantly surprised by how good it was. I have tried to replicate the authentic HK style milk tea myself at home, and kept failing miserably. It is challenging to achieve that perfect balance of tea and milk, and they managed to capture that complexity effortlessly.

I can tell they put a lot of thought into this as I believe the success with their milk tea has a lot to do with the design of their filter, the grind size & blend of their tea.  While it does take a bit longer to prepare compared to standard instant milk teas (it takes at least 15 mins to make), the extra effort is definitely worth it.

Their other teas are equally great, I tried their HK Style lemon tea and their natural fruit tea, the balance of the tangy and sweet was just right. Definitely worth trying if you're a fan of milk tea or looking for a variety of high-quality HK style teas!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Fok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUjIC-Lsg8VL03mVlbwumcLx6AaK5f_zcULalkFlQQUQxIBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I learned about Kong Tea from YouTube channel Koarlo. I was very excited about their HK Milk Tea and HK Lemon Tea. Unfortunately, they do not deliver outside of Canada.

Long story short. I planned a trip to visit Vancouver last week traveling from California and chatted with someone from the Kong Tea website about ordering their products without a Canada physical address. They went above and beyond by arranging personal delivery even my order was about $100.

The delivery process felt very welcoming because the owner, 1st name initial (P) personally delivered the products to me with his family. They even did a little birthday surprise and their children drew a birthday card for me.

The owner also provided detail instructions on how to make the drinks. This is definitely the best customer service/white gloves service I ever received.  (While in Vancouver)

Ok. I finally have the chance to make the HK Milk Tea. Yes, it takes a little time but it's well worth it. I purchased the loose tea leaf and used a French pressed. The processed is simple by following the given instruction. This is by far the best HK style milk tea I ever had in Northern America. It reminds me of Hong Kong chaan teng.

In conclusion. 15mins is well worth the wait. This is no 3 in 1 instant. Plus, when you drink at the cha chaan teng. They have submerged the tea for a while. So, good quality takes time. (Back in US).

https://youtu.be/zoWE3Y50Ud8?si=P_L4V0IoQ0ZlZWig

Kongtea.ca","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Miu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgZtxXruHyt2z_TDWYFJvFK4Vn0OfEk8sHmjYRZ-9u-jSUxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good tea and very nice services.
Will buy again!🤩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwmnl7xFCbBpf7O1xTseLogvVjkAPt2g6heIDJ&fid=0x0:0x7e972aae0e8f55c1"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"【許星馳 channel】","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdcUXegVxsgUX_GY44rD3ZCdBcPxDHjh6dQz76DE6iRiQxKfCF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"非常開心喝到用心的茶品，「買到好東西，勝過每天工作賺錢」， 來！ 港茶一級棒

So happy to enjoy a good tea when you know it is real and high-quality product from Kong Tea shop.

Better buying a good thing than working everyday to make money.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Elisa Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2KnuzcVu8y_F-Ig0pQTw681CuVq4SxWE7iJrVGkkU0asuUQkf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When we travel we like to ask the locals where they go daily. Of high recommendations Steveston Coffee Company was consistently mentioned by the locals. We had a Cortado, Cappuccino, and hot chocolate.

Family run by husband and wife, this was a really nice coffeehouse. The owner spent some time talking to me about coffee and it was lovely. A must stop in as an iconic coffeehouse in Steveston.

Free street side parking is available (3 hour max), limited seating, tight space in coffeehouse.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN06rvSr8c3pZdt4v9GmNMMK0I-9ikAr5FJ0BnJ&fid=0x0:0xf9f565d785bca5ad"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Noor Pwala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX73wZYOxvQUP_-hEkhgMR6FFgRokITePDBxNfDv6fPUVkVp2BD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little cafe with great coffee; my caramel macchiato and my husband’s latte were fantastic. Would definitely recommend and if we ever visit steveston again, we will go back for sure!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnUbXxdgMaAqUu_RYuVktZKZ66FwuyCPsU2F-p&fid=0x0:0xf9f565d785bca5ad"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Bonnie Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnEc4L_oX33x1BIdSnyu3qIy05RmcbQP1bJwBirlW_Yv38YSLczA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice Flat white.
Croissant n scones r good 👍🏻 too. Consistent customers visits👍🏻😎
Wraps n bagel 🥯 writtebn on blackboard, 🤔 unsure if still serving as appeared not on menu","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxmNSlL1Fgef5Ft1eH2HnmZvOy6Je5sGjKgcan&fid=0x0:0xf9f565d785bca5ad"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"Kwong Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRNhrcdIOQyhkpCbdjoUSwC0OqkPEp5C09o-KZX9pyAsIQioX9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"☕🌧️ A Perfect Escape on a Rainy Day at Steveston Coffee 🌧️☕

On a rainy Sunday, I found solace in the cozy confines of Steveston Coffee Company near Fisherman's Wharf. Their Latte was a highlight, offering rich and comforting flavors that perfectly complemented the day's mood. The café's ambiance, with its warm and inviting decor, provided an ideal backdrop for relaxation. It's a great spot for anyone seeking a quiet retreat and a delicious coffee in Richmond.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJeGpIzlFjgQ5qVKp09q9mfSXVp7SVkbrv3JFh&fid=0x0:0xf9f565d785bca5ad"],"When":"2024-2-11"},{"Name":"Jack C.S. W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVdnkQxYRl2U4uADHQtHhnTZ3y5_vhQQs3Ney8YGmJee-llJ6NWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Looks like a family shop by an asia couple. Latte art could improve but the taste was great. Subtle uniqueness in the beans. Well priced, was pretty busy in the morning, but smooth operation by the experienced couple.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6qfa_gZLPkXjX2j0bpStStjafaTnEBEOp7eMq&fid=0x0:0xf9f565d785bca5ad"],"When":"2023-12-16"},{"Name":"Ken Mogridge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3Ml8d1_DawOEpC9BGDlwnu-HDiERRmxYUGKPaV0u2VlGki3R9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome coffee. Great selection. Treats for 4 legged visitors. Sit in or out.
Perfect place to chill during a visit to Steveston","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven Tanaka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWK9bDs4c7P7rYbjduLt85BsSIhstBOchiaNtMf2MR90wxUVEc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I prefer to support local independent shops but unfortunately I was disappointed by the attitude of the owner/barista.  I asked to use the washroom before ordering and she insisted that I order first.  Understandably in busy times, washroom access can be an issue for public.  However, I am clearly not a homeless person and intended on making a purchase.

The americano was tasty and the environment would, otherwise, be comfortable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"__","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURtewwsqVG5PO3uKPn3OOA0FnfaP0WZtSfpikwyWKQHm8YamdS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always make a stop in Steveston when going to Vancouver from Seattle, and the Steveston Coffee Company is one of the reasons why. The cafe is clean and nicely decorated. Menu has many options for coffee drinks and bakery items. The brands they use are roasted in a way that makes them coffee really flavorful and not bitter - it's better than most coffee places in Seattle.

I would enthusiastically recommend Steveston Coffee Company.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOv1t_VmCoEm2aVgWMkHBdqUftJttkB-rgttEqn&fid=0x0:0xf9f565d785bca5ad"],"When":"2023-8-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bernie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPXTBFQGy4UZogf6r0hGxUGZ8fvtwePPN5iicbAtQksaWtpwOP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A coffee place gem at the Lansdowne Foodcourt. I tried this coffee shop for a Western breakfast craving.  Got a brewed coffee and a yummy waffle with cream and maple syrup. They also have a variety of delicious baked products.   As an avid coffee drinker, I loved the robust taste of freshly brewed coffee. You get your money’s worth.  The staff is great, fast and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzXIzb84_Per-vJf36yNin2tIWR61KDeGp5kzJ&fid=0x0:0x9e21d05cd22a00c0"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing coffee shop! I was very impressed by the quality of their products and their very reasonable and affordable prices. I highly reccomend the regular banana flavoured bubble tea with coconut jelly ($3.95)! It tastes just like a British banana milkshake. Plus, with any drink, you can add on two fresh made waffles with whipped cream and syrup for only $2.50! It's delicious too. They also have fresh baked scones that I want to try in the future. Highly reccomend this place if you are in Landsdowne food court. Service is absolutely excellent too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNP-WumdSLTHD-d2247RiIderR5_PTs_r-xJ_--&fid=0x0:0x9e21d05cd22a00c0"],"When":"2021-6-12"},{"Name":"Romarie R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzW5qJ6Byk1R2-iF2t8IobirxqbxjnMZt96PK0T0go7mibDUc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been eyeing to try for a very long time. So today I finally tried it. I was planning to get a coffee and one pastries but it change. Because I walk all the way here I feel so hot so I ordered Iced Latte then I saw the poster on the cashier Waffle ($2.50 additional for any ordered of a drink) So I asked the nice lady working if I can order it. She said yes but I need to wait for couple of minutes.  I was like sure.  She also asked me if I want some sugar on my iced latte. So friendly . She's the only one working that morning i feel so bad cause she just open 10am and I ordered a Waffle 😅 she's already busy before that. So she gave me first my latte and I just stayed on the corner waiting for my waffle I expect it will take a while cause she is so busy but no less than 3 mins. I feel inlove more cause of the smell so fresh why she is making it. Overall I purchased $7 something. Not bad at all. The Waffle came in 2 pcs with whipped cream on top and maple syrup on the side. I would definitely comeback here again and try their scones,brownies I saw first 😁😉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfQnz8ieUDWZ5JPJJ84Keax0XpuYU-VaQmm6v_&fid=0x0:0x9e21d05cd22a00c0"],"When":"2022-7-5"},{"Name":"Urvashi Gautam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-JsBPWns7aDcToqon1F-acNN3eI1Edex5K-ajgTHAwvHKoBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this charming coffee shop and had a delightful experience. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, but what truly sets it apart is the friendly staff. The service is exceptional, with a special shout-out to the wonderful barista who is always welcoming with a bright smile. The coffee is fantastic, but it's the warm hospitality that makes this place a standout gem. Highly recommended for a cozy and delightful coffee experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOr9EeiCzib9q4QtRVmtgBoayEi9D6BGzHdG1Il&fid=0x0:0x9e21d05cd22a00c0"],"When":"2023-12-6"},{"Name":"Austin Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHum01ey_MeIMUYynBQNNqO3jAErV-Sh_aZuntzxtn7df5Nw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Underrated. I have visited My Coffee numerous times now, primarily ordering the Mocha Frapp. The flavour is rich and tastes high quality. The consistency and how long the drink stays a frapp/slush/smoothie seems to be better and longer than other drink stores, including Starbucks, Tim Hortons, and the multitude of bubble tea stores. The prices are slightly cheaper than competitors as well.

Another menu item I have tried is the Green Tea Matcha Frapp. The taste reminds me of green tea-flavoured ice cream.

As of now, I have ordered from two different employees, but both are extremely friendly and efficient. If the rest of the menu is as high quality as the two items I have tried, My Coffee is definitely a place to visit and revisit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQgfNGKRixqbreonfYuxPPS7l4lxVqSo1Cg_sB&fid=0x0:0x9e21d05cd22a00c0"],"When":"2023-4-8"},{"Name":"R T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3qKHbtmD1fo11AAGY9Zyb-prKTL50gjE8OiiO4xLjhrjKJ2Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a surprise to find it in food court!
The waffle taste good, and the most astonishing is the HK style tea. It tastes exactly like the local HK "stocking tea" 絲襪奶茶！ I definitely will come agaiin! 👍👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_6g9Lkl8UrniRLQivepR5LiVDP66lyziGImnf&fid=0x0:0x9e21d05cd22a00c0"],"When":"2023-8-7"},{"Name":"chinwe Crystal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDaR07RBVX8kIWuLnj6kWc7H0I1IyEVHyEj8ll_AWRH2ajKA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Most of these reviews are just lies I had high hopes ordered caramel macchiato with oatmilk it was horrible alongside I got Sausage roll big mistake! I wasted my $12 I left the order at the counter the staff there had no empathy! Guys don’t bother going here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1f-vpJowrhq5vNtDaB7CQ0XS9FqpDitQrWmnWHwwrRZ12Ww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are at Lansdowne Mall and you need a strong jolt of good coffee, then this is the place for you. In addition to your usual coffee, they also make frappes, macchiato and the like, with real espresso shots! A definite must have if you are doing marathon shopping around the mall!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Steveston Cafe & Hotel
descriptions: Unfussy rooms, some with whirlpool tubs, in an 1895 hotel with a cafe, a liquor store & free WiFi.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Hard liquor","enabled":true},{"name":"Wine","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true},{"name":"Brunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Family-friendly","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Holly Woosey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV2lbZeCEe9uk_tp5v5HeEBpd05cOkWx2bWGKGCFJqdBVjRakcIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5* REVIEW IS FOR THE CAFE ONLY!

Cafe was excellent, really tasty food for a great price! The server was really friendly and helpful even though it was really busy and she was the only person on the floor. Definitely recommend the cafe for a good brunch.

The hotel I wouldn't recommend which is unfortunate, the staff were really helpful and nice, but they have a mouse and damp problem which lead us to changing rooms twice, due to pests and the smell/wet floors. The location is perfect though and if you are able to request a room on the front of the property I think it would be okay. The two rooms we had to move from were on the inside next to the low lying roof of the neighboring building.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Natalie Bull","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWf-cGMn_sV_l8bgFrRjWM93w9ZU2Q5V0l1sQ2zgiCEusIf24lggw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately I would not recommend this hotel until the mouse problem has been dealt with. We experienced hearing and seeing mice in our room at night, and had my purse completely bitten through by a mouse! Absolutely unsafe and unacceptable. We did not sleep at all the second night and left in the night to find a different hotel. We have had no response from the owners regarding our complaint.

Pros: good breakfast at neighbouring cafe, cute area","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"theodore francis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTSetJGCZSIvm0AtUnutt8BO6unSa4domn89NlrFeNQXq3IA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"oh boy well its look great and the town is special and charming, and there is heaps to enjoy and the staff try really hard but even though the pictures look good the rooms fail because of the mice/pest problem which makes you feel dirty and scared to put your feet on the ground. The beds are comfortable, the hot water takes ages to warm up, the tv etc all work but our bags were eaten by mice/rats, we heard noises at night but did not know until morning what had happened , food damaged and luggage. We could not get these thoughts out of our mind for the rest of the stay. the cafe breakfast is a nice looking place but a really controlled set up, you are not allowed to help yourself to a tea/coffee or jam or spoon you are not allowed to touch anything you have to wait to be served by one busy crazy lady, make sure you do what you are told and dont rock the boat !!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alexandre Contreras","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOw3b8mqN_9Z1ApZuHogzs37t-GRfam69BRQGJnjecXJ4Aw84e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"CONS: Room walls are made of paper, you can hear the hallway, very noisy, especially the hallway doors that bang constantly. It's hard to sleep at night when guests arrive or leave at 2 am. The shower is a hazard, it was so slippery. It requires a carpet or some sort of protection. I don't know if it was just our room, but I've never seen a tub so slippery. The room is pretty old, no fridge or microwave.

PROS: Staff was super friendly. Very well located, close to the airport and tons of restaurants and things to do around. Free parking for guests.

Overall, I would not recommend this hotel mainly because of the noise.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Falk von Metzen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSkgNG296rYM5u4fMvB8T_GxhmAzN4wFlsuVRIXJ79G8MDnHLS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The hotel is very well located! The price-performance ratio is fine if you book early enough. Yes it could do with a little renovation, but it didn't bother us.

I had drinks in the laundry basin to cool (unfortunately there is no fridge) and when we came back to the hotel in the evening, there was ice in the sink. What a nice service.

We had a small problem with the room, which was dealt with immediately and without complications! Thank you for that! We will be back on our next vacation in Canada.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vlade Patterson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM4ueYAVWh31RWSZpkcc8C4noJ_G9MjIF_WsTT3RGs4MwnVpjP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The hotel is Ok, nothing fancy About its outdated structure, and old style architecture. It is clean but stuffy. In good location, and cheaper than other hotels in the area.

The music bar downstairs is playing extremely loud music until 2AM, hotel has little soundproofing. Each beat vibrates the entire room. That entire walls shake. The reviews we found later have guest complaining for the past 2 years.

The management absolutely does not care, since nothing has been done about it for the past years.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nagisa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqXPNpu-jbMwJgl8cFVObs452H5IrrA3B8jU_qFa4Eq3UrnrMN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Staff was amazing! He clean up quickly and accept early check in. This hotel have only steps but he brought my little heave laggage :) thank you so much :). room key is only U lock.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Irving Salsbury","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHN5uty1a2s4R74gE3QR4yq-3dJFVGy1U-GJGx71xf01f5H1Zu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have to say that I am a frequent visitor to Steveston, it's a date night for the wife and me as we come from Everett, Wa.  The pub next store is our gathering place for our Canadian friends and the staff there (mostly Nick, the bartender) is incredible and attentive.  The charm of this hotel, the cafe for bfast and the pub, and the warmth of our friends add to our incredible date night! Let's always have this for all people to enjoy!!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"This food","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaxcCslaGrcC0u202g67ni7XJGWWGyPYtSKkUjWo5gpcXXO0Yv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A hidden gem in Steveston, Richmond. Korean-Western cuisine that’s a must try. We had the fried chicken waffles and Korean bugolgi eggs benny including their strawberry matcha cold latte beverage - all a must try! Decent pricing for the portions (approx. under $25 per our dishes). They have a camera Photo Booth where you can print your photo. They have maximized the seating space all the way to the door. Hopefully one day they will open a second location or a larger restaurant as this branch will get even more popular in no time. Will be returning and recommending to other locals! Truly a Korean restaurant just like back in Seoul, Korea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKEzOp_7WZFQcJraDUbUZp_CKN5d9ggsRsJ_Ef&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Kelly Argue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHguvt2mUYK3ZLLT7t42H3YMBdzPp4wF0FbC-_ZBGyrnECZG3faw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We happened upon this place after coffee, at 1:30 on a Tuesday we walked right in and got seated immediately. Loved the ambiance. We were served immediately, and our food came out very fast. I got the avocado eggs Benedict, and it tasted good but my only complaint was that it was not warm - the eggs or the bread and the holiday sauce was a smidge above room temperature. My friend had the salad and she absolutely devoured it. All in all really good experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLwQAyDLFgsIsGk68YJAGW1O89CJjtgaq6Hxx2&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Josh Kitagawa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCvbFsAmQKXq7eYwIwTFh7lGkN3BybRNmerg8V0KRS7uDJMw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A certain return to spot! Had a great morning walking along the Richmond Dyke, and for brunch afterwards we stopped at Toast to Coast. We weren’t too sure what to expect going in, but were both super super impressed with the food. We got the walk around the block and the Super Bowl and both were outstanding in their own way. Honestly one of the better if not best meals out we had both had in a while. Looking forward to the next time we drop in :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOpsYpHqKZreGxWznBhe6Fsq7uDnWIfyJh5IjP&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Holly Woosey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV2lbZeCEe9uk_tp5v5HeEBpd05cOkWx2bWGKGCFJqdBVjRakcIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time at Toast to Coast and were not disappointed. Really tasty food with large portions (definitely worth the price) we shared the Fisherman's Feast and the Pancakes and we were both stuffed! Loved the atmosphere/music was real chill and the staff were very attentive and helpful. Great place for a lovely brunch","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJoSR1iRK-O7LnHIv_yzY-DpOM75-6HHVnLRe8&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Hanson Kang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU05sdPHWWx_fwM9XAZhPqjZSqP90re58KpNh9FAdqd8EPWk7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There are quite a few brunch spots in Steveston but I came to this one due to the reviews -- did not disappoint! It's a must-visit for any enjoyers of a unique brunch experience. The Korean-inspired menu adds a fun twist to Canadian classics, and the ambiance is top-notch. The interior feels clean and well-planned out, with a cute photo booth, too.

I tried the Fisherman's Feast and the Korean Fried Chicken & Waffles, and the latter was especially delicious. The portions are great, and each dish comes with very nice complementary sides, like the hash brown blocks, assorted house-made pickles, and creative sauces (the waffles came with a gochujang-inspired syrup).

I've read a few comments about service, but it's probably as good as it can be with the limited staff and busy clientele, as there was a line to get in. Our orders were promptly taken, and food arrived quickly.

I will be revisiting the next time I visit Steveston!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT-px7rpGMDAN_Q6N5eJ_VeYO5L1eoPiUmd2lg&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"good times","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlXM1yie2CwXWjZm6fYTFK1Gh8ZCQs6kWWZyWD3G60SgLd8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A small place, so with a party of 4 you will have to wait.  They told us 30mins. (but it was 10min) We gave them our number, and walked around town. Plenty of places to visit.
Received the call and got seated. Servers were very nice.  The food was fantastic.  I had eggs benny with the aged bacon and a strawberry spiked lemonade.

Very nice town many places to visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0lAtKIzEjRbjKuz-nAu34SbyVvDsZN6_2J6QI&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Jah Baraquiel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdBuhq7i5xDfhlyZYWuv00vGsCGhiHgFR8xbt2-zWDkYkrepBh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"foods are superb 👌 staffs are also accommodating especially the owner. She’s one of the kindest person we’ve met. We’ll definitely come back and recommend it to our fam ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOF0bBO-e5spip9tHXr-4ztmNTb9t8TNoHJ5OIK&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Validorae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrAD3iajv4Yp09hKvvxZPV0GJ9zhq3gwKPSikmfm1tkCKmtL8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been here many times, and the food quality has always been excellent. The flavors are particularly amazing. I especially love their matcha latte, it’s the best I've had in Vancouver!
Today, on this cold rainy day, we came back, and the owner warmly welcomed us with two drinks, making us feel truly warm inside. Thank you Toast to Coast, you made my day :)  Will come back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeidmk9WirpC76rMyBM7mEMEOrouYzSMx6jkQB&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-10-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mehr Poulad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnMmsASCmXLOvaFhR1RoQ03vxNx7oVUBdwy_npEYvb7k7uZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good coffee and a great space to be in.
Ordered an americano, double espresso and an ice coffee. All three were great and the coffee is strong which I like. Lots of seating inside with high ceilings making it welcoming. Only issue is parking as it is on a very busy corner in a very busy area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNh08BJWTaqqYz8XcF4bOOIW0ETKZChiBHoLTx&fid=0x0:0xd56b9b190e08affe"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Thomas Vigneras","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJvDiINYP35wd3GhLGnyiOKFGZdLMj1Qu_huXskJeuw6aCOxDDMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place. Been here multiple times and the coffee is always on point. Got really good mokas this time as shown in the photo. Basque cheese cake was fabulous and the ham and cheese croissant quite good although the croissant quality doesn't match that of a real French bakery (hard to find good quality croissants in B.C. anyways).
Nice vibes for a little coffee brunch with friends and family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkic-X_U7cvvXdvEWLeEmqmPWjj4yaw1WI9fEx&fid=0x0:0xd56b9b190e08affe"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Yumi Nagahara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1l7716Bdm3-_SmQySMKOTNUKz4oK28vziry7XdxpvYW3NMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently enjoyed a delightful passion fruit tea, and it was such a comforting experience. The space has plenty of seats, making it a wonderful spot to unwind and truly relax. It’s nice to have a place where you can take a moment to yourself!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-S2fkzaQb_hdgsZpEI0k81yy1ZFlfuMhjta38&fid=0x0:0xd56b9b190e08affe"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Justin Stauffer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVkFmxVsaPtl5lwafZaRPB8PoSFeUaNgiBHp6zFo-x6C4-0pLN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Super cool place for a small bite to eat and coffee/tea. The food and drinks are excellent. That being said the service was a bit below par, just slightly ignorant staff and the need to bring our dishes to a bin (which I don’t mind doing, however they should make the bin area a bit more nice and more obvious to the entire cafe).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXv-8kLcR5LIh8Ode9hJ1xDwiU1e0cahz644Ol&fid=0x0:0xd56b9b190e08affe"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rocanini Coffee has always been our go-to spot when we're in Steveston. It’s hands down the #1 café in the area in terms of coffee, vibe, and service! Every time we’re nearby, we make it a point to stop by. The Aeropress coffee is my personal favorite, and their mocha, latte, and coffee jelly are all top-notch. Their croissants and sandwiches are always fresh and make for a perfect pairing with the coffee. The cozy ambiance and friendly staff make it an even better experience. We'll definitely be back again and again! Highly recommend this gem.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2ZxQYLDHk2Is_JTpZHeJoj71ueET2Np-oDnYX&fid=0x0:0xd56b9b190e08affe"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Marcos Alejandro Badra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTLtd9nTY-LLq4HPTmhq6AheFYUM0AowvvUad4ue9KcNlgdemgnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I visit Rocanini Cafe at least once a week, and while it has its charms, there are a few areas that could use improvement. The location is generally great, and I've noticed a positive change in the service lately. The attendants and servers have become friendlier and more engaging, making an effort to connect with customers and smile, which enhances the overall experience.However, the cafe could benefit from better cleanliness. The tables are often sticky, and the worn table finishes make it difficult to maintain a clean appearance.

Additionally, the tables are quite wobbly, leading to spilled beverages, which can be frustrating.While the food is quite expensive, I feel the quality of the products used doesn't fully justify the high prices. Some improvement in this area would make the experience much more satisfying.

Rocanini has potential and provides a pleasant atmosphere, but addressing these issues would greatly enhance the experience for regular customers like myself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuJr6I4KnHvpGaQ6plwSLTYfxa_35aphV0eb1n&fid=0x0:0xd56b9b190e08affe"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Paulina Pedrero Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoiOld2vaC2Dv18bWNi8EDRiykD7MSCRsU3RK7RESh6xQghXxb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The place is a nice coffee shop, yesterday was a rainy and chilly day, we go for a drink, we ordered a cold yuzu honey tea that was really good!, but the blue matcha latte was so bland that the only flavor you can perceive was milk, i didn’t drink totally it wasn’t worth it, the restrooms were also so dirty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6YsKaSnUNic2EPJ86TqA7h9Z3YHBw6WWbatUE&fid=0x0:0xd56b9b190e08affe"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Barbara Heller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyc8ymVKjSMQliaWvMZrRZBuD4gNfPzFaJuyTEEGYXXqehUXq7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a lovely place! I came back a 2nd time before flying home because I enjoyed the first trip here so much! I enjoyed the Hojicha latte!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVOZ1iPQfRoo-Bs4_Sw4_9YHGc5eiRFb5XS9rA&fid=0x0:0xd56b9b190e08affe"],"When":"2024-9-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"S J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINOajWqz0XV0vpC9IsQo0JnRUsZU5BE2RJJx-pBiB4H1nJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience here. I ordered the poached peach granola bowl - the portion was huge, delicious, and very reasonably priced. Iced latte tasted burnt though. But most importantly, they are pet-friendly. My friend, her puppy, and I sat on the patio on a rainy October day. Their patio is covered and heated, which is great even in lousy weather.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwxJFhfrY6PGKIN7HYpy8vbQ4GpycnHxU9ajQ&fid=0x0:0x2f3117ede1dd491c"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Turtlekeeper Designs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZmq2g731Yc8XnFSpBiniWaYnYNraL7GVOPNZyVCF5ChC8dro=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Casual cafe. Bright with indoor and outdoor seating. Nice servers. Healthy food menu available!  Food was fresh and looked like care was taken in presentation.  We were so hungry and the food was so good I forgot to take pics of my companions’ food until they were partway done. Oops.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPL6_lx7Pj8q7OSSf-P1iv2_5FwT4v_0GNnSvXJ&fid=0x0:0x2f3117ede1dd491c"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Nathan R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNn0dQ7dlU8l9n6uQSJCYngVxoJQg5dtCAXhDC50DzdQml0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I'm disappointed with the food and the service at this establishment. We got take out on friday night and ended up finding a hair in my food🤢.

The service was poor and the waitress was rude. I explained to her that I found hair in the fish and chips but she didn't seem to be very caring. I asked for a refund and my money back.After I was given the cash I was informed that she cannot remake it. It's quite ridiculous that I have to spend my time coming back with the food and you guys can't even have a bother to make it right? Why should I even bother giving a tip and spending my money here if this is how they treat customers? This is not the first time we have dealt with a rude waitress.

I do not recommend coming here at all! I suggest going elsewhere in the village where the service is better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMavn7CEBjB6kNaYVFVdGfFmUZKupnNkToZM_eU&fid=0x0:0x2f3117ede1dd491c"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Kelly Hrelja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVWh8qmVdPEfqahFaQ6ox93SOukCBaQIQqwS9jEApuOOnHfC4ZzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great (and strong) cocktails, a diverse range of beers, and tasty food! Definitely worth the visit when in Steveston.

I was pleasantly surprised by how large the serving of truffle fries was.

Really lovely patio space as well. Would go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbEy5FxWoHm4G2M3CeyUb88yIZ9-fP63Nzecf7&fid=0x0:0x2f3117ede1dd491c"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Maschanka Fernandes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7ToBWhyLBbGLZ9_8uWWhNnrT3Kh2_4kSVOU9RxE3Xv4dVckVdYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I'm surprised I haven't been here before. It's so lovely inside. Came in on a Tuesday night so it wasn't too busy. Tried the salmon burger and the shrimp and crab spaghetti and both were delicious. Lovely interiors, good food and kind servers what more could you ask for?!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8USZknU9rZP6JrPOEGcQd2yj0gXJmbFvi2lEM&fid=0x0:0x2f3117ede1dd491c"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Matthew L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKc9fHn8uXVktnQv8aocHCHj44Jm3-C13gSis0GjGhXqRQXFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A nice brewery and restaurant in Richmond. This was my first time there, and the staff, food, and beers were all great. A definite recommend for all those visiting the area, and be sure to try a flight of their beer as well as their clam chowder.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBPwbK4-4fm8JkoAFVuIW6qyRLxemldYPmhfNF&fid=0x0:0x2f3117ede1dd491c"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice atmosphere and good service. Their miso glazed cod is pretty good and I loved the risotto that came with it. Would come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzVkGvF2aUby8dkYHvrKSUWWL2WxX75QVhPSpG&fid=0x0:0x2f3117ede1dd491c"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Vivian Ly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWymnfRRGxsO6LjaKcayb9Cx0WHFTJm7tpbK6onLJDZ7RN5LmN9eA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here to for a friends birthday lunch and didn’t realize it was Dine Out Vancouver.

Small but cute and cozy restaurant, recommend getting reservations for a weekend. We were able to be seated right away at the bar luckily!

Our server/bartender was very kind and friendly. Gave some great suggestions for cocktails!

Food came out quickly and the portions were big! I really enjoyed the dine out menu, we all ordered something different to try everything. Would definitely come back.

Some topic picks are the ratatouille, fried chicken, prawns and crab spaghettini, salmon, and the butterfly sour cocktail!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMX-uOnfc3bfoYLL20pQtnzADT1sbSp1g4MAnz2&fid=0x0:0x2f3117ede1dd491c"],"When":"2024-1-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful, clean, and well organized store with a mix of different products. You can find bags, cards, tea, mugs, kettle, art, notebooks, wallets, plates, and a variety of items that you might want or to gift. There is a small sales section with products from the last season. Prices are clearly labelled on the products.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbem-zSFYWHph9L1ErwHZ6QQF7mnZpAiNbD2ST&fid=0x0:0x7457382b13c73aee"],"When":"2023-9-9"},{"Name":"annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbDoafZUiJThEes39-4Rzltsf9mgFaBsgEy-VPl0HLeQRyTEcd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"i was visiting this store while in the wharf village and it’s such a minimalistic yet whimsical sort of store and i enjoyed my entire experience here. the curated selection of items really fits into that category of like small upscale luxuries that really elevate a small aspect of your life. this store introduced me to many new brands i’ve never heard of and i think pricing wise, is very fair (and actually less than what i would normally get it for from where i’m from). i would def recommend stopping by if you’re visiting the wharf village in general!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSNJ3qAecGETIc9AqiIMW1bLXLjYotFcAkW8Ng&fid=0x0:0x7457382b13c73aee"],"When":"2023-5-17"},{"Name":"Michael Bemmels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_f_39W9WsafzfxLjM2tAdXBG3Rt-etERudRitBGMlNp_8WCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful selection of teas! Very unique flavours and blends. You can smell samples of the blends in the store too. Reasonable prices. I've gone here several times and would highly recommend it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chef Menajem Peretz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFHHucZwQOsfB8-8SKRbUjhOVQd_5RL6RbAdEZcnLC3uuqNK4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Look at this place for a while, but do to covid mostly the time was close, I was very happy last week to finally get inside, what a nice gift shop it is, with options for any taste and all very well curated. And of course the Tea Selection is great, I trying a few of the teas and they are very good. if you are in the area worth the visit. Excellent  customer service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyBCu6AElo_rWjV8OWYGiZqitd8Xs9a4KAKTc&fid=0x0:0x7457382b13c73aee"],"When":"2021-6-7"},{"Name":"Wendy Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTnNP_AF26NyTVKm_5CJvhklfI7iIuCWi9qbbOodgp57BMGUbb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful shop, staff and selection of pens, teas and potions. Had so much fun picking out new pens. Great help from staff. A must visit while in Steveston.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paulina Pedrero Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoiOld2vaC2Dv18bWNi8EDRiykD7MSCRsU3RK7RESh6xQghXxb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a lovely store!, they have great quality items, pencils, pens, posters, home fragrances and more!, but the best part is the tea 🫖😋, great options and perfect for a gift!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOazGKlNWhy4FLlNYyyXfr_1Br4ZJ6g2ShOvJBW&fid=0x0:0x7457382b13c73aee"],"When":"2024-1-29"},{"Name":"Eunice Marie Lazarro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIpWV7Ianu3lp7UKxAWLNn5MYkXPGIDroKxn-xQXYdXRvzNHrsjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"While roaming around Steveston, I found this beautiful store - Nikaido. They have a great variety of pens, stationary, tote bags, variety of teas and tea sets & more.

We purchased a Sukura & Decaf C.E.G  Tea - It is really good and I definitely recommend checking out their store, has an amazing aroma & atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN061WUoB-SxeysLAYRWyLrPDUs8gNCE4hC785g&fid=0x0:0x7457382b13c73aee"],"When":"2023-6-30"},{"Name":"Jerry Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1Y_9N1HnHcXwZEGEOUXgCIz67JQSQuPlTlEyvhWQ1oVqzgKFu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wicked cool and is absolutely representative of the steveston area. For those that don't know steveston is heavily tied with japanese fisherman and war history. Take a look if you have time and this store represents this.

It has cool asian-pacific works of art and accessories. It has cards, pens, wallets, antiques, just cool indiegogo kickstarter style items. When I travel I look for places like this.

I wouldn't say anything is overpriced but it is definitely in the $$$ category. We got a cute jellyfish puzzle and it's been weeks and we haven't finished yet. Fun covid!

I want the store owner to design my home if she could.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCXoqAU9U32qmu1l6MRaTi7jtge9-etGWQKYas&fid=0x0:0x7457382b13c73aee"],"When":"2021-2-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kwong Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRNhrcdIOQyhkpCbdjoUSwC0OqkPEp5C09o-KZX9pyAsIQioX9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"🍳 Perfect Family Brunch Spot at Breakfast Table Steveston! 🍳

🌞 Finally got to try the Breakfast Table—this time at their Steveston location after visiting Fisherman’s Wharf. The cozy, welcoming vibe was perfect for a family brunch. With a lovely rustic-chic decor and bright natural lighting, it’s an Instagram-worthy spot. The kids loved it and are already asking when we can go back!

🥞 The food was fantastic! We enjoyed both savory and sweet options, all beautifully presented on charming rustic plates. The portions were generous, and everything was packed with flavor. The staff was super friendly, and the restaurant was very accommodating for families.

🍴 Located right in Steveston Village, it’s a perfect spot to fuel up before exploring. The relaxed atmosphere and attention to detail make it a wonderful place to start the day.

⭐️ Breakfast Table Steveston is a must-visit for anyone in the area. Whether you’re a local or just visiting, it’s a delightful spot for brunch with family or friends. We’ll definitely be returning for another round soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9npqzVPmN3LB2nuejkj3XjcrFRpBmgLRa7Vsi&fid=0x0:0x4a438523437804c"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"T Dang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMSEwMA3m2f2pUNvDSD01evNvY5ImU08gKtdPmCpcdgJy2LmVY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably one of the best brunch places I’ve been to in a long time. Every single staff member is so kind and respectful. Even when walking by them to go to the washroom, they’ll step aside and let you by with a big smile on their face. It’s so rare these days to see this kind of service.

The food was so good too. Can’t say enough good things. Only wished they had a kids menu but the sides were pretty good so we made it work. 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpZSncihfvJnA5hnV4Da9BX-zv8xoq4fbkQAVe&fid=0x0:0x4a438523437804c"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Tyra Baltram","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvzE7mZZZY3BoRgyYVAmckgE999jzZibrXNp_9UUb3Q9Lw6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Breakfast Table is a cute little brunch spot in Steveston, close to the pier. When we arrived, there wasn't a long wait for our group of four to be seated. The service was amazing! Our server was so friendly and quick too.

Everyone ordered drinks; I picked a Steveston Sunrise and it was absolutely delicious. Very sweet and a perfect pairing for brunch. I also got a Hipster Benedict because I wanted to try their house made bacon, with fries instead of breakfast potatoes.

Overall, I was not too impressed with their Benedict. The eggs were poached well, but I didn't get a lot of flavor in them. The bacon was also only just okay, which was a shame, I was expecting to be impressed! However, the fries were amazing. They had tons of flavour and seasoning and every bite was delicious. I was so pleased with the taste and couldn't get enough!

Ultimately, I should've picked their current special, a steak and egg sandwich, but I know for next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO85-3rM7kvTOpSQ7k7wtEmXF_Hl01NkshDBuRG&fid=0x0:0x4a438523437804c"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Shirley Lew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_zh2rXt6NRpS7hUVsiSyPxmUiDc5QqHYAiVjYQIeJIj5ygA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to Steveston for breakfast on a Saturday and found a gem. The staff was so kind and friendly. She was very knowledgeable of the menu and made great recommendations. The avocado toast with smoked salmon and poached egg tasted so fresh and light. We also had the chicken and waffle with Brussels sprouts was also amazing. Try to get there early.. and enjoy the serenity before Stevenson touristy hour!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3Pf_vrBjrOCO5eM9rdiSCHduhCQxpSuMUn8fN&fid=0x0:0x4a438523437804c"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Dave Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL544JfNo-heg8UsP95fr9shcrTY9pTTKZqcIgOMgLc7F2usw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little restaurant in Steveston village. It has a little twist on the standard breakfast with a Korean fusion infusion. All of the standard meal that you would expect wth a very nice surprise twist. Staff is very accommodating and friendly. Parking is on the street right out front.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZuC5WWMcXtjM1KYRYV5cRn3C9WRS2rUeAKwP0&fid=0x0:0x4a438523437804c"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Agnes G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKArPrkBFRutixEQunjb2zrjlckEKRTU-61HutgiIMCw-CpUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Still quite busy on a rainy day, but surprisingly quick service, lovely staff. Eggs benedict exceptional, potatoes freshly cooked, hot and crispy on the sides. Will come back to try their Asian-fusion menu items!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMenQ4vlxVhvdewoAafDh-ASRbecC4dQjS8V68&fid=0x0:0x4a438523437804c"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Mikayla O`Leary","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWD3JRgziQcE-_PzCbOfMc6pc3d2Y7aMwDmw4DAe0Cf43RBim8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Brunch here was delicious! My partner got an omelette, with some of the best sautéed vegetables EVER, and I got the Challah French Toast (half) and Gluten Free Vanilla Waffle. Both were DELICIOUS! I am not GF, but the waffle tasted no different than a regular one! The salted caramel latte was also amazing! The staff were amazingly friendly! Very clean and modern vibes, would highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJNUx3-X8Ukru2xosdDqoXyN1AB-bgNyawU_Me&fid=0x0:0x4a438523437804c"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Doug W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhy5zidbGw7YT76n8e23XBKnwnPzmd2NsZebIoBJ1bZgTIBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Spotlessly clean, friendly and courteous staff, good but not great food.  Recently had a late breakfast (a vegetarian omelette) and very much enjoyed the meal.  The service was top notch, however the food was merely ok, bordering on good.  Their menu is a little bougie, but it’s that kind of place.  I also found their prices to be somewhat higher than the average for this type of place.  They did however appear to have very high quality ingredients.  The coffee was excellent, and they were fairly quick with refills.  4/5 is a bit generous for the food, their service however earned an honest 5/5.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3iSvyHkDzm3dh79dE6iAxtI71K9F_bnjQwjll&fid=0x0:0x4a438523437804c"],"When":"2024-10-30"}]
