user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sarah Wootty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7AAitqYRi3Dv8-ARHluxK55qFjxWTN-sqFKnOyb-SK5eVruA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is in my top 3 favourite brunch spots in Richmond. The food is always fresh and delicious and they have a great selection of hot and cold drinks. My favourites have been the chicken and waffles, truffle brisket Benny, and the hearty breakfast. The garlic hashbrowns are delightfully crispy. The truffle brisket Benny was exploding with truffle flavour. I’m obsessed! The little side salad that comes with your meal is simple, fresh, light and so tasty that I always eat every single bit of it, and I’m someone who usually ignores a side salad. Service is always friendly and efficient and the place seems well cared for. If you love hot sauce, you’ll love the options here - there’s at least 14 different kinds. The only downside is that there aren’t many tables in the restaurant so they can only serve about 8 or 9 groups at a time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMW-gdL1y91Fn8bgmqV9sTq6pvqyRX4AyP4KS3z&fid=0x0:0x27adf75c5ce9570a"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Finally made it to Chef's Playground in the beautiful town of Steveston. We had lunch and the wait was about 10-15 minutes, but it was worth it! The food was spot on, and the portions were HUGE. My personal favorite was the Texas BBQ burger – the combination of beef brisket, beef patty, and fresh veggies was perfect. My wife really enjoyed the chicken curry burger, though it wasn’t my favorite since I’m not big on fried chicken. The boys had chicken waffles and loved them, though the waffle was on the sweeter side – I'd recommend trying it before adding syrup.

What truly stood out was the fresh juice of the day – super refreshing! The ambiance here is warm and welcoming, and the staff was friendly and attentive. Definitely a place we’ll be visiting again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMF-_lKpkgOrNTidoahy_8cMDeRqQTvIBRNkTvw&fid=0x0:0x27adf75c5ce9570a"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Richard Oxlade","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6dmdsmRg8ls0W8KfTsxibV4XJj0l366DGgb_zQ42TaifdINNk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time exploring the Steveston area and decided to try a new brunch spot. The service is friendly and prompt when arriving and the menu has a decent amount of unique brunch items suitable for any dietary needs.

I was very impressed by the efficiency and quality of the ingredients making it a delightful start to the day. I got the Fried Chicken Benny which was amazing in every way and exactly as great as you’d hope it would be. Definitely worth coming back here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdRBvb3XA8L6W5FFMs01apPf9YXIDPUr8Tl6Lc&fid=0x0:0x27adf75c5ce9570a"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Caelin G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLGC4bNAQk1QiGf1k6SS7zGCvN-prlMszCXle0MDeZpWWLgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a calm and relaxing atmosphere here on a Saturday afternoon. It feels like a small seaside town with a lot of diverse options on eatery! Lots of street parking and paid parking lots and garages as well. Definitely a walkable area to spend a whole lunch and afternoon.
I stopped by this place since it was just after the lunch rush and there wasnt anyone inside on this cold and rainy day. But I saw they have RAVE reviews and the pictures of the food look amazing! The head chef built this whole indoor space himself! Down to the bench that
The atmosphere and decor is relaxing despite the open kitchen floorplan.

They also have SATURDAY Happy Hours!!
I ordered 2 happy hour items (triple garlic fries + oyster chowder), their blueberry lemonade, and a bbq burger.
The BBQ burger is one of the BEST I've ever had! And I'm from the US where we ARE burgers lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMC0l4rjLFzkKKf2K1IC-cfbI0wS6IK9R3ETJ2l&fid=0x0:0x27adf75c5ce9570a"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Dave Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL544JfNo-heg8UsP95fr9shcrTY9pTTKZqcIgOMgLc7F2usw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little hidden treasure right in Steveston village. Excellent atmosphere and the service is fast and friendly. Ordered the really tasty, King mushroom burger, and the nice crunchy fries. Has some limited street parking right out front. Come try it, you’ll be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4sodV6tgnnEK4LoJNLcwEsiKsUjx8PyymxnoB&fid=0x0:0x27adf75c5ce9570a"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Vancouver Subaru Club","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVU1rgxG9uka5-poCI1yeNpCECc1amazzTb2-ax3YsN6JYZCg8d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the steak and eggs. Everything was very good, steak was cooked to what's requested. Only I server working so server was very busy hence service was a bit slow very understandable. Very nice size piece of steak but would rather have a smaller size but better cut of meat, just my suggestion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoyA-hoTzjpRq_SpFUYhC22srfJ3vLTEInU9SY&fid=0x0:0x27adf75c5ce9570a"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Kel Shaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxlG7dSzG0XCaRucFdzjLtGXMN3t4REtRn-uT0qJZlGy2kASSN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice little brunch spot in Steveston. Service was very attentive. Brought my youngest here for a birthday breakfast date. Food was very tasty. Place is small but cute. Bacon was a bit overcooked but really nothing else wrong. Would definitely come back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_ooa5wMwu2fh14BEde_dmZqTs9PzVH5FwVRY&fid=0x0:0x27adf75c5ce9570a"],"When":"2024-4-18"},{"Name":"EL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2yPryHESod9FDq67pH52romRyAqfPUNSbzpu6LFJOTGTMUhsZvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Favourite brunch restaurant in Steveston (yes, better than the ‘newer’ ones that opened). Generous portions. Nice service. Their fresh pressed juices are really food. And also drinks like the oj pekoe tea, very refreshing. Favorite dishes include the chicken and waffles, or the hash. Definitely give this place a try when you’re out in Steveston.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMecoy86Xiq_vz042QhzzY65TVzSNnHu4CLSgbc&fid=0x0:0x27adf75c5ce9570a"],"When":"2024-8-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Annia Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCmNf-6kVgoV3z2v1rhLUKPIXQtdwZxPsOxdlb6pZhbXP-BQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their mixed coffee -tea 凍檸茶 was decent.  Quite busy in late afternoon, we came for lunch but ordered off the happy hour menu, even have 營養餐 nutritional items.
Payment was cash-only, but ample free parking.  The interior was all of famous old school actors and singers.  Food was just your regular type HK Style 茶餐廳 nothing fancy just simple and full.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMU12q4a49DSoWD5pc48_rJV-KLRYBEJTpPUyvW&fid=0x0:0x849f064f95af4389"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Super Stars Cafe
8080 Leslie Rd #110, Richmond, BC V6X 4A8

Ambiance:

The ambiance at Super Stars Cafe was average. While the seating was comfortable, the choice of background music and television programming seemed more tailored to local tastes, which may feel somewhat isolating for non-Chinese-speaking guests. This lack of inclusivity in the entertainment detracted from the overall dining atmosphere.

Rating: 6/10

Food:

Tom Yum Goong Seafood Hotpot with Rice
The Tom Yum Goong seafood hotpot was the highlight of the meal. The portion was generous, with a plentiful variety of seafood, including fish, shrimp, mussels, and fresh vegetables. The broth offered a well-balanced flavor, though it fell short of the punchy, spicy kick that typically defines this dish. A touch more heat would have elevated it to a more authentic Tom Yum experience. Nevertheless, the dish stands out as a solid choice for seafood lovers.

Rating: 9/10

Fried Intestines

The fried intestines were an unexpected delight. Expertly fried to a crisp, they offered a satisfying texture and depth of flavor. Paired with a garlic soy dipping sauce, the dish was well-executed and is highly recommended for those seeking a unique starter.

Rating: 9/10

Drink:

I opted for the taro slush, which unfortunately did not meet expectations. While the flavor was adequate, the texture was inconsistent, with ice chunks present throughout, marring the smoothness that a quality slush should provide. The drink could benefit from better preparation to achieve the expected level of refinement.

Rating: 5/10

Service:

The service was the most significant area in need of improvement. Given the nature of the restaurant, my expectations were moderate, but the staff’s attentiveness was lacking. Additionally, communication was difficult for non-Chinese-speaking customers, which could be an obstacle for many diners. Greater attention to service and accommodating all guests would significantly enhance the overall experience.

Rating: 2/10

Price:

The pricing was fair, especially considering the portion sizes and quality of the dishes. It offers good value for those looking to enjoy a variety of flavorful options without overspending.

Verdict:

Super Stars Cafe has potential, particularly with its food offerings, which are well-executed and reasonably priced. However, the experience was somewhat marred by the ambiance and service, which both require attention to cater to a broader clientele. The restaurant only accepts cash, and parking can be a challenge during peak hours, so plan accordingly. Despite these drawbacks, I would return to explore other items on their menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCqMo_AmYOxKlMXPUQgJXonjcJO1zs0L_2Rqui&fid=0x0:0x849f064f95af4389"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"JENN WOO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvIJPgN4NR4GqFDWwcS6beS_JkwzhP97OBJCKBMgCo_hhFdb4d=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"One star is also dont want to give to this restaurant.
Service is so bad, also food is worst ever i had in Vancouver.
Also they only take cash(i dont know why permitted restaurant only get cash), and we didnt know they only get cash so we try to etransfer but they treated us like very annoying. I'll NEVER come to this restaurant ever again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLU1b2H_o3o6IT9DJ7d4AShrqJVnZNPYds9OGY&fid=0x0:0x849f064f95af4389"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Evans Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1CAnsQLdeq_AM90IKnxhuLTzFWDJoL2eGsQ8nbnMQQxOtOME9xw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This restaurant is absolutely disgusting. The place is cramped, and the decor and cleanliness are abysmal. The hygiene is downright revolting—I was halfway through my meal when a huge rat started scurrying around. I was on the verge of a breakdown—what kind of hygiene standards do you have here? And it's not like the prices are cheap either. With all the money you’re making, could you at least invest in some basic cleanliness? The sight of it made me tremble all over, lost my appetite, and ran out immediately.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQRXu3F7jkqkxxWZmhjfDebqTnSRN7RL6_inL5&fid=0x0:0x849f064f95af4389"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Macy Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJER9yFgtNyUGssrtb5PmY4384Vkzv8f3uRUR7KE1COw58Bsg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very good food with reasonable prices. Service is good. They have special prices for some food items from 3pm to 6pm, but portion is still big. We tried soy sauce chicken which is really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKTYd84Qi3tg0oXMQ8CRB2vBABluXJ7ErfFof1&fid=0x0:0x849f064f95af4389"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Minji Co","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0cW7yUIGQwxewtq2t91XH-PweiJmGMnXmQUWs9lKXUa5ZbKC6vQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Edit: CASH PAYMENT ONLY!! Or WeChat!

This is very surprising for me to go into a restaurant that serves steak but only accepta cash payment. It’s very stressful don’t go if you don’t have cash.

Food: Huge portions like what you would serve yourself at home. Food arrived quickly, service was friendly.

Tastewise, the food was just ok.

Ordered their lunch special it was only $15 and includes hk tea with a free refill.

Despite the good value for money, I will not be returning here because of the stressful cash payment only situation. I would rather go to the public market food court for the same price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzo9X_c1GjXdNnpM43WZTmaN8KJkB6HzSlb3_v&fid=0x0:0x849f064f95af4389"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Kasumi A. Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7_0dE4TBrW-eazsY9gh6IEHsIYux8SX4ecNQs4YyVQn_4oH7I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not much services,  need to wave them for 10 minutes to place our orders. Took them 20 minutes to serve us French toast.
Their pasta with creamy clam and mushrooms sauce, only got 4 tiny clam inside, took them 30 minutes
To come.. it was not busy at that moment.
Their green onions chicken with
Dried and hard steamed rice.
Fried beef noodles with 4 thin
slices of beef inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTdTEsL8_ywHqPXLs5d2-y7TXDpbUxHCWg5my-&fid=0x0:0x849f064f95af4389"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Wen S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfKekcgGrSM5orE3YNPLTTzg5L68GHdpR3eDy-Cv34Kb5a-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is so good, big portion and reasonable price.  Another dish must try is stir fry pepper beef noodle with black bean sauce, the noodle 1/2 soft 1/2 crispy, so yummy!  The service is good as well.  Must go early as the parking lot can fill up quickly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPidnxU8qkzjlYAKbsxitjaOwf6ci8pM1krUHHj&fid=0x0:0x849f064f95af4389"],"When":"2024-1-29"}]

title: Mr. Gold's Gelato
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Gender-neutral washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Checks","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time at Mr. Gold's for their Elegant Afternoon Tea (regular $46 per person). Got a Groupon promo that also came with gelato, so ended up paying around $30 per person before tax (diners do pay tax on the non-discounted amount, however). It was a nice afternoon tea! We chose our tea, and the savoury and sweet treats were served on Royal Albert Lavender Rose china. As always with afternoon tea, small portions but a nice variety of bites. My favourites were the Avocado Prawn Salad (served in the avocado shell) and the Panna Cotta. We knew the gelato was coming, so couldn't finish all the treats and took a small box to go. We were able to sample some gelato before making our one scoop selection, and I had the Italian Tiramisu, which was creamy and decadent!

Water for our tea was attentively topped up by our server. My side of the white tablecloth was a little stained, so that was a small taint to the experience. Aside from that, the ambiance was nice and we had a bright window seat when it wasn't too crowded. The server kindly agreed to our request to see some of the private rooms, which is open for weekends and for parties. The venue and environment is good for groups! 3-hour parking can be found in a parking lot or on the street. Would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlRYfBBLGnEgTYNeEHS4ugOwfvdfS7HE-gDLMb&fid=0x0:0x73d7e413212040a9"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"ewan quirk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoMWm-X5SN92DWI6B21sYbhsZeeI1Y4MVw1SF4wkob-Q9TbAo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Classic high tea and gelato in a cosy cafe. If you feel like going all-in on a Hong-Couver, over-the top, Louis 14th decor setting, they have a small patio and semi-private rooms for more leisurely dining. The experience is fun. The food legitimately will make you want to return. Great sandwiches and desserts. The top-quality gelato is like "icing on the cake"! We have now had four visits, all exceptionally good.  I will return. I highly recommend for a special tea with friends.
5 stars for the gelato and sorbet. ☆☆☆☆☆","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUc72ZLp8zfWcO_KZ6932QQjvS6fU1n1_DxICW&fid=0x0:0x73d7e413212040a9"],"When":"2023-12-5"},{"Name":"Jessica Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCbDOs3AU7IEJRYegBFzvyg0E9_zxSPqtlYmViT0aZDA6qPg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We purchased the elegant tea set for 4 (40 dollars a person) on Groupon. Because we ordered the elegant tea set, we were able to modify one of the sets to be fit for a Vegetarian which was good.

We were lucky and got the backroom to ourselves. Decor was very nice and fit the atmosphere.

The savory portion was definitely better than the sweet. The bread for the cucumber sandwich did feel a bit dry and the "bruschetta" was on regular bread toasted until it was very hard...not great. The scone was also a bit dry. Flavour wise though it was quite tasty and light. As a vegetarian, I am often given a completely different menu from others and it tends to be less inferior. At Gold's they mimic the "regular" menu wonderfully. I consider this a bonus!
For example, instead of smoked salmon they gave me smoked carrot and they mimicked a tuna sandwich with a meat alternative. It still tasted very good. Visually it also looked similar.

As for the dessert portion I personally didn't feel it was anything amazing. It was very sweet and some of the desserts felt old. They do offer a cup of gelato at the end and it was very tasty. My personal favourite of the sweets.

Overall the food was acceptable.

My biggest complaint and reason for a deducted star is the tea. Selection was fine, they offered green, black, and floral/fruit options. But the quality and strength was severely lacking.
The black teas came in a teabag which wouldn't be strong enough for a full pot (nevermind refills) and we felt the tea to be very weak  from the get go. As we got refills this only got worse and it tasted like water...
The fruit teas were loose leaf and were a bit stronger, just took longer steep time to get the full flavour. Either they need to use two tea bags/more tea leaves at the start, or offer a new teabag/change the leaves with refills.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-2PJlybeW3XlZVzEnR7XlP6FQ7mL3DPBWdgwc&fid=0x0:0x73d7e413212040a9"],"When":"2023-8-8"},{"Name":"w ww","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUv2peG2w5c_6CRckn7hOXsLLMMK4liTItSAavAbEq-jfzmSKZWgg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"afternoon tea as a treat with my friend!

surprisingly filling! both of us walked away SO Stuffed!! i did enjoy the variety of the foods and most things were quite delicious! i think we had an issue with one of the macarons though!

overall nice experience and definitely good as a treat on a nice summer day!

their gelato is delicious as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4bOL3kN3B7SKOHl1wWy-00Bedo1K4_mVGk9Zy&fid=0x0:0x73d7e413212040a9"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"David Nagel-Nunez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4GrBw1C-wp5E6lU26l8zbTL7J98fUFUp_V_miqIS2FattutvC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was so cute!!  Delicious gelatos and very unique flavors!  There was even a durian flavor (which was sold out).  Overall, cute atmosphere, and great food options.

Note, something interesting about this place that I found out from the attendant! - we came to this town because Once Upon a Time was filmed here, and we came to this specific spot because this was the location of a pawn shop in the TV show that was filmed.  I asked the attendant, and she said that this place used to be a pawn shop/gift shop, but recently changed to an ice cream shop, and kept a similar name.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBZfr-PpVyclmW0RXjHeZTK91Kg_ZZYoBCvb5T&fid=0x0:0x73d7e413212040a9"],"When":"2023-5-1"},{"Name":"CYNTHIA Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJH2z5w5esglGQ4Imv_njvhNoG13UBbsik6vaSDb6fC6xnKug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We were strolling in the area. My child wanted chocolate ice cream and we happened to walk past this gelato place. Service was great. We were able to sample a few flavours. Gelato was creamy and tasted as described.

The person working was able to kindly split a double scoop into two separate cups as my child was not going to share the same cup with me. My only feedback is that I wish there were more flavours to choose from. There was plenty of seating available. They also serve afternoon tea and carry good quality tea options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCRsaPZGuBX7qHnf-Ry8F_BdtGlDZYSZq948EL&fid=0x0:0x73d7e413212040a9"],"When":"2023-2-26"},{"Name":"Sandra Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS3d7aZA4lMhkB4lrjOTrDjB_p6PvngmeWQeM0VFHPfzqli2Uc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My first time here was enjoyable, but I’d probably not choose to go for high tea again. I’d like to return for gelato and perhaps other menu items. The decor is a kind of a Bridgerton theme and a bit tacky. The privacy (for awhile) in the back room was nice as was the server. We ordered 3 Elegant Tea sets and one Gold (this is an Elegant plus the extra lobster with salad, shrimp and tuna plates). Our teas weren’t flavourful enough; the savouries and seafood were good; and the sweets and scones were fair. Btw, there’s free parking on the street and Steveston is quaint.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqBaEHM_CSAqMNNrCxjvYrIaTgxP4AhMaZ_Em-&fid=0x0:0x73d7e413212040a9"],"When":"2023-8-27"},{"Name":"Debbie Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8g1PfgIx7mfrkCp4JSSXmPFVBd9YdE1QmYzj9z6YWniTT3A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I went to Mr. Gold Gelato for the Golden Afternoon Tea which I purchased on Groupon.

This little shop is located in Steveston Village. It is nicely decorated with comfy chairs and beautiful tea sets/plates.

The food was surprisingly good. The lobster tail  was cooked perfectly and the lemon, rosemary marinade tasted great. There was a generous portion of ahi tuna which was very fresh. The gelato was delicious, I had the mango flavour which is made in house and they use Avalon milk.

I brought my daughter with me and ordered her the kids tea for $26. It had kid appropriate foods such as ham and cheese sandwich, smoked salmon pizza, macaroon, a mini croissant, a jumbo prawn, and a scoop of gelato. For the kids drink they had orange juice, apple juice or milk. I wish they had hot chocolate or apple cider or some hot option for the kids.

Overall we had a very good experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVwEm5F-cSVyOea3CEFQz5z_ngIC19RWGxpNOf&fid=0x0:0x73d7e413212040a9"],"When":"2022-1-8"}]

title: R Ki Coffee Lab
address: British Columbia, Richmond, Lansdowne Rd, R Ki Coffee Lab邮政编码: V6X 0B2
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"R Ki Coffee Lab in Richmond is a fantastic spot for coffee lovers. Their Latte is smooth and rich, and the Cappuccino is perfectly crafted with a balanced flavor. The staff is incredibly friendly, making you feel right at home. The atmosphere is laid-back, both inside and outside, perfect for a relaxing break or catching up with friends. They also offer a great selection of coffee accessories for sale, making it a one-stop shop for enthusiasts. Definitely a must-visit for anyone in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4xWWG_ZYQd3Cqn7zVxN-Ra1FnR3rEdJDyUz7y&fid=0x0:0xb480a42a61340ed4"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"tavers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVC7ILtSlxfdDxb6V9J462gwa1fPiceOnM23OIRkX4ftST7PlY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best cappuccino in Richmond. The texture was so smooth and silky. Served in a handmade pottery cup, with coffee aroma all around in a cozy sitting area, made the experience even better. I liked their no laptop policy today (Saturday).
excited to check out their other location for baked goods (updated after helpful reply:))","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBTJhTKZuYhVBPz0ahF7KezZjq_ie6_TDFQxav&fid=0x0:0xb480a42a61340ed4"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Snoopy Kitchen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3h-I-trbYva-Tzrs-UNhkQe4Nn1jgsblAcoQ0hPrnUWvugM3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Barista is professional in his coffee ☕️ and at the same time has his particular mood if you are beginner.  I did ask stupid question but learn a lot at the cafe about coffee.  Do coffee research before visit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8L0Q1kBdF2itWisUdIAoCIvInRjmrF5MAnX9Y&fid=0x0:0xb480a42a61340ed4"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Ann Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvn-xEzewwzi5MnaSg9fqfqC8GocNLnb-uO3tOtU-odVbwqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They provide super good quality coffee and coffee bean, probably the best we tried so far. But the coffee lab is a little small. If you are coffee enthusiast, you will like R Ki because the owner is a coffee purist. They also provide self brew.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbq3QHNtDZ-T7Ta20sBL417TMFwsqiZg0xwXwa&fid=0x0:0xb480a42a61340ed4"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Sweets Fanatic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKT4q9vq4bFnKURKLo-IuFZkNgSUZrYyHCHwVq7PvVTaTofHHc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A bit small but very cozy and comfortable. Also, they have really good coffee.

Love the music that they play, and the service is very nice.

Coffee taste: 4.5/5
Atmosphere: small but cozy 4.2/5
Price: 5-8$

Comeback rate: 100%","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5KyamU3BMtnxdnD47ZVapX1paMss_REbEc1mb&fid=0x0:0xb480a42a61340ed4"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Jot Chahal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpnXi_n9yiT0nmD6X8P6QtG1E6RalEF4ZZ4sP9wqUVP9FCngI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Got an iced latte on a super hot day.
They have no syrup at all or any kind of sweetener for iced drinks. So you are forced to have just espresso and milk for a latte ! I would understand this is to preserve the real taste of coffee only to find that the actual taste of esspresso is not even very smooth.
Wouldn’t recommend this place go somewhere else for iced drinks i cannot comment on hot ones since i havnt tried them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAYDFYdS2ZhzsBzt-kAqLVCY1uOTmXPnGw8UsA&fid=0x0:0xb480a42a61340ed4"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Gerald Fitzroy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJk0_NogsG-VLkHYij2MqtewQOHgfTJHtqoQwlBnYf62UzoYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yeah the barista (I assume he is the owner), he is a bit geeky.
But the coffee speaks itself enough for me.

The espresso was on point, I would visit for a pour-over next time when I’m around the neighbourhood and have more time.

If you like Tim’s, Starbucks, dark roast, bitter coffee or anything like that. I recommend you to pass here, this place is more for nerdy coffee drinkers who enjoy different fragrances and tastes from each coffee.

By the way, it gets quite busy on the weekends and the place is small.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amberly Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXB_nT7s1agwGSt7_KB7WpomU2EA9RCaAQwI1astIS3IsbEnEWZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don't usually enjoy lattes with no sweetener, however, I thoroughly enjoyed the hot latte here with oat milk. Not bitter, smooth, and just delectable. I love how quaint and comfortable this cafe is. The coffee is roasted perfectly with the ideal temperature to enjoy right away. The staff is very kind as well. You can tell that people enjoy coming here as though it's their own home.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chujia Ni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfu1lsQhTHhiOck-jScyu7E3NoA60O67RKvAfPyqvC69PdlDtD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It just so British, guess what, I found Scottish black pudding and haggis here! Yorkshire tea and Walker’s shortbread are authentic symbols. I’ll come again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7KJ-MgxsjUqzbkq3dK-Cmflx_dQnJbpvb-uH_&fid=0x0:0xdc1bd8976d9e13b8"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Shery On The Move","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmAA3VItm5d-LzZjMzSS_FZs12aHSse1X5w-nXQqVmdbUvhBBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Whenever i'm stepping into this shop, it  reminds me of my hometown in Australia (I miss home 🇦🇺). Australia and the UK 🇬🇧  are sharing lots of similarities, and that includes food. I'm so happy to come here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJe_lMdnX7oZuFBbhvFJSzjbma1eIdDoLHLK8C&fid=0x0:0xdc1bd8976d9e13b8"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Holly Woosey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV2lbZeCEe9uk_tp5v5HeEBpd05cOkWx2bWGKGCFJqdBVjRakcIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love coming to this store. It's always a great little slice of home. It's very well priced for imported specialty goods, a lot of stores are so expensive! We always pick up our tea and some biscuits. I also love that they have pies and baked goods, PORK SAUSAGE ROLLLS!! 5 stars just for that!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"__","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURtewwsqVG5PO3uKPn3OOA0FnfaP0WZtSfpikwyWKQHm8YamdS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fun store with British confections, biscuits, and hand pies.

Lots of Cadbury, mints, jellies, and other sweets that are not commonly found in North America.

I had a lot of fun looking around the shop and chatting with the owner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiWm7AChrgxk75miker-wxpQSb6sdKLolLgXZU&fid=0x0:0xdc1bd8976d9e13b8"],"When":"2023-8-1"},{"Name":"Huy Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqO3y7yL2DV-HA1Gc8ojlhL-nbXmMjnUX8RWl0tWwlYp0Yzw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The gentlemen is lovely but the sausage rolls are cold. They're reheated in a microwave, which makes them hot but soggy and there is no crunch to the pastry. Also, there's no tomato sauce which I think is against multiple international laws.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Naumann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSqHdPVDLr7nLtDUnE5vKc93YTqnTvOv5M73le5mndP1fkkVul=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I used to come here in it's previous incarnation to get the currant squares. Steveston's Best of British is just as charming. Mostly food with a few sundry items. The jam selection is wonderful with some I have not seen anywhere else. The M&S (Marks and Spencer) Sicilian Lemon Curd looked great with just minimal ingredients, but there are a number of different curds. Next there is a freezer with many packaged meats and sausages. A while back I got some black pudding to make a 'Full English' breakfast. Then there are a lot of spreads and sauces (my favourite is the Heinz Salad Cream). A small fridge has sweet pies and those wonderful currant squares. Sweet and sour with a crispy crust topped with sugar. The display case was pretty bare as it was the end of the day but call ahead to make sure they have what you want. The display of Cadbury chocolate is big. The fridge with drinks also has some surprises. They usually have a small area with discounted items. All through the middle of the store are various cookies/candy/chocolate.
I bought Wilkin and Sons Ltd Marmalade. You can see in the pics the pieces of peel. It was so good and reminded me of when I was in the UK as the packaging is so iconic. I also bought Cawston Press Ginger Beer made with apple cider and ginger. It was really tasty with a chili kick! They also have Schweppes Bitter Lemon which is hard to find. Great on it's own or in cocktails. So if it is for you or a gift or just nostalgic, I am sure you will find something.
Daniel","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUJ5-N2JOxM52GZx6p5bDvWukDIj1c1fC8Rujw&fid=0x0:0xdc1bd8976d9e13b8"],"When":"2021-4-22"},{"Name":"Mary Smyth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUr4abW9NQHruQa4zTtTiysnIYTj-ScImyA4cgScRHi9EfZYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Am retired Senior
Former  Uk Citizen
So appreciate
The British Import store
In my village Steveston BC
Is a delight to shop my
Treats especially fot
Potato Bread and Ayeshire
Back Bacon
Like to buy Sausage Rolls
Always met with a nice
Greeting especially
By Senior Lady server
I only shop twice a year
Summer months
And Christmas
Love to buy. 🎄Christmas
Pudding for myself
And friends
Mary Smyth","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paulina Pedrero Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoiOld2vaC2Dv18bWNi8EDRiykD7MSCRsU3RK7RESh6xQghXxb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very unique store, the first of this type i visit around the Vancouver area, so many cookies and candy of Britain, awesome decoration!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIkssH3v_iwodYyZUtMHJDGHpdB41HV1f1frOM&fid=0x0:0xdc1bd8976d9e13b8"],"When":"2024-1-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Liza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUU6psZuYm5issGPqVIywDJmiQmgvYke0cz4aCVVktU9NoaykdJkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great bookstore with new, used, and rare antique books all available in one place! The atmosphere is unique, and there's a cafeteria inside with outdoor seating. We found great children's books at a decent price, and the staff was very nice and helpful. It's a great place to visit if you're in Steveston.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMTMDCjNUzWqAdDM-Seh_ONvyplFZRR-wadCp3&fid=0x0:0xae6d47422d70d529"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Shery On The Move","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmAA3VItm5d-LzZjMzSS_FZs12aHSse1X5w-nXQqVmdbUvhBBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First visit : 9 May 2024
The moment i stepped in, i feel like i'm inside the movie set. Lots of books and it displays by the categories.

Second visit : 18 November 2024
I bought a cup of hot mocha. Very good and strong coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO29RotL-iYozeLQP7978L-wjE0ilMpgjsHTiCw&fid=0x0:0xae6d47422d70d529"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Bonnie Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnEc4L_oX33x1BIdSnyu3qIy05RmcbQP1bJwBirlW_Yv38YSLczA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vintage harry potter like bookstore wz ladder, and a cozy Coffee shop wz different flavor coffee ☕️. Went diff times n missed this book store and happy i finally got at a right time today😍. Want to bring my fam n freinds there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUGMKMjBi5AVoXcFBz4uoZunBngtNUoLmuwZxN&fid=0x0:0xae6d47422d70d529"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Michael Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuu0XixbCDUbw293zrEZIF_EL8wTnjHqjUy5MtP-2ypVIEInDR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First bought the macchiato, it’s really good, well-balanced flavours. The owner is very funny and friendly too, a nice guys. I saw 2 books nearby while I was waiting for my macchiato. I love the art of both books, obviously I’m an introvert and love arts and I bought them home. 😙 I didn’t take any photos of the store but you’ll feel very cozy and comfortable inside the bookstore/cafe.
Updates: I go to the store again today, anyone can find the treasure there. Because of no photo rule, I cheated, sketched the inside. 😜","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPw55o9eYZTmvJe9EZ9PdIgdz38TVHasGIRBORe&fid=0x0:0xae6d47422d70d529"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"J Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaRUeWmwlxvg1114VRnUwtV5PC5Em5QGiNRDXMwK4Cirp_bVNt_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice independent business with a coffee and pastries bar.  Lady behind the bar was most helpful to every customer.  A wide variety of titles to suit readers.  Christmas blend coffee is in!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_IKIG62koPMZf2zjNQtf6gmqrQHTmofX_kbRp&fid=0x0:0xae6d47422d70d529"],"When":"2023-12-6"},{"Name":"Amira Walker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1BK3sFMdRWxqfwF3-iHn1Sk2ABcJ4X0M4KzHYnKzReO1_usXt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Adorable bookstore with used and new items, as well as a coffee shop right in the middle of it all. It's a small space packed with shelves upon shelves of books. A great place to wander around and find a gem. I did not try the coffee, so I can't speak to that, but it smelled divine!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOe2ul2BPgVPikpAX7u3fC3d1shEKtdDYsftCW5&fid=0x0:0xae6d47422d70d529"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Mariah Kaye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcbvMioMFkuefsisIxSighvXnht9qocdkJS6wK6uO0OG_JEeyH7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem in Steveston worth checking out. I come here every weekend now for an iced latte to drink during my Steveston adventures. Customer service is great and their lattes are even better. One of the best lattes in Richmond, honestly. Espresso is nicely balanced and the milk is perfectly steamed and groomed. The latte art is well done too. You can’t say that about many places. 😌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7Xk_lmaEz0a3zhjo-OfostoYIv8MQ9oO6Zy_v&fid=0x0:0xae6d47422d70d529"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Emiliano Pazos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKV91HkAsLguleR8GXFV9DKsFv0VDkUlUg6igIqeB9dQbIkzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finding a bookstore is finding magic, shelves full of history and stories, of the dead that still live among us through ink and paper, Borges use to said "Let others pride themselves about how many pages they have written; I'd rather boast about the ones I've read.", an amazing place with amazing people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1K0RZXhtjJGL811Bo82FWfOo_omwowePI5XPM&fid=0x0:0xae6d47422d70d529"],"When":"2020-12-5"}]

about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Maxine Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLFR4Mj--MigqFnqnuj_01HrJBESbEtH6Y9a1nlCZadfa3LvcI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stinking adorable psyduck pudding!! We got a scoop of vanilla ice cream on the side. Very jiggly and fun.

The tofu pudding was tasty, but the scoops of ginger sugar on top were *spicy*. Caught us by surprise!

The tofu was lovely and smooth, and the toppings were unique. Very nice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPVKPiADusfMoYlVu2pGLWnv-B-Vwv1iANK8kK&fid=0x0:0x10f8be800cd6a3f4"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Ray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGVd5s-06Fr3JDo-bYWWNiziS7uiGN7g2hEorOk1Vp-qtDK_-cTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have never understood the appeal of tofu desserts until now, and now I am craving more!

First, the atmosphere is very warm, elegant but not pretentious or dull. It was not too busy on a weekday afternoon.

I ordered a custom soy pudding. You can choose 1-4 toppings from a good list. I picked grass jelly, taro yam balls, and sago (they were out of salted cream). I had my choice of pudding base, so I chose ginger brown sugar syrup. It was $12.50.

I sat down and waited for my order. It did take a little while, maybe between 5-10 minutes, but that was fine with me as it usually means the food will be fresh.

Presentation - really gorgeous, delicate and appealing. There were two scoops of brown sugar shaved ice (?) on top.

Flavor - The ginger is quite strong, and the syrup is very sweet and refreshing to contrast the unsweetened creamy soy. Really nice. The sago was super sweet, and the taro and yam offered a good nutty contrast that was fun to chew. The grass jelly was silky, flavored predominantly by just the syrup. I was worried that the flavors would be too strong, or bizarre, or would confuse my brain (again very new to the concept) but it was actually soooo good.

Texture - I loved slurping the cool syrup with scoops of all the toppings. The soy itself is separated into very smooth, silky strips. I liked the gummy texture of the sago the most, it had an easy chew. The taro yam balls were soft but not too soft, chewy but not overly annoying.

Serving - Very very filling. Took me a long time to eat it. I was so satisfied afterwards.

Overall - I really liked it, and I am craving more. The soy pudding is a great and refreshing summer treat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEfwaeQSzwOJUdPDt1lVt4e2NpkNU2Yty4zuxt&fid=0x0:0x10f8be800cd6a3f4"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Travelbunny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW464ClbO-80W6vQ7F4mHwcMtcKFqqA-51OrWDyVW9Qn7Hz1ZuS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you like soy milk or soy pudding!

This place is a must try 😍😍 I liked the matcha more than the mango sago

Definitely coming back to try different flavour","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjVV2sNad7DQ2kalgvMOUlqlbnPMRCT0FLUClq&fid=0x0:0x10f8be800cd6a3f4"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Norma Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-g4DZ9cUMMzppUh0HSL9Q_pUqU54OAcV3SKGGH4o8oSsPFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Got the plain tofu pudding for $6.50. Portion is big but it comes out lukewarm. Slow service.

Adding one topping costs $8.50 even though each topping is priced between $1.25-$2.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsLvhRvnAyG6YLkXhlqn4bgsCyxiEFyOcaX54b&fid=0x0:0x10f8be800cd6a3f4"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Michelle M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeetN-W20mnzvtvgZG8vAeDlWwG6zd354oPCvc1I4B_3Cjy_PI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tofu was very fresh and silky smooth. I loved the ice brown sugar on top because it was a warm day. The grass jerky was also very fresh. The only thing I recommend is get a bigger spoon, it was hard to scoop the grass jelly and pudding.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJmcOWqw9dlciEjptmo08FwzOL2oiISYMlUwsj&fid=0x0:0x10f8be800cd6a3f4"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"L Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtpgH22IsbtslOqtTxTBj-vMPoORXANLwdKU3Hx6ulREkxtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place for dairy free dessert. Not very sweet at all 🤤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZanSwW1OgqR49SQWjfTUg8959NQWBCpU6JHoG&fid=0x0:0x10f8be800cd6a3f4"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"J L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJb9IGd1t_dJnO7xGDyz54ELMlRIIm05JdP0FzckhKez5QyggAO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a clean, cute little cafe with delicious desserts amd drinks.  Service was good and the pricing was average for the location.  I tried the traditional cold soy tofu which came with a mix of tapioca pearls, ginger syrup and soy ice cream.  For someone who is semi-lactose intolerant, this place offers fantastic dessert choices!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqwOSWF_yCP_Zj-asmzUbhY6TSFd-o6CcpDvFD&fid=0x0:0x10f8be800cd6a3f4"],"When":"2021-3-7"},{"Name":"Diane (Dineoutwithdee)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJfHVJSjIKAcPEXNIfUcWAtOeYHaXavqJYPtVJZ3lhCbCbpeo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A great little shop at Parker Place! Cute and cozy place offering a variety of soy desserts. They have soy drinks, ice cream, mochi, pudding, toasts and pastries. If you’re vegetarian, lactose intolerant or simply a fan of soy, check this place out. Lots of yummy and healthy options for everyone. Items are fairly priced as well and come with great presentation.

I recommend the soy ice cream (comes in a cute cup!), soy toast and the classic pudding where you can put your own toppings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXF8EUoBGLEyyxg1lY5xpAyuYLMD42Zr16S_Yy&fid=0x0:0x10f8be800cd6a3f4"],"When":"2021-12-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Juston Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVAYC5afCmPwosxYjKpvQBOhWlOXQMR2Uh3uL_8gJcR0rRYyPd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"G-men ramen was suggested by my family and once again going on my list of good places to eat!

Menu has lots to chose from, ranging from the tasty shoyu to spicy RCMP bowl. Also great to share their G mega X bowl where they include all toppings for an extra $10.

The place is tiny and cute and service was very attentive. I was always being checked on in case our table needed anything. Would recommend to anyone and will come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcPLDtrs6CAhg3jjvseOpgixLjZASWAUYRcI4a&fid=0x0:0x9dc44ee84a5890ca"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty good ramen. You can either get the more basic one, that's $14.50 (last photo), or if you get the $20.50 one (2nd last photo), you'll get more meat and a full soft boiled egg.

It's on the heart of Steveston so it's very convenient if you're sightseeing and you are craving for some ramen. The rice dish is pretty good as well.

The kids meal is alright at $13, although it would be even better if it's ramen instead of udon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7kU9shNU-F3-x5WK-zS3eoindncpnkLnBKOei&fid=0x0:0x9dc44ee84a5890ca"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Onyx Kahle (Onyx)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk9S46QvzBEb1FQPA_E-W1Fqq52tCsnY9at5RaMtcb-wiKapJZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food and great atmosphere. Super friendly staff and a lovely outdoor seating area! Great spot if you’re riding an electric unicycle since there are plentiful charging spots","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqVmwAsJunVevAuCIZmWzLDLUHgNJ0emRtqccv&fid=0x0:0x9dc44ee84a5890ca"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"CallsignJester","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXbpQW0qzEoMMewJxJv8oQdJqysCRY767GR7DLyKg8CiaTZgI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here recently and the ramen hands down is probably the best I've ever had. I love their limited tonkotsu ramen, the broth was rich and flavourful. 10/10 ramen spot I highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOCq7f0xz_4BBeifg23VIjMF36XCfBfCy72w0&fid=0x0:0x9dc44ee84a5890ca"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Bonnie Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnEc4L_oX33x1BIdSnyu3qIy05RmcbQP1bJwBirlW_Yv38YSLczA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service is good
Love the atmosphere esp we sat outside in nice weather.
Combo Takoyaki taste good, can be larger in size 😻
Natto Tofu don tasted good👍🏻I like it as a heslthy choice.
Shoyo Ramen tasted good if u like mild flavour and thin ramen 🍜","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvPicFvLlOw0nVjGZ8AwXoXdKRV41Jxvf-sZZQ&fid=0x0:0x9dc44ee84a5890ca"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Pat H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLG-dNH_dxDe8COit03Fl-sr5emXwBhh0GmEAMKf9ggoHF2Jw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A lovely, relaxed spot with a beautiful patio. I stayed past closing time, but the server never rushed me. The food was great, with plenty of options to choose from. (August 2024)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1CVj5mZixl27xtYAtQTE9shbl-UG5HA54jPt9&fid=0x0:0x9dc44ee84a5890ca"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Coline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbX_QKuaEf6ecbnocWzjer3WudYneLMe_JJVgbs8i0ijFAVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very creamy and delicious tan tan ramen! Lovely atmosphere and interior too! Excellent service. Great place to eat with friends. I will recommend eating outside for more privacy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR9Ya8fpirgW6inMvJJ-o2B6-g1gdXx_jmFNZT&fid=0x0:0x9dc44ee84a5890ca"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Edith Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJmOen6EtIl7Ej_JFqybjeY6J0ua3WQel6_FE_xI_4sbCJAgJF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent ramen but the broth was on the salty side. For the don, sauce was on the side, so that easier to control. Great service though!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNisbjeFl5PcXau3YdCxocP86noRtlWMMHpZlFp&fid=0x0:0x9dc44ee84a5890ca"],"When":"2024-8-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"One of the few non-fair places that you can get mini donuts.

I like that they have different flavors. The classic cinnamon sugar are nicely dusted. The only thing better would be if they mini donuts were warm. As it was, the donuts were cold and took away from the enjoyment. We wound up bringing them home and heating them slightly and they were better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOSFbks82TjDzHEQ8oe1UGHEweoZp_5glJ2-X7&fid=0x0:0x74b9f9dfda483d72"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I was really looking forward to the mini donuts at Steveston but this was a disappointment. Usually the mini donuts that you can at the fair or at the food truck comes out piping hot or warm and really soft, but this was room temperature donut that I couldn’t tell if it was fresh or not because they gave me the donuts almost immediately after I ordered. $9 for a baker’s dozen was ok in price, but was really hoping for the basic cinnamon sugar donuts to bring back memories of being at the fare, but alas, it was not meant to be.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDi7qYN0gneSvEPjGL81n0BmhufQSs1DDJcRgr&fid=0x0:0x74b9f9dfda483d72"],"When":"2023-9-9"},{"Name":"T Norouzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZb7gb5ffRZWC5gTFt4YO3zVBKYABFSvSFOYyATLlIN2-tFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went there on a dark day after snow and loved the atmosphere and decoration of the store. I have to say that the donuts were not the best but it was a good deal 20 for $12.
I will try it in another maybe sunny day and recommend it to others.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIXWnjy2ui5T5Uy--vc3ivF82S6-ECN49Is4j9&fid=0x0:0x74b9f9dfda483d72"],"When":"2024-1-20"},{"Name":"Armaan Hothi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKG5iMg2Y3JRf5fPxGi7yooxzPpn9zoaw6yGIYFIX8tFk6pnw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Outpost Mini Donut Company is the perfect choice for get-togethers and parties! Their mini donuts are a crowd-pleaser—fresh, warm, and utterly addictive. The donuts are perfectly bite-sized, making them ideal for sharing, and they come with a variety of delicious toppings and glazes that satisfy every sweet tooth. Whether you go for the classic sugar coating or something more adventurous, like chocolate or sprinkles, each donut is bursting with flavor. They’re easy to serve and always a hit with guests. If you want to make your next gathering extra special, Outpost Mini Donuts is a must!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kit Yee Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUy4hyLjXryzPjKJf4N3DUJBAsHtZSSuk76pvxFtVmwfHSV1Gtd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was craving for mini donuts so badly. The one shop in vancouver was closed, so I was super happy to see Steveston Village has this mini donut shop! I must buy some before leaving Steveston Village today

The mini donuts were freshly made every day. There were different sizes, quantities, and flavours. I only love the cinnamon sugar ones which were the ones that I always had since I was a kid.

The customer service was great. They were friendly and efficient. I ordered the donuts, paid, picked up the donuts and left right away.

The shop was just a bit too small that it couldn’t have so many customers standing inside. Today (Sunday) it was a bit crazy inside. And the staff there couldn’t really handle the heavy traffic. A group of 5 customers were standing at the counter and debating on which flavours they were going to get. I felt a bit of annoying as they should just discuss their wants and needs outside and they should not make other customers waiting behind them.

Overall, the mini donuts were great. I would definitely and highly recommend others to buy them if they visit Steveston Village. It’s hard to find the mini donuts in Greater Vancouver unless you go to PNE, Rogers Arena or one in White Rock.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOf4aK-t8aHKpa9A1TxxrvncHZbceDVQjP7mHER&fid=0x0:0x74b9f9dfda483d72"],"When":"2022-7-25"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Mini donuts topped with various flavors and toppings are an irresistible treat that never disappoints. Whether you prefer a cozy atmosphere or a vibrant outdoor setting, this delightful store has got you covered. With limited indoor and outdoor seating options, you can enjoy your donuts on the go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrLqiNYUK_G9vG14r6eth6rrccMyCO1yIc1mlL&fid=0x0:0x74b9f9dfda483d72"],"When":"2023-5-26"},{"Name":"Tom Hu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyyQ5KvmKl4Z33nT4wusvkCwA9Cr-xWhWOhejIZbkV4EKIng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cute and rustic small mini Donut shop.  They have around 10 different flavours and every one of them is very delicious.  Highly recommend to try them all. Their hot chocolate with cream and homemade marshmallow is also great on a cold day.  A must come if you ever visit the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPflA7p99ZQq2O0fAj__R_lukKDD7Rq-udzZCLC&fid=0x0:0x74b9f9dfda483d72"],"When":"2019-2-28"},{"Name":"Tay Cun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVISvV4V-lNqhgBJaNaxP5l32SM4_qpYYBDmmefTcVji7eDYTQz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love these MINI Donuts!! They're the perfect size mini. So many delicious flavors I just cant pick one. Be prepared to wait in line even if you do come early, I guarantee there will be a line up. The service can definitely be better but i guess the donuts are really what Im here for.
Beyond that these Donuts are EXCELLENT!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvEoh4X4UNTNuTe95yvVJtOjwR7ndy1i8AWv51&fid=0x0:0x74b9f9dfda483d72"],"When":"2021-3-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joy Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWC-_yA3p_X742W41EdNrtxi3vJwE-8nzXlxcJ1ULn4Y4bOuMMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend commented this place. It is the Taiwan’s style restaurant. My favorite dish was beef noddle soup, the meat was tender and juicy. I love the fried food and wanted to try everything. So I order D1 including many things.  The double chicken legs combo must order. The tasty or food are good flavors not salty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPAUWhUH0uyIcKY-I4kWCCVGNDpe0-tKQ8HJ6W&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Yan Jie Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWtJgsuhwRId0t1MOzd5ywiIXfrBfIFDTo7UODkLUu9At3EXtegw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service: The lady is super kind! We arrived at around 2pm, and there’s about 4 groups in front of us, she kindly asked us to walk around or wa it inside the car cause it too windy outside. And when we were dining inside she keep saying sorry for the wait, it’s very heartwarming.
Food: their Taiwanese food is truly amazing. Great selection, and very authentic. I recommend fish belly soup, fried chicken, and sausage. No wonder there’s always a line! It’s worth the wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlbT6nS8QRvE7r0EjXvN0p8UVjdaYIf2qnVItY&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Nikki c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTEI07jnFTAEaLsFO0c2_mPPfnmG0XKKHuolSSFqT8Xlgj-nIi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the most authentic Taiwanese restaurants in greater Vancouver, great for when I’m missing hime. Love the small sausage in big sausage and stinky tofu: I just wish it was more stinky lol

Of course the prices could never compare to the prices in Taiwan but it’s Vancouver 🥲

The food is great and I always bring home the frozen gyoza 🥟 鍋貼which is sooooo delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB8vLmjd-icEEX5dB4X6adZXa4xLl_CbmdtYGA&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"James Coles-Nash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkJrmtjWT371XtK4SkdD-gc4742YrtKT1KSibl27VRSYpTt9Yi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Taiwanese food at a reasonable price. We had the Taiwanese sausage, drop fried chicken nuggets and beef noodle, all of them were great and came fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOubFZ14jTdQVCHMsiH3pkkFvTCFDU8RrOYCqEm&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Percy Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpYfKBRmcbCv3QlJ6bZXmv0ly8_CocIf_lBOXCAlxRrZaEag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We will go again to order other dishes.  We enjoyed the food and the service was really good.  We had the oyster pancake, beef noodle soup, oyster vermicelli soup, pork belly on rice, fried tofu, Taiwanese sausage and rice sausage.  Looking forward to our next visit!

Pictures from our latest visit.   They had a new lamb hotpot.   They asked for our feedback...it was very good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeCdmRIVc-f6B30uuAF5MHN74iHvM7PWNa3lOd&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Albert Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLu_EXMOFkw3t7ieiosbnUm8U0dDlr8SUxo6E0Nm1EZRYvKeA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Everytime when coming back, the food elevates it flavor.  Indicating they are always seeking to improved its dishes and giving room for improvement","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcDqQQNIfKM0qk-892nM0CTf6YpdvHGtHSLHjy&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-1-6"},{"Name":"Alastair Leigh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2gspK8j66vIPaBKlAUhLSLU2O8o8CDsdJ6D5x5Th63iSt_sjDAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for a bike ride with my buddy and decided to stop by here instead of getting pizza (which has become way too expensive). The patio was lovely on a sunny Saturday afternoon. The service was friendly and prompt. The food was delicious. I really enjoyed the beef noodle soup. Popcorn chicken was good but had a bit too much batter or fat, couldn't tell. Maybe use better cuts of chicken with less fat? Not sure. Dessert was aiyu and deliciously refreshing on a summer day. The price was very reasonable. Which is funny, because if it were more expensive I would've ordered a lot less (usually I just get noodles and call it a day). But I ordered 2 appetizers and a dessert at this restaurant and ended up spending more 😅.

Keep up the good work!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLK9eHJg0oxVm0NEUtP8_tD47CkAglDTnfMvca&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Nicole Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdAow82J4tPwMSY2ca6JgSF68bASnvtD-62FnrDIFUIVzacw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything is super yummy and flavorful with an authentic taste from the southern part of Taiwan (Tainan), and their service is absolutely amazing! We got the Formosa Platter which is a great choice if you want to try several different night market snacks at once and share between 1-2 people. The plate that they used even has the shape of Taiwan! We also loved the Pan-fried Oyster Pancake as it’s loaded with tons of toppings and the oysters are huge! The Mega Meat Dumpling is really unique with a chewy texture and stuffed with a good portion of meat. Their drinks were very refreshing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-yWx-db5o2E1ryYNLAOfJu9SYAXpvfpjcK1QM&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2022-8-24"}]

title: Blenz Coffee
address: Blenz in, 3900 Bayview St #105, Richmond, BC V7E 4R7

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jonathan Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKc28PytzOAoR2UxG9uIutIoNUJjg2v_2Xxu7kFTiCW1I5fFJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cozy coffee shop in the corner of a building on the wharf. The shop is very typical of a blenz with exceptionally quick service and friendliness. The coffee shop is a little tight due to the size of the space but has patio seating and window views by the street.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOe1MwkR97Qt0Ga3toXnHjLI8QQQeO_4nAgWsyK\u0026fid=0x0:0xab60446ff21cb588"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Louise Boilevin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrbB57nz9izpshPwn7yH-SAdWr6iO_LJBZM25eopW2F0ZElrXPDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy small blenz coffee ☕️ 💖 shop in Steveston ....its got inside \u0026 outside seating areas  ....can get busy at times its popular  here...service good......its location is handy close to fishermanwharf  ....parking around too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOl29HMAMChom-U5PHFlbNVKvXoBHwvChm6wVJ0\u0026fid=0x0:0xab60446ff21cb588"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Meisam Parsa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0CWR6Xook34i2f-5cEIausY_AkRgCHRWXBH9CNorik2ipiXNe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great staff, handle the busy location amazingly. The atmosphere is relaxed and nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNIGckeOSbvo_DPNYiqhQTEOaKuRi7TX2JYxm4\u0026fid=0x0:0xab60446ff21cb588"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Anna Zlaman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJFtRmpkpltyOYjY5Ytz2tMc6e4Te6HI4wSmoaUNTQSeO1Eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good selection of coffee, tasty cookies and a pleasant atmosphere. Every time when I go to this cafe I’m enjoying the vibe. Cozy experience on a quiet fall evening near the ocean. Some students were studying, several people were having coffee and talking. With wonderful music playing, “The Four Seasons” Violin concerto by Antonio Vivaldi, it’s a rare surprise today. Had a lovely time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4E7m-bemitBweQfOHNw1Sbcb4OTRn-2NJ9iQa\u0026fid=0x0:0xab60446ff21cb588"],"When":"2023-11-16"},{"Name":"Harwood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJaeJEbSziGdEHl_-U7ny5lgMXbTyjbcaEklHwV6c4ZnrEZbA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Rude and unfriendly staff. To ask for 30% tip is more than unreasonable. Stay away from this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNif_TUxZBv113oWo6y47wkudaZROy5hE3u8atB\u0026fid=0x0:0xab60446ff21cb588"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Ada M.Y. So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoFPDHTqxIiQRISietBi4gnvEwmH3UDBwMxndOQvBNOPaEVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The owner doesn't know his food and drink.  Super impatient and bad attitude.  There are a lot of better coffee shops in the area","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMR9K-kpotW7VcIteUQmlyHYSqB0K9OfLIIwDhD\u0026fid=0x0:0xab60446ff21cb588"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"G B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIP71dbH9q-tlu_gUMhBTA9DWXf5fPRgU7W956aP0T7oQmlIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent customer service. They treat my elderly dad so kindly. Thanks to the staff and special shout out to Julie. Keep up the great work.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Wootty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7AAitqYRi3Dv8-ARHluxK55qFjxWTN-sqFKnOyb-SK5eVruA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Lovely location near the water but don’t bother coming here if you need something quick to go. The service always takes forever. I show up with plenty of time to spare and then leave being almost late for work. It’s not worth it at all.","Images":null,"When":""}]
