user_reviews:
[{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The only coffee shop in this area! The coffee was pretty decent and the space was bright as well. As a Terra Nova resident I'm still very glad they chose to open in this area. The chicken sandwich also seems popular so will definitely give that a try next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFQVy-g00VcRcl1g9BYqX0WrgrkEL2AK1cdEmI&fid=0x0:0x609e3a941d0d0e26"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Shery On The Move","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmAA3VItm5d-LzZjMzSS_FZs12aHSse1X5w-nXQqVmdbUvhBBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Date of visit : 8 Nov 2024

I ordered Iced Mocha and Roasted Vege Panini (for take out).

I'm disappointed with my sandwich because its cold. I didn't ask for the staff to heat up because the menu on the wall stated 'hot sandwiches'. So i thought it will be served hot and fresh.  Unfortunately i was wrong.

I' happy with the iced mocha but its quite pricey for small size.

Seating area is small and tables are limited. Its not so cosy to seat down there.

For those who wants a good service, fresh food and cosy to hang out, feel free to go to L'aromas Cofee and Bakehouse in Delta. I went the before.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkCctnW8nwzu1TXnqWzXPKqdsipN_y1gCUvEDK&fid=0x0:0x609e3a941d0d0e26"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Greg Mattson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFrbttlbDAMTrqcEYaEoNGgTXaMwtarCi6C54s9mUz7zEh6gC-iw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a great little spot, but the word little is the only drawback here. Formerly a Starbucks, the cafe has a weird, narrow wedge design. The result is that there’s only 7 two-seater tables inside, so it’s frequently filled up with no place to sit. Too bad, because the coffee is really good, cinnamon buns tasty, and the staff always friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPReTdBZfrgc1y8avqRaY8AnOHtGAz1g7vMrpxG&fid=0x0:0x609e3a941d0d0e26"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Cookie Hunter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXt0vkVvy3V7zOQLqookmcIq_YHD4e9Kb6E4i_IaeGUl5Tg5Moz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This café has the most delectable pumpkin muffins, gooey cinnamon buns and blueberry scones. The chai is to LIVE for!! 💛 If you’re someone who is really anxious, this place is safe. The staff are extremely kind.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxS0ik2j9_BlXpCtBlFBwc921KM8tf6p8QGAuD&fid=0x0:0x609e3a941d0d0e26"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Erin Nunweiler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDVq5iPmjZ0NknNdChY5QEk1bFJt6EFnFZnZb-tbxgE9Rs0L0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love it here . The best manager and staff. They make the best cortado , I can’t stop coming here . The chicken pesto sandwich is also pretty amazing .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxF6icI93ajg8TAC3QXX-sQjkmyzYvHKlv58Hg&fid=0x0:0x609e3a941d0d0e26"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Elsa Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgBtFYCkWTkjtefII4egxADlhVRhaG7pRnzQoESC-LbjFzCviaGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We only had a cappuccino (16 oz - 2 shots) to go so we don't know the service beyond that. From what we've ordered, the drink is strong and aromatic, the milk a tad too watery for us but not that bad. The price is decent.

From what we can see the inside is brightly lit and the patio is a quaint little area.

Overall, a cute little coffee shop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBhy7Fr0Um7qQfxDgG_aOz0ObZX5W1p_T7tdEg&fid=0x0:0x609e3a941d0d0e26"],"When":"2023-7-7"},{"Name":"Dave Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL544JfNo-heg8UsP95fr9shcrTY9pTTKZqcIgOMgLc7F2usw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great neighbourhood coffee shop when you need a break from shopping. Love the coffee and the baked goods. Been going there for years. Lots of Patio seating available. Staff outgoing and friendly. Lots of parking in the mall lot. Come in an relax a little.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHfhlHks7HA6en2vj0Pw_ANiP9N4G12RFli13l&fid=0x0:0x609e3a941d0d0e26"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Faith Clow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOeH1n1Cz35G6Jqbhdw9Z4V-ji4aseb_lzJkEagL6qjqv0XQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been coming to this location with my boyfriend for about 2 years now and it’s our go to everyday and we love it!! The manager Damen is absolutely amazing and super thoughtful and Sabina is so sweet and kind and takes the time to talk to me everytime I’m there.

I’ve seen a couple people post reviews about how slow they are and how they mess up and it bothers me because these workers don’t get the recognition they deserve. It’s a small coffee shop and they get lots of rushes especially during lunch, so it makes sense that it will be a bit slower because they are on till and making drinks usually by themselves so obviously they can get things wrong sometimes, we’re all human and we all make mistakes.

Overall they’re an awesome team❤️","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Tea Monarch
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Gender-neutral washroom","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Brian Shaler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVanm_SU1M6cSuCRW78pg1T2oWnXPERDUCzn8bF70zKPszCwZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s a very nice place with a lot of spaced out seating (didn’t want to take pics of the people sitting). The BBT was okay. Whenever I try a new place I get green milk tea to evaluate the quality. It was good but lacked tea taste. 50% sugar was still a little sweet and the size was smaller than I am accustomed to with no option for bigger, though the $5.20 cost after tax is probably close to market price. I can appreciate the smaller size too as I don’t always want a full size and it’s nice that it costs less. The server struggled to communicate in English. But all in all it’s good enough to come back to as I’m in the area often.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2BNLkCxo4KorZoORpQdBHc2W3jgv2k-caNVq3&fid=0x0:0x185d662a4876bc26"],"When":"2022-9-14"},{"Name":"Vincy Hungry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9hpqDRo0ildKSn8sUXnt2zIplFpatwb-sCfxRTl-brn4VTUk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have never given a one star review but this cafe was so disappointing. We were in our way to another cafe but saw the pretty design and thought we would give it a try… bad decision.

I think their menu items are overpriced for the quality, we waited around 30 minutes for a really bad carbinini sandwich and we asked for a half sugar drink but they didn’t put any sugar in it. Normally I wouldn’t complain but it was a quiet time and the server just completely forgot our order and we had to ask where our food was.

Walked out and tossed out both items. Very disappointing, wish it could live up to its pretty interior designs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0ZxPj1-gxZeoOvJT2fOc6cYVm65lPaaSgtnH2&fid=0x0:0x185d662a4876bc26"],"When":"2022-9-15"},{"Name":"Negin Shakibi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFk-aQpm2xaaXSmzDWKhbRrNOGZkWeLaR0XYta4P6DleAYDq0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The bubble tea I had was a huge disappointment, as it consisted mainly of ice and excessive sugar, with just two strawberries. Surprisingly, it took a long time to prepare despite the presence of only one more customer. To make matters worse, they served it in a flimsy paper cup that quickly became wet and soggy. Additionally, they had run out of pearls, a crucial element in any good bubble tea. The overall experience was frustrating, leaving me with a negative impression of their customer service. I hope they address these issues and improve their offerings to provide a better experience for their customers in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiCgof09cLSofzlmsqCJy4p6cyCXAsjE18Q84J&fid=0x0:0x185d662a4876bc26"],"When":"2023-7-24"},{"Name":"Grace Hsieh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQTgL5VeWqwHfjwoVSAfRIfm7AWGvW0DT63KhWfVFQiIU4O566=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Large space but not many seating to sit, very small choices of coffee, mostly tea. Tea are creative comes with hot and cold. The stuff are friendly and assertive. Can be paid with cards or cash. Mostly Chinese tea so half of the menu are sweet. Wifi available, I think it would be better with more starting since they do have enough space.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPHQydkUqWBewk0WfXX2hcfXlEzlbfhH7uLOzC&fid=0x0:0x185d662a4876bc26"],"When":"2018-12-26"},{"Name":"Osis Kalache","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXH5f99g-3T5UPUw7y0xme5seEYKZalG8hLh-UxV99abOVJEHwP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently visited this tea lounge. Love the location and ambiance. The place feels comfy and nice. The owner should have more variety and food items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO13Y5B-dFp9SfJ2F9Z_TbaERxJWjE5k1aOU3KA&fid=0x0:0x185d662a4876bc26"],"When":"2023-11-29"},{"Name":"Marcus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVpAqx3Judbzb0iuJXzx52iIPBZjNV225UkWQ26P-4HM5WbcSiFg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here as I heard a lot of good things about this place. The atmosphere is nice and there are plenty of tables to sit. I enjoyed my tea. Would come back here again and try the other teas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjUH206LVj_Ejk_FhViVryTHkGb7NmedIk72nP&fid=0x0:0x185d662a4876bc26"],"When":"2022-3-30"},{"Name":"Sweets Fanatic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKT4q9vq4bFnKURKLo-IuFZkNgSUZrYyHCHwVq7PvVTaTofHHc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great price, but there's nothing the stunned me in my drink. I ordered four season oolong and it tasted like plain oolong. The atomosphere was very good though. Great for studying. You also have to add pearls into your milk tea as an extra.

The bathroom was a mess- would like to remind them to clean it from time to time, it even just during breaks.

Taste: 3.5/5
Price: $

Come back rate: 30%","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgzFVp87oERzOfRt8N3uxOqXKk9TSV5SOMbjql&fid=0x0:0x185d662a4876bc26"],"When":"2023-1-29"},{"Name":"nyuen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXV3D5pYR4RkxppDvdITZiG17V4u2rV75TkRYWiRblqOLYvg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place is located in Richmond about a 15 minute walk from Lansdowne station. There is also a parkade which is free for at least 90 minutes, under the T&T (make sure you pick the right parking spots). The products here are quite nice and mostly above average and the interior is quite clean looking and cozy. However, I hadn't really thought about this until I read one of the more lower rated reviews, but the server there appeared .... upset or annoyed about something. She was there by herself on a Sunday afternoon, and it wasn't busy or anything and again it didn't tarnish my experience but it's definitely food for thought.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEy6l7Ie7HhsHENYRZXRftE4-HuU-1c9iJgaUy&fid=0x0:0x185d662a4876bc26"],"When":"2018-8-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Look Look","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFnkEC0Vtlns3Rc_vpXyJoBK911s7R33e1juwoNfOw_Qrl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a family run restaurant and located inside the Steveston paramount.
As to support our neighbourhood restaurants, we want to try this for long time. However, their open hours are almost similar as my working hours and we can only try on Saturday (Sunday - off)!
Finally, we come today for late lunch. The owner are friendly and the foods are good. We try Pho/Coffee today and they also serve burgers, western breakfast too.
Sure will come again and highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPS1--Bia62cs6TVnicIpLFJfMgdTUY__WwetM&fid=0x0:0x896f80681144e16c"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"paul grewal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLL_5gAyVLhbsVHe22HJLiK-LIuUTj6EISuJJYPFgPYOIZ2KQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Greasy spoon/ Vietnamese
Fast and friendly service, the staff is great. I'm a breakfast fan so I came for that and it was good,  I would have given 5 stars but the hashbrowns are a potato patty. That being said, the Vietnamese food looked pretty good and my friend was quite satisfied with it.
Will return again and again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrew Castillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnBmb0w8cIZ9ukxl51-xBtxseYbfuNhDleoZneQ-8UT_K7VCq_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been here multiple times, and I've never had a bad experience. The food is always great and the service is equally as good. I would highly recommend eating here if you are considering trying a new place for Vietnamese food or just in the area for a snack","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Desy Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrUNUi5nBlBmUQMOU2Lo2Yu5SjMGgKZ2L2N1xVRXSvhFjaBcU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Riverside Cafe!  Hidden away inside the Steveston Harbour, is this family-run Vietnamese / American restaurant.

Another hole in the wall! Food was good, but nothing to rave too much about.  It is COLD inside so you might want to keep your jacket on for your meal!

1) Lemongrass Chicken on Rice with a Spring Roll
Overall it was a tasty dish, but I prefer ones from Pho 37, Thai Son, Com, Bonjour Vietnam, etc.  Despite being quite a bit cheaper than those other places, it does have less meat than the others.  Spring roll was decent!
4/5

2) Pho
Pho was standard, nothing to rave about.  Meat was a bit too lean and tough.  Broth was good and flavourful.
3.5/5

This cafe is situated right inside the Steveston Harbour, so feeding the cold fishermen with a nice home-style meal is perfect.  Would I come back? Yes!  But don't expect anything too fancy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYMlXQa9_bHdHFTKbDGB248ZcIFaPOt3VZ_tg&fid=0x0:0x896f80681144e16c"],"When":"2022-12-5"},{"Name":"Clara C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmc5kzCO5tkFsn4680DdIqFR890DxrKckFqBbF2fQo-K5WEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great hidden gem! Fantastic noodle soups and staff is friendly. I don't drink coffee but the Viet coffee is a must! Wish they opened for dinner as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Percy Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpYfKBRmcbCv3QlJ6bZXmv0ly8_CocIf_lBOXCAlxRrZaEag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was a little hard to find but glad we found it.   Nice little place with good all day breakfast and Vietnamese food.   We had the eggs, sausage,toast and hashbrown, rare beef, beef ball pho, lemon grass chicken, fried egg, spring roll on rice and lemon grass chicken, spring roll vermicelli bowl.  The food was very good and service was great.   Will come again...great find!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOc4hEPcv63VHIUJry-IGKT5pMyEODEj8e8nTzJ&fid=0x0:0x896f80681144e16c"],"When":"2022-9-20"},{"Name":"W T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdu0TMV7B9Y2mJkSC3Cb_ZRin-xtIVsRd9t2JXcXN3mCCzpbY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is made with love.  Good portions and tastes great. Staff is friendly.

Went back for takeout. Food still made with love. Eating it makes me happy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORckN6FU0wNOvDZzmckccpe7k0nj1hjuI2eSXy&fid=0x0:0x896f80681144e16c"],"When":"2022-11-12"},{"Name":"priscilla luarca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcHPyL4PQvXbHxJODS88u4f2xMg0a4bTylbgmnRVCK_Dsnqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a hole in the wall hidden gem. Came here for lunch with the kiddos. Ladies working were friendly and vietnamese food was good. Exceeded my expectations, given the location.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nick grountsev","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLK-fx6vTCZj3_YU2tlu03tQIeJwkjlTrhUzMXpzlc1B9ATWA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An absolutely phenomenal dining experience. I have been a loyal customer since 2010, coming to eat and enjoy the daily fresh made soups that have never failed me once. You can truly tell they have cooks and staff that truly care about the food. I have NEVER once had an unpleasant meal. Sure, the prices might be a bit high, however it is 100% worth it. Today for example I ordered their breakfast for $17. I was a bit hesitant at first (I never ordered their breakfast before) but after getting my food I don’t regret a single dollar spent. Keep doing what you guys are doing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLW3GMO5bupdMBI1PpBn8SX5yI2Qz6hTxPqZJg&fid=0x0:0xb4c36c00dcff8f17"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Just Me Traveling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX18amg9WNM9rF8Fs9axj8FE9tNtrVpXPgaMIl0yMbfuZ56ahzt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I stopped by for a quick dessert pick up. I got the Danish and it was amazing!
The service was quick and the staff was nice as always.
They have variety of pastries, bread and breakfast/brunch meals too.
They open early too which was a bonus. Definitely stop by when you are in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMhVpnFoLy-H6VbI7YgyuUcFbPLlV5mxs6U1PG&fid=0x0:0xb4c36c00dcff8f17"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Bonnie Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnEc4L_oX33x1BIdSnyu3qIy05RmcbQP1bJwBirlW_Yv38YSLczA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bkft wrap is so good and filling. And wz fruit pcs at Reasonable price.
Regular coffee is good. Good quality Bread 🍞 n discounts on selected items ! 😍😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOH5uPSUSHKIJJI4REoYRNQ6_8yZPVxP5N1nDHF&fid=0x0:0xb4c36c00dcff8f17"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place with mom and pop store feels.  Fresh bakery at great price and service.  Cake and bread were good for the price.  Restaurant is cozy and welcoming.  Right by nice beach walkway, this place added extra fun to our little weekend trip to the Steveston park.  Server was very friendly and professional too and the place sell sandwiches and soup as well.  We will return to try them for sure when we return to the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMx9BGQfOkZQgcLOXktTwsQQgwXlo0yKFX0Xz4J&fid=0x0:0xb4c36c00dcff8f17"],"When":"2023-3-4"},{"Name":"Autumn_Kiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1zcZdU411-b8f5Fcx7HImynMifJ7qg-_yzjSJzTLgmhJaggW_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Whenever I can I’ll drop in for a quick eat and coffee before my morning walk.  Lovely people here.  But the breakfast sandwich is wonderful.  Vegetarian options available and the coffee is always good.  Check the sandwich board out front for daily specials and come in and say hello.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5FV7qG8tNBekTJqICTOVhrSGBa3oF3mf0Siwr&fid=0x0:0xb4c36c00dcff8f17"],"When":"2024-1-10"},{"Name":"Rachel Keery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7HrRs2lYWD-a0OMwYD8hcg13jIWjm47WrdDcC3B391YGfNtPv3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious baking ! Panini also came with a side salad. Reasonable prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKozar9HC0xk-kHu8HWKs8-dI6jRxw_ejrLZQM&fid=0x0:0xb4c36c00dcff8f17"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Steven","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwhlFiHPSDGYcBNEBZjiV401CUR-8LRwpy-nj0JN_nYZzCJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice quiet coffee bakery shop in Steveston. The fruit tart was super sweet. The carrot cake was good not overly sweet. Fair prices, but not anything fancy or memorable in terms of bakery selection.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnVHGzd7SqQRYTQTLImfV_FgE9GL2lEK9c2of2&fid=0x0:0xb4c36c00dcff8f17"],"When":"2023-5-30"},{"Name":"Novak Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLoX9JVn_bDsVw23EtSJ2S2u4nUI2b3vvbvKZtAFgP5PCFSz34=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pecan pies were so good I almost hshshhsgdy
There was chocolate at the bottom and it was so good I shsygdgdgekekeo","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtnzJZX28_jwNUA6LRwIltorAzk65oAw0XSeQ3&fid=0x0:0xb4c36c00dcff8f17"],"When":"2024-9-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Erin Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNddZXBvjo1lM53d1JsGHCCAsJEWmjzWHaoOXhqaaioyHgIgaf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for lunch around noon on a weekday and it wasn't busy. The patio is clean and comfortable. Our server was nice and attentive.

We ordered eggs benedict with garlic shrimp, and another benedict with fried chicken. The fried chicken is well battered and fried, and was juicy since it was dark meat. The garlic shrimp was good, but if I'm honest I was a bit disappointed by the small size of the shrimp and the eggs that were used.

They were generous with the roasted potatoes and our meals tasted good, but for the price point it felt a bit underwhelming and the overall portion size for the eggs benedicts themselves has left me less than enthused to try this cafe again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtWcduJACjN62oAr55sTFfkUQMyOaymDFgDP3n&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Jennifer Osuna Ausa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTgleJyQy49XcPyy0x9GmD2FZbgVovfYE7EubdT6hoNd08zgl3SA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was our first time dining here, and we were not disappointed. We will surely return.The breakfast paella is a fusion dish, and the orzo rice is well prepared. They add a lot of shrimp, and the flavours combine nicely. The calamari was tender, and the flavour met my preferences.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp_4vdbbuq2tc_DUI7IbtdJ_WZx5MQmN7UzA3D&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Mochichi Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFyjPl7H-V7mWpuOxmhOZJlef_eIhgoybBQQCMDjX3GS8zgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is my first visit: Cannery cafe has  clean and comfortable outdoor seating.  Love their dishes with very good quality and presentation. Their spare ribs are so juicy, waffle with deep fried cod and poached egg is so good, Granny's clam chowder is extra yummy with the fresh bread. We also enjoyed their fresh brewed organic coffee, with hot milk and cream. Smart and courteous staff marks a great experience at the restaurant.  We'll definitely visit again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnMjBhICueHZW4mFKOtAtFIXY1vC8tsfHrnDd1&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"Ciaociao k","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXC98o0SMyIGT6PBDZZ1upK5e-wMdf2iaJ8WiCTjsLkNTDWJTYB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Patio season! We visited at Steveston early in May,of course no patio that time. Super nice weather no complain outside patio! Cafe is cute and cozy, not fancy but comfortable. Do not expect same as SFO or Seattle clam chowder. Soup is not enough. They have 3 options pay, cash, debit and credit. Cash and debit are better for pay.credit has to pay extra dollar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIGps6B6xh1GlixVEitud73CAC-hmcKS-qaeWD&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Ryan Dai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvz_7CRNc0uzQynlzLBSk6wo_JRdBk-3lTZRZl_hkyJTXWois=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely brunch spot in Steveston, offering a lot of options and great portion size. Plating and presentation was a pleasant surprise, had a wonderful time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuWezNJHt4pq31mT2OYMj2oKszPkY-DifGrhLL&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Mike Hassard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH-ZkQW5qJlRiHy-FNQ8xn3HmqC9mLEUcZ168947ILG-lhIDuY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Enjoyable relaxing breakfast. Food was great service was great cute restaurant with history. Make sure to check out the wall of famous patrons.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMK6wko7OMh1XCyrSjN3djzqlKSneNKNDCMyhWR&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Erica Ngan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxiFAMX-8U6Hf7I7ySV2AT1mYgYdeBidCPp2cDYnZKccTLsR17eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Liked the brunch options, their fries were unique, the food was displayed nicely as presentation is important. It's a small place that seems a bit crowded. It's busy on a sunny day, but didn't like that the building was old and glad we sat by the door for air circulation. Servers were nice and can customize your meal. Steak and lobster were surprisingly good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmWFDYqwWFxnXqha36ZojG88iuXufxmwP9-55D&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-3-4"},{"Name":"Sophie Song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYv0ajQfaQ3wgEOSuA8kGAiDy6DmnBuYNOsG4Nm-68UM6xqw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We gathered at Cannery Cafe on June 23, which is our yearly gathering and already keep going 6 years. We love the Cafe's environment, we choosed to sit at patio, beautiful view. And great service, when we told them that day is the birthday of one of our friends. The lady offered us beautiful cake. Nice experience and food, we love the granny chowder , and granny hot chocolate and salad.Back home, I started to watch the TV show: once upon a time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6_4KrXIH2SK-Ilu4hdG00CLlpIWpRl4y9uXba&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-6-30"}]

title: Something Sweet

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mia Duong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPAUy0Htbh5FTHA7CrcyalmfPE1fNra4l4o1y3j6EQjpz6Sdhn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Needed something sweet and a friend recommended this place. We tried the mango frappe which is shaved ice topped with mango, cereal like flakes, with a dollop of ice cream (vanilla or mango - your choice). Two people can share this. I ordered a hot London Fog and it it the spot - the hot and cold fusing together!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPktjJIg6WyuUWAM5SHDepBFN6J_DUzgsE55SxS&fid=0x0:0x2f1093826b9fffa4"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"handan ince","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJV77o3hTRmzgu4AKi41hdmoN1HI4ylYc_oIsw4nMdsV3m-JA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you’re a fan of indulgent desserts this cheesecake and frappe shop is a hidden gem you don’t want to miss!
I had the cheesecake and my husband had brown sugar frappe both desert were absolutely divine—each bite is rich, creamy, and perfectly balanced in sweetness.
The customer service is also top-notch. The staff is friendly and attentive
The shop itself is cozy and inviting, making it a great spot to relax or catch up with friends.
I highly recommend this business to anyone who looking for a satisfying treat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cin CL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYHRU9K3sI2Jdwyyj3VeuJJasluo8Wc9fpp4I7THLciAr10icg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love coming and supporting this cozy place in Steveston village. Our favourites are the injeolmi shaved ice, mango tapioca and their thick toasts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_13smYTbYcnbkMrhplGZqkX-flOKHXYxD7xKU&fid=0x0:0x2f1093826b9fffa4"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Jon Lo (VancityLolz)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyHXIvO6zjUGBm2q5mj88BnbYXYXFce_0_r9hk7c_P-UzKlHQRTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got the caramel flan frappe and strawberry cheesecake.

The Caramel flan had a thick layer of milk shaved ice topped with vanilla ice cream and huge caramel flan, and a bed of corn flakes to add a nice crunchy texture. And caramel drizzle. The balance of sweet and textures was really good. We prefer less sweet desserts usually 30% sweet for bubble tea for example. And this fit our palate nicely.

The strawberry cheesecake was light but thick and dense. Just the way we like it, reminds us of our favourite Caroll’s cheesecake in Toronto. The strawberry topping was great as well not too sweet, well balanced and a strong strawberry flavour not over powered by sugar.

The shop is small but can seat probably 15. We went on a Wednesday afternoon at a very non peak time. The service was perfect just enough attention to get what we want without feeling overwhelmed.

We’ve been thinking of trying this place for a while and finally did. It’s worth a try if you’re looking for a casual dessert","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-PFHXnFw-o0FtyY-0q1RCYGyJcNATy8nvTgwi&fid=0x0:0x2f1093826b9fffa4"],"When":"2023-8-10"},{"Name":"Shery On The Move","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmAA3VItm5d-LzZjMzSS_FZs12aHSse1X5w-nXQqVmdbUvhBBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Before I came here, I was planning to try whatever mango in the menu because I'm a mango lover. But at the very last minute, I decided to change to Taro Toast. Even though I managed to finish it, I totally regret changing what I wanted earlier. It just me didn't like it, and the presentation looked unpleasant.

My husband ordered Caramel Flan, and it was worth it. We both like it very much.

For drinks, we ordered herbal tea. Very nice, and it seems like we detox ourselves  after the 'sweet sugar coma'. 😂. You can add and ask for more hot water whenever you finish one cup.

Service was good and I liked the atmosphere too. I will definitely come again to try another dessert.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"elly s.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHB0_usq6Zuy1BCje3yTvVLfG6Swzb12afA7e1QYCgUKOf9vy2lA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a tiny store with two big tables where 6-8 people can sit at each table, meaning expect to share the table with other group of people.

The owner was so attentive and kind. He was operating alone when I visited, so he was busy making shaved ice for 3 groups. But he was doing his best to make the cold dessert items as fast as he could and didn't forget to refill my iced water until he got so busy. But is is not a big deal as I could just walk up to the counter and ask for refills.

My group ordered 3 different flavoured shaved ice bowls. They were more like individual portioned which wasn't super big but not small portions. I would recommend to order one bowl per person as each flavour was great and the price was reasonable for the stores in this Stevestone neighborhood.

There was only one washroom but it was clean.  I would go again if I pass by this area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Deanna Ngai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUi2Q9NZBXfTTrLTd3ahUxQF-OeDOHce_Iold4itm4AunrN3ss=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m changing my review from 2 stars to 5 stars because of the amazing customer service shown to me.

Previously I ordered two mango frappe that was lacking from the usual quality and quantity, that I have come to expect from Something Sweet, and I felt like I had been cheated as there was only about 1/2 inch of shaved ice. When I bought this to their attention they were sincere and wanted to make my experience better. They offered me two frappes of my choice, and when I came into the store the shop owner greeted me kindly, and made the frappes for me. They were as delicious as usual! Completely in love.

Best Bingsu, shaved ice, frappe in Vancouver!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMegKeRnQzUH8-hzeU3P0ZkAedwO8axCIEvklvx&fid=0x0:0x2f1093826b9fffa4"],"When":"2023-5-21"},{"Name":"Love2eat Blues","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImZuPy7HhbVixrQcb1Ekk3SK4yEylEsrt15M6EfayR94w82g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here on Sunday afternoon , just right open time. A small store but interior design is comfortable and modern.

Their shaved ice is called frappe and is so delicious! The ice is so fine, soft and milky.  Not too sweet which I like because it balance with the topping very well.

Price is a bit high, because $10+ a bowl still quite expensive. However, I think majority of the shaved ice places are about the same price range.

We will be back to try more items. 😃","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOorqsx9CKNM8iBlpeqJvzcX-SXBGdK44EoVfG&fid=0x0:0x2f1093826b9fffa4"],"When":"2019-7-22"}]

title: Serendipity's Backyard
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false},{"name":"Same-day delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Serendipity’s Backyard in Steveston, Richmond, is a hidden gem for anyone seeking holistic and spiritual wellness products. The store offers an incredible selection of essential oils, mist sprays, palo santo, and tarot cards, catering to both beginners and seasoned enthusiasts. Each item is thoughtfully curated, making it easy to find exactly what you need. The real highlight, however, is the staff – they are super friendly, approachable, and genuinely passionate about helping customers. Whether you’re looking for guidance on selecting the perfect essential oil or exploring the meanings of tarot cards, their expertise shines through. The welcoming atmosphere and personalized service make every visit a joy. Highly recommend stopping by to explore this treasure trove of mindful and uplifting products!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwvZWKLRTvaBA7REQTu-wfwvyNHSJiL4J7jEEE\u0026fid=0x0:0xf7a77f6a5ee4a1ee"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Lydia Klemensowicz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9fR1Q44S-LBHbQS2liNNM-UdfvZ6EBDCwP8Kr636SvOGJyXw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Serendipity's Backyard is a true gem in Richmond/Vancouver - it is a space where you feel welcome as soon as you open the door. The  staff is so friendly and helpful and they have a wide assortment of healing tools like cystals, books, oracle decks, candles, incense, and more! But this is more than a store, it's a community.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvwlyjB4u92gNs2XkVMCtEEv1bbhznwa-XyALuorQtBg64Yw0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good selection of holistic items, some prices are high. Worth it to stop in and just have a look around, others are reasonable, staff is very helpful. You can get card readings for $50\n*Updated, staff have reached out to myself and resolved my question, I just wanted to say thank you very much for your integrity \u0026 honesty.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marbie Alura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLm5YJEwqrSXIhXeNKoKWfFqDGvNTGpob_qX9OOIOhE6sasnw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place, the staff are so helpful and very knowledgeable about crystals, plus they have a great selection - but what I most enjoy are the intuitive healers you can have sessions with. I saw Darren for a tarot reading and wow! It's obvious he has an amazing gift - I'l definitely see him again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul Prussner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8v3s9rsukIifv2s9Dq8qpC9Yae2AEF8O4nztYo4Qnooa2uRAMKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's one of those... almost mystical shops. You might say... it's a little enchanting.... seriously though cute store with friendly staff and a soothing atmosphere 😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJ4XISgV5LyUfZ-5_dWl_fYtCi10W6G8Ll57iq\u0026fid=0x0:0xf7a77f6a5ee4a1ee"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"PeterSu Copley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWiJY6HY3mvG9guMEfDJKt8FgMqPH1pl_B7PqXHQAWkJyeEBFg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was not expecting a crystal ship when I walked thru the door, but glad I found one. They have labeled the crystals with their properties, healing qualities, and protection uses. There is a huge selection of both loose stones and jewelry, so you are bound to find what you are looking for, unless you have a big neck like I do. Fortunately, they have jewelers who can a add to the size, so it isn't a problem. The owner is super friendly and ready to help you find just what you need. I add a visit if you are in the Steveson Bayfront area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOOoCXrkn22-xqpS03a3kF9G88IJhF2ZkVrFPA\u0026fid=0x0:0xf7a77f6a5ee4a1ee"],"When":"2023-6-28"},{"Name":"Angela Lamarche","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXDYRadw0VdCMEOXMWa5Khavbs0F2scHdPCFUM8yqyGMS-CKZvYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful little shop with an amazing selection of tarot and oracle cards that are open box sonyou can look at the Deck before buying. Love this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNec6yEu8evKEfDRJSrviSDGIof9qtoIafzqFwr\u0026fid=0x0:0xf7a77f6a5ee4a1ee"],"When":"2023-9-25"},{"Name":"Alisha Pala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXsNoZ4vELxwTWaARBc2kppq2YvrXOIZX0Ioq0dHb1NZctBCs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s a beautiful place. Finally got a chance to stop by a few days ago. Great vibe and they are all very lovely and helpful.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shery On The Move","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmAA3VItm5d-LzZjMzSS_FZs12aHSse1X5w-nXQqVmdbUvhBBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was passing through this cafe many times but i didn't intend to come. Just until yesterday (Dec 15)  i decided to try.

I ordered two hot mocha and i got complimentary biscuits. I'm very impressed with the service because the server sent my drinks to the table and it served in a ceramic cup. To me, it's way better than a paper cup.

This cafe is very unique and has a special theme (bicycle). I didn't get a chance to take a proper video because lots of customer inside the cafe.

On the other note, restrooms are clean.

I'll definitely come again and this time around i'll hang out a little bit longer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNtguQLDEsETINUS7pXvirwMYq7sXPX2WvBwmk&fid=0x0:0x57d16da93a75024a"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Akhil Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmbmpTyLoaL98m64cZ3--AmwKl728g1HC-Q-80jP3jiw1P5nxH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing hot chocolate and outstanding customer service! The drink was perfectly made, rich, and comforting. The staff was warm, attentive, and made the experience even better. Highly recommend Sanctuary Cafe for anyone looking for a cozy spot with excellent service!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqA5t_F6713uEKDvPX3o5RsDB403z_HAyPFoW5&fid=0x0:0x57d16da93a75024a"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Frank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV32Dl3aDuecVTKkUVDILvrpBYb8ATjyfxIGWGxKJriKTeCzCiJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sanctuary Coffee offers an intriguing specialty coffee experience. I tried their Ethiopian blend which delivered interesting complexity - distinct strawberry notes up front with a pleasant chestnut undertone and a lingering sweetness. The acidity was pronounced, which might not be everyone's preference but showcases the beans' character.

The café's rustic wooden interior with exposed brick and Edison lighting creates a welcoming atmosphere. Their South American and Colombian offerings round out a thoughtfully curated selection.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlEWniLP1u-dc7-snudWEGim009y3OOnR0Pa5n&fid=0x0:0x57d16da93a75024a"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Richard Douglas Griffin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV94QelTxvB8upo_neBNBQ1v4cITUgRFE_sO2u2iSoqQqC-_B-1CA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I didn't eat just had chamomile tea. It is only a block from the Fraser River. It is a place where pedal bikes go for coffee or something to eat and hang out. Pleasent atmosphere sit outside or inside. Plenty of room to park your bike.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2W14FN_1w4aR7ee33UhkL5WiTXBGju_Xtcpb2&fid=0x0:0x57d16da93a75024a"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Grace Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJv2Qb5BK8BlHD8B-fNqpMIiwBP96of3n6s7qsHpu4xPXVSJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place to make a stop while biking. Clean facilities, friendly staff, coffee and treats. I have joined the annual fundraiser with the Rotary for their 105km ride for hearing previously and this is our midway pit stop!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMz-kZHLsoJyAjZ-Uw-MvLlxJ7358levrT8yoLp&fid=0x0:0x57d16da93a75024a"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Khushpreet Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJHdofGDw7ZA4fIhXAdyKnDBNfZ5Wn0U3HyAnyx1Wn248q7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super friendly staff…. In love love with the white chocolate mocha …. And the wilder lemon cookie is a must try… OVERALL : 10/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsCRtERRn2Ebu7HIhxOf1oRyvlQRu47gRcgheS&fid=0x0:0x57d16da93a75024a"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Jonathan Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHfpGA7JKvrEVjVOSDM5w-pnz0OF8A1w0PXOnjivD3Mi9QFfOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always come here when I have my annual Vancouver visit. Lovely spot, always friendly staff, great coffee. Good tables to sit and work at, or read. I only wished they opened a little longer each day :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"DK NG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDL3iKzA-KwRBp_QW-T4bxIzouYpU82YVrkKDRjecsEEcAnsE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried the black sesame croissant, cinnamon bun, flat white & hot chocolate, all decent food and drinks! If you love black sesame, you got to try the black sesame croissant! It is so tasty! The environment is very nice too!

Update: Their sesame croissant look even more nice right now, and of course still tasty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4daGYBdqIU5Se0HiZxT6nz9HhFU_6yHkF05sY&fid=0x0:0x57d16da93a75024a"],"When":"2018-12-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"P. Tremblay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPihLht1u4CeT-4iHJJGSCB63IYBoSaSD3Amqv_E9ebWLUcw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The BEST ice cream place in Richmond and the owner and staff are always wonderful. You can get waffles, bubble drinks, smoothies, shakes, ice cream in a cone or a cup, sooo many choices!! Then relax at one of their picnic tables, “Dine in”. My favourites are Maple Walnut and black cherry ice cream and these are sugar free!! Absolutely delicious!! I LOVE it here and it’s only steps away from the Steveston Wharf on the Fraser River.
B&P Ice-Cream  for the win!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBerRVKejWaoM9Rr9d-lF_kCKBkEHWBP0ymQPN&fid=0x0:0x8fcc3373d1c1872a"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Shierly Yolanda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUF095OeEzpSqLbe7Rx8sJGnw-Qm4kHB3lenS6Vg0qNm0JBnwBl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"it's a cute ice cream shop with lots of flavors available. tried the chocolate one and it's really good, perfect for the vibe! (and it's super affordable too)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONjtaqjMkVFoJMSROKh6jmEtjLwTBpWuuUdWh-&fid=0x0:0x8fcc3373d1c1872a"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Megan Chui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFOVbSuhvJHqXtWZtQ5vHFBM7EKeYfxKHFdVsrm2NsUXBh4tSnuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has really good ice cream for really low prices! There is a lot of variety of ice cream and sorbetto flavors. I got a single ice cream scoop with a waffle cone for $4.50. Highly recommend this place if you are in Steveston.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNak-oMADiUzoRBl1noAJIEdYEmAKellpA2xgkX&fid=0x0:0x8fcc3373d1c1872a"],"When":"2023-1-3"},{"Name":"Hoang Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUA6JZv8oy7kLYHtzcsV_vlG50p6ak9xnr0WvXguFOqp_Bgm85M0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little ice cream shop near the harbour that also serves bubble tea. They were perfect answers to a hot day. The pistachio ice cream was very creamy and delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCCbNTWNhx5UYamgQW_sCIAGsSBrGUEJXlDSnR&fid=0x0:0x8fcc3373d1c1872a"],"When":"2023-7-17"},{"Name":"Vee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUueJodC1i2retDaMGr8pdA6W5hmb6gmxJg1KJ9-r-bSnZjtK1s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here after whale watching, and it was a perfect treat to top of a great day. My only regret is that my stomach can't fit the 25 different flavours I wanted to try! They literally have so, SO many flavours. And yes, you can find a lot of this ice-cream at other shops and parlours in Stevenson and BC in general, but most places don't have ALL of them.

And it was cheap too.

I haven't had "SuperKid" flavour (originally from Laura Secord, do they even exist anymore?) in about 20 years! So, that alone was a delight.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZaTgzECOY4C9JnLwXNS1l36qzg7XGOCBTE5JG&fid=0x0:0x8fcc3373d1c1872a"],"When":"2022-9-13"},{"Name":"Chelsy Moore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCZP_sUGLVga0ATwe7JLZYbdUu9Vb3_wj1FHw7dhDHq3Hd0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have been coming here for years. Great service and lots of flavours of Icecream which kids love!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Almost every flavor of ice cream you would ever crave is on their menu. It's like an all in one shop with ice cream, bubble waffles, bubble tea, shaved ice, etc. Like a dessert parlour. Staff are very kind and the prices are the most fair I have encountered for ice cream in Steveston. It has traditional corner-store community ice cream vibes. $2.50 for one large scoop of ice cream in cone and $4.00 for one scoop of Gelato.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7m1GtTyvPErnMBFV8zeqdH1No6h561IAcQpxo&fid=0x0:0x8fcc3373d1c1872a"],"When":"2021-3-7"},{"Name":"Paul Weber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0Tg08iiwZrhgfVdMW-6BHq6ix48wuIj46luLzlnhdvjd7Kw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This ice cream place is as simple as it gets. But i adore the people that run this place.  It can be well after closing time, and they'll open the window and serve us.  We have no intention on interrupting if they're in the middle of a close, but we, as a family, appreciate it.  And we'll always be a customer for life","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Wanita Mitchell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV29ii29D1W-wQKPr9WGtR1nXVOhQdKX9Wj6ZrhNRRpTPapJ25u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the onion and cheese scone and a slice of banana bread. The scone was a beautiful texture, moist and delicious. The banana bread was dense and moist just how I like it. The cafe is quaint and small. It is so clean. I will go back and I would absolutely recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOchnc4oVOitoFRAy4HBFcVy1J8b5ew4hBBRF4\u0026fid=0x0:0xcbfae4d642dc640a"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"George Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnH1TcSxr0gOFlJGC9BuOBXtMSstQevILgFkD1pJ9OP49rvDo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best bakeries in Richmond, it’s located in Steveston.  I’ve tried their scones and almond croissants, and also love their pistachio raspberry tart!  Friendly and inviting service always!  Thumbs up!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOg028nkYuasE3pCWXeTxcRclsrdtc_KmjeDqAu\u0026fid=0x0:0xcbfae4d642dc640a"],"When":"2023-5-10"},{"Name":"Stephanie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBV5KRG75WlxmWo1wuDhWSQhlZCOao4V2_9kFkOn0OqRNe45TP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"COVID protocols in place. One person taking your order and another getting your baked goods. We went almost around closing so there weren't many pastries left. Staff was super nice, quick and attentive. The lemon meringue tart was my favourite (also one of their more popular items). The lemon curd was nice and tart and the meringue helped cut through the tartness perfectly. The tart itself was the perfect texture as it broke with adequate force. Would order it again. The cheesecake was definitely outshone by the tart. The cheesecake was okay but not my favourite. Can't wait to go back and try their other goods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDpSNUNw46Y6nqUwzLay-0a2VzM245EhLRja3g\u0026fid=0x0:0xcbfae4d642dc640a"],"When":"2021-6-9"},{"Name":"Rahim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4wlgtmAJFCPZ0n_3Eyp_TfiUVd1vo8vP_cRZSDslqagrvFfLC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is really a sweet spot for the delicate sweet taste. Fine pastry is the way I would describe their pastries. It's a cozy shop so it's for to go only. Cheese smoked salmon croissant is one of the few tasty savory bakes. The peach danish and pecan bread are really good. Friendly staff and elegant presentation","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNELg3kskZKRvd8kNxkY6QtnEtmsXfZuBNyBpkM\u0026fid=0x0:0xcbfae4d642dc640a"],"When":"2022-3-16"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice bakery with both sweet and savory quality products. Tried their sun dried tomato, spinach, and feta quiche. It tasted very rich and good, but also a bit on the oily side. I guess its a once in a while treat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOW_Np2Mlfg7Sj-z6ALkt7MnltaWxJCryuKedrl\u0026fid=0x0:0xcbfae4d642dc640a"],"When":"2021-7-20"},{"Name":"Hillbillytc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV833YeKMKJfxtYeKhRHVRSrikZoFOcCapKBwyEFBOnxiCMeXAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The server was very attentive and knowledgeable. The sweets are amazing. They also have a few GF options","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBWfzOFr2gA5FG9jYKubr4dWTUSbGBbTqpiM3e\u0026fid=0x0:0xcbfae4d642dc640a"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"J D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK06enKeUKGLNE835udDYXGjgrx4d3GRW63oK66ZwU3c2BjXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very disappointed with the pavlova. This is the second time I advanced ordered and upon pick up, it was flat.\nThe bakery offered a 20% off for my next order but it's catastrophic when the pavlova is for a birthday and there's  no possible way to recover from this.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cecilia Rosell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwomk9hg14pcxT_1Pv82sThciTLOUVA0AIBBVtyCCEFbgnW0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The raspberry cake slices and the pistachio cheesecake were both amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAVUkIQstfyQeaAbFWhfHbIpPXQdAtFFFYEACS\u0026fid=0x0:0xcbfae4d642dc640a"],"When":"2024-7-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bonnie Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnEc4L_oX33x1BIdSnyu3qIy05RmcbQP1bJwBirlW_Yv38YSLczA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy but spacious coffee place for sunny Sunday n oldies car parade

Croissant, buns, coffee , cold chocolate coffee r all good. And  Pricey.
Cold Matcha coffee slightly lack of matcha taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFnxJxihGJm9rvsHdPJzbym3wQRFhGwIH5v57j&fid=0x0:0xcf8437e78b3600f1"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Globus Shipping","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVJruCDxd4AOYgZZPT5kX1vWeozoTz9juRG5gVhqImQF-fzw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Waves coffee is a gem in Steveston! From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with the rich aroma of freshly brewed coffee and a warm, inviting atmosphere. The coffee here is simply outstanding. Each cup is crafted with care, and you can taste the quality in every sip. They also offer a great selection of teas and refreshing cold brews for those looking for something different.
The staff are incredibly friendly and knowledgeable. They're always happy to recommend a new blend or help you find your perfect drink. Service is prompt, and you can tell they genuinely care about providing a great experience for every customer.
In addition to their amazing coffee, Waves has a mouthwatering assortment of pastries and light bites.
Overall, Waves has become my go-to spot for coffee in Steveston.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZnsHFENVstpEQTbRonnRhjjT6T2c3OZw0NofT&fid=0x0:0xcf8437e78b3600f1"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Carl D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxqgvP-5esfzYwpCbrSOhfpiA0OzcL_XFV6VQZPW3nT06lv3Ra=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is easily one of my favorite coffee places in the area.  I've tried them all.  The place is huge for one thing, plenty of seats.  I never had a problem finding one whether I'm by myself or with other people.  I always order my black coffee, its always fresh and balanced.  I frequently order some of the breakfast sandwiches, but my favorite is the breakfast bagel that has melted cheese together with bacon and egg and the chipotle sauce completes the flavour.  I've had the curry wrap as well.  I've always wanted to try the cheesecakes because they look appetizing but maybe next time.   I like that there are tons of choices from dessert to sandwiches.  I know that they are also fresh, not sitting in the food display for weeks. It becomes hard after a while.  Although the place is busy I've never seen a long line and I have always gotten my drink relatively quick.  The staff is friendly whenever I come.  This is my pet peeve whenever doing reviews.  I dedicate a star just for that purpose coming from the service industry myself. The ambient music is just right, unlike the Starbucks across the street blasting music you can’t have a conversation and there’s plenty of light coming in thru the huge glass windows.  Not to mention the best views overlooking the river.  I've had great conversations with regulars here.  On a nice weather like this I enjoy sitting outside soaking the sun.  I highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsTpODGnYlPg6Z8Md3WQvZye0DTo6QLXxmgQ1n&fid=0x0:0xcf8437e78b3600f1"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Transam Freight","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLowYxkD2uF-xtFe3bVpeQcbnbQxABBqXeWIbFtqtPkI3M6rQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The ambiance is inviting, with cozy seating arrangements perfect for both solo coffee contemplation and lively chats with friends. Whether you're looking for a quiet corner to work or a vibrant atmosphere to socialize, Waves coffee strikes the perfect balance.
Each cup is a testament to their commitment to quality.The baristas are not just experts in their craft; they're passionate about coffee, and it shows in every cup they serve.
Service here is also top-notch. The staff is friendly, attentive, and always willing to offer recommendations or customize your order to perfection. Their dedication to customer satisfaction truly sets them apart.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN29i9-0BdEkxGfcPjdoRzrurPG28kPZ7-J8jUI&fid=0x0:0xcf8437e78b3600f1"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Jay A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0RELLdGDmU4mUU2O4splg5RoL3yTJnShh825sqC7IizJnW3IrnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One best place to be in when you want hot Chocolate in steveston! Beats Starbucks! No offence. Went there with my family for the first time since about 3-4 years ago and the place stayed the same! Clean! Friendly staff, spacious, sinks are awesome, food is good! Went here for breakfast. This place is great for catch up, study, group collaborations, chill time. If only I live close by, I would keep going to this place! Keep it up team! Good job!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGikAxJ8kfR8E-yGt9jW52PG5e32JrGlOj5bxe&fid=0x0:0xcf8437e78b3600f1"],"When":"2023-4-14"},{"Name":"Jun Yuan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlk095JmqEu4LDk3bI8aly62G1_ZENwtgtJRj6NALfKxoJBNsH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great Coffee Shop with the excellent location and the beautiful ocean view beside the well-known Steveston Fisherman’s Wharf. The parking lot is just across the street and is surrounded by the many famous seafood restaurants and Public Fish Sales Float! The shop is spacious, clean, and well decorated! The price was affordable and reasonable with such tasty coffee! The best of it was the excellent customer service! The staff was very friendly, diligent, and caring! Edith was very kind and she made sure that the coffee was poured all full of the cup! Thank you! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP98d4MKy3JyrLPS0_xSR6056Duu9Vn7yCs_eXh&fid=0x0:0xcf8437e78b3600f1"],"When":"2022-11-9"},{"Name":"Edgar Ignacio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7oexz4qXoBKr6ujKuYxwMvlf16ckv-ovFMKFmC4nzUqeMSoelFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Waves Coffee House is my go-to spot for a perfect cup of coffee whenever I visit this area for stress relieving walk. The quality of their coffee is outstanding, with a wide selection of beverages to choose from. The baristas are friendly and skilled, always creating beautiful latte art on every drinks.

The atmosphere at Waves Coffee House is cozy and inviting, making it an ideal place to relax or catch up with friends. The seating is comfortable, and the background music adds to the overall ambiance. I appreciate that they offer free Wi-Fi, which makes it a great spot to get some work done while seated.

The pastries and snacks are delicious, and I love indulging in a tasty treat with my coffee. The prices are reasonable considering the quality and service you receive. Overall, I highly recommend Waves Coffee House for anyone looking for a great coffee experience in a welcoming environment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoSrYywLXPpFvZnK6DJ9ohkZCkTaW2Ct62zxQn&fid=0x0:0xcf8437e78b3600f1"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Jennifer Lockhart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgUYOA4C8aRVFH58DclgCF9l3zgJFpoAaU2AYBrCk5UYLfke1t=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Specificly came to waves for a iced chocolate, chocolate was barely melted so the milk was bland with chunks on the bottom.
My mom's latte was even worse though. First they forgot about it. Next they tried to put a shot of espresso in that had been sitting on the machine for over 5 minutes..... I called them out on it and she made a fresh shot, but tried to serve the expired shot to the next customer. Lastly, it wasn't even hot. They did end up make a new latte for her
I know they were busy, but there should still be standards.  Suggest watching them make your drink if you care about what your getting.
3 stars only because I have had good service here in the past.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Cindy Xu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkWnRcqRwVg_mpqM7f4VioaCJHawOmYOsqXy6htya5AhFjkbgY1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Daruma Market has good variety of snacks and drinks imported from Japan and offer discounts on some items. The cashier was polite🙂. I bought a Hokkaido snow butter pudding and Nissin chicken ramen, which I will take photos and post them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTeGFJ5ETbDCJ-tSLv7VlbFUvzB8Suc8ocDppe\u0026fid=0x0:0x6f51a38d16a373a5"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Paulina Pedrero Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoiOld2vaC2Dv18bWNi8EDRiykD7MSCRsU3RK7RESh6xQghXxb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good Japanese store in the area, is in the main street just in front of the cannery, the store is well assorted and they have great products, specially if you want something sweet, this place a lot of tasty options!, also you can buy Pokemon cards and more cute stuff of moomins and more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8TbGe4iEj5-E9ek8rvxTHnmtN2gKjB3wPZvMP\u0026fid=0x0:0x6f51a38d16a373a5"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Nelda S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAlVKkaYG17FdDhtN5KbclOTN6bK5-1xgRDAsLQ-OVZ7LJhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found my favourite jelly candy here! Happy customer! Store is complete with all the snacks. I will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOK9Z8OT9Iu49sU7VkkQfBlA06ZQ21NHot8Y7n5\u0026fid=0x0:0x6f51a38d16a373a5"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Amazing selection of authentic snacks and foods from Japan. They even sell authentic Hokkaido milk! It’s like walking into a Family Mart in Japan. The only downside is it’s a bit expensive. Wish they had Family Mart prices but they have to import it so I guess it’s the closest to Family Mart you can get in Canada.\n\nCan’t wait to try their hello kitty cheese next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMA5Ea3fLaFwvYSr5Gl8ZuYUBG6IK0h9d82fpe\u0026fid=0x0:0x6f51a38d16a373a5"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"mochi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFJ3YzQy4Ek7Uv6iuvuDDt8SDrpfRq8OqiVFgoo79K5l16GqzX4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small Japanese convenience store with good hours (10am-8pm). There is a wide array of hard-to-find Japanese snacks and a mini bakery section. Most of them are on the expensive side, but they do offer discounts on some products. Looking forward to what this shop has to offer in the future!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5MbSCBB_WgSE0upzGHxPI7GI3GB1yYqVpFeNs\u0026fid=0x0:0x6f51a38d16a373a5"],"When":"2023-11-18"},{"Name":"A.J. Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Daruma Japanese Market is a new store I have found in  Stevenson. A cute little Japanese products store found here in Richmond. Treats, candies, chocolates and drinks not available everywhere. A clean store and friendly staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNadnNxpLUye-HXB2uDjoQ63Y3QPdXiNfIHSKNo\u0026fid=0x0:0x6f51a38d16a373a5"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"San'wal Durrani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcSAqJ64WAL3acuGY13pgmkarGs0vPb4N4UbcaBqkWTy9FDa8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cool Japanese convenience store, should check it out if you're in Steveston village.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgF47sEEOF0jBE7KbngPRptFbxG6fGyqKv2T4R\u0026fid=0x0:0x6f51a38d16a373a5"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Happy Heart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzxNDbSKqtfYHxkSt0sGCFHw-pDCXZ21NYpof7TRuf3xeLpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lots of Japanese food and Disney toy to choose. The owner is very kind speaks 3 languages :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdZoQ7VBKzLPWct2UeQ4Jfzm5uiWy9SE8d7Rg1\u0026fid=0x0:0x6f51a38d16a373a5"],"When":"2024-11-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sandy Y. (CameraGourmet)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ9J8ig1HwUQBJbXRdKDIwR0OrTw3YtQtyHDEaRuCN8XnUDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Damien's Belgian Waffles Ltd is our go-to spot in Steveston Village. This hidden gem never fails to impress with its mouth-watering Belgian Liege Waffles.

Damien's waffles are so versatile and delicious that they make a perfect meal any time of day. Whether it's a leisurely brunch or a cozy dinner, these waffles never disappoint.

With various flavours, including my favourites like MATCHA, MILK CHOCOLATE, PLAIN, and YUZU WAFFLE, there's something for everyone's taste buds.

📝📝
Food:  🧇🧇🧇🧇🧇 Must Try!
Service:  Eatery
Kids: 👶👶👶👶 Yay!
Price: 💲 less than $30 (a bag of 8 waffles)
Presentation: 📷📷
Parking: 🚗 has limited parking for customers but there are street parking in the neighbourhood.
Tips:
📝 Keep an eye out for daily specials or seasonal flavours for a unique waffle experience 😍.
📝 Accept cash or debit cards only for your convenience. 📝 Before heading out, double-check their opening hours to ensure they align with your visit plans.
📝 For those with dietary restrictions, rest assured that Damien's offers egg-free waffles.  To enjoy them at their best, warm them up using a toaster oven rather than a microwave.
Would I Return: Yes 👱‍♀️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMjNIojixGRHurj6TDVKXiWPn-Q2f8khC-hI7d&fid=0x0:0x3d1c6a1cbaa11a65"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Andrei Dobos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7c6ivpksJD7HQD4JrpyxFVCoVJ5wH6hagNWFMwlpHlnxHMug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best waffles I’ve had…anywhere! Waffles are not my go to snack, but these ones are amazing.They’re moist, full of flavor and you have so many options to choose from. Whatever you pick, you can’t go wrong. We don’t come to Steveston  often, but whenever we do, we always get some waffles from this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzAzQo0AO5t8zXFUrworxh1u1mpaPWX8IU3asX&fid=0x0:0x3d1c6a1cbaa11a65"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"Andrew Pak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3jBu_5wHotII3xrMHEGhyF1D64F2LfU0bHCjaN09FK6SxZNKS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best dessert place in Richmond, hands down.

I usually come here on the weekend for their special desserts, but they quickly sell out, so I end up getting 6 delicious freshly-made Belgian waffles.

Philippe and Miho are super good at what they do and care about their craft. 🔥❤️🎉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrM24flZGBThfjKyd2uKaOfAu6jooeeCvqVnJg&fid=0x0:0x3d1c6a1cbaa11a65"],"When":"2023-9-3"},{"Name":"Iris Afonso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyQxuCASaHGuWnwdVUCm45CngH-74RHKED2aYQ-i7rsg2KG0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tasty Belgian style waffles lovingly made.

I ordered their all day breakfast waffle, comes with waffle of your choice, fresh fruit, whipped cream and coffee/tea/juice for less than $10. I chose their cinnamon waffle and it had the perfect amount of cinnamon flavor and sweetness. The waffle had a nice chew/bite to it. Highly recommended when in Steveston.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtd03fsRS7y-jaOKaCfFbxvtTKwqL7tZ_SajE&fid=0x0:0x3d1c6a1cbaa11a65"],"When":"2019-7-27"},{"Name":"ayc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGTClI1ufBF8pIZ_TKv4EESjmvv_Mjq76JOsf7DhB2kLAKkVo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice place to start a day with waffles and coffee. If you brain want something subtle sweetness, visit here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAbzt2xC3LTTnwVYgB3hLP2po8QJpSAccH6-Yp&fid=0x0:0x3d1c6a1cbaa11a65"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Séra Klein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsX2Wc9rwt6p1OFqqYfVPexVGfJIkNDIJIJ9g28niJxvEKTtY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The place is small and cute, and the staff are very friendly.
The only reason why I give 4 stars is because we were under the impression the waffles were made to order. The waffles are premade (in-house).
We had our waffles reheated here, and the dark chocolate one was still cold and soggy(?), but the yuzu one was a little warmer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqVlswsHB9Zz9411RbiXK6fHwpXW0fihiBbcCr&fid=0x0:0x3d1c6a1cbaa11a65"],"When":"2019-6-17"},{"Name":"Luc J.M Corijn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAZV0FcFxoLsG8VsOZMMWYIuZlM-WgvNexEZKPvz1qmqWKdA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming to Damien's since Philippe and Miho opened the place. Philippe's dedication to quality and authenticity is unparalleled. The bread is unbelievably tasteful and the waffles are simply the best.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeng keefer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlze1N1nZAHRXbP4w5EFlNgFzuCzAZnURpC3XNFltK9Tl7RxCE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"waffles were light and crispy with a perfect balance of sweetness. The toppings were fresh and added a delightful touch to the overall experience. I highly recommend giving Damien's a try, especially if you're a fan of Belgian waffles. Great service and atmosphere as well!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFRQ-sYYYSGuqJ25BgOXdWuT7nFDVkNOHSzgWo&fid=0x0:0x3d1c6a1cbaa11a65"],"When":"2023-1-29"}]
