user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Estairia Hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmDLygqZ3OT1WagVoz_S7MOF1DNcLc8uEquGumaFc59ZLDHz6l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My friend had heard good things about this place and looking at the menu it seemed this would be a great place to go. But all hype didn’t pan up to expectations. The gelato was good but I didn’t have it very flavourful, pretty bland actually. Same goes for the waffle bowl. Maybe it’s cuz I was expecting creamy ice cream kind of vibes but this place is gelato.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8MYHDjnqqtk0Zp2nrsNnVpONmmJT05_nCAGpq&fid=0x0:0xd3664d31b6dbeb28"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Linh Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbP3plInkqXVOA2XJc8czoQ80aWBGnT8WS-yMiUPgvNShtt-y90A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The shop is cute. The gelato texture was smooth, rich and great. I got hojicha & chocolate strawberry while my husband got matcha & London fog. I don't really know why but there's something still missing to call it excellent. Maybe they lack something bold, some characteristics in flavors. For example, they have espresso here but at Earnest icecream, they add the real coffee flakes, they have hazelnut here but Earnest has whiskey hazelnut and you can feel both the alcohol flavor and the nut texture, etc.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOI6mW7wj9D9nYDhKmEpfu4KeTJ1xHIIeqH2MpS&fid=0x0:0xd3664d31b6dbeb28"],"When":"2023-3-27"},{"Name":"This food","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaxcCslaGrcC0u202g67ni7XJGWWGyPYtSKkUjWo5gpcXXO0Yv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious ice flavours. I’m so glad we saw this ice cream shop as it had different flavours compared to the other competitors in the area. We tried the goat milk with nuts and the milk tea and we enjoyed both flavours. The cone was a little too thin and I’m a slow eater with ice cream so I found the cone softening up faster than I can eat it all. However very tasty ice cream and I would recommend the milk tea as it pairs perfectly with the cone. They do give a generous portion per scoop!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_FC5ncymtF_wMEC-4PFiB8bHmJZk60b3iUNfk&fid=0x0:0xd3664d31b6dbeb28"],"When":"2023-4-29"},{"Name":"Paulina Pedrero Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoiOld2vaC2Dv18bWNi8EDRiykD7MSCRsU3RK7RESh6xQghXxb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We really liked all the flavors we tasted, the expresso is terrific!, we ordered also the strawberry rose and the cereal milk!, everything was so tasty and creamy!, the staff was very gentle and friendly!, if you are looking for great quality gelato, this place is the one!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyzhX0Tf7HSZHe3fao17W66tw68LVbAkoRJjW6&fid=0x0:0xd3664d31b6dbeb28"],"When":"2024-1-29"},{"Name":"Ayesha Madan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqIyrGZPA7xeg37e5OJjMuIzB5GORWRDMC5Dlq3zHuGCJAb60XqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Holy hell the flavours here created a serious delimma. Picked the right one though. Charcuterie - Pecans and dates and goat cheese ,  A++ . Service was so sweet though, didn’t make me feel guilty at all about the thousand flavours I tried!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6oSh3r_fppSNT9xDwGWcwleClNwkWxnpUDtUk&fid=0x0:0xd3664d31b6dbeb28"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Erin Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNddZXBvjo1lM53d1JsGHCCAsJEWmjzWHaoOXhqaaioyHgIgaf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really cute small gelato shop. No dine-in, but it's a nice treat to have while walking around Steveston.

Ordered an espresso gelato, and miso caramel gelato in waffle cones. The espresso is strong and will likely satisfy any coffee lover. The miso caramel was tasty you can definitely taste the milky base, but I felt like it was lacking on the promise of miso; it's incredibly subtle so I only tasted the caramel majority of the time. It'd be a big plus if they could add more miso to the recipe next time as I felt it was missing that salty, umami kick.

The texture of the gelato was really nice and soft. The waffle cone is thinner than other waffle cones people may be used to, but i actually prefer it more wafer-y like how they did it here, and it had a really nice cinnamon flavour too.

Would definitely come back and try the other unique flavours that they have here. The charcuterie flavour caught my eye, but alas, I have but one stomach.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOo4G0Y_5M_Ikre0MyafIYlrvCm70d1mxremWjf&fid=0x0:0xd3664d31b6dbeb28"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Erica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiBiehVBMqDRcQQk3J28lEnqLVQ-p5tIOA0Zlj3wvs65IUmg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute new little gelato parlour in the heart of Steveston in Richmond. Very friendly and excellent service. Clean and pretty decor inside.

I had the HK Milk Tea:
It was very smooth and creamy, with a strong fragrant tea flavour. Sweetness level was great as well. I really enjoyed this because not many gelato/ice cream places can extract the tea flavour well from my experience. They use premium Avalon milk & cream for all their gelato creations.

I also sampled the Hojicha, London Fog, Miso Caramel (sort of like a salted caramel, it does not taste like miso soup at all) and Espresso. These were also very authentic tasting, and flavourful.

They also offer waffle cones / waffles cups (which were sold out when I went unfortunately), as well as pints.

Edit: I visited again and tried the waffle cones! Nice and crispy. Mango Yuzu Sorbetto was refreshing too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0oQo1b5YelYt9pn6Qd2DdPb6I5myMs42gJMFD&fid=0x0:0xd3664d31b6dbeb28"],"When":"2021-2-1"},{"Name":"J A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfkdfQeauhci2fiM6sKV54sjIzTjIlOCwi_-fbOALibQEmkI0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just discovered this place when browsing DoorDash for a sweet treat, and I’m super glad I decided to give it a try. I had a really hard time picking a pint because all the flavours sounded so good, but I settled on cereal milk. A hard one to nail, but also gives me a chance to try the base without too many mixins.

I was honestly very surprised. This is real gelato, and the flavour is unreal. Sooo milky and dense, it literally glides on your tongue as it melts. And the flavour is straight up Frosted Flakes. I’m a massive flavour snob (pastry chef of ~10yrs), and this hits it out of the park. The high price might seem off putting, but gelato is a lot less aerated than ice cream so there’s more packed in there. And you really taste the difference in small batch. I’m super excited to go back for other flavors, especially pistachio and London fog.

I also tried a couple of cookies to test out the pastries, and they were great. Definitely baked on the same day, they were still chewy and crisp. 15 seconds in the microwave made them taste like fresh out of the oven. I’m usually a few bites and I’m good kinda guy, but I ate both cookies and the entire pint in one sitting if that’s worth anything 😂👏🏻","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Small dessert cafe in Steveston Richmond mainly serving beverages, shaved ice, and croffles, and a few items of hot Korean food. Several tables of seating to enjoy your food and people watch. The small portion of shaved ice is really small (like a rice bowl), so I think it’s more worth it to get a large bowl of shaved ice to share instead of two small bowls. The shaved ice itself was ok with smooth ice and plenty of toppings. It’s good size if you only want a small shaved ice dessert for yourself and don’t want to feel overwhelmed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPk28le7UkB5cuvNbJVa_X8jY5XgyPPC_DLpn4T&fid=0x0:0x40fac413888f04d4"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Kerri K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAtOwWrwUuvakmzWvzNBffQvaRKFZIOXa_VQFwnU7jAkfUTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A charming hidden gem. I was on a stroll trying to decide what to eat and saw this new place that sold kimbap. I decided to try it (despite its specialty in bingsoo), and I was very pleased to find it was freshly made to order. It was delicious and well presented too.

Probably the best and most legitimate kimbap I’ve had in metro Vancouver. Staff was welcoming and kind","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2lX0QZM7oNsoHtDR2CaxPImMLmjh5W4Dms2Xa&fid=0x0:0x40fac413888f04d4"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Kimberly W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyEcFWm9KlF1A5qUr48_2k5NqNkBKB28_JBHp8Hk3SydvKzo4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stumbled upon this place and decided to try their mixed berries bingsoo and croffle. Their croffle was great, warm and crunchy and the whipped cream they put on top did not taste like the fake canned whipped cream.

Their bingsoo was also good, but not the best I’ve had. The ice was a bit wet and seemed sweetest at the top then lost its flavour at the bottom. The fruit was not sweet (but I guess it wasn’t peak berry season) but they gave you a decent amount which was nice. It was also a bit on the pricey side for $20, I’ve been to similar places where you get more toppings or better product for around the same price or less. Service was also quite slow as it took at least 15 minutes for us to get our food.

All in all I really liked their croffle but I’d go elsewhere for my bingsoo fix!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmAOJIxfFP6P32ZjF5IsNktR1_Dc6hkC_64Sd3&fid=0x0:0x40fac413888f04d4"],"When":"2024-5-11"}]
